观察力
Whether delivering information, opinions, perspectives, dissenting arguments or humorous asides, the human voice is typically open, natural, uncontrived.
无论是传递信息、意见、观察、争论、还是笑话，人类的声音都是开放的、自然的、未计划的。
My first PHD assignment is to observe and track a bird village.
我的第一个博士作业是观察并记录一个鸟类群落。
The surveyor\'s comments are based on facts.
这位观察员的评论是符合事实的。
In order to have an unbiased view, you need to take a global view of the matter.
想要得到公正的观点，你必须整体观察这件事。
The multiple lens will help the biologist observe the bacteria better.
多重滤镜能帮助生物学家更好的观察细菌。
Your job is to observe the fish and note their sleeping habits.
你的工作就是观察这些鱼，记录它们的睡眠习性。
Observe these pictures and tell me what the differences are.
观察这些图片，告诉我有什么不一样。
He could only observe and had no say in the matter.
他只是观察，对这件事没说什么。
There were plenty of tomentum on the cultivated LEC surface.
扫描电镜观察 LEC立体感强、细胞表面微绒毛丰富。
Rita is a lively observer of her world, and describes it with vivid insight.
Ruìtǎ shànyú guānchá zhōuwéi shìjiè，bìng néng jìnxíng shēngdòng ér shēnkè de miáoxiě。
瑞塔善于观察周围世界，并能进行生动而深刻的描写。
Observe the bees at work in the beehive.
Guānchá zài fēngxiāng zhōng gōngzuò de mìfēng。
观察在蜂箱中工作的蜜蜂。
He enjoyed to take his binoculars into the woods and go birding.
Tā xǐhuan dàizhe shuāngtǒng wàngyuǎnjìng dào sēnlín lǐ qù guānchá niǎo。
他喜欢带着双筒望远镜到森林里去观察鸟。
You can easily observe the birds when sitting in a duck blind.
Duǒzài hēi\'àn de yǐnbìchù，nǐ kěyǐ hěn róngyì de guānchá niǎolèi。
躲在黑暗的隐蔽处，你可以很容易地观察鸟类。
Aside from observation, my primary source of knowledge was my education.
Chúle shíjì guānchá yǐwài，wǒ de zhǔyào zhīshi láiyuán shì wǒ jiēshòu de jiàoyù。
除了实际观察以外，我的主要知识来源是我接受的教育。
Here are some slices viewed from the side aspect with the knee joint facing to the left.
Zhèli shì yìxiē cóng cèmiàn guānchá de cháo zuǒ xīguānjié de héngqiē tú。

There are errors in the correspondence between the model and the observed data.
Zài móxíng hé guānchá dào de shùjù de yízhìxìng fāngmiàn yǒuxiē cuòwù。
在模型和观察到的数据的一致性方面有些错误。
Counts were always performed by the same two independent observers.
Dú miǎo zǒngshì yóu liǎng míng gùdìng búbiàn de guāncháyuán dúlì de jìnxíng。
读秒总是由两名固定不变的观察员独立地进行。
Crater is best seen sometime between March and June.
Jù jué zuò zài sān yuè hé liù yuè zhījiān zuìhǎo guānchá。
巨爵座在3月和6月之间最好观察。
By observing plants, even wild grasses, you can see some hairs on the stem .
Tōngguò guānchá zhíwù，shènzhì yěcǎo，nǐ huì fāxiàn zài tāmen jīnggàn shàng huì yǒu yìxiē róngmáo。
通过观察植物，甚至野草，你会发现在它们茎干上会有一些茸毛。
His head jerked up in her direction then went back to studying the ground.
Tā tóu tái xiàng tā de fāngxiàng，jiēzhe yòu jìxù guānchá dìmiàn。
他头抬向她的方向，接着又继续观察地面。
Near the coast, watch for large wind changes due to sea breezes.

在海岸附近要注意观察由海风引起强风的变化。

几天以来他一直用望远镜在观察那片旷野。
The actual work was related to scientific observation and enquiry.

实际的工作跟科学观察和探究息息相关。
The household structure of this sample population had many similarities with that observed today.

试验人口的家庭结构和我们今天所观察的有许多相似之处。
The little snail showed me its horns when I observed it.

chákàn fēngxiàng 
watch which way the wind is blowing
察看现场
chákàn xiànchǎng 
inspect the scene
留职察看
liúzhí chákàn 
retain one\'s post on probation (as a disciplinary measure)
察看事故发生现场
chákàn shìgù fāshēngxiànchǎng

察看工地
chákàn gōngdì
inspect a building site

被警察带走的时候，他甚至没有面露惭色。
Bèi jǐngchá dàizǒu de shíhou，tā shènzhì méiyǒu miànlòu cánsè。
There wasn\'t even a look of shame on his face when he was taken away by the police.
这位英勇的人民警察惨遭歹徒的杀害。
Zhèwèi yīngyǒng de rénmín jǐngchá cǎnzāo dǎitú de shāhài。
This brave policeman was cruelly murdered by the scoundrels.
这次科学考察团的任务就是探测沙地下是否有石油。
Zhècì kēxué kǎochátuán de rènwù jiùshì tàncè shādìxia shìfǒu yǒu shíyóu。
The task of this scientific group is to explore whether there is oil under the ground.
每天晚上都有很多警察在全市的大街小巷进行查巡。
Měitiān wǎnshàng dōu yǒu hěnduō jǐngchá zài quánshì de dàjiē xiǎo xiàng jìnxíng cháxún。
Every night, many policemen patrol the streets and alleys of the city.
地质学家对塔克拉玛干沙漠进行了察勘。
Dìzhì xuéjiā duì Tǎkèlāmǎgānshāmò jìnxíng le chákān。
Geologists carried out a survey of the Takla Makan Desert.
他准备赶往事发地点察验虚实。
Tā zhǔnbèi gǎnwǎng shìfā dìdiǎn cháyàn xūshí。
He intended to go to the spot of the accident to find out the truth.
警察及时地击毙了持枪歹徒，确保了人质的安全。
Jǐngchá jíshí de jībì le chíqiāng dǎitú，quèbǎo le rénzhì de ānquán。
In time the police killed the gunmen, and secured the safety of the hostage.
警察叱令劫匪放下手中的枪。
Jǐngchá chìlìng jiéfěi fàngxià shǒu zhōng de qiāng。
Police yelled at the robbers, ordering them to put down their guns.
警察在毒贩出货的时候将他们抓获。
Jǐngchá zài dúfàn chūhuò de shíhou jiāng tāmen zhuāhuò。
The police arrested the drug dealers in the act.
警察一眼就识破了他们串谋作伪证的伎俩。
Jǐngchá yìyǎn jiù shípò le tāmen chuànmóu zuò wěizhèng de jìliǎng。
The police immediately saw through their trick of collaborating to give false testimony.
为了防止他们之间串气作假，局长决定亲自去视察。
Wèile fángzhǐ tāmen zhījiān chuànqì zuòjiǎ，júzhǎng juédìng qīnzì qù shìchá。
The head of the bureau decided to make a personal inspection visit so as to prevent them from colluding in counterfeiting.
他凑近了，仔细观察那朵花。
Tā còujìn le，zǐxì guānchá nà duǒ huā。
He got closer, and watched the flower carefully.
本次赴欧考察团由我带队。
Běn cì fù Ōu kǎochátuán yóu wǒ dàiduì.
I will lead the investigatory group to Europe this time.
巡逻的警察都佩戴了电警棍。
Xúnluó de jǐngchá dōu pèidài le diànjǐnggùn。
Patrolling policemen are all equipped with electric sticks.
我是一个督察警，每天都要上街巡逻。
Wǒ shì yígè dūchájǐng，měitiān dōuyào shàngjiē xúnluó。
I\'m a police inspector and I go patrolling every day in the streets.
警察一举查抄了这个赌点。
Jǐngchá yìjǔ cháchāo le zhège dǔdiǎn。
The police demolished the illegal gambling den during a raid.
警察没收了所有的赌资和赌具。
Jǐngchá mòshōu le suǒyǒu de dǔzī hé dǔjù。
The police confiscated all the gambling money and gambling equipment.
经过对断口的仔细观察，他们得出了钢梁断裂的原因。
Jīngguò duì duànkǒu de zǎixì guānchá，tāmen déchū le gāngliáng duànliè de yuányīn。
Through careful analysis of the fracture, they figured out why the steel pipe broke.
出访欧洲五国的考察团已于今日返抵北京。
Chūfǎng Ōuzhōu wǔguó de kǎochátuán yǐ yú jīnrì fǎndǐ Běijīng。
The delegation returned to Beijing after their visit to five European countries.
我们站在高岗上，俯察那片火红的高粱地。
Wǒmen zhànzài gāogǎng shàng，fǔchá nà piàn huǒhóng de gāoliángdì。
We stood on the high ridge, looking down on the flaming expanses of broomcorn.
政府官员要多多俯察民情。
Zhèngfǔ guānyuán yào duōduō fǔchá mínqíng。
Government officials should frequently examine the situation of the people.
我们要赴港澳台进行为期一个月的考察。
Wǒmen yào fù Gǎng Ào Tái jìnxíng wéiqī yígèyuè de kǎochá。
We are going to make a one-month inspection tour of Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan.
病人在隔离室里接受观察。
Bìngrén zài gélíshì lǐ jiēshòu guānchá。
The patient is being observed in the isolation ward.
你到镇子里的各处走走，体察一下民情。
Nǐ dào zhènzi lǐ de gè chù zǒuzǒu，tǐchá yíxià mínqíng。
Go everywhere around the town and find out what are going on with the people.
小偷故技重施，被守候在一旁的便衣警察抓了个正着。
Xiǎotōu gùjì chóngshī，bèi shǒuhòu zài yìpáng de biànyī jǐngchá zhuā le gè zhèngzháo。
When trying the same old trick, the thief was caught by the plainclothes policeman waiting at the side.
这篇文章出自著名政治观察家之手。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng chūzì zhùmíng zhèngzhì guānchájiā zhī shǒu。
This article was written by a political observer.
观察哨上的哨兵工作环境很艰苦。
Guāncháshào shàng de shàobīng gōngzuò huánjìng hěnjiānkǔ。
The working environment for guards at the observation post is very tough.
这次参加考察的官员临时就住于黄龙。
Zhècì cānjiā kǎochá de guānyuán línshí jiùzhù yú huánglóng。
The officers taking part in the survey this time lived temporarily in Huanglong.
在警察赶来前，他成功地毁证。
Zài jǐngchá gǎnlái qián，tā chénggōng de huǐzhèng。
He successfully destroyed the evidence before the police arrived.
我趴在窗户上，默默观察着城市中疾走的人群。
Wǒ pāzài chuānghu shàng，mòmò guānchá zhe chéngshì zhōng jízǒu de rénqún。
I bent over the window, silently watching the fleet-footed people in the city.
我满怀喜悦观察潭景，体会潭中鱼与游者相乐的佳趣。
Wǒ mǎnhuái xǐyuè guānchá tánjǐng，tǐhuì tán zhōng yú yǔ yóuzhě xiānglè de jiāqù。
I enjoyed the charming scene of the pool, where the fish and the swimmers were enjoying each other\'s company.
做一个合格的行侦人员一定要有敏锐的鉴察能力。
Zuò yígè hégé de xíngzhēn rényuán yídìng yào yǒu mǐnruì de jiànchá nénglì。
It requires acute vision to be a competent detective.
警察抓他时他非常后悔，但已是江心补漏，为时已晚。
Jǐngchá zhuā tā shí tā fēicháng hòuhuǐ，dàn yǐshì jiāngxīn bǔlòu，wéishí yǐwǎn。
He felt deeply regretful when he was arrested by the police, but it was too late for him to mend his ways.
交通岛上的警察正在指挥交通。
Jiāotōngdǎo shàng de jǐngchá zhèngzài zhǐhuī jiāotōng。
The policeman is commanding traffic on the traffic island.
交通警察正在突击检查违规车辆。
Jiāotōng jǐngchá zhèngzài tūjī jiǎnchá wéiguī chēliàng。
Traffic policemen are having a surprise inspection of cars that violate traffic regulations.
这张照片展现出了这位女警察娇柔的一面。
Zhèzhāng zhàopiàn zhǎnxiànchū le zhèwèi nǚjǐngchá jiāoróu de yí miàn。
This photo reveals the gentle side of the policewoman.
谁记住那位勇治歹徒的警察的警号了？
Shéi jìzhù nà wèi yǒngzhì dǎitú de jǐngchá de jǐnghào le？
Who can remember the police ID of the policeman who caught the gangster?
这位老警察的警龄已有30年。
Zhèwèi lǎojǐngchá de jǐnglíng yǐ yǒu sānshí nián。
This old policeman has worked as a policeman for 30 years.
他们从不背着纠察队干违纪的事。
Tāmen cóngbú bèi zhe jiūcháduì gàn wéijì de shì。
They never violate the rules behind the pickets\'back.
大堪布视察各地寺院时，受到了各寺院的欢迎。
Dà Kānbùshìchá gè dì sìyuàn shí，shòudào le gè sìyuàn de huānyíng。
The lama official paid an inspection visit to temples at various places and was warmly welcomed.
我校组织同学们去革命老区参观考察。
Wǒ xiào zǔzhī tóngxuémen qù gémìng lǎoqū cānguān kǎochá。
Our school organized students to visit and inspect the old revolutionary base.
警察在他们的老窝中发现了十几支手枪和几百发子弹。
Jǐngchá zài tāmen de lǎowō zhōng fāxiàn le shí jǐ zhī shǒuqiāng hé jǐ bǎi fā zǐdàn。
The police found more than ten guns, and several hundred bullets in their nest.
我哥哥是个雷达兵，他回家时我总缠着他给我讲雷达侦察的事情。
Wǒ gēge shì gè léidábīng，tā huíjiā shí wǒ zǒng chán zhe tā gěi wǒ jiǎng léidá zhēnchá de shìqing。
My elder brother is a radar man. Every time he goes home, I always importune him to tell me about stories of radar detection.
这个小偷已经是第5次被警察抓住了，真是累教不改。
Zhège xiǎotōu yǐjing shì dìwǔcì bèi jǐngchá zhuāzhù le，zhēnshì lěijiào bùgǎi。
This thief has been caught by the police five times. What a person who refuses to mend his ways, despite  repeated punishment.
我们这次准备得仓促，不足之处还望谅察。
Wǒmen zhècì zhǔnbèi de cāngcù，bùzú zhī chù háiwàng liàngchá。
We have made preparations too hurriedly this time. Please forgive us for our inconsiderate points.
为了更好地观察敌军的动静，我们在阵地上修起了一座瞭望台。
Wèile gènghǎo de guānchá díjūn de dòngjìng，wǒmen zài zhèndì shàng xiūqǐ le yízuò liàowàngtái。
In order to observe the enemies\' activities better, we built an observation platform on the battlefield.
我利用显微镜观察这朵花的裂片。
Wǒ lìyòng xiǎnwēijìng guānchá zhè duǒ huā de lièpiàn。
I am using microscope to observe the lobes of the flower.
我每年都要来到这里观察林相。
Wǒ měinián dōuyào láidào zhèlǐ guānchá lín xiàng。
I come here to observe the status of the forest every year.
警察一声喝斥，吓得犯罪分子落荒而逃。
Jǐngchá yìshēng hēchì，xià de fànzuìfènzǐ luòhuāng ér táo。
The criminals fled in panic after the shout of the police.
对于某些弊端，明察是无法发现的，所以只能暗访了。
Duìyú mǒuxiē bìduān，míngchá shì wúfǎ fāxiàn de，suǒyǐ zhǐnéng ànfǎng le。
Some malpractices, and evils can not be found by clear observation, so we had to investigate privately.
对于这场纠纷的谁是谁非，您一定要明察啊！
Duìyú zhèchǎng jiūfēng de shéi shì shéi fēi，nín yídìng yào míngchá a！
You should observe clearly the right, and wrong in this dispute.
刑警侦察员都有一双明锐的眼睛。
Xíngjǐng zhēncháyuán dōu yǒu yì shuāng míngruì de yǎnjīng。
All criminal police scouts have sharp eyes.
在警察赶到之前，他已经跟歹徒扭扯到了一起。
Zài jǐngchá gǎndào zhīqián，tā yǐjing gēn dǎitú niǔchědào le yìqǐ。
He scuffled with the gangster before the police arrived.
明天总店将派员考察各加盟店的销售情况。
Míngtiān zǒngdiàn jiāng pàiyuán kǎochá gè jiāméngdiàn de xiāoshòu qíngkuàng。
The head office will appoint some people to inspect the sales of all franchises.
干部下乡视察怎么能在村里吃偏饭呢？
Gànbùxiàxiāng shìchá zěnme néng zài cūn lǐ chī piānfàn ne？
How could the cadres enjoy special treatment and food, when they are going to the country to make an inspection?
野象在我们观察镜头内出现的频度很高。
Yě xiàng zài wǒmen guānchá jìngtóu nèi chūxiàn de píndù hěngāo。
The wild elephants appear frequently in our sights.
站在那条平交公路上的警察，是我儿时的伙伴。
Zhànzài nà tiáo píngjiāo gōnglù shàng de jǐngchá，shì wǒ érshí de huǒbàn。
The policeman standing at the crossroads is my childhood friend.
机智的警察在匪徒掏枪的瞬间将其扑倒，避免了伤亡。
Jīzhì de jǐngchá zài fěitú tāoqiāng de shùnjiān jiāng qí pūdǎo，bìmiǎn le shāngwáng。
The wise policeman threw himself at the gangster and knocked him down just as he was pulling out the gun, avoiding injuries and deaths.
昨天警察局门口竟发生了一起枪战。
Zuótiān jǐngchájú ménkǒu jìng fāshēng le yì qǐ qiāngzhàn。
There was a gun battle in front of the doorway of the police station yesterday.
尽管逃犯再三躲藏，最终还是被警察擒获。
Jìnguǎn táofàn zàisān duǒcáng，zuìzhōng háishi bèi jǐngchá qínhuò。
Though hiding again and again, the escaped criminal was eventually arrested by the police.
无论遇到什么困难，你都可以求助于人民警察。
Wúlùn yùdào shénme kùnnan，nǐ dōu kěyǐ qiúzhùyú rénmín jǐngchá。
You can turn to the people\'s police for help, no matter what kind of trouble you are in.
深夜，我们可以通过观察三星来推测时间。
Shēnyè，wǒmen kěyǐ tōngguò guānchá sānxīng lái tuīcè shíjiān。
Late at night, we can confer the time by observing the three stars.
还望法官明察，为我伸雪啊！
Hái wàng fǎguān míng chá，wéi wǒ shēn xuě a！
Mr. Judge, I hope you can investigate this thoroughly and correct my unfair conviction!
观察研究发现：猴群中也有世族等级制度。
Guānchá yánjiū fāxiàn：hóuqún zhōng yě yǒu shìzú děngjí zhìdù。
Observation and research show that there is a hierarchy even in monkey groups.
这几个犯罪分子还算老实，警察一到，他们就束手就擒了。
Zhè jǐgè fànzuìfènzǐ hái suàn lǎoshi，jǐngchá yídào，tāmen jiù shùshǒujiùqín le。
These criminals were somewhat docile. Once the policemen came, they allowed themselves to be seized without putting up a fight.
小偷每次偷盗前都会先去踏点，观察一下四周的情况再行动。
Xiǎotōu měi cì tōudào qián dōuhuì xiān qù tàdiǎn，guānchá yíxià sìzhōu de qíngkuàng zài xíngdòng。
Each time, before stealing, the thieves go about making observations.
小偷刚刚把钱包偷到手就被警察逮住了，真是螳螂捕蝉，黄雀在后呀！
Xiǎotōu gānggāng bǎ qiánbāo tōu dàoshǒu jiù bèi jǐngchá dǎizhù le，zhēnshì tángláng bǔchán，huángquè zàihòu ya！
No sooner had the thief stolen the wallet, than he was caught by the police. As the saying goes: coveting the gains ahead, unaware of danger behind.
你能从这个桯子观察出植物缺少哪种元素吗？
Nǐ néng cóng zhège tīngzi guānchá chū zhíwù quēshǎo nǎ zhǒng yuánsùma？
Can you see from its flora axis which element the plant is lacking?
这名警察因玩忽职守罪被判了刑。
Zhè míng jǐngchá yīn wánhū zhíshǒuzuì bèi pàn le xíng。
This policeman was punished for his dereliction of duty.
警察从他的旅行包里搜出了违禁品。
Jǐngchá cóng tā de lǚxíngbāo lǐ sōuchū le wéijìnpǐn。
The police have discovered out some contraband goods in his traveling bag.
习焉不察容易使人忽视一些常见错误。
Xíyān bùchá róngyì shǐ rén hūshì yìxiē chángjiàn cuòwù。
People are unware of the common mistakes once they are too accustomed to them.
经过侦察，警方认为小王是这个案子最大的嫌疑人。
Jīngguò zhēnchá，jǐngfāng rènwéi Xiǎo Wáng shì zhè gè ànzi zuìdà de xiányírén。
After investigation, the police are sure that Xiao Wang is the most likely suspect in the case.
这位穿便服的警察身手骁健。
Zhèwèi chuān biànfú de jǐngchá shēnshǒu xiāojiàn。
The police officer in his casual clothes is very brave.
小偷正为偷到手机而得意，却没想到斜刺里杀出两个警察。
Xiǎotōu zhèng wèi tōudào shǒujī ér déyì，què méi xiǎngdào xiécì lǐ shāchū liǎnggè jǐngchá。
The thief was feeling glad about stealing a mobile phone when he was caught by two policemen.
警校毕业后他就当了一名刑事警察。
Jǐngxiào bìyè hòu tā jiù dāng le yìmíng xíngshì jǐngchá。
He became a criminal policeman after graduating from the Police Academy.
经过刑警们几天几夜的紧张侦察，凶案已经破获。
Jīngguò xíngjǐngmen jǐtiān jǐ yè de jǐnzhāng zhēnchá，xiōngàn yǐjing pòhuò。
After several days and nights\' investigation by the criminal police, the murder case was uncovered.
警察正在调查小张凶死的原因。
Jǐngchá zhèngzài diàochá Xiǎo Zhāng xiōngsǐ de yuányīn。
The police are investigating the cause of Xiao Zhang\'s violent death.
警察在寻究事情的起因，大家都沉默。
Jǐngchá zài xún jiū shìqing de qǐyīn，dàjiā dōu chénmò。
When the police inquired about the cause of the matter, everyone remained silent.
你别寻事，告诉你警察就在附近。
Nǐ bié xúnshì，gàosù nǐ jǐngchá jiùzài fùjìn。
Do not look for trouble. The police are around.
在旧社会他做过巡捕，相当于现代的警察。
Zài jiù shèhuì tā zuòguò xúnbǔ，xiāngdāngyú xiàndài de jǐngchá。
What he did in the old society is something like the policeman at modern times.
你居然在警察眼皮底下偷东西，好大的胆子。
Nǐ jūrán zài jǐngchá yǎnpí dǐxià tōu dōngxi，hǎo dà de dǎnzi。
You\'re so audacious, you steal in front of the eyes of the police.
警察展开撒网式侦查，凶手无处隐遁。
Jǐngchá zhǎnkāi sāwǎngshì zhēnchá，xiōngshǒu wúchǔ yǐndùn。
The police are conducting a drag net investigation, so the murderer has no place to hide.
经过一年的预备期考察，他终于被批准转正了！
Jīngguò yìnián de yùbèiqī kǎochá，tā zhōng yú bèi pīzhǔn zhuǎnzhèng le！
After being examined for a probationary period of one year, he finally became an official member of the Communist Party.
侦察兵发现了敌人。
Zhēnchábīng fāxiàn le dírén。
The scout has found the enemy.
侦察员报告说，她已经离开北京了。
Zhēncháyuán bàogào shuō，tā yǐjing líkāi Běijīng le。
According to the scout, she has already left Beijing.
市长为了把投资工作搞好，特地让副市长去国外出专差考察。
Shìcháng wèi le bǎ tóuzī gōngzuò gǎohǎo，tèdì ràng fùshìzhǎng qù guówài chū zhuānchāi kǎochá。
In order to do a good job in investment, the mayor sent the vice-mayor abroad for a specialized inspection.
单位派出了超级钻井船进行远洋考察。
Dānwèi paichū le chāojí zuànjǐngchuán jìnxíng yuǎnyáng kǎochá。
The unit sent out a super oil rig for an ocean expedition.
他每天的工作就是站在操纵台上观察各种仪表。

我跟他磨了半天嘴皮子，也没能把他说服。

我没功夫跟他磨嘴皮子。

狞恶的嘴脸
níngwù de zuǐliǎn
ferocious features

I pouted my lips at him, hinting that he should speak first.

He was going to butt in when his mother darted a look of disapproval at him.
这女孩儿撇嘴要哭。
Zhè nǚháir piězuǐ yào kū。
The girl\'s mouth began to twitch; she was on the verge of tears.
他的嘴真贫。
Tā de zuǐ zhēn pín。
He is really too garrulous.
你不能凭他嘴上说的就算数。
Nǐ bùnéng píngtā zuǐ shàngshuō de jiù suànshù。
You can\'t take him at his word.
方案一公布，大家就七嘴八舌地议论开了。
Fāng\'àn yì gōngbù，dàjiā jiù qīzuǐbāshé de yìlùn kāi le。
The draft plan touched off a lively discussion the moment it was announced; everybody was eager to put in a word.
人们都围了上去，七嘴八舌，他不知听谁的好。
Rénmen dōu wéi le shàngqù，qīzuǐbāshé，tā bùzhī tīngshuí de hǎo。
People crowded round him, all talking at once, so that he didn\'t know who to listen to.
按次序发言，别抢嘴。
Àncìxù fāyán，bié qiǎngzuǐ。
We will take turns speaking, so don\'t all try to speak at once.
你嘴巧，你去说他准听。
Nǐ zuǐ qiǎo，nǐ qù shuō tā zhǔn tīng。
You\'re a clever talker and he\'ll listen to you if you try to persuade him.
她的嘴真损，老取笑人。
Tā de zuǐ zhēn sǔn，lǎo qǔxiào rén。
She has a really sharp tongue—always ridiculing people.
这句话很绕嘴。
Zhèjùhuà hěn ràozuǐ。
This sentence is a tongue twister.
小孩子抿了抿嘴唇，傻乎乎地笑了。
Xiǎoháizi mǐn le mǐn zuǐchún，shǎhūhū de xiào le。
The child puckered up her lips and began to smile innocently.
生就一张利嘴
shēng jiù yì zhāng lìzuǐ
have the gift of the gab
我一句话说漏了嘴，把事情捅出去了。
Wǒ yíjù huà shuōlòu le zuǐ，bǎ shìqing tǒng chūqù le。
I made a slip of the tongue and gave the show away.
你说破嘴他也不会听你的。
Nǐ shuōpò zuǐ tā yě bú huì tīng nǐ de。
He won\'t listen to you even if you talk yourself hoarse.
咱们谁也别说嘴。
Zanmen shéi yě bié shuōzuǐ。
Let\'s not have any boasting.
好跟人说嘴
hào gēn rén shuōzuǐ
like to quarrel with people
嘴太碎
zuǐ tài suì
talk too much; be a regular chatterbox
两句话能说完的事就别犯碎嘴子了。
Liǎng jù huà néng shuōwán de shì jiù bié fàn suìzuǐzi le。
Don\'t talk on and on (or jabber away) when you can say it in a few words.
舔舔嘴唇
tiǎntiɑn zuǐchún 
moisten one\'s lips with the tongue
用铅丝通烟嘴儿
yòngqiānsī tōngyānzuǐr 
poke a piece of wire through a cigarette holder to clean it
这个人嘴很紧，一点风也不透。
Zhègerén zuǐ hěn jǐn，yìdiǎn fēngyě bú tòu。
The man was closemouthed and didn\'t drop a hint.
他话到嘴边，却又吞咽下去了。
Tā huà dào zuǐ biān，què yòu tūnyàn xiàqù le。
He was on the point of saying something when he checked himself.
他的嘴有些歪扭。
Tā de zuǐ yǒuxiē wāiniǔ。
His mouth was a little twisted.
他的嘴唇翕动着，可已经说不出话来。
Tā de zuǐchún xīdòng zhe，kě yǐjing shuō bu chū huà lai。
He kept moving his lips but could not utter a word.
他的嘴很严。
Tā de zuǐ hěn yán。
He is tight-mouthed.
她的嘴严实着呢！
Tā de zuǐ yánshi zhe ne！
She has tight lips.
她那嘴可不严实。
Tā nà zuǐ kě bùyánshi。
She has a loose tongue.
他话到嘴边又咽了回去。
Tā huà dào zuǐbiān yòu yàn le huíqù。
He was on the point of saying something when he checked himself.
用嘴咬住绳子
yòngzuǐ yǎozhù shéngzi
grip the rope with one\'s teeth
这家伙嘴油得很。
Zhè jiāhuo zuǐ yóu de hěn。
That fellow has a very glib tongue.
他怨怪我多嘴。
Tā yuànɡuài wǒ duō zuǐ。
He blamed me for not keeping my mouth shut when I should.
与他这种人讲话，我还怕脏污了我的嘴呢。
Yǔ tā zhèzhǒng rén jiǎnghuà，wǒ hái pà zāngwū le wǒ de zuǐ ne。
By speaking to someone like him I shall only be fouling myself.
你这张嘴啊！
Nǐ zhè zhāng zuǐ ɑ! 
What a tongue you\'ve got!
他正要张嘴，一个年轻妇女抢先说了。
Tā zhèngyào zhāngzuǐ，yígè niánqīngfùnǚ qiǎngxiān shuō le。
He was on the point of saying something when a young woman started to speak.
我想找他帮忙，又不好意思张嘴。
Wǒ xiǎngzhǎo tā bāngmáng，yòu bùhǎoyìsi zhāngzuǐ。
I would have liked him to give me a hand, but found it embarrassing to ask.
老太太扯起东邻西舍的闲事，总是不住嘴。
Lǎotàitai chěqǐ dōnglínxīshè de xiánshì，zǒngshì bú zhùzuǐ。
The old woman would keep on and on gossiping about her neighbours.
她说着说着就走了嘴。
Tā shuō zhe shuō zhe jiù zǒu le zuǐ。
As she talked on and on, she blurted the secret out.
闭上嘴
bìshàngzuǐ 
keep one\'s mouth shut
嘴上说说而已
zuǐ shàngshuōshuo éryǐ 
pay lip service
茶壶嘴儿
cháhúzuǐr 
the spout of a teapot
瓶嘴儿
pínɡzuǐr 
the mouth of a bottle
张开嘴巴。
Zhāngkāi zuǐbɑ。
Open your mouth.
上(下)嘴唇
shàng（xià）zuǐchún
the upper (lower) lip
咬着嘴唇
yǎo zhe zuǐchún 
bite one\'s lips
这小姑娘嘴乖，挺逗人喜欢。
Zhè xiǎogūniangzuǐguāi，tǐngdòu rén xǐhuan。
What a dear little girl, talking so sweetly!
他这个人嘴尖，说的话真刺耳。
Tā zhège rén zuǐjiān，shuō de huà zhēn cì\'ěr。
He\'s sharp-tongued and what he says is often very biting.
别嘴尖了，给你什么你就吃什么。
Bié zuǐjiān le，gěi nǐ shénme nǐ jiù chī shénme。
Don\'t be so choosy. Take what you\'re given.
他嘴角叼着一支烟走了进来。
Tā zuǐjiǎo diāo zhe yìzhī yān zǒu le jìnlái。
He came in with a cigarette dangling from a corner of his mouth.
他脚底一滑，摔了个嘴啃泥。
Tā jiǎodǐ yì huá，shuāi le gè zuǐkěnní。
He slipped and fell on his face.
她嘴快，跟谁都会说。
Tā zuǐkuài，gēn shuí dōuhuì shuō。
She has a loose tongue and will tell everybody.
一副丑恶嘴脸！
yí fù chǒu\'è zuǐliǎn！
What a hideous face!
他那副嘴脸真难看。
Tā nà fù zuǐliǎn zhēn nánkàn。
He had a very nasty look on his face.
他那两片嘴皮子可能说了。
Tā nà liǎngpiàn zuǐpízi kě néngshuō le。
He has a ready tongue. or He can argue on any side of any question.
吃人嘴软。
Chī rén zuǐruǎn。 
A guest can\'t speak against his host.
性直嘴松
xìnɡ zhí zuǐ sōnɡ 
have a candid nature and a loose tongue
知道错了，就别嘴硬。
Zhīdào cuò le，jiù bié zuǐyìng。
You know you\'re wrong, so don\'t stubbornly insist that you aren\'t.
山嘴子
shānzuǐzi 
the tip of a foothill
左右开弓打人嘴巴
zuǒyòukāigōngdǎ rén zuǐba 
slap sb. on both cheeks
露出丑恶的嘴脸
lùchū chǒu\'è de zuǐliǎn
show one\'s ugly face; reveal one\'s hideous features
掌嘴
zhǎngzuǐ
slap sb.\'s face; box sb.\'s ears
打嘴巴
dǎ zuǐba
slap sb. in the face; box sb.\'s ears
他一见有好吃的东西就嘴馋。
tā yíjiàn yǒu hàochī de dōngxi jiù zuǐchán。
He will start drooling at the sight of good food.
他咧嘴哈哈大笑。
Tā liězuǐ hāhādàxiào。
冬天里冷风吹过，我的嘴唇裂开了。
Dōngtiānlǐ lĕngfēng chuīguò，wŏ de zuǐchún lièkāi le。
小狗喝水时，嘴里吧唧吧呶的。
Xiǎogǒu hēshuǐ shí，zuǐ lǐ bājī bānáo de。
The puppy makes a lot of noise when it drinks.
吃饭时，他一吧唧嘴，妈妈就说他。
Chīfàn shí，tā yì bājīzuǐ，māmā jiù shuō tā。
His mom would stop him every time he made noise while eating.
他在学校的时候有名地笨嘴拙舌，现在却变得伶牙俐齿。
Tā zài xuéxiào de shíhou yǒu míng de bènzuǐ zhuōshé，xiànzài què biàn de língyá lìchǐ。
He was famous for his clumsiness of speech, but now he is quite eloquent.
他知道自己说错了话，赶紧闭嘴了。
Tā zhīdào zìjǐ shuōcuò le huà，gǎnjǐn bìzuǐ le。
He realized that he had said something wrong, and checked himself immediately.
这句话不太好记，读起来有些别嘴。
Zhèjùhuà bú tài hǎojì，dú qǐlái yǒuxiē biézuǐ。
This sentence is difficult to read, not to mention to memorize.
光嘴上说努力，可你怎么就不动窝呢？
Guāng zuǐshàng shuō nǔlì，kě nǐ zěnme jiù búdòngwō ne?
You said you would work hard, but why don’t you put it into practice.
他回来就一把抓起香肠放到嘴里，好像个小馋猫。
Tā huílái jiù yìbǎ zhuāqǐ xiāngcháng fàng dào zuǐ lǐ，hǎo xiàng gè xiǎochánmāo。
He stuffed a sausage into his mouth the moment he got home, just like a little greedy cat.
她喜欢一边看电视一边吃零嘴。
Tā xǐhuan yìbiān kàn diànshì yìbiān chī língzuǐ。
She likes to snack while watching TV.
教育孩子要讲方法，抽嘴巴是解决不了问题的。
Jiàoyù háizi yào jiǎng fāngfǎ，chōu zuǐba shì jiějuébùliǎo wèntí de。
Slapping a child is not a good form of punishment, we should try to educate them instead.
你说这种话，就该打嘴！
Nǐ shuō zhèzhǒng huà，jiù gāi dǎzuǐ！
You deserve to be slapped for saying this!
在公共场合别打嘴仗。
Zài gōnggòng chǎnghé bié dǎ zuǐzhàng。
Don\'t quarrel in public.
光动嘴是不行的，一定要办实事。
Guāng dòngzuǐ shì bùxíng de，yídìng yào bàn shíshì。
All talk and no action doesn\'t work. We must do something.
现在咱们讨论一下正经事，你们别逗嘴了。
Xiànzài zánmen tǎolùn yíxià zhèngjingshì，nǐmen bié dòuzuǐ le。
Now let\'s get down to business, please stop quarreling.
我说得嘴都发干了，你到底是听明白了没有？
Wǒ shuō de zuǐ dōu fāgen le，nǐ dàodǐ shì tīng míngbai le méiyǒu?
Well, I\'ve exhausted myself talking. Now, do you understand?
他心脏不好，经常嘴唇发青。
Tā xīnzàng bùhǎo，jīngcháng zuǐchún fāqīng。
His lips turned blue when he was suffering from the heart attack.
这种清洗喷嘴利用液体的反作用力驱动。
Zhèzhǒng qīngxǐ pēnzuǐ lìyòng yètǐ de fǎnzuòyònglì qūdòng。
This cleaning spray head is driven by the counter-force of the liquid.
从现在起，我就该改嘴叫你弟妹了。
Cóng xiànzài qǐ，wǒ jiù gāi gǎizuǐ jiào nǐ dìmèi le。
I should call you sister-in-law from now on.
他干渴得嘴唇都裂了。
Tā gānkě de zuǐchún dōu liè le。
He\'s so thirsty that his lips are almost chapped.
他的嘴唇下长起了两个小疙疸。
Tā de zuǐchún xià zhǎngqǐ le liǎnggè xiǎogēdǎn。
There are two small swellings on his face below the lip.
他就是狗嘴里吐不出象牙，什么难听说什么。
Tā jiùshì gǒuzuǐ lǐ tǔ bùchū xiàng yá，shénme nántīng shuō shénme。
He always says the worst thing.  Well, what can you expect from a dog but a bark.
狐狸的眼睛骨碌碌地转着，想着怎么得到乌鸦嘴里的那块肉。
Húli de yǎnjīng gǔlùlù de zhuàn zhe，xiǎng zhe zěnme dédào wūyā zuǐ lǐ de nà kuài ròu。
With eyeballs rolling, the fox is thinking about how to get the piece of meat from the crow\'s mouth.
水还热着呢，小心烫嘴。
Shuǐ hái rè zhe ne，xiǎoxīn tàngzuǐ。
The water is still burning hot. Be careful not to be scalded.
我抽的是带过滤嘴的烟，这样不浪费烟丝。
Wǒ chōu de shì dài guòlǜzuǐ de yān，zhèyàng bú làngfèi yānsī。
I smoke filter-tipped cigarettes in order not to waste pipe tobacco.
冬天在室外，人们一说话，嘴边就出现一团团哈气。
Dōngtiān zài shìwài，rénmen yì shuōhuà，zuǐbiān jiù chūxiàn yìtuántuán hāqì。
During winter, bodies of air can be seen when people speak.
他嘴很甜，很会哄人，颇受老年人的欢迎。
Tā zuǐ hěntián，hěnhuì hǒngrén，pōshòu lǎoniánrén de huānyíng。
He has a honeyed mouth, and good at amusing people so he is very popular with old people.
胃病患者的秋季饮食应忌嘴保养。
Wèibìng huànzhě de qiūjì yǐnshí yīng jìzuǐ bǎoyǎng。
People with stomach illnesses should avoid certain foods in autumn.
这个顽皮的孩子，总是爱跟大人犟嘴。
Zhège wánpí de háizi，zǒngshì ài gēn dàrén jiàngzuǐ。
The naughty child likes to answer his parents back.
我把水送到他焦干的嘴边。
Wǒ bǎ shuǐ sòngdào tā jiāogān de zuǐbiān。
I offer him water to his parched mouth.
我还没说完，他就一撅嘴走开了。
Wǒ hái méi shuōwán，tā jiù yìjuēzuǐ zǒukāi le。
Before I had finished, he walked away pouted lips.
小明夸嘴说这次考试自己一定会得第一名。
Xiǎo Míng kuāzuǐ shuō zhècì kǎoshì zìjǐ yídìng huì dé dìyī míng。
Xiaoming boasts that he would get first place in the examination.
往日的一张利嘴今天却给他惹了大祸。
Wǎngrì de yìzhāng lìzuǐ jīntiān què gěi tā rě le dàhuò。
Today his usually gib tongue has brought him catastrophe.
这条牲口没带龙嘴，你小心它会乱吃东西。
Zhè tiáo shēngkǒu méi dài lóngzuǐ，nǐ xiǎoxīn tā huì luànchī dōngxi。
Be cautious. The draft animal doesn\'t have a muzzle, and may eat things randomly.
我家煤气灶的炉嘴儿该换一个了。
Wǒjiā méiqìzào de lúzuǐr gāi huàn yígè le。
The furnace mouth of my gas cooker should be replaced.
他好像嘴上抹了蜜糖，说出话来真好听。
Tā hǎo xiàng zuǐshàng mǒ le mìtáng，shuōchūhuàlái zhēn hǎotīng。
His words are so sweet that it seems he has honey in his mouth.
不知她男朋友在她耳边说了什么，逗得她抿嘴笑了。
Bùzhī tā nánpéngyou zài tā ěrbiān shuō le shénme，dòu de tā mǐnzuǐ xiào le。
Her boyfriend whispered something in her ear that made her compress her lips into a smile.
他总是贫嘴薄舌地挖苦人家，人家怎能高兴呢？
Tā zǒngshì pínzuǐ bóshé de wākǔ rénjia，rénjia zěnnéng gāoxìng ne？
He is always annoyingly garrulous and sharp-tongued towards everyone, how could anyone be happy?
这么点儿事你就唠叨个没完，真是个婆婆嘴！
Zhème diǎnr shì nǐ jiù làodāo gè méiwán，zhēnshì gè pópózuǐ！
You are really have such a long tongue, you don\'t stop nagging about such a trifle.
缺嘴并不是大缺陷，完全可以通过手术矫治。
Quēzuǐ bìng búshì dà quēxiàn，wánquán kěyǐ tōngguò shǒushù jiǎozhì。
A harelip is not a big defect, it can be remedied through an operation.
全家就这一个孩子，怎么舍得让他缺嘴呢？
Quánjiā jiù zhè yígè háizi，zěnme shědé ràng tā quēzuǐ ne？
There is only one child in this family, who is willing to let him to be unhappy with his snacks?
他只是嘴唇嚅动了两下，最终还是没说什么。
Tā zhǐshì zuǐchún rúdòng le liǎng xià，zuì zhōng háishi méi shuō shénme。
He just moved his lips, but he didn\'t say anything.
叔婆今年添了个小孙孙，高兴得整日合不拢嘴。
Shūpó jīnnián tiān legè xiǎosūnsūn，gāoxìng de zhěngrì hébùlǒng zuǐ。
Getting a little grandson this year, my husband\'s aunt is so happy that she smiled all day long.
这孩子挑嘴，从来不吃米饭。
Zhè háizi tiāozuǐ，cónglái bùchī mǐfàn。
The child is very choosy about what he eats, and doesn\'t like rice.
他是有名的铁嘴，你肯定辩论不过他。
Tā shì yǒumíng de tiězuǐ，nǐ kěndìng biànlùn búguò tā。
He has a silver tongue. I bet you will never beat him in debate.
新郎新娘站在门口迎接来宾，嘴里不断地重复着“同喜”。
Xīnláng xīnniáng zhànzài ménkǒu yíngjiē láibīn，zuǐ lǐ búduàn de chóngfù zhe “tóngxǐ”。
The bridegroom and his bride are standing at the gateway to welcome the guests, repeating &quot;The same to you&quot;.
他满嘴的牙石，也不知道去清理一下。
Tā mǎnzuǐ de yáshí，yě bùzhīdào qù qīnglǐ yíxià。
He doesn\'t go and clean his mouth, even though there is tartar in it.
药液顺着他的嘴角流下来。
Yàoyè shùn zhe tā de zuǐjiǎo liú xiàlái。
Liquid medicine runs down the corners of his mouth.
他是出了名的快嘴，说起话来特别扎耳朵。
Tā shì chū le míng de kuàizuǐ，shuōqǐhuàlái tèbié zhā ěrduo。
He is well known for his quick tongue, and always says sharp things.
他面对自己心爱的人，张嘴结舌不知所云。
Tā miànduì zìjǐ xīnài de rén，zhāngzuǐ jiéshé bùzhī suǒyún。
Facing his lover, he was tongue-tied and didn\'t know what he was talking about.
小孩在一起争嘴是很正常的。
Xiǎohái zài yìqǐ zhēngzuǐ shì hěn zhèngcháng de。
It is normal for children to quarrel with each other.
他的两个儿子经常争嘴。
Tā de liǎnggè érzi jīngcháng zhēngzuǐ。
His two sons are usually fighting for food.
人们常对孩子说：“大人说话，小孩儿别支嘴。”
Rénmen cháng duì háizi shuō：“dàrén shuōhuà，xiǎoháir bié zhīzuǐ。”
People usually say to children &quot;don\'t make suggestions while the grown-ups are talking&quot;.
看着他拙嘴笨舌的样子，她在旁边都干着急。
Kàn zhe tā zhuōzuǐ bènshé de yàngzi，tā zài pángbiān dōu gān zháojí。
Hearing his clumsy-tongued manner, she can do nothing but stand anxiously by his side.
小孩跑过来的时候嘴边还有几颗饭粒。
Xiǎohái pǎo guòlái de shíhou zuǐbiān háiyǒu jǐ kē fànlì。
The kid running over here has several rice grains around his mouth.
他从小就嘴刁，所以营养不良，瘦得像个猴子。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù zuǐdiāo，suǒyǐ yíngyǎng bùliáng，shòu de xiàng gè hóuzi。
He has been critical about food since he was little. Therefore, he is malnourished and as thin as a monkey.
大家都知道老板娘嘴刁，谁都不敢惹她。
Dàjiā dōu zhīdào lǎobǎnniáng zuǐdiāo，shuí dōu bùgǎn rě tā。
Everyone knows that the boss\'s wife is sharp-tongued, and no one dares provoke her.
小萃嘴损，所以单位没有派她去参加联欢活动。
Xiǎo Cuì zuǐsǔn，suǒyǐ dānwèi méiyǒu pài tā qù cānjiāliánhuān huódòng。

zhǎngzuǐ
slap sb.\'s face; box sb.\'s ears
掌嘴。
心直嘴快，藏不住话。
咱们谁也别说嘴。
Zanmen shéi yě bié shuōzuǐ。
Let\'s not have any boasting.
好跟人说嘴
hào gēn rén shuōzuǐ
like to quarrel with people
你说破嘴他也不会听你的。
Nǐ shuōpò zuǐ tā yě bú huì tīng nǐ de。
He won\'t listen to you even if you talk yourself hoarse.
我说得嘴都发干了，你到底是听明白了没有？
Wǒ shuō de zuǐ dōu fāgen le，nǐ dàodǐ shì tīng míngbai le méiyǒu?
Well, I\'ve exhausted myself talking. Now, do you understand?
冬天在室外，人们一说话，嘴边就出现一团团哈气。
Dōngtiān zài shìwài，rénmen yì shuōhuà，zuǐbiān jiù chūxiàn yìtuántuán hāqì。
During winter, bodies of air can be seen when people speak.
我一句话说漏了嘴，把事情捅出去了。
Wǒ yíjù huà shuōlòu le zuǐ，bǎ shìqing tǒng chūqù le。
I made a slip of the tongue and gave the show away.
小明夸嘴说这次考试自己一定会得第一名。
Xiǎo Míng kuāzuǐ shuō zhècì kǎoshì zìjǐ yídìng huì dé dìyī míng。
Xiaoming boasts that he would get first place in the examination.
他是出了名的快嘴，说起话来特别扎耳朵。
Tā shì chū le míng de kuàizuǐ，shuōqǐhuàlái tèbié zhā ěrduo。
He is well known for his quick tongue, and always says sharp things.
你不能凭他嘴上说的就算数。
Nǐ bùnéng píngtā zuǐ shàngshuō de jiù suànshù。
You can\'t take him at his word.
嘴上说说而已
zuǐ shàngshuōshuo éryǐ 
pay lip service
他这个人嘴尖，说的话真刺耳。
Tā zhège rén zuǐjiān，shuō de huà zhēn cì\'ěr。
He\'s sharp-tongued and what he says is often very biting.
光嘴上说努力，可你怎么就不动窝呢？
Guāng zuǐshàng shuō nǔlì，kě nǐ zěnme jiù búdòngwō ne?
You said you would work hard, but why don’t you put it into practice.
别人说话，你别插嘴。
Biérén shuōhuà，nǐ bié chāzuǐ。
You shouldn\'t interrupt when others are talking.
我嘴里不说，心里可高兴极啦。
Wǒ zuǐlǐ bùshuō，xīnlǐ kě gāoxìngjí la。
I said nothing, but felt extremely happy inside.
他嘴里不说，心里可是想着呢！
Tā zuǐlǐ bùshuō，xīnlǐ kěshì xiǎng zhe ne！
He wouldn\'t say it, but he sure was thinking it!
她说着说着就走了嘴。
Tā shuō zhe shuō zhe jiù zǒu le zuǐ。
As she talked on and on, she blurted the secret out.
他嘴头上说的要比他做的多。
Tā zuǐtóushàng shuō de yào bǐ tā zuò de duō。
He always talks more than he does.
我向他努努嘴，让他先说。
Wǒ xiàng tā nǔnǔ zuǐ，ràng tā xiān shuō。
I pouted my lips at him, hinting that he should speak first.
你嘴巧，你去说他准听。
Nǐ zuǐ qiǎo，nǐ qù shuō tā zhǔn tīng。
You\'re a clever talker and he\'ll listen to you if you try to persuade him.
吃饭时，他一吧唧嘴，妈妈就说他。
Chīfàn shí，tā yì bājīzuǐ，māmā jiù shuō tā。
His mom would stop him every time he made noise while eating.
我还没说完，他就一撅嘴走开了。
Wǒ hái méi shuōwán，tā jiù yìjuēzuǐ zǒukāi le。
Before I had finished, he walked away pouted lips.
他嘴里虽没明说，心里却有想法。
Tā zuǐ lǐ suī méi míngshuō，xīnlǐ què yǒu xiǎngfǎ。
He didn\'t say anything definitely, although he had ideas of his own.
他那两片嘴皮子可能说了。
Tā nà liǎngpiàn zuǐpízi kě néngshuō le。
He has a ready tongue. or He can argue on any side of any question.
他知道自己说错了话，赶紧闭嘴了。
Tā zhīdào zìjǐ shuōcuò le huà，gǎnjǐn bìzuǐ le。
He realized that he had said something wrong, and checked himself immediately.
你说这种话，就该打嘴！
Nǐ shuō zhèzhǒng huà，jiù gāi dǎzuǐ！
You deserve to be slapped for saying this!
人们常对孩子说：“大人说话，小孩儿别支嘴。”
Rénmen cháng duì háizi shuō：“dàrén shuōhuà，xiǎoháir bié zhīzuǐ。”
People usually say to children &quot;don\'t make suggestions while the grown-ups are talking&quot;.
两句话能说完的事就别犯碎嘴子了。
Liǎng jù huà néng shuōwán de shì jiù bié fàn suìzuǐzi le。
Don\'t talk on and on (or jabber away) when you can say it in a few words.
她嘴快，跟谁都会说。
Tā zuǐkuài，gēn shuí dōuhuì shuō。
She has a loose tongue and will tell everybody.
他好像嘴上抹了蜜糖，说出话来真好听。
Tā hǎo xiàng zuǐshàng mǒ le mìtáng，shuōchūhuàlái zhēn hǎotīng。
His words are so sweet that it seems he has honey in his mouth.
不知她男朋友在她耳边说了什么，逗得她抿嘴笑了。
Bùzhī tā nánpéngyou zài tā ěrbiān shuō le shénme，dòu de tā mǐnzuǐ xiào le。
Her boyfriend whispered something in her ear that made her compress her lips into a smile.
我跟他磨了半天嘴皮子，也没能把他说服。
Wǒ gēn tā mó le bàn tiān zuǐpízi，yě méi néngbǎ tā shuìfú。
I failed to bring him around though I talked myself hoarse.
他的嘴唇翕动着，可已经说不出话来。
Tā de zuǐchún xīdòng zhe，kě yǐjing shuō bu chū huà lai。
He kept moving his lips but could not utter a word.
小刚说起话来总给人一种油嘴滑舌的感觉。
Xiǎo Gāng shuōqǐhuàlái zǒng gěi rén yìzhǒng yóuzuǐhuáshé de gǎnjué。
Xiaogang always sounds like a gilb talker to others.
他正要张嘴，一个年轻妇女抢先说了。
Tā zhèngyào zhāngzuǐ，yígè niánqīngfùnǚ qiǎngxiān shuō le。
He was on the point of saying something when a young woman started to speak.
他就是狗嘴里吐不出象牙，什么难听说什么。
Tā jiùshì gǒuzuǐ lǐ tǔ bùchū xiàng yá，shénme nántīng shuō shénme。
He always says the worst thing.  Well, what can you expect from a dog but a bark.
他嘴里嘟嘟囔囔的，也不知道在说什么。
Tā zuǐ lǐ dūdu\'nāngnang de，yě bùzhīdào zài shuō shénme。
He was mumbling to himself and was barely intelligible.
他只是嘴唇嚅动了两下，最终还是没说什么。
Tā zhǐshì zuǐchún rúdòng le liǎng xià，zuì zhōng háishi méi shuō shénme。
He just moved his lips, but he didn\'t say anything.
他光会说嘴，一件实事也干不来。
一时情急，把话说走嘴了。
说走了嘴。
光凭嘴说不行，必须出证。
老太太是个婆婆嘴，说起话来没完没了。
说走了嘴。
他嘴上说得好听，暗地里却给人使绊子。
一看他撅嘴不说话的样子，就知道他又来拗劲了。
他吧嗒吧嗒嘴，没说什么
不住嘴地说。
我嘴笨，说不过你。
嘴里不说，心里有数
能说会道的利嘴。
急得他嚅动着嘴巴却说不出话来。
他嘴上没说什么，可心里老大不高兴。
他嘴上没说什么，可心里不大乐意。
别看他嘴上没说，心里却早有文章|
她嘴上不说，心里可是雪亮的。
有意见就说，不要光撅着嘴不作声。
说你两句，就撅嘴了。
人们七嘴八舌地说个不停。
昏迷了好几天，嘴里不断地说胡话。
这个人嘴松，一哄就说漏了馅儿。
大人说话，小孩子家别多嘴
嘴里哇啦哇啦说个不停。
大人说话时，小孩子不要抢嘴。
病人嘴里咕噜着，听不清是在说什么

要干，别光嘴说。
Most people thought he was too big for his boots only after he opened his mouth.
Dàbùfèn rén rènwéi， tā zhāngzuǐ shuōhuà shí， tài mùzhōng-wúrén。
大部分人认为，他张嘴说话时，太目中无人。
He loved her only in the abstract--not in person.
Tā zhǐshì zuǐshàng shuō ài tā，érfēi zhēn de shì nàyàng。
他只是嘴上说爱她，而非真的是那样。
Mark doesn\'t say much, he keeps his mouth shut!
Mǎkè yìzhí bìzhezuǐ，méiyǒu shuō tàiduō huà。
马克一直闭着嘴，没有说太多话。
a fast talker
油嘴滑舌的演说者
Her mouth closed after a moment and she said nothing.
Guòle yíhuìr，tā bìshàngle zuǐ，shénme yě méi shuō。
过了一会儿，她闭上了嘴，什么也没说。

Wǒ érzi chāzuǐ dǎduànle wǒ shuōhuà。
我儿子插嘴打断了我说话。

The mothers stoppered their babies\' mouths with pacifiers.

他是有名的铁嘴，你肯定辩论不过他。

多嘴多舌
duōzuǐduōshé
gossipy and meddlesome; long-tongued
要不是他多嘴，事情也不至于搞僵。
Yào búshì tā duōzuǐ，shìqing yě bú zhìyú gǎojiāng。

他怨怪我多嘴。

多嘴多舌

He kept moving his lips but could not utter a word.
他只是嘴唇嚅动了两下，最终还是没说什么。

这篇文章文笔显得有些蹇涩，可见作者的功力尚浅。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng wénbǐ xiǎnde yǒuxiē jiǎnsè，kějiàn zuòzhě de gōnglì shàngqiǎn。
The essay doesn\'t reads smoothly, which reveals that the author is far from being skilled in writing.
管道铺设已大抵完工，只剩些许接头儿处尚未完成。
Guǎndào pūshè yǐ dàdǐ wángōng，zhǐ shèng xiēxǔ jiētóurchù shàngwèi wánchéng。
The laying of pipelines has been completed, except for a few joints.
专家在考证今文《尚书》，因为其中有很多疑点。
Zhuānjiā zài kǎozhèng jīnwén《Shàngshū》，yīnwèi qí zhōng yǒu hěnduō yídiǎn。
The experts are researching the modern script version of shangshu, as there are many doubtful points.
这件事情尚无了期，如有变动我会立刻通知您的。
Zhèjiàn shìqing shàngwú liǎoqī，rú yǒu biàndòng wǒ huì lìkè tōngzhī nín de。
There is no definite ending date yet for this matter. If there is any change, I will notify you immediately.
他很时尚，总能最先发现今年的流行色。
Tā hěnshíshàng，zǒngnéng zuìxiān fāxiàn jīnnián de liúxíngsè。
He is fashionable and is always the first to know the fashionable colors of the year.
这一带经济落后，尚是一片蛮荒之地。
Zhè yídài jīngjì luòhòu，shàngshì yípiàn mánhuāng zhī dì。
This area is under-developed, it is an uncivilized region.
这孩子出生到现在尚不弥月，所以体质很差。
Zhè háizi chūshēng dào xiànzài shàngbùmíyuè，suǒyǐ tǐzhì hěnchà。
The baby is less than one month old, so he has a weak constitution.
到跑马场骑马，成了都市年轻人的时尚运动。
Dào pǎomǎchǎng qímǎ，chéng le dūshì niánqīngrén de shíshàng yùndòng。
Riding a horse on the racetrack is a fashionable sport loved by the young people in the city.
这个项目已经报批了，现在尚待审核。
Zhège xiàng mù yǐjing bàopī le，xiànzài shàngdài shěnhé。
The project has been reported to higher authorities, and is under approval now.
这部影片的票房收入尚可，观众的评价却一般。
Zhèbù yǐngpiàn de piàofáng shōurù shàngkě，guānzhòng de píngjià què yìbān。
Though the box-receipts of the film are quite high, the audience does not have a high opinion of it.
我还有很多工作尚未完成，看来晚上要加班了。
Wǒ háiyǒu hěnduō gōngzuò shàngwèi wánchéng，kànlái wǎnshàng yào jiābān le。
I have plenty of work to finish. It seems that I will work overtime tonight.
他为人慎独、品德高尚。
Tā wéirén shèndú、pǐndé gāoshàng。
He has lofty sentiments, observing morality even when he is alone.
实业家出钱办教育已经成为一种公益时尚。
Shíyèjiā chūqián bàn jiàoyù yǐjing chéngwéi yìzhǒng gōngyì shíshàng。
It has become a fashion in public welfare for businessmen to support education with money.
这部全书尚未完善，还有需要拾遗补缺的地方。
Zhèbù quánshū shàngwèi wánshàn，háiyǒu xūyào shíyí bǔquē de dìfāng。
This book is not complete yet, there is still much to be added.
势不可挡的时尚风潮对他好像毫无影响，他依然保持着自己朴素的特点。
Shìbùkědǎng de shíshàng fēngcháo duì tā hǎo xiàng háowú yǐngxiǎng，tā yīrán bǎochí zhe zìjǐ pǔsù de tèdiǎn。
Irresistible fashion trends don\'t seem to have any influence on him, he still keeps his simple style.
他得的这种病目前在我国还尚属首例。
Tā dé de zhèzhǒng bìng mùqián zài wǒguó hái shàngshǔ shǒulì。
His disease is the first case in our country.
我的家乡俗尚淳朴、风景秀丽。
Wǒ de jiāxiāng súshàng chúnpǔ、fēngjǐng xiùlì。
In my hometown, customs are simple, and the scenery is beautiful.
能为国争光对我而言是无尚的光荣。
Néng wèiguó zhēngguāng duì wǒ éryán shì wúshàng de guāngróng。
I am deeply honored to fight for the glory of our country.
过年燃焰火、放鞭炮已经成为当地的习尚。
Guònián rán yànhuǒ、fàng biānpào yǐjing chéngwéi dāngdì de xíshàng。
It is customary to set off firecrackers and fireworks during the Spring Festival.
比起时尚服装，他还是偏爱中装。
Bǐqǐ shíshàng fúzhuāng，tā háishi piān\'ài zhōngzhuāng。
He prefers traditional Chinese clothing to fashionable clothing.
他年龄尚小，羽毛未丰，看起来就是一副很稚气的样子。
Tā niánlíng shàngxiǎo，yǔmáo wèifēng，kànqǐlái jiùshì yífù hěn zhìqì de yàngzi。
He is still quite young and not mature enough. Judging from his appearance, people think he is quite childish.
高尚风格
gāoshàngfēnggé
refined manner
朋友之间应该礼尚往来。
Péngyou zhījiān yīnggāi lǐshàngwǎnglái.
Friends should treat each other the way they would like to be treated themselves.
现在下结论为还时尚早。
Xiànzài xià jiélùn wéi hái shíshàng zǎo。
It\'s still too early to jump to conclusions.
简单的对话他尚且都不懂，更何况难的了。
Jiǎndān de duìhuà tā shàngqiě dōu bùdǒng，gèng hékuàng nán de le。
He can\'t even understand simple conversations, let alone difficult ones.
宝宝尚且不会走路，更何况跑呢。
Bǎobǎo shàngqiě búhuì zǒulù，gèng hékuàng pǎo ne。
The baby can\'t even walk, let alone run.
除去花销，尚余千元。
Chúqù huāxiāo，shàng yú qiānyuán。

这几天大家都在日以继夜的赶任务。

These days, everyone is working day and night in order to finish the job on time.
夜以继日
夜以继日
夜以继日。
to do sth twenty-four-seven
夜以继日地做某事
She worked around the clock.
Tā yèyǐjìrì de gōngzuò。
她夜以继日地工作。

The delegates spoke one after another.
许多物种都在进化中相继消亡，但依然有一些物种瓜瓞绵延至今。

相继
xiāngjì
one after another

The boss felt regret, even distress, about the spate of resignations.

jìrèn shǒu xiàng

在绝大多数幸福的婚姻中，丈夫和妻子都会继续留些时间给对方，并互相理解。

在这种情况下，他们的任务是提供事实依据来澄清观点，而不是继续辩论。

如果还想继续讨论的话，请跟我联系。

继续做某事

His father and step-mother came to live with him for a time.
Tā fùqīn hé jìmǔ lái hé tā zhù shàng yí duàn shíjiān。
他父亲和继母来和他住上一段时间。
He inherited a huge chunk of land from his father.
Tā cóng tā de fùqīn shǒulǐ jìchéngle dàliàng de tǔdì。
他从他的父亲手里继承了大量的土地。
I inherited a castle from my French grandparents.
Wǒ cóng wǒ de Fǎguó zǔ fùmǔ nàlǐ jìchéngle yí zuò chéngbǎo。
我从我的法国祖父母那里继承了一座城堡。
Over the next two days, she continued to evade her father.
Zài jiēxiàlái de liǎng tiān lǐ，tā jìxù duǒbì zìjǐ de fùqīn。
在接下来的两天里，她继续躲避自己的父亲。
He was deprived of heritage because he refused to support his father.
由于他拒绝赡养父亲，所以他的继承权被剥夺了。
After his father died, his fee would be a manor.
父亲去世后,他将继承世袭的庄园。
The son succeeded to the estate on the death of his father.
Fùqīn qùshì hòu，tā de érzi jìchéngle tā de dìchǎn。
父亲去世后，他的儿子继承了他的地产。
The house came to him on the death of his father.
他父亲死后这所房子由他继承。
始而不解，继而恍然。
Shǐ\'ér bùjiě，jì\'ér huǎngrán。
At first I didn\'t catch on; then I suddenly saw the light.
他先是一愣，继而大笑。
Tā xiānshì yí lèng，jì\'ér dà xiào.
At first he was taken aback – then he burst out laughing.
始则刮风，继而下雪
先是开大会，继而分组讨论。
She was discovered at age 16 and went on to become a famous model.
她在16岁的时候被发现，继而成了一名著名的模特。
the rioting that followed the verdict
裁定后继之而来的暴乱
Don\'t give up, go ahead with your plans.
不要半途而废，继续你的计划。
Instead they continued to burn wood to light up their homes.
Tāmen fǎn\'ér hái jìxù yòng ránshāo de mùcái gěi jiālǐ zhàomíng。
他们反而还继续用燃烧的木材给家里照明。
Many people struggle on with their lives.
Xǔduō rén dōu zài wèi jìxù shēngcún ér zhēngzhá。
许多人都在为继续生存而挣扎。
In such cases, their function is to provide factual information to clarify points raised and not to carry argument.
在这种情况下，他们的任务是提供事实依据来澄清观点，而不是继续辩论。
A huge time waster is people who continue to argue about the election.
继续为选举而争论的人是最浪费时间的人。
She was very tired, nevertheless she kept on working.
她虽然很疲倦, 然而她却继续工作。
Instead of telling him to stop, the King asked the messenger to say on.
Guówáng méiyǒu ràng xìnshǐ tíng xiàlái，fǎn\'ér ràng tā jìxù shuō。
国王没有让信使停下来，反而让他继续说。
She\'s a rich woman in her own right rather than by inheritance.
Tā shì gè píng zìjǐ běnshi ér bú kào jìchéng yíchǎn chénggōng de fùpó。
她是个凭自己本事而不靠继承遗产成功的富婆。
His stepmother rejected his cry and went out for a walk.
他的继母不理他的哭叫，而出去散步了。
These figures will continue to increase with the rise in usage.
Zhèxiē shùzì jiāng jìxù suízhe lìyònglǜ de pānshēng ér shàngshēng。
这些数字将继续随着利用率的攀升而上升。
The two men, in broad daylight and in full view the enemy, made their way forward.
Zhè liǎnggè rén zài guāngtiānhuàrì zhīxià érqiě zài dírén de yǎnpídǐxià jìxù qiánxíng。
这两个人在光天化日之下而且在敌人的眼皮底下继续前行。
他坚信这门艺术自有来者承继。
Tā jiānxìn zhè mén yìshù zìyǒu láizhě chéngjì。
He is sure that future generations will inherit the art.
The researchers looked at a sample of 302 people who had inherited a house.
Yánjiūzhěmen guānzhùzhe bèi chōu xuǎnchūlái de de 302 wèi fángwū jìchéngzhě。
研究者们关注着被抽选出来的的302位房屋继承者。
He nominated David Rowland as his successor.
Tā rènmìng Dàwèi·Luólán wéi tā de jìchéngzhě。
他任命大卫·罗兰为他的继承者。
She finally picked her successor.
Tā zuìzhōng tiāoxuǎnle tā de jìchéngzhě。
她最终挑选了她的继承者。
Our successors...may be graver，more inured and equable men.
Wǒmen de jìchéngzhě … Kěyǐ shì gèng chénwěn、gèng jiānqiáng hé gèng wěndìng de rén。
我们的继承者…可以是更沉稳、更坚强和更稳定的人。
an heir presumptive
假定继承人(指有血统更近的亲属出生时即失去继承权者)
As the subsequent to the retired leader, he followed his predecessor\'s policy.

the sole heir

jìchéngxiānrén yíyè

Perry Mason solved the case of the missing heir.
Pèilǐ·Méisēn jiějuéle nàgE quēshǎo jìchéngrén de ànzi。

The crown prince was acknowledged as the true heir to the throne.

She was slated to be his successor.
Tā bèi xuǎndìngwéi tā de jìchéngrén。
她被选定为他的继承人。
You\'ve forfeited your right to name your successor.
Nǐ yǐjīng sàngshīle zhǐdìng jìchéngrén de quánlì。
你已经丧失了指定继承人的权利。
The estate devolved to an heir that everybody had assumed to be dead.

The young man fooled his inheritance away on partying.

Children born out of wedlock enjoy the same right of inheritance as children born in lawful wedlock.

bōduó jìchéngquán

Esau sold his birthright to Jacob for a mess of pottage.

In order to standardize inheritance by will, every country has formulated an inheritance act.

dāngrán jìchéngrén 
heir apparent

Fán shǔ wǒguó wénhuà yíchǎn zhōng yǒuyòng de dōngxi，dōu yīngdāng jìchéng。

jìchéng
inherit

Tā jiāng yú míngrì dēngjī，jìchéng dìwèi。
He will ascend the throne tomorrow and become the king.
他的儿子不想继承父业。
Tā de érzi bùxiǎng jìchéng fùyè。
His son doesn\'t want to succeed his father.

In regard to our ancestors\' old systems, we must inherit critically.

她唱的开篇既继承了传统，又有创新。

Her introductory song not only inherits tradition but also has its own innovations.
族里的老族长将我立嗣，继承他的族长之位。
Zú lǐ de lǎozúzhǎng jiāng wǒ lìsì，jìchéng tā de zúzhǎng zhī wèi。
The old Shaikh of the clan picked me to be his heir to succeed the sovereign of Shaikh.
李师傅的内画技艺，既继承了传统又有自己的创新，非常漂亮！
Lǐ shīfu de nèihuà jìyì，jì jìchéng le chuántǒng yòu yǒu zìjǐ de chuàngxīn，fēicháng piàoliàng！
Master Li has inherited traditional skills from his predecessors and innovates his own skills in inside-bottle painting, so his works are very beautiful.
继承了一大笔遗产后他就过上了奢糜的生活。

He began to lead a luxurious life after inheriting a large amount of property.
皇帝的嗣子急于继承皇位，竟然发动了叛乱。

The emperor\'s eldest son was so eager to take over the crown that he revolted.
你是我们家的一份子，当然有份继承遗产。
Nǐ shì wǒmen jiā de yífènzǐ，dāngrán yǒu fèn jìchéng yíchǎn。
You are a member of our family; of course you have the right to inherit the legacy.
他决定由家里的正出继承他所有的财产。
Tā juédìng yóu jiā lǐ de zhèngchū jìchéng tā suǒyǒu de cáichǎn。
He decided to let the child of his legal wife inherit all his property.
他的做派继承了先师的精髓。
Tā de zuòpài jìchéng le xiānshī de jīngsuǐ。
His acting carries on the spirit of his deceased master.
他委托律师办理财产继承的事，并签下了委托书。
Tā wěituō lǜshī bànlǐ cáichǎn jìchéng de shì，bìng qiān xià le wěituōshū。
He signed the letter of appointment to entrust his lawyer to handle the inheritance.

These days, everyone is working day and night in order to finish the job on time.
许多物种都在进化中相继消亡，但依然有一些物种瓜瓞绵延至今。
Xǔduō wùzhǒng dōu zài jìnhuà zhōng xiāngjì xiāowáng，dàn yīrán yǒu yìxiē wùzhǒng guādié miányán zhìjīn。
Many species died out during evolution, but there are still some of them in existence now.
前面是一片黑森森的树林，我们不要继续走了。
Qiánmiàn shì yípiàn hēisēnsēn de shùlín，wǒmen búyào jìxù zǒu le。
We\'d better stop since there is a dark and gloomy forest in front of us.
中国女子跳水队后继乏人的现象令人担忧。
Zhōngguó nǚzǐ tiàoshuǐduì hòujì fárén de xiàn xiàng lìngrén dānyōu。
It is very worrying that there is no heir on the Chinese Womens Diving Team.
这台机器的机时已经超标，不能再继续使用了。
Zhètái jīqì de jīshí yǐjing chāobiāo，bùnéng zài jìxù shǐyòng le。
This machine has passed its validity time, and shouldn\'t be used any more.
不能再继续稽延了，他的病情在快速恶化。
Bùnéng zài jìxù jīyán le，tā de bìngqíng zài kuàisù èhuà。
His disease is deteriorating rapidly. It needs prompt attention.
继配的离世让老人非常悲伤，经常暗自流泪。
Jìpèi de líshì ràng lǎorén fēicháng bēishāng，jīngcháng ànzì liúlèi。
The old man is very sad at his second wife\'s death, he often sheds tears when he is alone.
此诗的作者是明代著名文学家的继室。
Cǐshī de zuòzhě shì Míngdài zhùmíng wénxuéjiā de jìshì。
The author of this poem is the second wife of a famous writer in the Ming Dynasty.
为发扬光大民族手工业，王先生继武家族事业。
Wèi fāyáng guāngdà mínzú shǒugōngyè，Wáng xiānshēng jìwǔ jiāzú shìyè。
In order to bring our national handicraft industry to a great height of development, Mr. Wang went on doing his family business.
他是社会未来一代应当敬仰和为之继业的榜样。
Tā shì shèhuì wèilái yídài yīngdāng jìngyǎng hé wéizhī jìyè de bǎngyàng。
He is an example for our society of what should be honored and continued in the future.
老人的两个继子女对他很孝顺。
Lǎorén de liǎnggè jìzǐnǚ duì tā hěnxiàoshùn。
This aged man\'s two step-children treat him very well.
王先生的继子女对他现在的太太不太友善。
Wáng xiānshēng de jìzǐnǚ duì tā xiànzài de tàitài bú tài yǒushàn。
Mr. Wang\'s children by his first wife are not kind to his present wife.
我们一定要继续战斗，争取把敌人全部剪灭。
Wǒmen yídìng yào jìxù zhàndòu，zhēngqǔ bǎ dírén quánbùjiǎnmiè。
We are determined to go on with the battle until we have annihilated the enemy.
在路上碰到熟人，见礼后我继续骑车赶往天津。
Zài lùshàng pèngdào shúrén，jiànlǐ hòu wǒ jìxù qíchē gǎnwǎng Tiānjīn。
On my way to Tianjin, I came across an acquaintance. We greeted each other, and then I went on riding.
老祖宗留下的旧物我们应当批判地继承。
Lǎozǔzōng liúxià de jiùwù wǒmen yīngdāng pīpàn de jìchéng。
In regard to our ancestors\' old systems, we must inherit critically.
最终他们只好拍卖了这份没有继承人的绝产。
Zuì zhōng tāmen zhǐhǎo pāimài le zhèfèn méiyǒu jìchéngrén de juéchǎn。
Finally they had no choice but to auction the inheritance that had no-one to inherit it.
她唱的开篇既继承了传统，又有创新。
Tā chàng de kāipiān jì jìchéng le chuántǒng，yòu yǒu chuàngxīn。
Her introductory song not only inherits tradition but also has its own innovations.
他坚信这门艺术自有来者承继。
Tā jiānxìn zhè mén yìshù zìyǒu láizhě chéngjì。
He is sure that future generations will inherit the art.
族里的老族长将我立嗣，继承他的族长之位。
Zú lǐ de lǎozúzhǎng jiāng wǒ lìsì，jìchéng tā de zúzhǎng zhī wèi。
The old Shaikh of the clan picked me to be his heir to succeed the sovereign of Shaikh.
他经常找一些励志故事来激励我们继续努力。
Tā jīngcháng zhǎo yìxiē lìzhì gùshì lái jīlì wǒmen jìxù nǔlì。
He often found some inspiring stories to encourage us to continue making great efforts.
这批溜槽的质量不过关，还得继续改造。
Zhè pī liūcáo de zhìliàng bú guòguān，hái děi jìxù gǎizào。
This batch of chutes is of poor quality and should be improved.
古代的官员满服后可以继续出来为官。
Gǔdài de guānyuán mǎnfú hòu kěyǐ jìxù chūlái wéiguān。
In ancient China, after reaching the end of the mourning period for his deceased parent, an official could continue his post.
经过检验这些都是米猪，不能继续出售了。
Jīngguò jiǎnyàn zhèxiē dōushì mǐzhū，bùnéng jìxù chūshòu le。
After examination, these pigs are all infested with cysticercus , and can no longer be sold.
李师傅的内画技艺，既继承了传统又有自己的创新，非常漂亮！
Lǐ shīfu de nèihuà jìyì，jì jìchéng le chuántǒng yòu yǒu zìjǐ de chuàngxīn，fēicháng piàoliàng！
Master Li has inherited traditional skills from his predecessors and innovates his own skills in inside-bottle painting, so his works are very beautiful.
老师的鼓励给了我继续前行的动力。
Lǎoshī de gǔlì gěi le wǒ jìxù qiánxíng de dònglì。
The teacher\'s words of encouragement drive me to continue moving forward.
队伍里的伤号太多了，不能继续作战了。
Duìwǔ lǐ de shānghào tài duō le，bùnéng jìxù zuòzhàn le。
Too many soldiers are wounded; we can not continue the war.
继承了一大笔遗产后他就过上了奢糜的生活。
Jìchéng le yí dàbǐ yíchǎn hòu tā jiù guòshàng le shēmí de shēnghuó。
He began to lead a luxurious life after inheriting a large amount of property.
你这样说实属无理取闹，我拒绝和你继续谈下去。
Nǐ zhèyàng shuō shíshǔ wúlǐ qǔnào，wǒ jùjué hé nǐ jìxù tán xiàqù。
You are making trouble out of nothing, so I refuse to go on talking to you.
睡眠疗法对于他的病很有效，医生决定继续用这种方法对他进行治疗。
Shuìmián liáofǎ duìyú tā de bìng hěnyǒuxiào，yīshēng juédìng jìxù yòng zhèzhǒng fāngfǎ duì tā jìnxíng zhìliáo。
Sleep treatment is very effective for his disease, so the doctor decided to go on using it to treat him.
皇帝的嗣子急于继承皇位，竟然发动了叛乱。
Huángdì de sìzǐ jíyú jìchéng huángwèi，jìngrán fādòng le pànluàn。
The emperor\'s eldest son was so eager to take over the crown that he revolted.
我没儿子，就从大哥家过继了一个嗣子。
Wǒ méi érzi，jiù cóng dàgē jiā guòjì le yígè sìzǐ。
I haven\'t got a son, so I adopted one from my eldest brother.
承蒙抬爱，我将继续努力，争取取得更大的成绩。
Chéngméng tái\'ài，wǒ jiāng jìxù nǔlì，zhēngqǔ qǔdé gèngdà de chéngjì。
With your care and support, I will continue to work hard so as to achieve more.
如果大家继续窝里斗，那么这公司早晚是要倒闭的。
Rúguǒ dàjiā jìxù wōlǐdòu，nàme zhè gōngsī zǎowǎn shì yào dǎobì de。
If we continue this internal fighting, the company will close down sooner or later.
康熙一继位即命人修史。
Kāngxī yí jìwèi jí mìngrén xiūshǐ.
Kang Xi ordered people to compile historical books the moment he succeeded to the throne.
皇帝在遗诏中指明要第二个儿子继位。
Huángdì zài yízhào zhōng zhǐmíng yào dìèr gè érzi jìwèi。
In the edict, the dying emperor designated his second son to ascend to the throne.
小张失业后母亲又得了重病，生活得饔飧不继。
Xiǎo Zhāng shīyè hòu mǔqīn yòu dé le zhòngbìng，shēnghuó de yōngsūn bújì。
Xiaozhao lost his job, then his mother was seriously ill; what a hard life it is for them.
你是我们家的一份子，当然有份继承遗产。
Nǐ shì wǒmen jiā de yífènzǐ，dāngrán yǒu fèn jìchéng yíchǎn。
You are a member of our family; of course you have the right to inherit the legacy.
飞行器穿过云际，继续上升。
Fēixíngqì chuānguò yúnjì，jìxù shàngshēng。
The aircraft flies through the clouds and continues to ascend.
他决定由家里的正出继承他所有的财产。
Tā juédìng yóu jiā lǐ de zhèngchū jìchéng tā suǒyǒu de cáichǎn。
He decided to let the child of his legal wife inherit all his property.
由于网络的中继线出了问题，造成数据通信不畅，技术人员正在抢修。
Yóuyú wǎngluò de zhōng jìxiàn chū le wèntí，zàochéng shùjù tōngxìn búchàng，jìshù rényuán zhèngzài qiǎngxiū。
As there is something wrong with the trunk line of the network, the transmission of data is blocked. The technical staff is urgently repairing it.
他的做派继承了先师的精髓。
Tā de zuòpài jìchéng le xiānshī de jīngsuǐ。
His acting carries on the spirit of his deceased master.
法官宣布退庭，明天继续审理此案。
Fǎguān xuānbù tuìtíng，míngtiān jìxù shěnlǐ cǐ\'àn。
The judge announced a retirement from the court, and decided to hear the case tomorrow.
他委托律师办理财产继承的事，并签下了委托书。
Tā wěituō lǜshī bànlǐ cáichǎn jìchéng de shì，bìng qiān xià le wěituōshū。
He signed the letter of appointment to entrust his lawyer to handle the inheritance.

jìchéng
be a successor to
我们大家必须继续努力。
Wǒmen dàjiā bìxū jìxùnǔlì。
We must all keep on trying.

Fùqīn bōduóle wǒde jìchéngquán。
My father deprived me of my inheritance.
法定继承权
fǎdìngjìchéngquán
legal right of inheritance
他从小就过继给了他的叔叔。
Tā cóngxiǎo jiù guòjì gěile tāde shūshu。
He was adopted by his uncle when he was little.

jìrèn
succeed to a post

xiāngjì

Tā xiānshì yí lèng，jì\'ér dà xiào.
At first he was taken aback – then he burst out laughing.
你们要继续努力。
Nǐmen yào jìxù nǔlì.
You must continue to work hard.
我们继续昨天的话题接着谈。
Wǒmen jìxù zuótiān de huàtí jiēzhe tán.
We\'ll continue with the topic we discussed yesterday.

Shēntǐ quányù hòu，tā jìxù gōngzuò.
After he recovered he went back to work.

Wǒmen jìxù wǎngxià dú.
Let\'s read on.
少时雷雨停了，探险队又继续赶路。
Shǎoshí léiyǔ tíngle，tànxiǎnduì yòu jìxù gǎnlù。
Before long the storm stopped and the exploration team continued on its way.
对职员们的相继辞职，老板感到遗憾甚至痛苦。
Duì zhíyuánmen de xiāngjì cízhí，lǎobǎn gǎndào yíhàn shènzhì tòngkǔ。
The boss felt regret, even distress, about the spate of resignations.
去年，他的爷爷、奶奶相继去世了。
Qùnián，tā de yéye 、 nǎinai xiāngjì qùshìle。
Last year his grandfather and grandmother died one after the other.
加固堤坝的工程夜以继日地进行着。
Jiāgù dībà de gōngchéng yèyǐjìrì de jìnxíngzhe。
Work on reinforcing the dam continued day and night.
让我们继承先烈遗志继续前进。

an heir presumptive
假定继承人(指有血统更近的亲属出生时即失去继承权者)
As the subsequent to the retired leader, he followed his predecessor\'s policy.
作为这位退休领导的后继者，他继承了前任的政策。
The manor was entailed on Lucy, the only heiress alive.
Zhuāngyuán yóu wéiyī zàishì de nǚ jìchéngrén Lùxī jìchéng。

fire away
【口语】开始(讲话或提问)(常用于祈使句)；继续开枪(或发炮)
The house came to him on the death of his father.
他父亲死后这所房子由他继承。
to hold a course

She sang on.
她继续唱下去。
If you keep working like this, there\'s no doubt you\'ll get ahead.
继续这样工作的话，你就一定会取得成功的。
He became king when he was still very young.
他年幼时就继承王位了。

她说在一个意味深长的停顿之后，委员们才继续处理其他问题。

他沉默了一下，然后才继续讲话。
He continued his progress around the earth.
他继续自己的环球旅行。
Many zoos around the world continue to seek pandas from China.

你觉得自己会满足于当个第二名，还是会继续努力去获得第一名？
She continued to stare at his head.
她继续盯着他的头。
The boss continues to operate the company even after most of the employees have been on strike.
很多雇员都罢工了，但老板还是让公司继续运营。
If she gets any worse, we must call the doctor.
如果她的病情继续恶化，我们必须得叫个医生了。
To keep going you have to jump across the stream.
要继续走就得跨过小溪。
They didn\'t like the look of the restaurant and preferred to keep looking.
他们不看好那家酒店的外观，想再继续找找看。
If you don\'t have an ear for a meter, carry on writing free verse or prose.
如果你对韵律不敏感的话，那就继续写自由体诗或散文吧。
He continues against reason to lend money to his friends.
他还是那么不明智，竟然继续借钱给自己的朋友。
I can\'t keep studying on a empty stomach.
我不能饿着肚子继续学习。
Don\'t give up, go ahead with your plans.
不要半途而废，继续你的计划。
If you go on calling him you\'ll run up a huge telephone bill.
如果你继续给他打电话，你的电话费用将会激增。
You have to bury your last love story, and all the hatred it left you, and go on with your life.
你必须忘记上一段感情以及它留给你的怨恨，然后继续你的生活。
She\'ll continue to take French lessons next semester.
她下个学期会继续修法语课。
Now we can continue with our homework.
现在我们可以继续做作业了。
If she keeps working so hard, soon she will become the director of the marketing department.
如果继续这样努力工作，她不久就会成为市场部的经理。

如果她继续发球失误，不久就会被淘汰出局。
I am going further down the river to look for food.
我会继续沿河寻找食物。
I won\'t let him block your talent. You have to go on studying piano.
你继续学钢琴吧，我不会让他埋没你的天份的。
The investigation was at a standstill, but now we have lot of chances to continue it.
调查一度中断，但是现在有很多契机，可以让调查继续下去。
A leg bye is scored when the ball hits the batsman but doesn\'t contact his bat and then proceeds to run.
触身得分是指球击中击球员的身体，但是没有碰到他的球棒，然后球继续滚动。
Youth leaders carry on campaign for small schools.
青年领袖为了缩小学校规模继续开展运动。

从这个论据推出一个合理的结论，我们就会发现继续投资不是一个好主意。
In such cases, their function is to provide factual information to clarify points raised and not to carry argument.
在这种情况下，他们的任务是提供事实依据来澄清观点，而不是继续辩论。
Contact me if you need to carry the discussion forward.
如果还想继续讨论的话，请跟我联系。
Although in this case he carries the bitter joke too far.
在这种情况下，他还是继续讲那个恶毒的笑话。

即使面对灾难这个社团还是在继续活动。
Let\'s carry on this discussion tomorrow.
我们明天再继续讨论。
Carry on the good effort!
继续努力！
Sorry to interrupt you, please do carry on.
非常抱歉打断你，请继续。
Peter just carried on playing on his videogame.

继续做某事

继续某事

dāngrán jìchéngrén 
heir apparent

jìchéng
inherit

During this weekend we decided to rent out a dingy and row down the river.

这周末我们准备租一个小船，划到河的下游。
The boat was skimming over the water.
Xiǎochuán lüèguò shuǐmiàn。
小船掠过水面。
The tides swept the boat along the ocean.
Cháoshuǐ tuīzhe xiǎochuán zài dàyáng lǐ qiánjìn。
潮水推着小船在大洋里前进。
The small boat was swayed with the waves.
Nà zhī xiǎochuán zài làngtou shàng bǎiláibǎiqù。
那只小船在浪头上摆来摆去。
The boat headed into the chop.

His hobby was the building of boats.
Tā de àihào shì jiànzào xiǎo chuán。
他的爱好是建造小船。
The huge waves swallowed the small boat and it sank shortly thereafter.
Jùlàng tūnshìle xiǎochuán，hěn kuài tā jiù chéndǐ le。
巨浪吞噬了小船，很快它就沉底了。
From the bow she stared at the mesmerising onrush of the sea where it split and foamed.
Tā cóng xiǎochuán tóu dīngzhe hǎilàng xiōngyǒng ér lái，ránhòu bèi pò kāi bìng biànchéng pàomò。
她从小船头盯着海浪汹涌而来，然后被破开并变成泡沫。
The boats were held together by lashings.
Nàxiē xiǎochuán yòng shéngsuǒ shuān zài yìqǐ。
那些小船用绳索拴在一起。
Don\'t rock the boat or it will capsize!
Búyào yáohuàng xiǎo chuán，fǒuzé tā huì fān de。

The boat was set adrift.
Xiǎo chuán piāofúzhe。
小船漂浮着。

The pond was too small for sailing.

liner

开船时间

sailing time; hour of sailing

划船
huá chuán
paddle (or row) a boat

一只船
yì zhī chuán 
a boat

船长走下楼梯，向她大声说，他可以送她出去。
The captain sung out: Stand away!

这位船长喊道：站远点。
The orders from the captain were subordinated to the orders from the general.

船家
chuánjiā
one who owns a boat and makes a living as a boatman; boatman
船家
chuánjiā
boatman
这家船务公司拥有上千艘船厗。
Zhèjiā chuánwù gōngsī yōngyǒu shàngqiān sōu chuántí。
This shipping service company owns thousands of ships.
又一家船务公司开张了。
Yòu yìjiā chuánwù gōngsī kāizhāng le。
Another shipping service company has been opened.
他家是船户，以打鱼为生。
Tā jiā shì chuánhù，yǐ dǎyú wéishēng。
He lives on a boat and makes his living by fishing.
自家的小船
zìjiā de xiǎochuán 
one\'s own boat
我们大家雇了一只船。
Wǒmen dàjiā gù le yìzhī chuán。
We hired a boat between us.
这家公司专门从事搜救遇险船舶和飞机。
Zhèjiā gōngsī zhuānmén cóngshì sōujiù yùxiǎn chuánbó hé fēijī。
This company specializes in search-and-rescue of vessels and aircraft in distress.
多亏船家把我渡到对岸
他家原是深圳的船户。

詹姆斯·库克船长是一名英国探险家，他最终升到了皇家海军船长的职务。
the merchant marine
(一个国家的)商船队

dā lúnchuán qù Shànghǎi

一个大浪把小船打翻了。
Yígè dàlàng bǎ xiǎochuán dǎfān le。
A huge wave overturned the boat.
打捞沉船
dǎlāo chénchuán 
salvage a sunken ship
风更大了，船身颠簸起来。
Fēng gèngdà le，chuánshēn diānbǒ qǐlái。
As the wind grew stronger, the boat was tossed about by the waves.
他用篙一点就把船撑开了。
Tā yòng hāo yì diǎn jiù bǎ chuán chēngkāi le。
He pushed the boat off with a shove of the pole.
(船用)起重吊杆
（chuányòng）qǐzhòng diàogān 
derrick
我一坐海船就感到恶心。
Wǒ yízuò hǎichuán jiù gǎn dào ěxīn。
I always feel sick (or nauseated) at sea.
渔船厄于风暴。
Yúchuán è yú fēngbào。
The fishing boat was caught in a storm.
车船齐发。
Chēchuán qífā。
All the boats and carts set out at the same time.
船翻了。
Chuán fān le。
The ship capsized.
风浪大，船颠簸得很利害。
Fēnglàng dà，chuán diānbǒ de hěn lìhai。
There was a heavy sea and the ship tossed terribly.
船老大仔细观察风头和水势。
Chuánlǎodà zǐxì guānchá fēngtóu hé shuǐshì。
The boatman kept a sharp eye on the wind and water.
造船钢板
zàochuán gāngbǎn
ship plate
船搁浅了。
Chuán gēqiǎn le。
The ship got stranded (or ran aground).
渔船在不断更新。
Yúchuán zài búduàn gēngxīn。
Old fishing vessels are continually being replaced by new ones.
乘车固可，乘船亦无不可。
Chéngchē gù kě，chéngchuán yì wú bùkě。
Admittedly we can make the journey by train, but there is no harm in our travelling by boat.
我们大家雇了一只船。
Wǒmen dàjiā gù le yìzhī chuán。
We hired a boat between us.
海洋石油钻井船
hǎiyángshíyóu zuànjǐngchuán
offshore oil drilling rig
拉纤的船夫在河岸上一步步挣扎着前进，一面有节奏地齐声哼着“杭育！杭育！”
Lāqiàn de chuánfū zài hé\'àn shàngyíbù bùzhēngzhá zhe qiánjìn，yí miàn yǒu jiézòu de qíshēngheng zhe “hángyù！hángyù！”
As they inched forward, step by step, on the banks of the river, the boat-pullers kept up a constant rhythmical &quot;Heave ho! Heave ho!&quot;
好晕船
hào yūnchuán
be liable to seasickness; be a bad sailor
这条运“人蛇”的黑船在纽约港被扣住。
Zhè tiáo yùn“rén shé”de hēichuán zài Niǔyuēgǎngbèi kòuzhù。
The ship carrying illegal immigrants was detained at New York harbor.
渔船上的灯火忽悠忽悠的。
Yúchuán shàng de dēnghuǒ hūyōu hūyōu de。
Lights flickered on the fishing boats.
划船
huá chuán
paddle (or row) a boat
小船在江面上晃荡。
Xiǎochuán zài jiāngmiàn shànghuǎngdang。
The small boat is rocking on the river.
别晃动这船。
Bié huàngdòng zhè chuán。
Don\'t rock the boat.
定期货船
dìngqī huòchuán 
cargo liner
领航员机智地带领船只通过险滩。
Lǐnghángyuán jīzhì de dàilǐngchuánzhī tōngguò xiǎntān。
The navigator skillfully guided the ship over the dangerous shoals.
这里到处是激流险滩，行船要加倍留意。
Zhèlǐ dàochù shì jīliú xiǎntān，xíngchuán yào jiābèi liúyì。
There are rapids and dangerous shoals throughout the area, so boats must be navigated with the utmost care.
集装箱船
jízhuānɡxiānɡchuán 
container ship
船上交货
chuánshàng jiāohuò 
ex ship
现在船的速度是十八节。
Xiànzài chuán de sùdù shì shíbā jié。
The ship is making 18 knots
劫持飞机(船舰)
jiéchí fēijī(chuánjiàn) 
hijack an aeroplane (a ship, a train, a motor vehicle)
一个大浪把小船卷走了。
Yígè dà làngbǎ xiǎo chuán juǎnzǒu le。
A huge wave swept the boat away.
等河开了坐船走。
Děnghé kāi le zuò chuán zǒu。
Wait until the river is open and then go by boat.
把汽船开到对岸去。
Bǎ qìchuán kāidào duì\'àn qù。
Steer the motorboat over to the opposite bank.
开船时间
kāichuán shíjiān
sailing time; hour of sailing
不怕开顶风船
bú pà kāi dǐnɡfēnɡchuán
unafraid to run counter to the mainstream
去武汉的船上午八点开航。
Qù Wǔhàn de chuán shàngwǔ bā diǎn kāiháng。
The boat for Wuhan sails at 8 a.m..
这条船开足马力，向前行驶。
Zhè tiáo chuán kāizú mǎlì，xiàng qián xíngshǐ。
The ship was moving full steam ahead.
船已经靠码头了。
Chuán yǐjing kàomǎtóu le。
The ship has docked.
轮船慢慢地靠近码头。
Lúnchuán mànmàn de kàojìn mǎtóu。
The ship is gradually nearing the dock.
科研考察船
kēyán kǎocháchuán
research ship
定期客船
dìngqī kèchuán
liner
这条轮船的快慢怎么样？
Zhè tiáo lúnchuán de kuàimàn zěnmeyàng?
What\'s the speed of this steamer? or How fast can this steamer sail?
新船砍缆下水。
Xīn chuán kǎn lǎn xiàshuǐ。
The new ship cut her cable and slipped into the water.
对船货有留置权
duì chuánhuò yǒu liúzhìquán 
have a lien on the cargo
宇宙飞船模型
yǔzhòu fēichuán móxíng
a spaceship model
这河的下游能够行驶轮船。
Zhè hé de xiàyóu nénggòu xíngshǐ lúnchuán。
The lower reaches of the river are navigable for steamers.
波浪拍打着船舷
bōlàng pāidǎzhe chuánxián
waves lapping against the sides of the boat
排水量两万两千吨的远洋轮船
Páishuǐliàngliǎngwàn liǎngqiān dūn de yuǎnyánglúnchuán
an ocean-going liner of 22,000 tons displacement
船偏离了航线。
Chuán piānlí le hángxiàn。
The ship drifted off its course.
小船顺流漂去。
Xiǎochuán shùnliú piāo qù。
The boat drifted down the stream.
湖面上漂浮着几只小船。
Húmiàn shàngpiāofú zhe jǐ zhī xiǎochuán。
A few boats are floating on the lake.
小船随波飘荡。
Xiǎochuán suíbō piāodànɡ。
The boat was drifting with the tide.
平底船
píngdǐchuán
flat-bottomed boat; flatboat; punt
原子破冰船
yuánzǐ pòbīngchuán
atomic icebreaker
大副发现船的左前方有鲸鱼群。
Dàfù fāxiàn chuán de zuǒqiánfāngyǒu jīngyú qún。
The first mate sighted a herd of whales ahead to the left of the boat.
戗风行船
qiāngfēngxíngchuán
sail against the wind
上水船
shàngshuǐchuán
an upstream boat
上行船
shàngxíngchuán
an upstream boat
船身
chuánshēn
the body of a ship; hull
把船拴住。
Bǎ chuán shuānzhù。
Make the boat fast.
通货一膨胀，物价就涨，水涨船高嘛。
Tōnghuò yì péngzhàng，wùjià jiù zhǎng，shuǐzhǎngchuángāo ma。
Prices rise in proportion to inflation, like boats going up with the level of the water.
顺风行船
shùnfēng xíngchuán
sail with the wind
这家公司专门从事搜救遇险船舶和飞机。
Zhèjiā gōngsī zhuānmén cóngshì sōujiù yùxiǎn chuánbó hé fēijī。
This company specializes in search-and-rescue of vessels and aircraft in distress.
搜索失踪船只
sōusuǒ shīzōng chuánzhī
search for missing boats
两艘油船
liǎng sōu yóuchuán
two tankers
船索
chuánsuǒ
a ship\'s rigging
三条船
sān tiáo chuán 
three ships
这个码头可以停泊五十多艘轮船。
Zhège mǎtou kěyǐ tíngbó wǔshí duō sōu lúnchuán。
The docks can berth over fifty vessels.
小船被波浪吞没了。
Xiǎochuán bèi bōlàngtūnmò le。
The little boat was engulfed in the waves.
拖网渔船
tuōwǎnɡ yúchuán 
trawler
把船湾在那边。
Bǎ chuán wān zài nàbiān。
Moor the boat over there.
围网渔船
wéiwǎnɡ yúchuán 
purse seiner; purse boat
船桅
chuánwéi 
mast
轮船上的汽笛呜呜叫。
Lúnchuán shàng de qìdí wuwu jiào。
The ship\'s whistle kept hooting.
船上的货还没下完。
Chuánshàng de huò háiméi xiàwán。
The cargo hasn\'t all been unloaded yet.
船在九江下碇。
Chuán zài Jiǔ Jiānɡ xiàdìnɡ。
The ship anchored at Jiujiang.
又一艘新船下水了。
Yòu yì sōu xīn chuán xià shuǐ le。
Another new ship was launched.
新船下水典礼
xīn chuán xiàshuǐ diǎnlǐ
the launching ceremony of a new ship
下水船
xiàshuǐchuán
a downriver boat
下行船
xiàxíngchuán
a downstream boat
这些船明天卸货。
Zhèxiē chuán míngtiān xièhuò。
The ships will unload (the cargoes) tomorrow.
大运河有几段仍可以行船。
Dàyùnhé yǒu jǐ duàn réngkěyǐ xíngchuán。
The Grand Canal is still navigable in certain sections.
修造轮船
xiūzào lúnchuán
build or repair ships
船身摇摆。
Chuánshēn yáobǎi。
The ship rocked.
这条新船即将投入营运。
Zhè tiáo xīnchuán jíjiāngtóurù yíngyùn。
This new ship will soon go into operation.
应合着船的摇动
yìnghé zhe chuán de yáodòng
rock with the boat
你与其坐车，不如坐船。
Nǐ yǔqí zuò chē，bùrú zuò chuán。
It\'s better for you to go by boat than by train.
宇宙飞船正把他们载向月球。
Yǔzhòu fēichuán zhèngbǎ tāmen zài xiàng yuèqiú。
The spaceship was carrying them to the moon.
把船凿沉
bǎ chuán záochén
scuttle the ship
上贼船
shàngzéichuán
board the pirate ship —join a reactionary faction or a criminal gang; go astray
一只船
yì zhī chuán 
a boat
分批装船
fēn pī zhuāngchuán 
partial shipment
自家的小船
zìjiā de xiǎochuán 
one\'s own boat
这船一小时走十五海里。
Zhè chuán yì xiǎoshí zǒu shíwǔ hǎilǐ。
The ship makes 15 knots.
租一条小船
zū yì tiáo xiǎochuán 
hire a boat
船家
chuánjiā
one who owns a boat and makes a living as a boatman; boatman
船坞
chuánwù
dock; shipyard
划船时把舵最关键。
Huáchuán shí bǎduò zuì guānjiàn。
那边的水域有暗坝，行船要小心！
Nàbiān de shuǐyù yǒu ànbà，xíngchuán yào xiǎoxīn！
There are submerged dams in those waters. Sailers must watch out.
自己包船游玩，会感觉更自在。
Zìjǐ bāochuán yóuwán，huì gǎnjué gèng zìzài。
It will be a lot more fun to rent a boat for our exclusive use.
那是外省游客的包船。
Nà shì wàishěng yóukè de bāochuán。
That boat has been rented by tourists from outside the province.
今夜有暴风雨，渔民们已经将船停入了避风港。
Jīnyè yǒu bàofēngyǔ，yúmínmen yǐjing jiāng chuán tíngrù le bìfēnggǎng。
The fishermen have already put their boats in the shelter, because there is going to be a tempest tonight.
他们把渔船驶向边岸。
Tāmen bǎyúchuán shǐ xiàng biānàn。
They sailed the fishing boat to the coast.
公园里，来坐冰船的人还真不少。
Gōngyuán lǐ，lái zuò bīngchuán de rén hái zhēn bùshǎo。
There are a great number of people in the park riding the sledge.
由于紧急情况，我们拨转了船头。
Yóuyú jǐnjí qíngkuàng，wǒmen bōzhuǎn le chuántóu。
Due to emergencies, we sailed in the opposite direction.
这个电影再现了一起著名的沉船事件。
Zhège diànyǐng zàixiàn le yì qǐ zhùmíng de chénchuán shìjiàn。
The movie reappears a famous vessel-sink case.
据说这条海底沉船里有无数的宝藏。
Jùshuō zhètiáo hǎidǐ chénchuán lǐ yǒu wúshù de bǎozàng。
It\'s said that there are numerous treasures on the sunken ship.
起火的船只很快就沉底了。
Qǐhuǒ de chuánzhī hěnkuài jiù chéndǐ le。
Boats on fire sank to the bottom of the pool soon.
轮船已经沉落到海底，恐怕很难打捞了。
Lúnchuán yǐjing chénluò dào hǎidǐ，kǒngpà hěnnán dǎlāo le。
The vessel has sunk to the bottom of the ocean, it will be difficult to salvage.
渔夫撑船离岸，到湖里打鱼去了。
Yúfū chēngchuán líàn，dào húli dǎyú qù le。
The fisherman poled a boat and went fishing on the lake.
这是这艘船的处女航，工作人员既紧张又兴奋。
Zhè shì zhè sōu chuán de chǔnǚháng，gōngzuò rényuán jì jǐnzhāng yòu xīngfèn。
This is this ship\'s virgin voyage, so the crew is very excited.
这艘船城造价之高令人惊叹。
Zhè sōu chuánchéng zàojià zhī gāo lìngrén jīngtàn。
The production cost of this huge passenger liner is stunningly high.
将船帆升起，我们准备出发。
Jiāng chuánfān shēngqǐ，wǒmen zhǔnbèi chūfā。
Let\'s raise the sails and get ready for departure.
看清船号，做好记录，不要出错。
Kànqīng chuánhào，zuòhǎo jìlù，búyào chūcuò。
Take a good look at the ship number and then record it. Please don\'t make any mistakes.
风大时，船户一般不会出航。
Fēng dà shí，chuánhù yìbān búhuì chūháng。
When there is a strong wind, the boatmen do not go sailing under ordinary circumstances.
他家是船户，以打鱼为生。
Tā jiā shì chuánhù，yǐ dǎyú wéishēng。
He lives on a boat and makes his living by fishing.
附近的船民都是世居此地，祖祖辈辈以打鱼为生。
Fùjìn de chuánmín dōushì shìjū cǐdì，zǔzǔbèibèi yǐ dǎyú wéishēng。
All the neighboring boatmen have lived here and made a living by fishing for generations.
本地的船王由于涉嫌商业欺诈已被法院传唤。
Běndì de chuánwáng yóuyú shèxián shāngyèqīzhà yǐ bèi fǎyuàn chuánhuàn。
The local shipping tycoon has been summoned to court because of suspected deceptive business practices.
船桅上的旗子是他们公司的标志。
Chuánwéi shàng de qízi shì tāmen gōngsī de biāozhì。
The flag on the mast is the symbol of their company.
又一家船务公司开张了。
Yòu yìjiā chuánwù gōngsī kāizhāng le。
Another shipping service company has been opened.
老板决定把这批货物船运出境。
Lǎobǎn juédìng bǎ zhè pī huòwù chuányùn chūjìng。
The boss decided to ship this batch of goods abroad.
小船在水面上荡悠着，不知驶向何处。
Xiǎochuán zài shuǐmiàn shàng dàngyōu zhe，bùzhī shǐ xiàng héchù。
The boat is swaying on the water in no certain direction.
我们的船在导标的指引下航行。
Wǒmen de chuán zài dǎobiāo de zhǐyǐn xià hángxíng。
The beacons guided our sailing.
船长决定今晚抵靠码头，明天继续前进。
Chuánzhǎng juédìng jīnwǎn dǐkào mǎtóu，míngtiān jìxù qiánjìn。
The captain has decided to stop at a wharf for the night and go on tomorrow.
小船在湍急的河水中前进，险情迭现。
Xiǎochuán zài tuānjí de héshuǐ zhōng qiánjìn，xiǎnqíng diéxiàn。
The little boat was sailing ahead in torrential rivers and more danger kept on appearing.
船刚航行到江心，舵盘忽然失灵了。
Chuán gāng hángxíng dào jiāngxīn，duòpán hūrán shīlíng le。
The steering wheel failed to work properly when the ship was in the middle of the river.
那个河段刚刚发生了翻船事故，好在没有人员伤亡。
Nàge héduàn gānggāng fāshēng le fānchuán shìgù，hǎo zài méiyǒu rényuán shāngwáng。
There was a shipping accident at that part of the river just now, but luckily no one died or got hurt.
他尽干违法的坏事，早晚有一天会翻船！
Tā jìn gàn wéifǎ de huài shì，zǎowǎn yǒu yìtiān huì fānchuán！
He will be caught one day for all his bad deeds.
那艘船的方向舵突然失灵了。
Nà sōu chuán de fāngxiàng duò tūrán shīlíng le。
The rudder of that ship suddenly failed.
每到端午节，这里都会举行飞舟竞渡的划龙船比赛。
Měi dào Duānwǔ Jié，zhèlǐ dū huì jǔxíng fēizhōu jìngdù de huálóngchuán bǐsài。
Boating competitions are held here during every Dragon Boat Festival.
港口一片繁忙景象，来往船只风樯林立。
Gǎngkǒu yípiàn fánmáng jǐng xiàng，láiwǎng chuánzhǐ fēngqiáng línlì。
The port is crowded with ships coming and going.
舵手把钢缆系在了船尾处。
Duòshǒu bǎ gānglǎn jìzài le chuánwěichù。
The cox tied the steel rope to the end of the boat.
我们的船距离最近的港埠还有100海里。
Wǒmen de chuán jùlí zuìjìn de gǎngbùháiyǒu yìbǎi hǎilǐ。
Our ship is one hundred sea miles away from the nearest port.
他用篙子把船头的野鸭赶下了水。
Tā yòng gāozi bǎ chuántóu de yěyā gǎnxià le shuǐ。
He drove these wild ducks on the bow into the water with a punt-pole.
海浪翻滚，小船左右摇摆，颠簸得很厉害。
Hǎilàng fāngǔn，xiǎochuán zuǒyòu yáobǎi，diānbǒ de hěnlìhai。
The boat rolled violently in the waving sea.
在轮船上，我们可以通过航讯了解国内外大事。
Zài lúnchuán shàng，wǒmen kěyǐ tōngguò hángxùn liǎojiě guónèiwài dàshì。
On steamboat, we can get news from home and abroad via radio signal.
红帽子告诉我还要等一小时，船才能到。
Hóngmàozi gàosù wǒ háiyào děng yì xiǎoshí，chuán cáinéng dào。
The porters in red hats told me that it would take another hour for the boat to arrive.
暴风雨的海面上，小船在巨浪间忽隐忽现。
Bàofēngyǔ de hǎimiàn shàng，xiǎochuán zài jùlàng jiān hūyǐn hūxiàn。
On the stormy ocean, the little boat was hardly discernible among the waves.
我们划船的速度很慢，但还是到达了河对岸。
Wǒmen huáchuán de sùdù hěnmàn，dàn háishi dàodá le hé duì\'àn。
We rowed slowly but arrived at the other side of the river anyway.
有道是“众人划桨开大船”，这是很有道理的。
Yǒu dào shì“zhòngrén huájiǎng kāidàchuán”，zhè shì hěnyǒu dàolǐ de。
As the saying goes &quot;Every one paddles ,and a ship can be started&quot; is with good reason.
过去的火轮的时速很低，根本不能和现在的轮船相比。
Guòqù de huǒlún de shísù hěndī，gēnběn bùnéng hé xiànzài de lúnchuán xiāngbǐ。
Steamers in the past were very slow, they couldn\'t match today\'s ships.
暴风雨来临，激浪猛烈地敲打船梢。
Bàofēngyǔ láilín，jīlàng měngliè de qiāodǎ chuánshāo。
A storm has come and surging waves are beating against the rudder end of the boat.
航空母舰不小心挤垮了一艘小渔船，幸亏没造成人员伤亡。
Hángkōngmǔjiàn bùxiǎoxīn jǐkuǎ le yì sōu xiǎo yúchuán，xìngkuī méi zàochéng rényuán shāngwáng。
The aircraft carrier accidentally hit a little fishing boat. Luckily, no one was hurt.
夜里，灯塔默默地为舰船指引着方向。
Yèlǐ，dēngtǎ mòmò de wèi jiànchuán zhǐyǐn zhe fāng xiàng。
The beacon guides ships at night.
由于江流很急，小船无法过江。
Yóuyú jiāngliú hěnjí，xiǎochuán wúfǎ guòjiāng。
The boat cannot cross the river because of the strong current.
他站在船头看着汹涌的江涛感慨万分。
Tā zhànzài chuántóu kàn zhe xiōngyǒng de jiāngtāo gǎnkǎi wànfēn。
He stands at  the bow, looking at the waves, which stirs him to sigh with emotion.
救援人员在江心打捞落水的渔船。
Jiùyuán rényuán zài jiāngxīn dǎlāo luòshuǐ de yúchuán。
The rescue men are salvaging the sunken fishing boat in the middle of the river.
谈恋爱可不能脚踩两只船。
Tánliàn\'ài kě bùnéng jiǎo cǎi liǎng zhī chuán。
One shall not build relationships with two people at the same time when they are in love.
一艘客轮进港了，工作人员都在忙着接船。
Yì sōu kèlún jìngǎng le，gōngzuò rényuán dōu zài máng zhe jiēchuán。
A passenger liner is arriving at the port, and workers are preparing themselves for its arrival.
我带的东西很多，你们来港口接船吧。
Wǒ dài de dōngxi hěnduō，nǐmen lái gǎngkǒu jiēchuán ba。
I have a lot of luggage, so would you please pick me up at the port?
宇宙飞船直上九霄，最后飞离了大气层。
Yǔzhòu fēichuán zhíshàng jiǔxiāo，zuìhòu fēilí le dàqìcéng。
The space ship flies into the sky and flies through the aerosphere.
出海捕鱼前我要在船上绑几个救生圈。
Chūhǎi bǔyú qián wǒ yào zài chuánshàng bǎng jǐgè jiùshēngquān。
I tie several rubber tires to the boat before I go to the sea to fish.
划船的时候别忘了穿救生衣。
Huáchuán de shíhou biéwàng le chuān jiùshēngyī。
Do not forget to wear a life jacket when you go boating.
这条船共有10个客仓、20个客位。
Zhè tiáo chuán gòngyǒu shígè kècāng、èrshígè kèwèi。
This vessel has ten cabins and twenty seats.
出海远航到第10天时，船上的淡水就匮竭了。
Chūhǎi yuǎnháng dào dìshítiān shí，chuánshàng de dànshuǐ jiù kuìjié le。
On the tenth day of the voyage, the vessel\'s fresh water was exhausted.
船已离岸，我们回去吧。
Chuán yǐ lí\'àn，wǒmen huíqù ba。
The ship has already left the shore. Let\'s go back.
在北戴河时，我坐了一次楼船。
Zài Běidàihé shí，wǒ zuò le yícì lóuchuán。
I took an ancient towered ship when I was on Beidai River.
光看外形就知道，这是一条采沙用的民船。
Guāng kàn wàixíng jiù zhīdào，zhè shì yìtiáo cǎishā yòng de mínchuán。
Only from appearance do you know that this is a civil boat used for mining sand.
在冥茫的江面上，远远地驶来一条小船。
Zài míngmáng de jiāngmiàn shàng，yuǎnyuǎn de shǐlái yìtiáo xiǎochuán。
A boat is coming from far on the boundless river.
爷爷时常架着这条木船在江上捕鱼。
Yéye shícháng jià zhe zhètiáo mùchuán zài jiāng shàng bǔyú。
Grandpa always goes fishing with this wooden boat.
经水下考古证明，这艘明代的难船是触礁沉没的。
Jīng shuǐxià kǎogǔ zhèngmíng，zhèsōu Míngdài de nànchuán shì chùjiāo chénmò de。
It is proved by submarine archaeology that the sunken ship of Ming dynasty struck a rock and then sank.
截止目前，难船已经成功营救了130多名遇难人员。
Jiézhǐ mùqián，nànchuán yǐjing chénggōng yíngjiù le yīyìbǎisānshíduōmíng yùnàn rényuán。
Till now, the boat containing refugees has successfully rescued over 130 victims.
湖面上往来的篷船构成了江南的一道风景。
Húmiàn shàng wǎnglái de péngchuán gòuchéng le jiāngnán de yídào fēngjǐng。
There are a lot of boats with awnings forming a beautiful landscape in the south of the Yangtze River.
我们的轮船将于后天11：00启碇。
Wǒmen de lúnchuán jiāng yú hòutiān shíyīdiǎn qǐdìng。
Our steamship will set sail on 11:00, the day after tomorrow.
我们坐的船将于今夜起碇。
Wǒmen zuò de chuán jiāngyú jīnyè qǐdìng。
Our ship sets sail tonight.
他已经夺得过三次赛船大会的冠军了。
Tā yǐjing duódéguo sān cì sàichuán dàhuì de guànjūn le。
He has already been the champion of the boat race three times.
那条红色的赛船第一个冲过了终点线。
Nà tiáo hóngsè de sàichuán dìyī gè chōngguò le zhōng diǎnxiàn。
The red racing boat crossed the finish line first.
你一定要提高警惕，千万不要上贼船呀！
Nǐ yí dìng yào tígāo jǐngtì，qiānwàn bùyào shàng zéichuán ya ！
You should sharpen your vigilance, and not board a pirate ship.
这项工作看似简单，干起来竟这么难，可真是上贼船了！
Zhè xiàng gōngzuò kàn sì jiǎndān，gàn qǐlái jìng zhème nán，kě zhēnshi shàng zéichuán le ！
The work seems easy, but is extremely difficult. I have been cheated in joining the work group.
昨天夜里巡逻队又截获了一艘企图偷渡的蛇船。
Zuótiān yèlǐ xúnluóduì yòu jiéhuò le yí sōu qǐtú tōudù de shéchuán。
Last night, the patrol team captured another boat that intended to ferry across the border secretly.
这艘船上安装了两台声呐探测仪。
Zhèsōuchuán shàng ānzhuāng le liǎng tái shēngnà tàncèyí。
This ship is installed with two sonar detectors.
我们的轮船已于早上8：00驶离港口。
Wǒmen de lúnchuán yǐ yú zǎoshàng bādiǎn shǐlí gǎngkǒu。
Our ship left the port at 8 o\'clock this morning.
他们的船已经顺流而下，我们很难追上。
Tāmen de chuán yǐjing shùnliú ér xià，wǒmen hěnnán zhuīshàng。
Their boat has moved down the river with a favorable current, so it\'s hard for us to catch up.
乘坐太空船遨游太空是小明童年的梦想。

It was Xiaoming\'s dream as a child to travel through space in a spacecraft.
轮船收起了铁锚，慢慢开出了港湾。
Lúnchuán shōuqǐ le tiěmáo，mànmàn kāichū le gǎngwān。
Drawing in the anchor, the ship slowly moved out of the harbor.
由于导航系统出现了故障，船舶停驶在公海上了。

Due to problems with the navigation system, the ship was forced to stop on the high seas.
在前面水域失事的是一艘土籍轮船。

船长决定到下个码头的时候下锚靠岸。

Nǐmen shàngchuán ba，wǒ lái yáolǔ。

在船/车/飞机上
to go by boat
乘船去
The ship could carry seventy passengers.
这只船能载70名乘客。

乘游船旅行
world cruise

to make a boat fast
[BRIT] 把船拴牢

船开出了25公里

to be seasick
晕船呕吐

在船上
