This does not take account of those who perished by shipwreck.
Zhè bìng méi kǎolǜ nǎxiē yīn chénchuán ér shìqù de rénmen。
这并没考虑哪些因沉船而逝去的人们。
Refloating the sunken ship proved impracticable because of its fragility.
Yīnwèi chénchuán guòyú cuìruò，zuìhòu zhèngmíng dǎlāo gōngzuò shì búqièshíjì de。
因为沉船过于脆弱，最后证明打捞工作是不切实际的。
The fisherman was bailing out the water to keep his boat afloat.
Wèile fángzhǐ chuán chénrù shuǐzhōng，zhège yúmín zhèngzài páichū chuán nèi de shuǐ。
为了防止船沉入水中，这个渔民正在排出船内的水。
After their boat sank they wound up on a desert island.
他们的船沉没后，他们被风吹到了一个荒无人烟的小岛上。
The boat settled down on the ocean floor.
Zhè sōu chuán chéndàole dàyáng dǐbù。
这艘船沉到了大洋底部。
A telltale patch of oil on the water marked where the boat went down.
Shuǐmiàn shàng piāofú de yóubān zhǐshì chū zhè sōu chuán chénmò de dìdiǎn。
水面上漂浮的油斑指示出这艘船沉没的地点。
The boat began to list heavily to one side before it sank.
Chuán zài chénmò zhīqián，kāishǐ yánzhòng xiàng yí cè qīngxié。
船在沉没之前，开始严重向一侧倾斜。
It (becoming a hero) was involuntary. They sank my boat.
Zhè （chéngwéi yīngxióng zhè jiàn shìqing ） shì wúyì zhōng fāshēng de，tāmen chénle wǒ de chuán。
这（成为英雄这件事情）是无意中发生的，他们沉了我的船。
The Titanic sank with all the crew on board.

The ship settled down a bit and the deck was awash.

一艘载着1300人左右的客船一夜之间就在地中海沉没了。

那艘船在海平面以下500米的地方沉了快15年了。
The boat driven against the rocks, broke up and sank in a few minutes.

穿素色服装显得高雅。

The companies merged to optimize the allocation of resources.
内蒙的草业资源十分丰富。
Nèiměng de cǎoyè zīyuán shífēn fēngfù。
Inner Mongolia is rich in meadow resources.
这个山区附近的地矿资源非常丰富。
Zhège shānqū fùjìn de dìkuàng zīyuán fēicháng fēngfù。
The vicinity of mountainous area is rich in geological minerals.
我们一定要合理利用非再生资源。
Wǒmen yídìng yào hélǐ lìyòng fēizàishēng zīyuán。
We should use non-renewable resources in a rational way.
企业要保持人力资源的供需平衡。
Qǐyè yào bǎochí rénlìzīyuán de gōngxū pínghéng。
The enterprise shall maintain the balance between the supply and demand of human resources.
我们要充分利用光能这个可再生资源。
Wǒmen yào chōngfèn lìyòng guāngnéng zhège kě zàishēng zīyuán。
We should make good use of light power, which is renewable.
今年遭遇大范围水灾，各部门领导努力保证物资供应，不让资源减损，让群众正常生活。
Jīnnián zāoyù dàfànwéi shuǐzāi，gè bùmén lǐngdǎo nǔlì bǎozhèng wùzī gōngyìng，bú ràng zīyuán jiǎnsǔn，ràng qúnzhòng zhèngcháng shēnghuó。
Many areas have been swept by floods this year; in order to make sure that people in these areas lead a normal life, cadres from all sectors have taken measures to ensure the supply of materials.
水虽然是可再生资源，但我们仍然需要节约使用。
Shuǐ suīrán shì kě zàishēng zīyuán，dàn wǒmen réngrán xūyào jiéyuē shǐyòng。
Though water is a renewable resource, we should still economize.
空载是浪费交通资源的行为！
Kōngzǎi shì làngfèi jiāotōng zīyuán de xíngwéi！
Bare weight wastes communications resources.
这里水资源极度匮缺。
Zhèlǐ shuǐ zīyuán jídù kuìquē。
This area is extremely short of water.

The current society is one of circulating information. We must update our information sources constantly to stand fast in society.

Wǒmen yīng jiǎnshǎo shuǐ zīyuán de lòushī。
We should reduce the leakage and loss of water.
不要认为自然资源是永不穷匮的。
Búyào rènwéi zìrán zīyuán shì yǒngbùqióngkuì de。
Don\'t believe that natural resources are inexhaustible.
不要以为地球上的资源是取之不尽，用之不竭的！

Don\'t just think that natural resources can be used without limit.
我们应该尽量发掘自己民族的人文资源。
Wǒmen yīnggāi jìnliàng fājué zìjǐ mínzú de rénwén zīyuán。
We should do our best to uncover our national human resources.

to spring from
起源于

wàn\'è zhī yuán

爷爷是走过新旧社会两重天的人，对旧社会的批判最有发言权。
Yéye shì zǒuguò xīnjiù shèhuì liǎngchóngtiān de rén，duì jiùshèhuì de pīpàn zuì yǒu fāyánquán。
My grandpa has lived through the old, and new societies. He is the most suitable person to have the say of the old society.
这次审判中，有许多证据有质证，需要重新核实。
Zhècì shěnpàn zhōng，yǒu xǔduō zhèngjù yǒu zhìzhèng，xūyào chóngxīn héshí。
During this trial, there are many doubtable pieces of evidence which must be re-verified.
依法应当重判的，要坚决重判。

pronounce sb. guilty

Yídàn duìfāng nénggòu tígōngle hétong，nǐ jiù yīnggāi gùyòng yí gè lǜshī lái dàibiǎo nǐ tánpàn。
一旦对方能够提供了合同，你就应该雇用一个律师来代表你谈判。
How to negotiate is implicit in the process of formulating a contract.

píngpàn shèngfù
decide who is the winner; judge between contestants

判决有罪(无罪)
pànjué yǒu zuì（wúzuì）
pronounce sb. guilty (not guilty)

zhōnɡshěn pànjué

你如果不服判决还可以上诉。

法院的判决已经出来了。
Fǎyuàn de pànjué yǐjīng chūláile.
The court has already come to a verdict.

从轻判决

The judge sentenced him to three year\'s imprisonment.
Gāi fǎguān pàn tā sān nián túxíng。
该法官判他三年徒刑。
The judge set bail at $10,000.
Fǎguān pàndìng bǎoshìjīn wéi yí wàn Měiyuán。
法官判定保释金为一万美元。
The judge clapped him in jail.
Fǎguān pàn tā rùyù。
法官判他入狱。
The advocate counsellor supports the decision of the judge.
Biànhù lǜshī duì fǎguān de pànjué biǎoshì zhīchí。
辩护律师对法官的判决表示支持。
The issue was decided against the defendant.
Bèigào bèi pàn shūdiàole guānsi。
被告被判输掉了官司。
Judgment is hanging in the scales of justice.
Pànjué zài fǎguān nàlǐ réng xuán\'érwèijué。
判决在法官那里仍悬而未决。
The judge\'s decision is final.
Zhège fǎguān de pànjué shì zhōngshěnpànjué。
这个法官的判决是终审判决。
The judge\'s ruling was handed down in a preliminary hearing rather than a trial and was therefore unappealable.
Fǎguān de pànjué shì zài yùshěn shí zuòchū de，érbúshì zài shěnpàntīng shàng zuòchū de，yīncǐ bù néng shàngsù。
法官的判决是在预审时做出的，而不是在审判厅上作出的，因此不能上诉。
If he doesn\'t pay the fine soon, he\'ll be up before the magistrate.
如果不立刻交纳罚金，他将会受到法官的审判。
A Brazilian illegal immigrant has been sentenced to 33 months in jail for blackmailing a judge.
Yìmíng bāxī fēifǎ yímín yóuyú lèsuǒ fǎguān ér bèipànrùyù 33 gè yuè。
一名巴西非法移民由于勒索法官而被判入狱33个月。
The sentence was passed on by the judge.
Fǎguān xuāndúle pànjué。
法官宣读了判决。
The judge was solemn as he pronounced sentence.
Fǎguān zài xuāndú pànjué shí fēicháng zhuāngyán。
法官在宣读判决时非常庄严。
They pulled her up in front of a judge for her sentence.
Tāmen bǎ tā dàidào fǎguān miànqián，jiēshòu pànjué。
他们把她带到法官面前，接受判决。
The judge will withdraw even further from public sight as the trial goes on.
Yóuyú shěnpàn réng zài jìxù dāngzhōng，fǎguān jiāng yuǎnlí gōngzhòng de shìxiàn。
由于审判仍在继续当中，法官将远离公众的视线。
Opinions are usually written by a single judge.
Xuānpàn shū tōngcháng yóu yíwèi fǎguān xiějiù。
宣判书通常由一位法官写就。
The CEO said that the merger discussions had been completed in just three weeks.
Shǒuxí zhíxíngguān shuō gōngsī bìnggòu tánpàn yǐ zài sān zhōu nèi wánchéng。
首席执行官说公司并购谈判已在三周内完成。
The judge conceded the newsworthiness of the trial.
Fǎguān chéngrènle nàgè shěnpàn jùyǒu xīnwén bàodǎo jiàzhí。
法官承认了那个审判具有新闻报导价值。
The judge gave the jury the charge to arrive at a verdict.
Fǎguān yāoqiú péishěntuán zuòchū pànjué。
法官要求陪审团作出判决。
The judge charged the jury with the responsibility of arriving at a verdict.
Fǎguān zhǐshì péishěntuán zuòchū pànjué。
法官指示陪审团作出判决。
The judge said he found nothing to justify blame in the accident.
法官说他没有找到能够判定此次事故责任的证据。
The judge delivered a quick verdict.
Fǎguān zuòchūle yí gè kuàisù de pànjué。
法官作出了一个快速的判决。
A judge should know the reasons that justify statutes and precedents.
Yí gè fǎguān yīnggāi zhīdào chéngwénfǎ hé pànlì hélǐ de nèizài yuányīn。
一个法官应该知道成文法和判例合理的内在原因。
The judge has handed down his decision on the case.
Fǎguān duì zhè jiàn ànzi zuòchūle pànjué。
法官对这件案子作出了判决。
These offences carry a mandatory death penalty, which means that trial judges have no option but to impose a death sentence on those who are convicted.
这些犯罪行为将构成强制死刑，这就是说庭审法官没有其他选择，直接宣判犯罪分子死刑。
The judge called for a pitcher of water, a tip-off that the session would be long.
法官要了一大杯水，这表明审判要延续很长一段时间。
The judges will go into a huddle to decide the verdict.
Fǎguānmen huì sīxià shāngtán，juédìng zuìzhōng de pànjué。
法官们会私下商谈，决定最终的判决。
A judge can not allow people\'s comments to disturb his thinking.
法官不应让别人的言论影响自己的判断。
The judge decided the case in favor of the plaintiff.
Fǎguān duì gāi ànjiàn zuòchūle yǒulìyú yuángào de pànjué。
法官对该案件做出了有利于原告的判决。
运用你自己的判断力
yùnyòngnǐ zìjǐ de pànduànlì
use your own judgment
爱情冲昏了她的头脑，使她失去了正确的判断力。
Àiqíng chōnghūn le tā de tóunǎo，shǐ tā shīqù le zhèngquè de pànduànlì。
She was carried away by love and couldn\'t use correct judgment.
His clouded judgment and obsession with rewriting his own legacy gets in the way of objective advice.
他的判断力模糊而且又热衷改遗嘱，完全听不进别人实事求是的建议。
It seems your deep rooted prejudice has completely colored your judgment.
看来你根深蒂固的偏见已经完全影响了你的判断力。
I was persuaded against my better judgement to withdraw my request for a transfer.
Wǒ bèi wǒ gèng hǎo de pànduànlì shuōfú ér gǎibiànle qǐngqiú diào zhí de shēnqǐng。
我被我更好的判断力说服而改变了请求调职的申请。
Patience and judgement are required to know how to pace the learning and personal adjustment needs.
Zhīdào rúhé tiáozhěng xuéxí sùdù hé gèrén tiáojié xūqiú shì xūyào nàixīn hé pànduànlì de。
知道如何调整学习速度和个人调节需求是需要耐心和判断力的。
Danger heightened his powers of discrimination.
Wēixiǎn de júshì zēngqiángle tā de pànduànlì。
危险的局势增强了他的判断力。
The servants showed great tact and discretion.
Púrénmen biǎoxiànchū jíhǎo de jīzhì hé pànduànlì。
仆人们表现出极好的机智和判断力。
You can rely on his discretion.
Nǐ kěyǐ xìnlài tā de pànduànlì。
你可以信赖他的判断力。
His ad-lib comments showed poor judgment.
Tā de jíxí pínglùn xiǎn de quēfá pànduànlì。
他的即席评论显得缺乏判断力。
Children must develop a sense of right and wrong.
Háizǐmen bìxū péiyǎng pànduàn shìfēi de nénglì。
孩子们必须培养判断是非的能力。
The Age of Reason is famous for being the period in which a person is considered capable of making reasoned judgments.
理性时代是一段非常著名的时期，我们通常认为那时的人有能力做出理性判断。
肯定的判断
kěndìng de pànduàn
a positive assessment
判断是非
pànduàn shìfēi
judge (or decide) what is right and what is wrong
判断情况
pànduàn qínɡkuànɡ
assess (or size up) the situation
你判断得很正确。
Nǐ pànduàn de hěn zhèngquè。
Your judgment is sound.
你判断错了。
Nǐ pànduàn cuò le。
You used bad judgment.
判断失误
pànduàn shīwù
an error in judgment; a misjudgment
运用你自己的判断力
yùnyòngnǐ zìjǐ de pànduànlì
use your own judgment
他从小生活在海边，能够准确地判断潮信的到来。
Tā cóng xiǎo shēnghuó zài hǎibiān，nénggòu zhǔnquè de pànduàn cháoxìn de dàolái。
Since he has lived along the ocean since his childhood, he can  accurately predict the tides.
老中医正在从寸口脉象的变化来判断他的病因。
Lǎo zhōng yī zhèngzài cóng cùnkǒu mài xiàng de biànhuà lái pànduàn tā de bìngyīn。
The old doctor of traditional Chinese medicine is diagnosing the cause of his illness by examining the changes of pulse on his wrist.
据医生判断，她可能患有胆结石。
Jù yīshēng pànduàn，tā kěnéng huànyǒu dǎnjiéshí。
The doctor estimated that she may have a gall stone.
从车身表面的光洁度可以判断生产厂家的喷涂水平。
Cóng chēshēn biǎomiàn de guāngjiédù kěyǐ pànduàn shēngchǎn chǎngjiā de pēntú shuǐpíng。
Judging by the brightness and cleanliness of the car\'s surface, you can find out the quality of the manufacturer\'s flame plating.
你知道如何判断钢琴音色的好坏吗？
Nǐ zhīdào rúhé pànduàn gāngqín yīnsè de hǎohuài ma？
Do you know how to judge piano timbre?
弧线球易使裁判产生错误判断。
Húxiànqiú yì shǐ cáipàn chǎnshēng cuòwù pànduàn.
Arcing balls are inclined to mislead umpires to incorrect judgements.
我们根据花翎就可以判断他的职位高低。
Wǒmen gēnjù huālíng jiù kěyǐ pànduàn tā de zhíwèi gāodī。
According to the peacock plume, we can judge the rank of his position.
他根据这种植物的特征判断出它是黄柏。
Tā gēnjù zhèzhǒng zhíwù de tèzhēng pànduàn chū tā shì huángbǎi。
Judging from its two characteristics he concluded that the plant was yellow cypress.
她从灰度等级来判断图片的质量。
Tā cóng huīdù děngjí lái pànduàn túpiàn de zhìliàng。
She judged the picture quality according to the grey degree scale.
护士通过回血现象判断进针情况。
Hùshì tōngguò huíxiě xiàn xiàng pànduàn jìnzhēn qíngkuàng。
Nurses judge the needle-pressing condition according to the back blood.
爱情冲昏了她的头脑，使她失去了正确的判断力。
Àiqíng chōnghūn le tā de tóunǎo，shǐ tā shīqù le zhèngquè de pànduànlì。
She was carried away by love and couldn\'t use correct judgment.
我们不能仅从事物的牝牡骊黄来判断事物的本质。
Wǒmen bùnéng jǐn cóng shìwù de pìnmǔlìhuáng lái pànduàn shìwù de běnzhì。
We can\'t judge the essence of a thing just by its outward appearance.
法医往往通过尸斑来判断死者的死亡时间。
Fǎyī wǎngwǎng tōngguò shībān lái pànduàn sǐzhě de sǐwáng shíjiān。
Legal medical experts often judge time of death from livor mortis.
实测和目测是有差距的，我们不应根据目测的数据来作判断。
Shícè hé mùcè shì yǒu chājù de，wǒmen bùyīng gēnjù mùcè de shùjù lái zuò pànduàn。
There are differences between actual measurement and visual inspection, so we shouldn\'t make judgments based on the data from visual inspections.
他总是习惯于按照主观判断来给别人贴标签。
Tā zǒngshì xíguàn yú ànzhào zhǔguān pànduàn lái gěi biérén tiē biāoqiān。
He always labels others according to his own subjective judgment.
你应当统揽全局，做出最正确的判断。
Nǐ yīngdāng tǒnglǎn quánjú，zuòchū zuì zhèngquè de pànduàn。
You should bear in mind the total situation, and make the best judgment.
根据他的口音可以判断出他可能来自下江地区。
Gēnjù tā de kǒuyīn kěyǐ pànduàn chū tā kěnéng láizì xiàjiāng dìqū。
From his accent we can infer that he maybe from the lower reaches of the Yangze River.
从这个小弟的口音判断，它应该是个河南人。
Cóng zhège xiǎodì de kǒuyīn pànduàn，tā yīnggāi shì gè Hénánrén。
From his accent, we can infer that this boy must be from Henan Province.
老王根据看到的晓月判断天就快亮了。
Lǎo Wáng gēnjù kàndào de xiǎoyuè pànduàn tiān jiù kuài liàng le。
Lao Wang infers that it is soon going to be daybreak based on his observation of the fading moon.
这种现象的好坏，也没有明确的临界点进行判断。
Zhèzhǒng xiàn xiàng de hǎohuài，yě méiyǒu míngquè de línjièdiǎn jìnxíng pànduàn。
Whether this phenomenon is good or bad, there is no clear critical point to judge.
做这种判断你有什么依据吗？
Zuò zhèzhǒng pànduàn nǐ yǒu shénme yījù ma？
Do you have any basis for this judgment?
中断谈判
zhōngduàn tánpàn 
break off the negotiations (or talks)
假言判断。
判断。
准确判断股价的峰位与底位。
否定判断
或然判断。
他的判断竟然如此准确。
正确的决心来源于正确的判断
判断真假。
判断失误
只听一面之词，以致作出了错误的判断。
他的判断被证实了。
全称判断的主词是周延的。
谈判中断。
People are judged by the company they keep.
看一个人交哪些朋友，就能判断他的为人；从其交友知其为人。
a sound critical estimate of the problem
对问题的正确判断和评价
to judge with single eye
公正(或专心)地判断
to use one\'s judgment
作出自己的判断

理性时代是一段非常著名的时期，我们通常认为那时的人有能力做出理性判断。
Different species of snakes can often be distinguished by their characteristic color patterns.
蛇的种类可以从它们身体的颜色和图案特征来判断。
It\'s difficult to sex newborn chicks.
新生小鸡雏的性别是很难判断的。
You can always tell when she\'s excited by the way she bursts into the room.
看她闯进门的样子，就能判断出她是不是高兴。
His clouded judgment and obsession with rewriting his own legacy gets in the way of objective advice.
他的判断力模糊而且又热衷改遗嘱，完全听不进别人实事求是的建议。
It seems your deep rooted prejudice has completely colored your judgment.
看来你根深蒂固的偏见已经完全影响了你的判断力。
judging by {or} from his expression
从他的表情上判断
to be a good judge of sth
很会判断某事
an error of judgment
判断失误
by the look {or} looks of it
根据外表来判断
The test of any civilised society is how it treats its minorities.
对于任何文明社会的判断标准是它怎样对待少数民族。
Good decisions stem from good judgments.
明智的决定来源于准确的判断。
Babies can\'t vocalize their emotions, but you can judge from their facial expression and behaviors.
婴儿无法说出自己的感情，但是你可以从他们的面部表情和行为判断出他们的意思。
A judge can not allow people\'s comments to disturb his thinking.
法官不应让别人的言论影响自己的判断。
It is not easy to estimate whether this method will work or not.
判断这个方法是否奏效并不容易。
It is difficult to judge a man\'s merits properly only by the historical records in the book.
只根据书中的历史记载，很难正确的判断一个人的功过。
A wise man can judge the merits of the matter reasonably.
聪明人可以合理地判断是非。
Chronical prejudice will mislead you in making judgment on this event.
长期的成见会误导你对这件事情做判断。
Experience told him that danger lurked just around the corner.
他凭经验判断出危险就在身旁。
critical judgment
严谨的判断
As coins were mass-produced, they can often be accurately dated.
Yìngbì shì dàpīliàng shēngchǎn de，yīncǐ zǒng néng pànduànchū tāmen de rìqī。
硬币是大批量生产的，因此总能判断出它们的日期。
We are trying to decide what the most ethical course of action would be.
Wǒmen zhèngzài pànduàn shénme cái shì zuì dàodé de xíngwéi。
我们正在判断什么才是最道德的行为。
May we be wary of judging people by their wealth.
Wǒmen kěnéng huì yījù tāmen de cáifù lái pànduàn rén。
我们可能会依据他们的财富来判断人。
There is sufficient reason to judge that they will be unfit to practise medicine.
Yǒu zúgòu de lǐyóu pànduàn tāmen bú shìhé xíngyī。
有足够的理由判断他们不适合行医。
I can see with your business brain there\'s no holding you back.
Wǒ gēnjù nǐ de shāngyè tóunǎo lái pànduàn，kǒngpà méiyǒu shénmedōngxī néng ràng nǐ huítóu le。
我根据你的商业头脑来判断，恐怕没有什么东西能让你回头了。
She couldn\'t let her judgement be coloured by personal feelings.
Tā bù néng ràng tā de pànduàn shòu gèrén gǎnqíng sècǎi de yǐngxiǎng。
她不能让她的判断受个人感情色彩的影响。
I was persuaded against my better judgement to withdraw my request for a transfer.
Wǒ bèi wǒ gèng hǎo de pànduànlì shuōfú ér gǎibiànle qǐngqiú diào zhí de shēnqǐng。
我被我更好的判断力说服而改变了请求调职的申请。
Our sense of the true and the false is too easily deceived and manipulated.
Wǒmen duì zhèngquè hé cuòwù de pànduàn hěn róngyì bèi méngbì hé lìyòng。
我们对正确和错误的判断很容易被蒙蔽和利用。
He is already in a state of anxiety which tends to make him make poor judgments.
Tā chǔyú yì zhǒng jiāojí zhuàngtài xià，zhè kěnéng huì shǐ tā zuòchū cuòwù pànduàn。
他处于一种焦急状态下，这可能会使他做出错误判断。
Political decisions sometimes come down to the judgement and wisdom of individuals.
Zhèngzhì juécè yǒushíhòu kě guījiéwéi gèrén de pànduàn hé ruìzhì。
政治决策有时候可归结为个人的判断和睿智。
Patience and judgement are required to know how to pace the learning and personal adjustment needs.
Zhīdào rúhé tiáozhěng xuéxí sùdù hé gèrén tiáojié xūqiú shì xūyào nàixīn hé pànduànlì de。
知道如何调整学习速度和个人调节需求是需要耐心和判断力的。
From the right perspective, this china can be of great value.
Cóng hélǐ de pànduàn lái kàn，zhè jiàn cíqì kěnéng jiàzhíliánchéng。
从合理的判断来看，这件瓷器可能价值连城。
I will not let personal prejudices interfere with my judgement.
Wǒ búhuì ràng gèrén piānjiàn gānrǎo wǒ de pànduàn。
我不会让个人偏见干扰我的判断。
They were determined to be responsible by the bank and lent the money.
Yínháng pànduàn tāmen kěyǐ xìnlài，gěile tāmen dàikuǎn。
银行判断他们可以信赖，给了他们贷款。
He glanced up when he finished speaking to gauge the effect of his words.
Dāng tā jiéshù yǎnjiǎng shí，tā sǎoshìle yí biàn guānzhòng，yǐ pànduàn tā yǎnjiǎng de xiàoguǒ。
当他结束演讲时，他扫视了一遍观众，以判断他演讲的效果。
I cautioned against a rush to judgment, but he didn\'t listen.
Wǒ jǐnggào tā búyào jíyú zuòchū pànduàn， dàn tā bù tīng。
我警告他不要急于做出判断，但他不听。
In the absence of such data, we must reason from more indirect evidence.
Yóuyú quēshī zhè zhǒng shùjù，wǒmen bìxū gēnjù jiànjiē zhèngjù zuòchū pànduàn。
由于缺失这种数据，我们必须根据间接证据作出判断。
We rely on simple judgement or wishful thinking too often.
Wǒmen tài duō de yīlài yú jiǎndān pànduàn hé yìxiāngqíngyuàn le。
我们太多地依赖于简单判断和一厢情愿了。
The interviewee will evaluate, judge and generally size us up, no matter what we do.

kòng zhì tán pàn；zài tán pàn zhōng qǔ dé zhǔ dòng quán
dominate the negotiation
裁判暂停了比赛，判切尔西主罚点球。

bùfú cáipàn

cáijūn tánpàn

Tā yìngyāo wèi zhèchǎng páiqiúsài dānrèn cáipàn。

gōngkāi shěnpàn

Yǒu gè cáipàn bùgōngzhèng。

Lìshǐ jiāng duì zhèxiē rén zuòchū zuì gōngzhèng de pànjué。

对方在谈判中还没有关门。

The other side hasn\'t yet slammed the door on further negotiations.
由审判员一人，人民陪审员二人组成的合议庭
Yóu shěnpànyuán yì rén，rénmín péishěnyuán èr rén zǔchéng de héyìtíng。

pànchǔ sǐxíng，huǎnqī èr nián zhíxíng
condemned to death with the sentence suspended for two years; sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve
如果审判员是案件的当事人，应当自行回避。
Rúguǒ shěnpànyuán shì ànjiàn de dāngshìrén，yīngdāngzìxínghuíbì。
If the judge is a party to the case, he should withdraw of his own accord.
在继承古代文化上，我们决不能无批判地兼收并蓄。
Zài jìchénggǔdài wénhuà shàng，wǒmen jué bùnéng wú pīpàn de jiānshōubìngxù。
In inheriting our old culture, we should never swallow anything and everything uncritically.

Tánpàn chǔyú jiāngchí zhuàngtài。

在这场比赛中，球迷对边裁的判罚表示不满。

The football fans were not satisfied with the side umpire.
古时候的人如果犯了重罪，就会被判处满门抄斩。
Gǔ shíhou de rén rúguǒ fàn le zhòngzuì，jiùhuì bèi pànchǔ mǎnmén chāozhǎn。
In ancient times, a person who committed a felony would have his family members sentenced to death with him.
他从小生活在海边，能够准确地判断潮信的到来。
Tā cóng xiǎo shēnghuó zài hǎibiān，nénggòu zhǔnquè de pànduàn cháoxìn de dàolái。
Since he has lived along the ocean since his childhood, he can  accurately predict the tides.
球已出线，但裁判员并没看见。
Qiú yǐ chūxiàn，dàn cáipànyuán bìng méi kànjiàn。
The ball was out of bounds, but the umpire didn\'t see it.
对于法官的从轻判决，他很意外。
Duìyú fǎguān de cóngqīng pànjué，tā hěnyìwài。
He was very surprised at the light sentence given by the judge.
老中医正在从寸口脉象的变化来判断他的病因。
Lǎo zhōng yī zhèngzài cóng cùnkǒu mài xiàng de biànhuà lái pànduàn tā de bìngyīn。
The old doctor of traditional Chinese medicine is diagnosing the cause of his illness by examining the changes of pulse on his wrist.
据医生判断，她可能患有胆结石。
Jù yīshēng pànduàn，tā kěnéng huànyǒu dǎnjiéshí。
The doctor estimated that she may have a gall stone.
得亏有你，这场谈判才如此顺利。
Děikuī yǒu nǐ，zhè chǎng tánpàn cái rúcǐ shùnlì。
These negotiation wouldn\'t have been so smooth without you.
由于意见不一致，谈判双方对攻了起来。
Yóuyú yìjiàn bùyízhì，tánpàn shuāngfāng duìgōng le qǐlai。
The two negotiating parties began to attack each other because they held completely different opinions.
那些追名逐利的人，正是他这次批判的锋芒所向。
Nàxiē zhuīmíng zhúlì de rén，zhèngshì tā zhècì pīpàn de fēngmáng suǒ xiàng。
He is attacking those who strive for vanity and fame.
是否增发新股需要董事会公判决定。
Shìfǒu zēngfā xīngǔ xūyào dǒngshìhuì gōngpàn juédìng。

法官下午将在体育场举行公判大会。
Fǎguān xiàwǔ jiāng zài tǐyùchǎng jǔxíng gōngpàn dàhuì。
The judge will hold the meeting to pronounce the judgment made by the public at the stadium this afternoon.
从车身表面的光洁度可以判断生产厂家的喷涂水平。
Cóng chēshēn biǎomiàn de guāngjiédù kěyǐ pànduàn shēngchǎn chǎngjiā de pēntú shuǐpíng。
Judging by the brightness and cleanliness of the car\'s surface, you can find out the quality of the manufacturer\'s flame plating.
执法这场比赛的是国家裁判。
Zhífǎ zhèchǎng bǐsài de shì guójiā cáipàn。
It was a national judge who refereed the game.
我们已经就此事进行函洽，并约定下月开始正式谈判。
Wǒmen yǐjing jiù cǐshì jìnxíng hánqià，bìng yuēdìng xiàyuè kāishǐ zhèngshì tánpàn。
We have talked about this matter by letter, and have decided to begin an official negotiation next month.
你知道如何判断钢琴音色的好坏吗？
Nǐ zhīdào rúhé pànduàn gāngqín yīnsè de hǎohuài ma？

Ànjiàn de pànfá yào zūnzhòng héyìtíng de yìjiàn。

Wèile jiéshù zhànzhēng，liǎng guó jìnxíng le hépíng tánpàn。
The two countries are having negotiations in order to end the war.
我们根据花翎就可以判断他的职位高低。
Wǒmen gēnjù huālíng jiù kěyǐ pànduàn tā de zhíwèi gāodī。
According to the peacock plume, we can judge the rank of his position.
他根据这种植物的特征判断出它是黄柏。
Tā gēnjù zhèzhǒng zhíwù de tèzhēng pànduàn chū tā shì huángbǎi。
Judging from its two characteristics he concluded that the plant was yellow cypress.
她从灰度等级来判断图片的质量。
Tā cóng huīdù děngjí lái pànduàn túpiàn de zhìliàng。
She judged the picture quality according to the grey degree scale.
护士通过回血现象判断进针情况。
Hùshì tōngguò huíxiě xiàn xiàng pànduàn jìnzhēn qíngkuàng。
Nurses judge the needle-pressing condition according to the back blood.
他因越狱罪加刑10年，已经判得很轻了。
Tā yīn yuèyùzuì jiāxíng shínián，yǐjing pàn de hěnqīng le。
Because of his escape from prison, he was sentenced to another ten years in prison, which was less severe than he deserved.
他因酒后驾车撞人而被判交通肇事罪。
Tā yīn jiǔhòu jiàchē zhuàngrén ér bèi pàn jiāotōng zhàoshìzuì。
After drinking, he drove his car and hit someone. As a result, he was found guilty of traffic violations.
老祖宗留下的旧物我们应当批判地继承。
Lǎozǔzōng liúxià de jiùwù wǒmen yīngdāng pīpàn de jìchéng。
In regard to our ancestors\' old systems, we must inherit critically.
远东国际军事法庭在二战之后审判了战犯。
Yuǎndōng guójì jūnshì fǎtíng zài èrzhàn zhīhòu shěnpàn le zhànfàn。
The Far-east International Military Tribunal brought the war criminals to trial after the Second World War.
在谈判桌前，他慷慨陈词，不卑不亢地表述了我方观点。
Zài tánpànzhuō qián，tā kāngkǎi chéncí，bùbēi búkàng de biǎoshù le wǒ fāng guāndiǎn。
In front of the negotiation table, his impassioned speech demonstrated our points in a way neither servile nor overbearing.
这个变态的人，酷虐妇女儿童，真应该把他判死刑。
Zhège biàntài de rén，kùnüè fùnǚ értóng，zhēn yīnggāi bǎ tā pàn sǐxíng。
This abnormal man should be sentenced to the death penalty, for he has cruelly abused women and children.
爷爷是走过新旧社会两重天的人，对旧社会的批判最有发言权。
Yéye shì zǒuguò xīnjiù shèhuì liǎngchóngtiān de rén，duì jiùshèhuì de pīpàn zuì yǒu fāyánquán。
My grandpa has lived through the old, and new societies. He is the most suitable person to have the say of the old society.
裁判鸣枪后，参加长跑的运动员们都跑了出去。
Cáipàn míngqiāng hòu，cānjiā chángpǎo de yùndòngyuánmen dōu pǎo le chūqù。
After the referee fired his gun, the long-distance running athletes began running.
谈判双方你来我往，都因为各自公司的利益而互不相让。
Tánpàn shuāngfāng nǐlái wǒwǎng，dōu yīnwèi gèzì gōngsī de lìyì ér hùbùxiāng ràng。
Both parties bargain with each other, unwilling to make concessions to the profits of their own companies.
心脏内科的医生怎么能不会判读心电图呢？
Xīnzàng nèikē de yīshēng zěnme néng búhuì pàndú xīndiàntú ne？
How can a physician be unable to interpret a electrocardiogram?
爱情冲昏了她的头脑，使她失去了正确的判断力。
Àiqíng chōnghūn le tā de tóunǎo，shǐ tā shīqù le zhèngquè de pànduànlì。
She was carried away by love and couldn\'t use correct judgment.
正义者和非正义者之间有着判若鸿沟的区别。
Zhèngyìzhě hé fēizhèngyìzhě zhījiān yǒu zhe pànruò hónggōu de qūbié。
People who have a sense of justice are completely different from those who don\'t.
足球场上的裁判要不停地跟着球员们跑动。
Zúqiúchǎng shàng de cáipàn yào bùtíng de gēn zhe qiúyuánmen pǎodòng。
The umpire has to move continually in the field to follow the players.
我们不能仅从事物的牝牡骊黄来判断事物的本质。
Wǒmen bùnéng jǐn cóng shìwù de pìnmǔlìhuáng lái pànduàn shìwù de běnzhì。
We can\'t judge the essence of a thing just by its outward appearance.
这次谈判你功不可没，回到公司后我一定为你请赏。
Zhècì tánpàn nǐ gōngbùkěmò，huídào gōngsī hòu wǒ yídìng wèi nǐ qǐngshǎng。
You have done great deeds in the negotiation, and I will request a reward for you.
经过多年的艰苦谈判，中国终于成功入关。
Jīngguò duōnián de jiānkǔ tánpàn，Zhōngguó zhōng yú chénggōng rùguān。
After years of arduous negotiation, China was eventually admitted to the General Agreement on Tariffs and Trade.
经少年法庭判定，这个孩子犯了偷窃罪。
Jīng shàonián fǎtíng pàndìng，zhège háizi fàn le tōuqièzuì。
According to the juvenile court\'s judgment, this child has committed theft.

Suí zhe cáipànyuán de shàoshēng xiǎngqǐ，zhěng chǎng bǐsài jiéshù le。
The whole game ended when the referee blew his whistle.

Fǎyī wǎngwǎng tōngguò shībān lái pànduàn sǐzhě de sǐwáng shíjiān。
Legal medical experts often judge time of death from livor mortis.
实测和目测是有差距的，我们不应根据目测的数据来作判断。
Shícè hé mùcè shì yǒu chājù de，wǒmen bùyīng gēnjù mùcè de shùjù lái zuò pànduàn。
There are differences between actual measurement and visual inspection, so we shouldn\'t make judgments based on the data from visual inspections.
他因杀人罪被判死刑、打入死牢。
Tā yīn shārénzuì bèi pàn sǐxíng、dǎrù sǐláo。
He was sentenced to death because of the murder, and has been sent to the condemned cell.
公司特命你前往美国进行贸易谈判。

这些犯罪行为将构成强制死刑，这就是说庭审法官没有其他选择，直接宣判犯罪分子死刑。

[BRIT] 对决定/判决进行上诉
to take a bearing
判明位置

这封信明确承诺要重新开始谈判。

判决某人有罪/无罪
He was sentenced to two years in jail.
他被判两年监禁。
judging by {or} from his expression
从他的表情上判断
to be a good judge of sth
很会判断某事
to pass judgment (on sb/sth)
[法] (对某人/某事)作出判决
an error of judgment
判断失误

上诉法院判决这个案子没有理论依据。
Most of these complaints are settled before they go to trial.

这些控诉中的大多数在审判前都得到了解决。
The umpire warned the batter to stay in the batter\'s box.

Facts likely to influence the judgment are called material facts.
Yǒu kěnéng yǐngxiǎng pànduàn de shìshí chēngwéi zhòngyào shìshí。
有可能影响判断的事实称为重要事实。

公开审判
gōngkāi shěnpàn
public (or open) trial
历史将对这些人作出最公正的判决。
Lìshǐ jiāng duì zhèxiē rén zuòchū zuì gōngzhèng de pànjué。
History will pass the fairest judgment on such people.
我们要公平裁判这件事。
Wǒmen yào gōngpíngcáipàn zhèjiànshì。
We should make a fair decision on this matter.
有个裁判不公正。
Yǒu gè cáipàn bùgōngzhèng。
One of the judges was partial.
陪审制有利于实现法庭审判的公正。
Péishěnzhì yǒulìyú shíxiàn fǎtíng shěnpàn de gōngzhèng。
The jury system is of benefit in achieving justice in the court.
执判比赛要公正。
Zhípàn bǐsài yào gōngzhèng。
The referee of a contest must be fair.
作为主裁判员，他向来公平公正。
Zuòwéi zhǔ cáipànyuán，tā xiàng lái gōngpíng gōngzhèng。
As the main referee, he is always very fair.
法院一审作出判决，认定他挪用公款不能退还的行为构成贪污罪。
Fǎyuàn yìshěn zuòchū pànjué，rèndìngtā nuóyònggōngkuǎn bùnéng tuìhuán de xíngwéi gòuchéngtānwūzuì。
The court convicted him in first instance and confirmed that his embezzlement of public funds without means to return them constituted a crime of corruption.
这次谈判你功不可没，回到公司后我一定为你请赏。
Zhècì tánpàn nǐ gōngbùkěmò，huídào gōngsī hòu wǒ yídìng wèi nǐ qǐngshǎng。
You have done great deeds in the negotiation, and I will request a reward for you.
谈判双方你来我往，都因为各自公司的利益而互不相让。
Tánpàn shuāngfāng nǐlái wǒwǎng，dōu yīnwèi gèzì gōngsī de lìyì ér hùbùxiāng ràng。

nationwide census
全国人口普查

national census
人口普查
人口普查
The population of a country is counted using a census.
国家的人口统计是通过人口普查的方式来完成的。
In the United States, collectives of related ethnic groups are typically counted together in the census.
美国的人口普查通常会把互相关联的种族团体放在一起考虑。
Data derived from population censuses is useful for social researchers.
Cóng rénkǒupǔchá zhōng dédào de shùjù duì shèhuì yánjiūzhěmen hěn yǒu yòngchu。
从人口普查中得到的数据对社会研究者们很有用处。
The whole area is censused every five years.
Zhè zhěnggè dìqū měi wǔ nián jìnxíng yí cì rénkǒupǔchá。
这整个地区每五年进行一次人口普查。
This census is an invaluable resource for tracing family history.

人口普查是追查家族史的一种宝贵资源。
The census bureau is an organ of the commerce department.
Měiguó rénkǒupǔchá jú shì shāngwùbù xiàshǔ de yí gè jīgòu。
美国人口普查局是商务部下属的一个机构。
这位高僧一直在为佛光普照大地贡献着力量。

pǔtōngrén

他说的是纯正的普通话。
Tā shuō de shì chúnzhèng de pǔtōnghuà。
He speaks pure putonghua.
普通话中的“了、着、的”等虚词和做后缀的“子、头”等字都念轻声。
Pǔtōnghuà zhōng de“le、zhe、de”děng xūcí hé zuò hòuzhuì de“zǐ、tóu“děng zì dōu niàn qīngshēng。
In putonghua, particles like le, zhe, and de and suffixes like zi and tou are all in the neutral tone (or are all toneless).

苏格兰普通法是建立在判例体系基础上的。
Most states have replaced the common law definition of rape with statutes defining sexual assault.

大多数州都将普通法中对强奸的定义换成了界定性攻击的条例。
In common law any degree of contributory negligence would bar the plaintiff from collecting damages.
Zài pǔtōngfǎ zhōng，rènhé chéngdù de gòngtóng guòshī dōuhuì chéngwéi yuángào huòdé sǔnshī bǔcháng de zhàng\'ài。
在普通法中，任何程度的共同过失都会成为原告获得损失补偿的障碍。
Common law originated in the unwritten laws of England and was later applied in the united states.
Pǔtōng fǎ qǐyuányú yīngguó de bùchéngwén fǎlǜ，hòulái yìngyòngyú Měiguó。
普通法起源于英国的不成文法律，后来应用于美国。
The law\'s purpose is to protect the common man.

法律的作用是保护普通人。

The limited is much faster than the regular.

这种基本型轿车以普通型而著称。

普通一兵
pǔtōngyì bīng
an ordinary soldier; a soldier in the ranks; a rank-and-filer
普通人
pǔtōngrén
the average person; the man in the street
普通话中的“了、着、的”等虚词和做后缀的“子、头”等字都念轻声。
Pǔtōnghuà zhōng de“le、zhe、de”děng xūcí hé zuò hòuzhuì de“zǐ、tóu“děng zì dōu niàn qīngshēng。
In putonghua, particles like le, zhe, and de and suffixes like zi and tou are all in the neutral tone (or are all toneless).
提倡说普通话
tíchàngshuō pǔtōnghuà

普通田鼠
pǔtōngtiánshǔ

普通照会
pǔtōngzhàohuài

普通话中的“了、着、的”等虚词和做后缀的“子、头”等字都念轻声。
Pǔtōnghuà zhōng de“le、zhe、de”děng xūcí hé zuò hòuzhuì de“zǐ、tóu“děng zì dōu niàn qīngshēng。
In putonghua, particles like le, zhe, and de and suffixes like zi and tou are all in the neutral tone (or are all toneless).

这种说法现被普遍认为不那么符合现代英语的规范
East Prussian was an exclave of Germany.
东普鲁士原先是德国的飞地。
a generally accepted usage
被普遍接受的用法
a legal handbook for lay readers
非专业性法律手册；普及法律手册
4/4 meter is also called common time
4/4拍也叫作普通拍子
coats in misses\' sizes
普通尺寸的女外套
a plain man
普通人
to promulgate learning and culture
普及知识及文化
secular schools
普通学校 (有别于教会学校)
surface mail
平寄(或普通)邮件(别于航空邮件)
widespread benefits
普遍受益
He studied Mandarin almost ten years and now he speaks like a real Chinese does.
他学了差不多十年的普通话，现在说起话来俨然就是个中国人。
He behaves as a boss but is a common employee.
他的举止像个老板，其实却只是名普通员工。
The sun is shining.
阳光普照。
The master of the house is a young man named Phillip.
房子的主人是个叫菲利普的年轻人。
I love the second movement of Puccini\'s &quot;The Madame Butterfly&quot;.
我很喜欢普契尼《蝴蝶夫人》的第二乐章。
Mel Gibson played opposite Danny Glover In Lethal Weapon.
在影片《致命武器》中，梅尔·吉普森与丹尼·格洛弗演对手戏。
Although she is a famous singer, she dresses like an ordinary girl.
虽然是著名歌星，但是她打扮得就像个普通女孩。
Plastic is one of the most commonly used materials in the world.
塑料是世界上使用最普遍的一种材料。
The population of a country is counted using a census.
国家的人口统计是通过人口普查的方式来完成的。
It is common practice in the US to tip the waiter.
在美国给服务生小费是很普遍的现象。
I want a regular coffee, please.
请给我来份普通咖啡。
Tickets are now on sale at usual outlets.
现在可以在普通售票口买到票。
I can\'t stick this with regular glue, I might need something else.
普通的胶水沾不上这个，我需要换种胶水。
It seems to be a general truth that nothing is so simple as it first seems.
没有什么事情像表面看上去那么简单，这似乎是一个普遍的真理。
Donald Trump has business interests all around the world.
唐纳德·川普在世界很多地方均拥有股份。
The sun is shining outside.
外面阳光普照。
Heavy water is chemically the same as regular-light water.
重水在化学成分上与普通水是一样的。
Coeducation is very common in North America.
男女同校的现象在北美非常普遍。
Mel Gibson is a famous movie director.
梅尔·吉普森是著名的电影导演。
Philip hung his coat on a hook behind the door.
菲利普把上衣挂在了门后的挂钩上。
The &quot;separate but equal&quot; doctrine adopted in Plessy v. Ferguson, has no place in the field of public education.
“隔离但平等”的原则源于普莱西诉弗格森案，但是这条原则在公共教育方面根本行不通。
The Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region is issuing smart identity cards to replace the old ID cards.
香港特别行政区政府正在发放新的智能身份证，来取代过去的普通身份证。
Allergy to cats is extremely common, and can be a major problem even for people who don\'t own cats.
对猫过敏是非常普遍的，即使这对那些不养猫的人来说也是个大问题。
China, also known as soft-paste or tender porcelain, is softer: it can be cut with a file, while porcelain cannot.
陶器，也叫幼陶器或软瓷器，它的质地柔软，可以用锉刀切开，但是普通瓷器就不行。
The public is usually unwilling to accept cloudy wine.
普通大众通常不会接受混浊的酒。
For more flavorful espresso and coffee, use a coffee grinder to grind your beads fresh.
想要烹制出更加香浓的蒸馏咖啡或是普通咖啡，可以使用咖啡机，绝对滴滴香浓。
A dirty bomb kills or injures through the initial blast of the conventional explosive and by airborne radiation and contamination.
核弹先是通过普通炸药的爆炸，然后是航空辐射和污染来造成伤亡。
He feels he can doctor himself for just a common cough.
他觉得普通的咳嗽难不倒他，自己是能把自己治好的。
My uncle Philip had very skillfully made a concealed trap-door.
我叔叔菲利普用他高超的技术做了一扇隐蔽的地板门。
This is an ordinary table red dry wine.
这是种普通的佐餐干红。
contrary to popular belief
与普遍观点相反的是
the common man
普通人
Sampras leads by four games to one.
桑普拉斯在局数上以4比1领先。
a topic of general interest
普遍感兴趣的话题
a general feeling of optimism
普遍的乐观情绪
we\'re only human
我们只是普通人
three days out from Plymouth
从普利茅斯出发3天的路程
to put out from Plymouth
从普利茅斯启航
the rank and file
普通成员
the man in the street
普通人
She won general acceptance in the advertising industry by her hard work and excellent performance.
她凭借努力工作和出色的表现赢得了广告界的普遍认可。
My grandfather is a kind and conventional person.
我爷爷是个善良的普通人。
The World Bridge Federation held an exhibition competition to increase the bridge\'s popularity before the 2002 Salt Lake City Olympic Games.
世界桥牌联合会在2002年盐湖城冬奥会之前举办了一个表演赛来提高桥牌的普及率。
One common explanation of UFOs is that they are just lights of planes in the sky.
对不明飞行物的一个普遍解释是那只是天上飞机发出的光。
Philip is very arrogant. His important air at the meeting offended everyone.
菲利普非常傲慢，他在会上骄傲的态度得罪了所有人。
Ordinary sailors are not allowed to have meals in officer\'s mess.
普通水手不能在官员餐厅吃饭。

对生活在新普利茅斯的刻板的分离主义者来说，建立这个五月柱很令人伤感。
Philip has been a secretary of this club for seven years.
菲利普在这个俱乐部作干事已经七年了。
Organic food is superior to regular food in many ways.
有机食品在很多方面都优于普通食品。
This institution is tasked with conducting a general economic survey.
这个机构的任务是进行经济普查。
In China today throwaway tissues are so universal that cloth handkerchiefs are regarded as old fashioned.
在今天的中国，一次性的纸巾是如此普遍，而使用布手帕已经过时。
Such theories are unapprehended by average people.
这些理论不是普通人所能了解的。

翰尼·德普会出演下一部《蝙蝠侠》电影的反面角色吗？

他的妻子是自赞蒂普以来最坏、最无法相处的妻子。

霍普金斯研究小组进行了异种移植的临床试验。

乔治·贝利不是一个普通的粗人。

普林斯顿大学有世界上最好的语言教学课程，拥有来自世界各地的语言教师。
The source of this character in the play is a regular traffic police officer.
这部剧里这个人物的原型是一个普通的交通警察。
Bonded carpet is thicker than ordinary carpet.
粘合地毯比普通地毯厚。
In ancient times, the masses were not allowed to comment on politics.
在古代，普通人是不允许议论政治的。
The company\'s financial statements are in compliance with generally accepted accounting practices.
公司的财务报表依从普遍接受的会计惯例。
In the United States, collectives of related ethnic groups are typically counted together in the census.
美国的人口普查通常会把互相关联的种族团体放在一起考虑。
The common cold has evolved so well that nearly all treatments are futile.
这种由普通感冒病毒变异而来的病毒几乎是无药可治的。
Common camera usually has an exposure at a centisecond.
普通相机的曝光时间通常是百分之一秒。

这个导演偏爱长相普通的演员。

这些联邦州都要遵从一个普遍的宪法。

人们普遍错误地认为战争已经破坏了和平进程。
People celebrate the occasion all over the country.
全国普天同庆这一节日。

公司可以购买自己已发行的普通股或有限股，并将其取消以收回股票。

财务室的保险门能抵挡普通的炸弹爆炸。

Dāng pǔtōng de rìcháng huódòng dōu biàn dé kùnnan de shíhou，rénmen jīngcháng huì gǎndào gūdú。

Fèiqì de yǔyán zài dāngjīn gèng pǔbiàn le。

Tā xǐhuan qiǎn jīnfà，shēncáimiáotiáo，xiàngmào pǔtōng hé pífū guānghuá de rén。

It was a fair performance that didn\'t deserve any praise or criticism.
Zhège yèjì hěn pǔtōng，bù zhídé biǎoyáng huòzhě pīpíng。

Thompson is a young theater director who is in charge of all the productions in this city.
Tāngpǔsēn shì yí wèi niánqīng de xìjù zǒngjiān，fùzé zhè zuò chéngshì lǐ de suǒyǒu zhìzuò。

Hǎoxiàng shì shíhou bānbù fǎnqíshìfǎ de shíhou le，yīnwèi xiànzài rénmen pǔbiàn jiēshòule tóngxìngliàn。

Cóng rénkǒupǔchá zhōng dédào de shùjù duì shèhuì yánjiūzhěmen hěn yǒu yòngchu。

The famous performing artist of Beijing Opera, Mr. Shang Changrong, has created and performed a vivid portrayal of Caocao.

Both Ci and Qu were art forms of chords at the beginning. Later they developed into independent literary forms.

不同的艺术家在唱同样的段子时，鼓词会有很大不同。
Bùtóng de yìshùjiā zài chàng tóngyàng de duànzi shí，gǔcí huì yǒu hěndà bùtóng。

Zhèwèi lǎoyìshùjiā yǐjing yǒu hǎo duōnián méiyǒu dēngtái yǎnchū le，zhècì fùchū ràng xiànchǎng guānzhě rúdǔ。

Wǒ guó xǔduō dìfāngxìqǔ dōushì yóu mínjiān yìrén shìdài kǒushòu ér bǎocún xiàlái de。
Many of our local operas were preserved by folk artists who passed them down from generation to generation by word of mouth.
艺术夸张
yìshù kuāzhāng
artistic exaggeration
在街头卖艺
zài jiētóu màiyì 
be a street-performer

Shūbótè de yìshù gēqǔ gěi rén yǐ měigǎn。
Art songs by Schubert give one sensuous pleasure.
工艺美术
gōngyì měishù

艺术魅力
yìshù mèilì 
artistic charm
她牌艺高超。
Tā páiyì ɡāochāo。
She is a very skillful bridge player.
评审文艺作品
píngshěn wényì zuòpǐn

棋艺精湛
qíyì jīnɡzhàn
be a chess expert
“气韵生动”论是中国艺术理论的基础。
Qìyùn shēngdònglùn shì Zhōngguó yìshù lǐlùn de jīchǔ。
The concept of &quot;spirit-resonance life-movement&quot; is the cornerstone of Chinese art theory.
文艺对人们的思想起着潜移默化的作用。
Wényì duì rénmen de sīxiǎngqǐ zhe qiányímòhuà de zuòyòng。
Literature and art exert an imperceptible influence on people\'s thinking.
他的手艺很巧。
Tā de shǒuyì hěn qiǎo。
His workmanship is excellent.
比赛后两国篮球运动员聚在一起，切磋球艺。
Bǐsài hòu liǎngguó lánqiú yùndòngyuán jù zài yìqǐ，qiēcuō qiúyì。
The basketball players of the two countries got together and swopped pointers after the match.
文学艺术家们要切实负起人类灵魂工程师的伟大使命。
Wénxué yìshùjiāmen yào qièshí fùqǐ rénlèi línghún gōngchéngshī de wěidà shǐmìng。
Writers and artists should realize their great responsibility as those who shape people\'s minds and souls.
文艺界人士
wényìjiè rénshì
people of literary and art circles
糅合莎士比亚戏剧和京剧二者的艺术形式
róuhé Shāshìbǐyà xìjù hé jīngjù èrzhě de yìshù xíngshì

色艺俱佳
sèyì jù jiā

Wénhuà yìshù shǔyú shàngcéngjiànzhù。
Culture and art belong to the realm of the superstructure.
艺术是现实生活的升华。
Yìshù shì xiànshí shēnghuó de shēnghuá。
Art is the distillation of life.
文艺战线上的一支生力军
wényì zhànxiànshàng de yìzhī shēnglìjūn

一种失传的艺术
yìzhǒng shīchuán de yìshù

这些艺人各有自己的师承。
Zhèxiē yìrén gè yǒu zìjǐ de shīchéng。
These artists have inherited the traditions of their respective masters.
十八般武艺，样样精通
Shíbā bān wǔyì，yàngyàng jīngtōng
be skilful in using each and every one of the 18 weapons; be versatile
这玩艺儿我使不了。
Zhè wányìr wǒ shǐ bùliǎo。
I can\'t use this gadget.
艺术手段
yìshù shǒuduàn

跟师傅学手艺
gēn shīfu xué shǒuyì

老王的棋艺在我们单位是首屈一指的。
Lǎo Wáng de qíyì zài wǒmen dānwèi shì shǒuqūyìzhǐ de。
Lao Wang is the best chess player in our unit.

Shēnghuó shì wényì chuàngzuò de yuánquán。

他手艺真巧，简直是鲁班再生。

鉴赏师细细端详着这件艺术品。
Jiànshǎngshī xìxì duānxiang zhe zhèjiàn yìshùpǐn。
这件玉制工艺品玲珑剔透。
Zhèjiàn yùzhì gōngyìpǐn línglóngtītòu。
手编笆篓是我国简朴漂亮的民俗工艺品。
Shǒubiān bālǒu shì wǒguó jiǎnpǔ piàoliàng de mínsú gōngyìpǐn。
Hand-weaved baskests are beautiful, simple folk handicraft.
以前有很多人四处走动专门打把式卖艺。
Yǐqián yǒu hěnduōrén sìchù zǒudòng zhuānmén dǎbǎshì màiyì。
Streat performers used to walk from one place to another, doing Chinese kongfu for audiences.
他棋艺不高，败象纷生。
Tā qíyì bùgāo，bàixiàng fēngshēng.
He is not a good chess player. It seems to me that this time, he is destined to lose.
那些石刻具有很高的艺术价值。
Nàxiē shíkè jùyǒu hěngāo de yìshù jiàzhí。
Those inscriptions have extremely high artistic value.
碑志记录了中国书法艺术的流传与演变。
Bēizhì jìlù le Zhōngguó shūfǎ yìshù de liúchuán yǔ yǎnbiàn。
The inscription on the tablet records the spreading and evolution of Chinese calligraphy.
这个碑座的雕刻很能体现唐代艺术风格。
Zhège bēizuò de diāokè hěnnéng tǐxiàn Tángdài yìshù fēnggé。
The sculpture on the bottom of the stone tablet showcases to perfection the artistic style of the Tang Dynasty.
这本书记载了当时北曲演员的艺术活动。
Zhèběnshū jìzǎi le dāngshí běiqǔ yǎnyuán de yìshù huódòng。
The book describes the artistic life of  Beiqu (operas popular in the North of China) actors at that time.
影视圈中许多知名艺人的本名并不被众人所知。
Yǐngshìquān zhōng xǔduō zhīmíng yìrén de běnmíng bìng búbèi zhòngrén suǒ zhī。
The original names of many celebrities from the film and TV community are not known by the public.
旧社会，戏曲艺人被贬称为戏子。
Jiù shèhuì，xìqǔ yìrén bèi biǎnchēng wéi xìzǐ。
In the old days, opera artists were looked down as opera jesters.
在曲艺界，他是变口说得较好的人。
Zài qǔyì jiè，tā shì biànkǒu shuō de jiàohǎo de rén。
He is famous for his skills in speaking variant tones in the folk art community.
他的艺术影响遍于世界。
Tā de yìshù yǐngxiǎng biànyú shìjiè。
His art influenced the entire world.
小妹常说，驳价也是一门艺术。
Xiǎomèi chángshuō，bójià yěshì yìmén yìshù。
My little sister often says that bargaining is also an art.
虽然当年的好嗓子已不再，但老艺术家们的演唱依然是韵味十足。
Suīrán dāngnián de hǎosǎngzi yǐ búzài，dàn lǎoyìshùjiāmen de yǎnchàng yīrán shì yùnwèi shízú。
Although they no longer possessed the wonderful voice they used to have, the old artists still sing beautifully.
这是一家专门经营布艺的商店。
Zhè shì yìjiā zhuānmén jīngyíng bùyì de shāngdiàn。
This shop specializes in dealing with cloth processing.
他凭借自己在音乐方面的才赋，成功考取了艺术学院。
Tā píngjiè zìjǐ zài yīnyuè fāngmiàn de cáifù，chénggōng kǎoqǔ le yìshù xuéyuàn。
He is enrolled in the art school for his gifts in music.
演员中我最喜欢他，因为他才艺超群。
Yǎnyuán zhōng wǒ zuì xǐhuan tā，yīnwèi tā cáiyì chāoqún。
Of all the actors, I like him best as he is very talented.
这家裁缝店师傅的手艺很好，所以有很多人愿意到这里裁制衣服。
Zhèjiā cáiféngdiàn shīfu de shǒuyì hěnhǎo，suǒyǐ yǒu hěnduōrén yuànyì dào zhèlǐ cáizhì yīfu。
The tailor’s wonderful skills attracted a lot of customers.
这个彩雕作品在艺术展上特别引人注目。
Zhège cǎidiāo zuòpǐn zài yìshùzhǎn shàng tèbié yǐnrénzhùmù。
This colored sculpture attracted a lot of attention in the art exhibition.
他退休后，把很多精力放到了茶艺研究上。
Tā tuìxiū hòu，bǎ hěnduō jīnglì fàngdào le cháyì yánjiū shàng。
He devoted much energy to tea arts after retirement.
这枚用昌化石制作的印章，是难得的工艺品。
Zhè méi yòng chānghuàshí zhìzuò de yìnzhāng，shì nándé de gōngyìpǐn。
Made of Changhua stone, this seal is a rare work of art.
一个文艺工作者长年累月地练功是十分必要的。
Yígè wényì gōngzuòzhě chángnián lěiyuè de liàngōng shì shífēn bìyào de。
It\'s very necessary for an artist to continue to practice their skills over the years.
潮绣是生产于广东潮州地区的工艺品。
Cháoxiù shì shēngchǎn yú Guǎngdōng Cháozhōu dìqū de gōngyìpǐn。
Chaozhou embroidery is a craftwork produced in Chaozhou, Guangdong Province.
这种盲目炒星，实在是艺术的悲哀。
Zhèzhǒng mángmù chǎoxīng，shízai shì yìshù de bēiāi。
It damages the arts in the way we blindly market, and promote pop stars.
退休后他一直沉潜于京剧艺术的研究。
Tuìxiū hòu tā yìzhí chénqián yú jīngjù yìshù de yánjiū。
After retirement, he became absorbed in the research of Beijing Opera.
制作工艺品太吃功夫了，工人们很辛苦。
Zhìzuò gōngyìpǐn tài chī gōngfu le，gōngrénmen hěnxīnkǔ。
Craft making requires great effort, so they have to work hard.
旧社会，曲艺表演者也被称为是吃开口饭的。
Jiù shèhuì，qǔyì biǎoyǎnzhě yě bèi chēngwéi shì chī kāikǒufàn de。
In old society, quyi performers were entertainers who talked or sang.
他对于京剧艺术的迷恋已经到了痴狂的程度了。
Tā duìyú jīngjù yìshù de míliàn yǐjing dào le chīkuáng de chéngdù le。
He is crazy about Beijing Opera.
这家小饭馆的厨子手艺真是不错，天天都有那么多人光顾。
Zhèjiā xiǎofànguǎn de chúzi shǒuyì zhēnshì búcuò，tiāntiān dōu yǒu nàme duō rén guānggù。
The little restaurant cooks was so skilled that many people came to dine there.
杵乐这种民间艺术歌舞在中国大陆是很少见到的。
Chǔyuè zhèzhǒng mínjiān yìshù gēwǔ zài Zhōngguó dàlù shì hěnshǎo jiàndào de。
&quot;Pestle music&quot; - A folk performance of song and dance, is very rare in Mainland China.
照规矩，这门手艺只能传技给自家的子孙。
Zhào guījǔ，zhè mén shǒuyì zhǐnéng chuánjì gěi zìjiā de zǐsūn。
According to the rules, this handicraft can only be passed on to the family\'s own descendants.
老艺术家们都渴望把自己的一身本事传人。
Lǎo yìshùjiāmen dōu kěwàng bǎ zìjǐ de yìshēn běnshì chuánrén。
The senior artists really want to pass on their skills to others.
他今年在文艺理论研究领域颇有创获。
Tā jīnnián zài wényì lǐlùn yánjiū lǐngyù pōyǒu chuànghuò。
He has made a number of new achievements in the theory of literary and art this year.
著名京剧表演艺术家尚长荣先生创演的曹操的形象入木三分。
Zhùmíng jīngjù biǎoyǎn yìshùjiā Shàng Chángróng xiānshēng chuàngyǎn de Cáo Cāo de xíng xiàng rùmùsānfēn。
The famous performing artist of Beijing Opera, Mr. Shang Changrong, has created and performed a vivid portrayal of Caocao.
艺术创作需要极富创造力的思维。
Yìshù chuàngzuò xūyào jí fù chuàngzàolì de sīwéi。
Creation of art demands a kind of thinking that embodies extremely rich creations.
词曲开始时都是和乐的艺术形式，发展到后来成为独立的文学形式。
Cíqǔ kāishǐ shí dōushì héyuè de yìshù xíngshì，fāzhǎn dào hòulái chéngwéi dúlì de wénxué xíngshì。
Both Ci and Qu were art forms of chords at the beginning. Later they developed into independent literary forms.
这个镇子瓷画工艺远近闻名。
Zhège zhènzi cíhuà gōngyì yuǎnjìn wénmíng。
The porcelain painting techniques of this town are known far and wide.
那个工艺师制作的瓷刻与众不同。
Nàge gōngyìshī zhìzuò de cíkè yǔzhòngbùtóng。
The porcelain carvings made by that artisan are so different from others.
这些面被这位民间艺人搓捏为一个个可爱的小动物。
Zhèxiē miàn bèi zhèwèi mínjiān yìrén cuōniē wéi yígè gèkě\'ài de xiǎodòngwù。
Dough is kneaded and then molded into little cute animals by this folk artisan.
这盏铜灯，底座错银，工艺极好。
Zhè zhǎn tóngdēng，dǐzuò cuòyín，gōngyì jí hǎo。
This brass lamp, with a silver-inlaid lamp stand, is made in excellent workmanship.
他们哥几个都是靠打把式卖艺为生。
Tāmen gē jǐgè dōushì kào dǎbǎshì màiyì wéishēng。
The brothers all live by practicing martial arts.
他在向我们展示蛋雕工艺。
Tā zài xiàng wǒmen zhǎnshì dàndiāo gōngyì。
He demonstrated the craft of egg carving for us.
你的手艺不错，今晚宴会你当厨。
Nǐ de shǒuyì búcuò，jīnwǎn yànhuì nǐ dāngchú。
You\'ll cook the dinner since you are highly skilled.
数万市民来悼唁这位人民艺术家。
Shùwàn shìmín lái dàoyàn zhèwèi rénmín yìshùjiā。
Hundreds of thousands of citizens are grieving over the death of this popular artist.
文艺作品中应当着力塑造典型化人物。
Wényì zuòpǐn zhōng yīngdāng zháolì sùzào diǎnxínghuà rénwù。
Literary works should focus on portraying typical people.
这座商场里面有上百台电子游艺机。
Zhèzuò shāngchǎng lǐmian yǒu shàngbǎi tái diànzǐ yóuyìjī。
There are hundreds of electronic games in this shopping mall.
这个仿古兜鍪的工艺品是我刚买的。
Zhège fǎnggǔ dōumóu de gōngyìpǐn shì wǒ gāng mǎi de。
I bought this copy of an ancient helmet recently.
修理钟表算是他的独门手艺了。
Xiūlǐ zhōng biǎo suàn shì tā de dúmén shǒuyì le。
He is very skilled at repairing clocks and watches.
这件工艺品的表面有金属镀层。
Zhèjiàn gōngyìpǐn de biǎomiàn yǒu jīnshǔ dùcéng。
This piece of handicraft has metal cladding on its surface.
这本《中国京剧概览》是了解京剧艺术的钥匙。
Zhèběn《Zhōngguó jīngjù gàilǎn》 shì liǎojiě jīngjù yìshù de yàoshi。
The book, &quot;A General Survey of Beijing Opera in China&quot; is a key to acquaint yourself with the art of Beijing opera.
据考证，擀毡工艺已有上千年的历史。
Jù kǎozhèng，gǎnzhān gōngyì yǐyǒu shàng qiānnián de lìshǐ。
It has been found that felt-making techniques have a history of over a thousand years.
这些手艺由她的孙女赓续下来了。
Zhèxiē shǒuyì yóu tā de sūnnǚ gēngxù xiàlái le。
These handicrafts were passed on to her granddaughter.
这是幅污水处理的工艺流程图。
Zhè shì fú wūshuǐ chǔlǐ de gōngyì liúchéngtú。
This is a drawing of the technological process of sewage processing.
我躬逢梅兰芳艺术高峰的时代，他真不愧为京剧大师。
Wǒ gōngféng Méi Lánfāng yìshù gāofēng de shídài，tā zhēn búkuì wéi jīngjù dàshī。
I was present in person at the height of Meilanfang\'s art career. He really deserves to be called a master of Beijing Opera.
不同的艺术家在唱同样的段子时，鼓词会有很大不同。
Bùtóng de yìshùjiā zài chàng tóngyàng de duànzi shí，gǔcí huì yǒu hěndà bùtóng。
Lyrics vary greatly if the same piece is sung by different artists.
这位老艺术家已经有好多年没有登台演出了，这次复出让现场观者如堵。
Zhèwèi lǎoyìshùjiā yǐjing yǒu hǎo duōnián méiyǒu dēngtái yǎnchū le，zhècì fùchū ràng xiànchǎng guānzhě rúdǔ。
This old artist hasn\'t performed on stage for many years. This return performance has earned a large audience.
文革中下乡的艺术家到现在还有很多都没有归口，真是可惜。
Wéngé zhōng xiàxiāng de yìshùjiā dào xiànzài háiyǒu hěnduō dōu méiyǒu guīkǒu，zhēnshì kěxī。
It is pity that many of the old artists that went to the countryside during the Cultural Revolution haven\'t been able to return to their original professions yet.
在金元时期，行院艺人是没有社会地位的。
Zài jīnyuán shíqī，hòngyuàn yìrén shì méiyǒu shèhuì dìwèi de。
In the Jin and Yuan dynasties, actors and actresses had no social status.
艺人们的炒作，就是为了产生轰动效应。
Yìrénmen de chǎozuò，jiùshì wèi le chǎnshēng hōngdòng xiàoyìng。
Deliberate news-making of celebrities aims to create strong public interest.
过去的游艺场都会发放红票给顾客。
Guòqù de yóuyìchǎng dōuhuì fāfàng hóngpiào gěi gùkè。
Entertainment places in the past used to give out free tickets to customers.
少数民族艺术家们在人民大会堂进行了汇演。
Shǎoshù mínzú yìshùjiāmen zài rénmín dàhuìtáng jìnxíng le huìyǎn。
Artists from minor nationalities gave a joint performance in the People\'s Hall.
我经常和乒乓球协会的会友一起切磋球艺。
Wǒ jīngcháng hé pīngpāngqiú xiéhuì de huìyǒu yìqǐ qiècuō qiúyì。
Members of the ping pong association and I often learn from each other by practicing together.
他们的文章佶屈聱牙，甚至文理不通，既缺思想性，又无艺术性。
Tāmen de wénzhāng jíqū áoyá，shènzhì wénlǐ bùtōng，jì quē sīxiǎngxìng，yòu wú yìshùxìng。
Their articles read awkwardly and don\'t even have unity and coherence, lacking in both ideas and art.
急口令是中国民间文学中比较独特的语言艺术形式。
Jíkǒulìng shì Zhōngguó mínjiān wénxué zhōng bǐjiào dútè de yǔyán yìshù xíngshì。
The tongue twister is a distinctive language art form in Chinese folk literature.
这家工艺品店卖的角雕很精美。
Zhèjiā gōngyìpǐndiàn mài de jiǎodiāo hěnjīngměi。
The horn carvings sold at the craftwork shop are very delicate.
老人金针度人，把自己的手艺全部传给了他的徒弟。
Lǎorén jīnzhēn dùrén，bǎ zìjǐ de shǒuyì quánbùchuángěi le tā de túdì。
The old man taught his students everything he knew.
他的绘画技艺日渐精进，真是难得。
Tā de huìhuà jìyì rìjiàn jīngjìn，zhēnshì nándé。
He is making great progress in painting, which is hard to achieve.
你要用心去领略中国艺术的精微。
Nǐ yào yòngxīn qù lǐnglüè Zhōngguó yìshù de jīngwēi。
You must try to comprehend the profoundity and subtlety of Chinese art.
由于家里世代经营茶园，她十分精于茶艺。
Yóuyú jiā lǐ shìdài jīngyíng cháyuán，tā shífēn jīngyú cháyì。
She is good at conducting tea ceremonies, as her family ran tea gardens from generation to generation.
这些卖艺的是九流三教，什么人都有。
Zhèxiē màiyì de shì jiǔliú sānjiào，shénme rén dōu yǒu。
These perfomers come from all walks of life.
这位大侠有一身武艺，在局子里走镖。
Zhèwèi dàxiá yǒu yìshēn wǔyì，zài júzi lǐ zǒubiāo。
The swordman is very experienced in fighting and works for a professional armed escort establishment.
大师去世后，他的艺术也就成了绝响。
Dàshī qùshì hòu，tā de yìshù yě jiù chéng le juéxiǎng。
After passing away, the master\'s art became a lost art.
他练就了拉面的绝艺，能把面拉到数十米长，而面不断。
Tā liànjiù le lāmiàn de juéyì，néng bǎ miàn lādào shù shí mǐ cháng，ér miàn búduàn。
He has a unique skill of making hand-pulled noodles. The noodles can be pulled to a length of ten meters and still don\'t break.
小明精通棋艺，面对棋盘他总有种君临天下的感觉。
Xiǎo Míng jīngtōng qíyì，miànduì qípán tā zǒng yǒu zhǒng jūnlín tiānxià de gǎnjué。
Xianming is good at playing chess. He always feels like a sovereign descending to the world in front of the chess board.
这件艺术品的刻工十分精美，难怪会这么值钱。
Zhèjiàn yìshùpǐn de kègōng shífēn jīngměi，nánguài huì zhème zhíqián。
This engraving of artistic work is sublime. No wonder it is so expensive.
这件丝织品，采用的是刻丝工艺。
Zhèjiàn sīzhīpǐn，cǎiyòng de shì kèsī gōngyì。
This knit silk product adopts kesi weaving (weaving done with fine silks and gold thread by the tapestry method).
他从小就和爷爷学习刻制印章的技术，现在技艺已经很精湛了。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù hé yéye xuéxí kèzhì yìnzhāng de jìshù，xiànzài jìyì yǐjing hěnjīngzhàn le。
He has been learning seal engraving from his grandpa, and now has perfect craftsmanship.
他这手空拳夺刀的武艺，令人叫绝。
Tā zhè shǒu kōngquán duódāo de wǔyì，lìngrén jiàojué。
Everyone applauded his skill in seizing knives bare-handed.
你这门手艺，因为没有用武之地而旷废了，真可惜！
Nǐ zhè mén shǒuyì，yīnwèi méiyǒu yòngwǔ zhī dì ér kuàngfèi le，zhēn kěxī！
It is regrettable that your skill was neglected because it can be applied nowhere.
这件衣服是经过拉毛工艺处理的，手感很好。
Zhèjiàn yīfu shì jīngguò lāmáo gōngyì chǔlǐ de，shǒugǎn hěnhǎo。
This napped garment is soft to the touch.
他坚信这门艺术自有来者承继。
Tā jiānxìn zhè mén yìshù zìyǒu láizhě chéngjì。
He is sure that future generations will inherit the art.
莱塞被广泛运用在医疗、商业、艺术等许多领域。
Láisāi bèi guǎngfàn yùnyòng zài yīliáo、shāngyè、yìshù děng xǔduō lǐngyù。
Lasers are widely used in many fields, such as medical treatment, commerce, and arts, etc..
戏曲这种艺术形式滥觞于宋朝。
Xìqǔ zhèzhǒng yìshù xíngshì lànshāngyú Sòngcháo。
Traditional opera originated in the Song dynasty.
我小时候就爱上劳作课，因为可以亲手制作工艺品。
Wǒ xiǎoshíhou jiù ài shàng láozuòkè，yīnwèi kěyǐ qīnshǒu zhìzuò gōngyìpǐn。
I liked handiwork courses when I was young, because I could make handicrafts myself.
有些老辈的手艺确实比现代人要精湛。
Yǒuxiē lǎobèi de shǒuyì quèshí bǐ xiàndàirén yào jīngzhàn。
Some old folks are more skilled than younger people.
李多奎先生对老旦艺术的贡献是大家有目共睹的。
Lǐ Duōkuí xiānshēng duì lǎodàn yìshù de gòngxiàn shì dàjiā yǒumù gòngdǔ de。
It is obvious to everyone that Mr. Li Duokui has contributed a lot to the art of laodan (an old female role in traditional Chinese opera).
他正在烙花，会这种手艺的人已经不多了。
Tā zhèngzài làohuā，huì zhèzhǒng shǒuyì de rén yǐjing bùduō le。
He is pyrographing. Now there are not many people who know this craft.
这个理发店的生意不错，原因是师傅的手艺好。
Zhège lǐfàdiàn de shēngyì búcuò，yuányīn shì shīfu de shǒuyì hǎo。
The business of the hairdressing salon is quite good due to the skill of the stylists techniques.
理发员和理发师的差别在于理发的技艺水平高低不同。
Lǐfàyuán hé lǐfàshī de chābié zàiyú lǐfà de jìyì shuǐpíng gāodī bùtóng。
The difference between a barber, and a hairdresser lies in their technical skill level.
一件艺术品的真正价值很难用金钱来量化。
Yí jiàn yìshùpǐn de zhēnzhèng jiàzhí hěnnán yòng jīnqián lái liànghuà。
The real value of an artwork is difficult to be measured with money.
灵感对于一个艺术家来讲是非常重要的。
Línggǎn duìyú yígè yìshùjiā láijiǎng shì fēicháng zhòngyào de。
Inspiration is very important to an artist.
令郎的武艺我是领教过的，在下甘败下风。
Lìngláng de wǔyì wǒ shì lǐngjiào guò de，zàixià gānbài xiàfēng。
I’ve encountered your son’s martial arts skills, and I sincerely acknowledge his superiority.
这本书主要介绍了戏曲艺术的流变历史。
Zhèběnshū zhǔyào jièshào le xìqǔ yìshù de liúbiàn lìshǐ。
This book mainly talks about the evolution of traditional Chinese opera.
在古代六艺是指礼、乐、射、御、书、数等六种技能。
Zài gǔdài liùyì shì zhǐ lǐ、lè、shè、yù、shū、shù děng liùzhǒng jìnéng。
The six arts in ancient China meant rites, music, archery, charioteering, reading and writing, and arithmetic.
他很小时就熟读六艺。
Tā hěnxiǎo shí jiù shúdú liùyì。
He read the six classics fluently when he was young.
用螺甸制作的工艺品在游客中很受欢迎。
Yòng luódiàn zhìzuò de gōngyìpǐn zài yóukè zhōng hěnshòu huānyíng。
Handicrafts inlaid with mother-of-pearl are very popular with tourists.
他已经迷醉于京剧艺术多年了。
Tā yǐjing mízuìyú jīngjù yìshù duōnián le。
He has been fascinated by the art of Beijing opera for years.
他面塑的手艺是从那个老人那学来的。
Tā miànsù de shǒuyì shì cóng nàge lǎorén nà xuélái de。
His learned craft of dough modeling from that old man.
文艺界既是个名场，也是利场。
Wényìjiè jì shì gè míngchǎng，yě shì lìchǎng。
The world of literature and art is an arena where people jockey for both position and wealth.
自从得到名师亲授，他的技艺进步很快。
Zìcóng dédào míngshī qīnshòu，tā de jìyì jìnbùhěnkuài。
After having had the benefit of guidance by a master, he has made much headway in skill.
多年来，他一直以他的艺术创作而名震中外。
Duōniánlái，tā yìzhí yǐ tā de yìshù chuàngzuò ér míngzhèn zhōng wài。
He has been famous at home, and abroad for his artistic works through these years.
泰山上的摩崖石刻，都是精美的艺术品。
Tài Shān shàng de móyá shíkè，dōushì jīngměi de yìshùpǐn。
All inscriptions on cliff surfaces of Tai Mountain are delicate artistic works.
他跟师傅学到了磨漆画这项技艺。
Tā gēn shīfu xuédào le móqīhuà zhè xiàng jìyì。
He has learned the skill of lacquer painting from his master.
这块玉石要几经磨制才能成为好看的工艺品啊！
Zhèkuài yùshí yào jǐjīng mózhì cáinéng chéngwéi hǎokàn de gōngyìpǐn a！
How many times does the jade need to be polished to be wonderful handiwork!
魔术师的各种神奇技艺都是艰苦训练出来的。
Móshùshī de gèzhǒng shénqí jìyì dōushì jiānkǔ xùnliàn chūlái de。
All magic skills of magicians are learned through hard training.
她对艺术事业的贡献是不可抹煞的！
Tā duì yìshù shìyè de gòngxiàn shì bùkě mǒshà de！
Her contribution to art can not be obliterated.
他的墨笔山水画是很不错的艺术作品。
Tā de mòbǐ shānshuǐhuà shì hěnbúcuò de yìshù zuòpǐn。
His Chinese landscape paintings by brush are wonderful artistic works.
他从小就拜师学习南拳，如今已经武艺高强了。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù bàishī xuéxí nánquán，rújīn yǐjing wǔyì gāoqiáng le。
He learned southern style boxing from a master when he was very young, and now he is highly skilled in wushu now.
李师傅的内画技艺，既继承了传统又有自己的创新，非常漂亮！
Lǐ shīfu de nèihuà jìyì，jì jìchéng le chuántǒng yòu yǒu zìjǐ de chuàngxīn，fēicháng piàoliàng！
Master Li has inherited traditional skills from his predecessors and innovates his own skills in inside-bottle painting, so his works are very beautiful.
用涅石染把布料染黑，如今这已是一种很古老很少见的工艺了。
Yòng nièshírǎn bǎ bùliào rǎnhēi，rújīn zhè yǐshì yìzhǒng hěngǔlǎo hěnshǎojiàn de gōngyì le。
Using alunites to dye cloth black is now an old but rarely seen craft.
她报考了农业大学，将来想当个农艺师。
Tā bàokǎo le nóngyè dàxué，jiānglái xiǎng dāng gè nóngyìshī。
She became a candidate for admission to an agricultural university, because she dreams of becoming a agronomist.
这些工艺品如此精美，真令人拍案叫绝。
Zhèxiē gōngyìpǐn rúcǐ jīngměi，zhēn lìngrén pāi\'ànjiàojué。
The delicate crafts struck everyone with admiration.
她烹制西餐的手艺是从妈妈那里学来的。
Tā pēngzhì xīcān de shǒuyì shì cóng māma nàlǐ xué lái de。
The craft of cooking Western-style food was learned from his mother.
她开了一家专营各类皮件工艺品的小店。
Tā kāi le yìjiā zhuānyíng gè lèi píjiàn gōngyìpǐn de xiǎodiàn。
She runs a small shop which deals in fur goods.
他总是谦称自己是书法艺术的门外汉。
Tā zǒngshì qiānchēng zìjǐ shì shūfǎ yìshù de ménwàihàn。
He always modestly calls himself a laymen in calligraphy.
孙悟空四处求师学艺，终于学成了通天的本领。
Sūnwùkōng sìchù qiúshī xuéyì，zhōng yú xuéchéng le tōngtiān de běnlǐng。
The monkey king sought masters everywhere, and finally mastered extraordinary ability.
她以一套漂亮流畅的球操获得了艺术体操大赛的冠军。
Tā yǐ yítào piàoliàng liúchàng de qiúcāo huòdé le yìshù tǐcāo dàsài de guànjūn。
She won the championship of the artistic gymnastics competition with her fluent ball gymnastics.
这些艺术作品的原材料全部取自天然。
Zhèxiē yìshù zuòpǐn de yuáncáiliào quánbùqǔzì tiānrán。
The materials for the works of art come from nature.
他的雕刻技艺十分高超，居然在这么小的石头上雕刻出了人形。
Tā de diāokè jìyì shífēn gāochāo，jūrán zài zhème xiǎo de shítou shàng diāokè chū le rénxíng。
He is skilled in carving, to be able to carve a figure from such a small stone.
我们最近搞了一次慰问荣军的文艺演出。
Wǒmen zuìjìn gǎo le yícì wèiwèn róngjūn de wényì yǎnchū。
We organized a theatrical performance to express our gratitude to the disabled soldiers.
这件工艺品经过修复，已经完好如初了。
Zhèjiàn gōngyìpǐn jīngguò xiūfù，yǐjing wánhǎo rúchū le。
After the repairs, the craft is in as good shape as it was before.
从颜色款式中可以看出，这件瓷器的烧制工艺十分高超。
Cóng yánsè kuǎnshì zhōng kěyǐ kànchū，zhèjiàn cíqì de shāozhì gōngyì shífēn gāochāo。
Judging from the color and style, this porcelain was fired with advanced skills.
每逢社火，村子里都会有各种各样的演艺活动。
Měi féng shèhuǒ，cūnzi lǐ dōuhuì yǒu gèzhǒng gèyàng de yǎnyì huódòng。
On traditional festivals for folk art, various performances are put on in villages
生角是中国戏曲艺术中的一个重要行当。
Shēngjué shì Zhōngguó xìqǔ yìshù zhōng de yígè zhòngyào hángdàng。
The male character is an important profession in Chinese theatre.
这个艺术体操队中仅有两名练绳操队员。
Zhège yìshù tǐcāoduì zhōng jǐnyǒu liǎng míng liàn shéngcāo duìyuán。
There are only two rope dancers in this gymnastics team.
我学艺未精，恐怕有辱师门。
Wǒ xuéyì wèijīng，kǒngpà yǒu rǔ shīmén。
I\'m not skilful yet in this profession and might disgrace my teacher.
十不闲儿莲花落是旧时曲艺的一种，一般在相声之前演唱以招揽生意。
Shíbùxiánr liánhuāluò shì jiùshí qǔyì de yìzhǒng，yìbān zài xiàng shēng zhīqián yǎnchàng yǐ zhāolǎn shēngyì。
&quot;Shibuxianlianhualuo&quot; (a singing form accompanied by music on ten percussion instruments) is an old folk art form, which is generally performed before a comic dialogue to attract attention.
十年动乱期间，曾有许多艺术品遭到毁坏。
Shí nián dòngluàn qījiān，céng yǒu xǔduō yìshùpǐn zāodào huǐhuài。
Many works of art were destroyed during the ten years of turmoil.
十三辙是戏曲、曲艺约定俗成要遵照的韵脚辙口。
Shísānzhé shì xìqǔ、qǔyì yuēdìng súchéng yào zūnzhào de yùnjiǎo zhékǒu。
The Thirteen Rhymes are the established rhymes in operas and other folk art forms.
现在的曲艺演员已经很少有人能够演唱什不闲儿莲花落了。
Xiànzài de qǔyì yǎnyuán yǐjing hěnshǎo yǒurén nénggòu yǎnchàng shíbùxiánr liánhuāluò le。
Few of today\'s opera actors can sing &quot;Shibuxian\'erlianhuala&quot; (a singing form accompanied by music on ten percussion instruments).
龙门石窑是河南洛阳的著名景点，是一个古代石刻艺术的宝库。
Lóngménshíyáo shì Hénán Luòyáng de zhùmíng jǐngdiǎn，shì yígè gǔdài shíkè yìshù de bǎokù。
Longmen Grottoes is a famous sight spot in Luoyang in Henan province, and also a treasure house of ancient stone-carving art.
时代感和艺术性都具备的作品才是好作品。
Shídàigǎn hé yìshùxìng dōu jùbèi de zuòpǐn cái shì hǎo zuòpǐn。
Only those works with a sense of times and artistry can be called good ones.
王毓宝先生是著名的天津时调表演艺术家。
Wáng Yùbǎo xiānshēng shì zhùmíng de Tiānjīn shídiào biǎoyǎn yìshùjiā。
Mr. Wang Yubao is a well-known Tianjin Ditty singer.
《天桥拾趣》这篇文章讲的是老北京天桥艺人们的零散故事。
《Tiānqiáoshíqù》zhèpiān wénzhāng jiǎng de shì lǎo Běijīng tiānqiáo yìrénmen de língsǎn gùshì。
The Interesting Stories on the Overpasses is an article describing odd stories of the artists on overpasses in old Beijing.
这次厨艺大赛专门设置了食雕这个项目。
Zhècì chúyì dàsài zhuānmén shèzhì le shídiāo zhège xiàng mù。
The cooking contest this time has especially set up the activity of food carving.
女孩子们都喜欢各种各样的小饰品、小玩艺儿。
Nǚháizimen dōu xǐhuan gèzhǒng gèyàng de xiǎoshìpǐn、xiǎowányìr。
All girls like different kinds of little decorations and souvenirs.
他毕业论文的题目是《试论新闻工作的艺术性》。
Tā bìyè lùnwén de tímù shì《Shìlùn xīnwén gōngzuò de yìshùxìng》。
The title of his thesis is &quot;Some Opinions on the Artistic Quality of Journalism&quot;.
如果你常看娱乐新闻，会觉得文艺圈简直像个是非窝。
Rúguǒ nǐ chángkàn yúlè xīnwén，huì juédé wényìquān jiǎnzhí xiàng gè shìfēiwō。

这些手艺由她的孙女赓续下来了。

The old man taught his students everything he knew.

他正在烙花，会这种手艺的人已经不多了。

遇到困难决不后退
yùdào kùnnan jué bú hòutuì 
never shrink from difficulties
他一遇上困难就灰心丧气。
Tā yí yù shàngkùnnan jiù huīxīnsàngqì。
He\'s easily disheartened by difficulties.
一遇到困难，他就满脸苦相。
Yí yùdào kùnnan，tā jiù mǎnliǎn kǔ xiàng。
He gives an agonized look whenever he faces difficulty.
他总有这样一股拧劲儿：越是遇到困难就越是充满斗志。
Tā zǒngyǒu zhèyàng yìgǔ nǐngjìnr:yuè shì yùdào kùnnan jiù yuè shì chōngmǎn dòuzhì。
He is always so pigheaded. The more difficulties he encounters, the more fighting spirit he has.
他不是一个遇到困难就束手无策的人。
Tā búshì yígè yùdào kùnnan jiù shùshǒuwúcè de rén。
He is not a man without resources when running into trouble.
每当遇到困难的时候，他总是畏葸不前。
Měidāng yùdào kùnnan de shíhou，tā zǒngshì wèixǐ bùqián。
He always shrinks away when faced with difficulties.
每次遇到困难你就退缩，真是个窝囊废！
Měi cì yùdào kùnnan nǐ jiù tuìsuō，zhēnshì gè wōnángfèi！
You shrink whenever you encounter difficulties, what a worthless wretch!
遇到困难时，姐妹们总是给我支招儿。
Yùdào kùnnan shí，jiěmèimen zǒngshì gěi wǒ zhīzhāor。
My sisters always give me suggestions when I have problems.
你如果遇到困难，可以去找同乡会的人帮忙。
Nǐ rúguǒ yùdào kùnnan，kěyǐ qù zhǎo tóngxiānghuì de rén bāngmáng。
If you run into trouble, you can turn to the Association of Fellow Provincials.
遇到困难我们不应该龟缩。
Yùdào kùnnán wǒmen bùyīnggāi guīsuō。
We shouldn\'t recoil in the face of difficulty.
当他人遇到困难的时候，我们应该慷慨解囊。
Dāng tārén yùdào kùnnán de shíhou，wǒmen yīnggāi kāngkǎijiěnáng.
When others are in difficulties, we should be generous to them.
朋友遇到困难，我就拉他一把。
Péngyou yùdào kùnnán，wǒ jiù lā tā yìbǎ.
I would always help a friend in trouble.
她遇到困难时，朋友们想方设法帮她解决。
Tā yùdào kùnnán shí，péngyǒumen xiǎngfāng-shèfǎ bāng tā jiějué。
When she encountered a difficulty, her friends moved heaven and earth to help her.
不能遇到点困难就打退堂鼓呀。
Bùnéng yùdào diǎn kùnnan jiù dǎtuìtánggǔ ya。
You can\'t give up the moment you run up against difficulty.
年轻人经事少，遇到问题难免想的不周到。
Niánqīngrén jīngshì shǎo，yùdào wèntí nánmiǎn xiǎng de bùzhōudào。
Young people lack experience and can not consider things in a comprehensive way.
无论遇到什么难事他都能想得通。
Wúlùn yùdào shénme nánshì tā dōunéng xiǎngdétōng。
Whatever happens, he can always take it easy.
我们起头遇到些困难，后来就好多了。
Wǒmen qǐtóu yùdào xiē kùnnán，hòulái jiù hǎoduō le.
We encountered some difficulties at the beginning, but later things got a lot better.
极困难的境遇
jí kùnnan de jìngyù
extremely adverse circumstances
一种新的工作，开始总会遇到一些困难。
Yì zhǒng xīn de gōngzuò，kāishǐ zǒnghuì yùdào yìxiē kùnnan。
You always run into some difficulties at the beginning of any new job.
如果你遇到什么困难，我们必将全力鼎助。
Rúguǒ nǐ yùdào shénme kùnnan，wǒmen bì jiāng quánlì dǐngzhù。
If you have any difficulty, we will help you with all our strength.
认定了这条路就要坚定地走下去，遇到什么艰难险阻也绝不回还。
Rèndìng le zhètiáo lù jiùyào jiāndìng de zǒu xiàqù，yùdào shénme jiānnán xiǎnzǔ yě juébùhuíhuán。
Once you have decided the way to go, you should move forward without hesitation. Whatever hardship you may be confronted with, you should never return to the starting point.
在列车上遇到什么困难，都可以请列车员帮忙解决。
Zài lièchē shàng yùdào shénme kùnnan，dōu kěyǐ qǐng lièchēyuán bāngmáng jiějué。
If you have any trouble on the train, you can ask the train attendant for help.
无论遇到什么困难，你都可以求助于人民警察。
Wúlùn yùdào shénme kùnnan，nǐ dōu kěyǐ qiúzhùyú rénmín jǐngchá。
You can turn to the people\'s police for help, no matter what kind of trouble you are in.
如果你遇到什么困难我必当相帮。
Rúguǒ nǐ yùdào shénme kùnnan wǒ bìdāng xiāngbāng。
I will surely help you out if you have difficulties.
棋逢对手难相胜，将遇良才不敢骄。
Qíféngduìshǒu nán xiāngshèng，jiàngyùliángcái bùgǎn jiāo。
When a general meets a worthy opponent, he won\'t dare to underestimate him.
原来她丈夫遇车祸去世了，难怪她的哭声这么阴惨。
Yuánlái tā zhàngfū yù chēhuò qùshì le，nánguài tā de kūshēng zhème yīncǎn。
As it turns out that her husband died in a traffic accident, there is no wonder that her crying is so sorrowful and plaintive.
突然遇到这么一件事，难怪他发蒙！
Tūrán yù dào zhème yíjiàn shì，nánguài tā fāmēng！
He became muddled after such an sudden incident.
无论遇到什么样的困难我们也不能退后。
Wúlùn yùdào shénmeyàng de kùnnan wǒmen yě bùnéng tuìhòu。
We will never fall back, whatever difficulties we might run into.
路上遇着了说不尽的艰难险阻。

遇到前所未有的困难
yùdào qiánsuǒwèiyǒu de kùnnan
encounter greater difficulties than ever
我与他手谈数局而难分胜负，真是遇到对手了。
Wǒ yǔ tā shǒután shù jú ér nánfēn shèngfù，zhēnshì yùdào duìshǒu le。
We\'ve drawn several times in chess. He is really a match for me!

向着遇难渔船方向行驶
遇难获救。

遇上顶头风，自行车很难骑

a ship lost in the storm
在风暴中遇难的一只船
The victims have not been named.
遇难者的身份还没有确定。
The victim was named as John Smith.
遇难者被确认是约翰史密斯。

They were lucky not to die up the mountain when their group was struck by disaster.

他们很幸运，在遇到灾难时没有死在山上。
This is an opportunity of lifetime, so you should try your best.

这是一次一生难遇的机会，因此你应竭尽全力。
We had difficulty in extracting the metal from the ore.
Wǒmen zài cóng kuàngshí zhōng tíliàn jīnshǔ shí yùdàole kùnnan。
我们在从矿石中提炼金属时遇到了困难。
He was knocked about in the first three rounds.
Tā zài qián sān jú yùdàole kùnnan。
他在前三局遇到了困难。
In spite of his troubles he never gave up hope.

尽管遭遇重重困难，但他从未放弃希望。

你告诉过我，无论我遇到任何困难，你都会帮助我。

刚开始学一门语言时，遇到一些困难是很正常的。

我们不论遇到什么困难都应该继续我们的旅行。

We were in luck and had no difficulties getting on a flight.
