Tā yǒu hǔdǎn què méi zhìhuì，yùdào wēixiǎn yě zhǐguǎn wǎngqián chōng。
He is a man of dauntless courage, but he lacks wisdom. When confronted with danger, he just rushes forward.
你们是亲兄弟，遇到争执应互谅互让。
Nǐmen shì qīnxiōngdì，yùdào zhēngzhí yīng hùliàng hù ràng。
You are full brothers. You should understand, and make concessions to each other when you are at odds.
前方遇到紧急情况，我们必须马上回撤。
Qiánfāng yùdào jǐnjí qíngkuàng，wǒmen bìxū mǎshàng huíchè。
There appeared an emergency in front. We must beat a retreat immediately.
认定了这条路就要坚定地走下去，遇到什么艰难险阻也绝不回还。
Rèndìng le zhètiáo lù jiùyào jiāndìng de zǒu xiàqù，yùdào shénme jiānnán xiǎnzǔ yě juébùhuíhuán。
Once you have decided the way to go, you should move forward without hesitation. Whatever hardship you may be confronted with, you should never return to the starting point.
遇到复杂的词语要作个简释，以便学生明白。
Yùdào fùzá de cíyǔ yào zuò gè jiǎnshì，yǐ biàn xuésheng míngbai。
Difficult words should be annotated, so that students will be able to understand them.
他遇到了麻烦，只有我们才能帮他解愁。
Tā yùdào le máfan，zhǐyǒu wǒmen cáinéng bāng tā jiěchóu。
He is in trouble now, and only we can help him and cheer him up.
年轻人经事少，遇到问题难免想的不周到。
Niánqīngrén jīngshì shǎo，yùdào wèntí nánmiǎn xiǎng de bùzhōudào。
Young people lack experience and can not consider things in a comprehensive way.
取经途中师徒四人遇到了很多精怪。
Qǔjīng tú zhōng shītú sì rén yùdào le hěnduō jīngguài。
On the way to the West, the monk and his followers encountered a lot of demons.
卷曲的茶叶遇到开水渐渐舒展开来，在杯子里上下浮沉。
Juǎnqū de cháyè yùdào kāishuǐ jiànjiàn shūzhǎn kāilái，zài bēizi lǐ shàngxià fúchén。
The crimped tea leaves gradually unfold after hitting the hot water and are floating up and down in the cup.
别看她平时挺能说的，真遇到该表明态度时，她就卷舌不语了。
Biékàn tā píngshí tǐng néngshuō de，zhēn yùdào gāi biǎomíng tàidu shí，tā jiù juǎnshé bùyǔ le。
Though she talks a lot generally, when it is time to make her attitude clear, she says nothing.
遇到烦恼的事，开颜笑笑，烦恼总会过去的。
Yùdào fánnǎo de shì，kāiyán xiàoxiào，fánnǎo zǒng huì guòqù de。
Whenever coming across upset things, smile, because everything will pass in the end.
一遇到困难，他就满脸苦相。
Yí yùdào kùnnan，tā jiù mǎnliǎn kǔ xiàng。
He gives an agonized look whenever he faces difficulty.
在列车上遇到什么困难，都可以请列车员帮忙解决。
Zài lièchē shàng yùdào shénme kùnnan，dōu kěyǐ qǐng lièchēyuán bāngmáng jiějué。
If you have any trouble on the train, you can ask the train attendant for help.
他总是这样慢慢悠悠的，遇到什么事情都不着急。
Tā zǒngshì zhèyàng mànmànyōuyōu de，yùdào shénme shìqing dōu bùzháojí。
He is such a slowcoach that he won’t feel urgency whatever happens.
年轻人要朝气蓬勃，不能因为遇到一时的挫折就显得暮气沉沉的。
Niánqīngrén yào zhāoqì péngbó，bùnéng yīnwèi yùdào yìshí de cuòzhé jiù xiǎnde mùqì chénchén de。
Young people should be full of youthful spirit, and can not get lethargic due to temporary frustration.
年轻力壮的大小伙子，怎么能一遇到挫折就叹气呢？
Niánqīng lìzhuàng de dàxiǎohuǒzi，zěnme néng yí yùdào cuòzhé jiù tànqì ne？
You are a young and vigorous man. How can you sigh when you meet a setback?
他总有这样一股拧劲儿：越是遇到困难就越是充满斗志。
Tā zǒngyǒu zhèyàng yìgǔ nǐngjìnr:yuè shì yùdào kùnnan jiù yuè shì chōngmǎn dòuzhì。
He is always so pigheaded. The more difficulties he encounters, the more fighting spirit he has.
我迷路了，正好遇到一个放牛的牛郎，给我指了路。
Wǒ mílù le，zhènghǎo yùdào yígè fàngniú de niúláng，gěi wǒ zhǐ le lù。
I was lost, when a cowherd appeared and showed me the road.
遇到不懂的问题，他总是喜欢刨根儿问底。
Yùdào bùdǒng de wèntí，tā zǒngshì xǐhuan bàogēnr wèndǐ。
He always like to get to the root of everything he doesn\'t understand.
她面容憔悴，目光凄楚，大概是遇到了不幸的事。
Tā miànróng qiáocuì，mùguāng qīchǔ，dàgài shì yùdào le búxìng de shì。
She looks wan, sallow and miserable, she\'s probably had some bad luck.
遇到抢匪时他冲在了最前面。
Yùdào qiǎngfěi shí tā chōngzài le zuì qiánmiàn。
He was right at the front when they were confronted by the robbers.
无论遇到什么困难，你都可以求助于人民警察。
Wúlùn yùdào shénme kùnnan，nǐ dōu kěyǐ qiúzhùyú rénmín jǐngchá。
You can turn to the people\'s police for help, no matter what kind of trouble you are in.
他经常遇到这种棘手的事情，因此处理起来也是如履平地。
Tā jīngcháng yùdào zhèzhǒng jíshǒu de shìqing，yīncǐ chǔlǐ qǐlái yěshì rúlǚ píngdì。
He always runs into tough matters like this, so it is easy for him to solve them.
今年遇到了特大旱情，看来农作物要失收了。
Jīnnián yùdào le tèdà hànqíng，kànlái nóngzuòwù yào shīshōu le。
There was a serious drought this year, and it seems there won\'t be a good harvest of crops.
我与他手谈数局而难分胜负，真是遇到对手了。
Wǒ yǔ tā shǒután shù jú ér nánfēn shèngfù，zhēnshì yùdào duìshǒu le。
We\'ve drawn several times in chess. He is really a match for me!
他不是一个遇到困难就束手无策的人。
Tā búshì yígè yùdào kùnnan jiù shùshǒuwúcè de rén。
He is not a man without resources when running into trouble.
他在遇到突发事件时总能泰然处之，这点让我很佩服。
Tā zài yùdào tūfā shìjiàn shí zǒng néng tàirán chǔzhī，zhè diǎn ràng wǒ hěnpèifú。
He is always calm when faced with an emergency, which makes me admire him very much.
我没有想到能在街上突遇到我的老师。
Wǒ méiyǒu xiǎngdào néng zài jiē shàng tū yùdào wǒ de lǎoshī。
I didn\'t expect to meet my teacher in the street.
无论遇到什么样的困难我们也不能退后。
Wúlùn yùdào shénmeyàng de kùnnan wǒmen yě bùnéng tuìhòu。
We will never fall back, whatever difficulties we might run into.
每当遇到困难的时候，他总是畏葸不前。
Měidāng yùdào kùnnan de shíhou，tā zǒngshì wèixǐ bùqián。
He always shrinks away when faced with difficulties.
每次遇到困难你就退缩，真是个窝囊废！
Měi cì yùdào kùnnan nǐ jiù tuìsuō，zhēnshì gè wōnángfèi！
You shrink whenever you encounter difficulties, what a worthless wretch!
乌鲗遇到危险的时候会喷出黑色液体。
Wūzéi yùdào wēixiǎn de shíhou huì pēnchū hēisè yètǐ。
The cuttlefish spurts out dark ink when it is in danger.
你遇到这点小事就害怕了，真是吴牛喘月。
Nǐ yùdào zhè diǎn xiǎoshì jiù hàipà le，zhēnshì wúniú chuǎnyuè。
You are scared by such a tiny thing, what a coward.
如果你遇到什么困难我必当相帮。
Rúguǒ nǐ yùdào shénme kùnnan wǒ bìdāng xiāngbāng。
I will surely help you out if you have difficulties.
无论遇到什么难事他都能想得通。
Wúlùn yùdào shénme nánshì tā dōunéng xiǎngdétōng。
Whatever happens, he can always take it easy.
每次遇到不开心的事，他都会向隅独坐。
Měicì yùdào bùkāixīn de shì，tā dōuhuì xiàng yú dúzuò。
He sits all alone in the corner every time something unpleasant happens.
循例你是要坐牢的，算你幸运，遇到贵人了，可以躲过此劫。
Xúnlì nǐ shì yào zuòláo de，suàn nǐ xìngyùn，yùdào guìrén le，kěyǐ duǒguò cǐjié。
You were suppose to go to prison, according to past experience, but it is very lucky for you that someone helped you to dodge this misfortune.
你是不是遇到什么妖怪了，满身的妖气。
Nǐ shìbushì yùdào shénme yāoguài le，mǎnshēn de yāoqì。
Have you met some evil spirits? You looked monstrous.
遇到这种情况时，他总是支吾其词。
Yùdào zhèzhǒng qíngkuàng shí，tā zǒngshì zhīwú qící。
He always speaks evasively under these circumstances.
遇到困难时，姐妹们总是给我支招儿。
Yùdào kùnnan shí，jiěmèimen zǒngshì gěi wǒ zhīzhāor。
My sisters always give me suggestions when I have problems.
这一次，做事至当的他也遇到了意想不到的麻烦。
Zhè yícì，zuòshì zhìdāng de tā yě yùdào le yìxiǎng búdào de máfan。
This time, he who usually behaves appropriately came across unexpected troubles.
遇到突发状况，他总是先把别人置于安全中。
Yùdào tūfā zhuàngkuàng，tā zǒngshì xiān bǎ biérén zhìyú ānquán zhōng。
When coming across sudden accidents, he would always put others in safety first.
遇到矛盾我们要多做自我批评。
Yùdào máodùn wǒmen yào duō zuò zìwǒ pīpíng。
When coming across contradictions, we should resort to self-criticism more often.
你如果遇到困难，可以去找同乡会的人帮忙。
Nǐ rúguǒ yùdào kùnnan，kěyǐ qù zhǎo tóngxiānghuì de rén bāngmáng。
If you run into trouble, you can turn to the Association of Fellow Provincials.
遇到不如意的事，她马上就会沉下脸来。
Yùdào bùrúyìde shì，tā mǎshàng jiùhuì chénxiàliǎnlái。
She pulls a long face as soon as anything happens to displease her.
遇到问题应该及时处理。
Yùdào wèntí yīnggāi jíshíchǔlǐ。
You should deal with problems as they arise.
遇到困难我们不应该龟缩。
Yùdào kùnnán wǒmen bùyīnggāi guīsuō。
We shouldn\'t recoil in the face of difficulty.
当他人遇到困难的时候，我们应该慷慨解囊。
Dāng tārén yùdào kùnnán de shíhou，wǒmen yīnggāi kāngkǎijiěnáng.
When others are in difficulties, we should be generous to them.
朋友遇到困难，我就拉他一把。
Péngyou yùdào kùnnán，wǒ jiù lā tā yìbǎ.
I would always help a friend in trouble.
我们起头遇到些困难，后来就好多了。
Wǒmen qǐtóu yùdào xiē kùnnán，hòulái jiù hǎoduō le.
We encountered some difficulties at the beginning, but later things got a lot better.
她遇到困难时，朋友们想方设法帮她解决。
Tā yùdào kùnnán shí，péngyǒumen xiǎngfāng-shèfǎ bāng tā jiějué。
When she encountered a difficulty, her friends moved heaven and earth to help her.
遇到这种麻烦事，他心慌意乱，不知所措。
Yùdào zhèzhǒng máfánshì，tā xīnhuāng-yìluàn，bùzhīsuǒcuò。
When he comes up against this kind of problem, he gets nervous and flustered and doesn\'t know what to do.
他怀才不遇，感到非常怃然。
Tā huáicái búyù,gǎndào fēicháng wǔrán.
he is very depressed, because his talents are not recognized by others.
遭到冷遇
zāodào lěnɡyù 
be given the cold shoulder; be left out in the cold
受到礼遇
shòu dào lǐyù 
be accorded a courteous reception
他是这家公司的大恩人，所以受到厚遇。
Tā shì zhè jiā gōngsī de dàēnrén，suǒyǐ shòudào hòuyù。
He is a great benefactor to this company, thus receives favourable treatment.
受到良好待遇
shòudào liánghǎo dàiyù 
have received good treatment
战俘应受到人道待遇。
Zhànfú yīng shòudào réndào dàiyù。
Prisoners of war should receive humane treatment.
我遭到了她的冷遇。
Wǒ zāodàole tā de lěngyù.
She gave me the cold shoulder.
人们为他受到的不公正待遇愤愤不平。
Rénmen wèi tā shòudào de bùgōngzhèng dàiyù fènfènbùpíng。
People are indignant at the unfair treatment he received.
那些战俘受到了不人道的待遇，世界舆论为之震惊。
Nàxiē zhànfú shòudào le bùréndào de dàiyù，shìjiè yúlùn wèi zhī zhènjīng。
Inhuman treatment of the prisoners of war shocked world opinion.
他一到公司就被给予厚遇。
Tā yídào gōngsī jiù bèi jǐyǔ hòuyù。
As soon as he joined the company, he was given favourable treatment.
没想到会在大街上突然遇见分别多年的旧情人，她像泥塑木雕似的呆住了。
Méi xiǎngdào huì zài dàjiē shàng tūrán yùjiàn fēnbié duōnián de jiù qíngrén，tā xiàng nísù mùdiāo sì de dāizhù le。
Never expecting to come across her old lover in the street after many years apart, she was stunned as wooden as a dummy.
只要是人才，到了我们公司一定待遇从优。
Zhǐyào shì réncái，dào le wǒmen gōngsī yídìng dàiyù cóngyōu。
As long as you are talented, our company well provide you with a high salary.
百年一遇的洪水吞没了这个县城，到处浊浪滔滔。
Bǎiniányíyù de hóngshuǐ tūnmò le zhège xiànchéng，dàochù zhuólàng tāotāo。
A flood, the first in nearly one hundred years, has engulfed the county with muddy waves.
遘时(遇到好时机)
不能一遇到困难就却步不前。
途中遇到暴雨。
遇到这种哑巴亏，真让人心里窝气。
半路遇到一个熟人。
他遇到麻烦了，你替他活动活动。
遇到烦恼事，只好自己找乐子。
船遇到了逆风。
丰年多积存一些粮食，遇到歉年也就不怕了。也说歉岁。
遇到了强硬对手
遇到看不惯的事，他常会说上几句俏皮话。
他算计着出线后将遇到哪些对手。
不能一遇到困难就泄气。
预想在比赛中将会遇到哪些困难。
遇到了阻碍。
遇到台风，在海口被阻留了三天。
他抛弃了优厚的待遇回到祖国
受到不公正待遇
受到非人的待遇
为他受到的不公正待遇鸣不平。
总是找不到他，今天一出门就遇见了，真是个寸劲儿。
to meet one crisis, only to face another
遇到一次危机，却又招来另一次危机
Can you give me a piece of advice, I\'m in trouble.
你能给我提个建议吗，我遇到麻烦了。
If you go to Africa, you will probably meet lions or other scary animals on your way.
如果你去非洲，在路上你可能会遇到狮子或者其它吓人的动物。
You told me once you would have helped me out if I had come up against any kind of difficulty.
你告诉过我，无论我遇到任何困难，你都会帮助我。
Don\'t be worried about your arms and legs falling asleep, it happens to everyone.
胳膊、腿麻了也别担心，每个人都会遇到这种情况。
She is very unlucky, and has already faced all kinds of troubles.
她非常不幸，曾遇到过各种各样的困难。
I met Sarah 20 minutes back. She\'s always so busy.
20分钟前我遇到萨拉了。她总是那么忙。
Don\'t worry I will back your bill in case of problems.
别担心，万一遇到问题我会在财力上支持你的。
She was walking when I met her, but she didn\'t recognize me.
我在路上遇到她了，但她没有认出我。
Take this stick to beat the burglar with in case you find one.
拿着这跟棍子，万一遇到窃贼你就用棍子打他。
They had such a case last year.
他们去年就遇到过这种情况。
She is always imagining that she will meet her brother who died during the war.
她总想象着能遇到在战争中去世的弟弟。
He got laid last night by a girl he met at a bar.
他昨晚和在酒吧遇到的一个女孩发生了关系。
You meet some very interesting people in my line of business.
干我们这行，你会遇到很多有趣的人。
He is always trying to neck all the girls that he meets.
他一遇到女孩就想去亲吻拥抱人家。
They have trouble finding financial support for their business operations.
他们在为公司运转寻找资金赞助时遇到了一些麻烦。
We are late because we got stuck in traffic.
因为遇到堵车，所以我们迟到了。
I need your help, I am having a little problem with my homework.
我做作业时遇到了点儿小问题，需要你的帮助。
This morning when I passed him, he didn\'t recognized me.
今天早晨我遇到他的时候，他没认出我来。
He ran into a problem again.
他又遇到问题了。
What\'s the right behavior for this situation?
遇到这种情形时，怎么做才合适？
Last week I saw him going to Tokyo.
上周我遇到他，他刚好要去东京。
We were lucky enough to travel without any problems with the weather.
我们真够走运的，在旅行过程中没有遇到一点儿坏天气。
He was very even during the exam and had no problem solving all the questions.
他在考试过程中非常冷静，答题没有遇到任何问题。
Let\'s bring a blanket just in case the weather goes bad on us.
我们带上条毯子吧，以防遇到坏天气。
Don\'t forget to turn left when the road branches off because it will take less time to get here.
遇到岔路口时不要忘记向左拐，这样可以省点儿时间。
I celebrate your ability to deal with the problem we have been facing lately.
你在处理我们最近遇到的问题时表现出了超凡的才干，我很是钦佩。
It is normal to have some difficulties when you start to learn a language.
刚开始学一门语言时，遇到一些困难是很正常的。
He has experienced a lot of difficulty finding a job.
他找工作的过程中遇到了诸多困难。
She is in a bit of a fix with her thesis.
她在论文上遇到了些问题。
The idea suddenly flashed across my mind that he was in trouble.
我脑海里突然闪过一个念头，他可能遇到麻烦了。
I have been tasked with helping the foreign students if they have some question about our campus.
我的职责就是协助外国留学生，帮解决他们在校园里遇到的问题。
Stated thus, it seems we have a big problem.
综上所述，看来我们到遇到大问题了。
Since she met him she\'s a changed woman.
自从遇到了他，她就彻头彻尾地变了个人。
Jack experienced some difficulties at first.
起初杰克也遇到一些麻烦事。
You met him at our office party, didn\'t you?
你是在我们公司的舞会上遇到他的，对吗？
I hate Sunday drivers when I am in a hurry.
赶时间的时候最怕遇到新手司机了。
to be {or} get caught in sth
[+storm] 遇到某事
how did you come to meet him?
你是怎么遇到他的？
to meet one\'s match
遇到对手
the man who we met in Sydney
我们在悉尼遇到的那个男子
On my return journey from Shanghai, I met an old friend from high school on the plane.
我从上海回来的途中，在飞机上遇到了高中的老朋友。
We should proceed our journey regardless of any difficulty.
我们不论遇到什么困难都应该继续我们的旅行。
He fitted the rope lashings of the oars onto the thole pins and, leaning forward against the thrust of the blades in the water, he began to row out of the harbor in the dark.
他把桨上的绳圈套在桨座的钉子上，身子朝前冲，抵消桨片在水中所遇到的阻力，在黑暗中动手划出港去。
They got caught in the thundershower.
他们遇到了大雷雨。
The vessel encountered bad weather and had to change the route.
这艘船遇到了坏天气，不得不改变航线。
Many weak-willed people kill themselves when they get in the trouble.

[BRIT] 觉得受到不公平待遇
She didn\'t deserve to be treated like that.
她不应得到那样的待遇。
Special friends deserve special treatment.
特别的朋友要受到特别的待遇。
He feels hard done by after his girlfriend dumped him.
Bèi nǚyǒu shuǎile hòu， tā gǎnshòu dào bù gōngzhèng dàiyù。
被女友甩了后，他感受到不公正待遇。
The outspoken cabinet member was sidelined by the President.
Zhè wèi zhíyánbúhuì de nèigé chéngyuán shòudào zǒngtǒng de lěngyù。
这位直言不讳的内阁成员受到总统的冷遇。
The boy got a square deal, he received a good education like everyone else.
Zhège nánhái dédàole gōngpíng de dàiyù ：tā hé qítā rén yíyàng jiēshòule liánghǎo de jiàoyù。
这个男孩得到了公平的待遇：他和其他人一样接受了良好的教育。
He\'s storming about the way he had been treated.
Tā zhèng qìfèn de shuōzhe tā shòudào de bù gōngzhèng dàiyù。
他正气愤地说着他受到的不公正待遇。
He\'s an American citizen and he expected to be treated as such.
Tā shì gè Měiguó gōngmín，qīwàng shòudào yǔqí xiāngyìng de dàiyù。
他是个美国公民，期望受到与其相应的待遇。
Jon was hard done by after being replaced as team captain.
Qǔdài duìzhǎng zhī hòu， Qiáo\'ēn shòudàole bù gōngzhèng de dàiyù。
取代队长之后，乔恩受到了不公正的待遇。
She did not expect the cold reception she received from her superiors.
Tā méiyǒu yùliào dào shàngjí duì tā de lěngyù。
她没有预料到上级对她的冷遇。
The agency got the kid-glove treatment on capitol hill.

这个机构在国会山得到非常宽松的待遇。
I believe you need an apology. You really don\'t deserve such treatment.
我觉得他们欠你一个道歉，你真是不应该受到这么不公正的待遇。
The encounter will culminate on August 27th when Mars comes to within 35 million miles of Earth.
Zhècì zāoyù jiāng zài bā yuè èrshíqī rì dádào zuì gāo diǎn，dàngtiān Jīnxīng lí dìqiú búdào sānqiān wǔbǎi wàn yīnglǐ。
这次遭遇将在八月二十七日达到最高点，当天金星离地球不到三千五百万英里。

某个人因为民族、肤色或是种族的原因，在类似环境中遭到与他人不一样的待遇时，就产生了歧视。
Each employee receives a like base salary.

Because of a drought the like of which is not seen in a hundred years, there was almost a total crop failure.

Coming across old friends in a place far away from home is one great happiness in life.
我们好久没见面了，这次相遇聊了好半天。
Wǒmen hǎojiǔ méi jiànmiàn le，zhècì xiāngyù liáo le hǎobàntiān。
We talked for a long time, because we hadn\'t meet each other in a long time.
他是这家公司的大恩人，所以受到厚遇。
Tā shì zhè jiā gōngsī de dàēnrén，suǒyǐ shòudào hòuyù。
He is a great benefactor to this company, thus receives favourable treatment.
他一到公司就被给予厚遇。
Tā yídào gōngsī jiù bèi jǐyǔ hòuyù。
As soon as he joined the company, he was given favourable treatment.
他俩呼吸相通，经常在一起讨论生活上遇到的问题。
Tā liǎ hūxī xiāngtōng，jīngcháng zài yìqǐ tǎolùn shēnghuó shàng yùdào de wèntí。
They hold the same opinions, and often discuss problems that they confront in their lives.
他有虎胆却没智慧，遇到危险也只管往前冲。
Tā yǒu hǔdǎn què méi zhìhuì，yùdào wēixiǎn yě zhǐguǎn wǎngqián chōng。
He is a man of dauntless courage, but he lacks wisdom. When confronted with danger, he just rushes forward.
你们是亲兄弟，遇到争执应互谅互让。
Nǐmen shì qīnxiōngdì，yùdào zhēngzhí yīng hùliàng hù ràng。
You are full brothers. You should understand, and make concessions to each other when you are at odds.
前方遇到紧急情况，我们必须马上回撤。
Qiánfāng yùdào jǐnjí qíngkuàng，wǒmen bìxū mǎshàng huíchè。
There appeared an emergency in front. We must beat a retreat immediately.
认定了这条路就要坚定地走下去，遇到什么艰难险阻也绝不回还。
Rèndìng le zhètiáo lù jiùyào jiāndìng de zǒu xiàqù，yùdào shénme jiānnán xiǎnzǔ yě juébùhuíhuán。
Once you have decided the way to go, you should move forward without hesitation. Whatever hardship you may be confronted with, you should never return to the starting point.
中国文学潮流遭遇了急变，白话叙事替代文言咏叹。
Zhōngguó wénxué cháoliú zāoyù le jíbiàn，báihuà xùshì tìdài wényán yǒngtàn。
The trend of Chinese literature experienced a sudden change. Narrating in colloquial language replaced chanting in classical Chinese.
家兄就在这个工厂工作，据说待遇还不错。
Jiāxiōng jiù zài zhège gōngchǎng gōngzuò，jùshuō dàiyù hái búcuò。
My elder brother works in this factory and is paid well.
今年遭遇大范围水灾，各部门领导努力保证物资供应，不让资源减损，让群众正常生活。
Jīnnián zāoyù dàfànwéi shuǐzāi，gè bùmén lǐngdǎo nǔlì bǎozhèng wùzī gōngyìng，bú ràng zīyuán jiǎnsǔn，ràng qúnzhòng zhèngcháng shēnghuó。
Many areas have been swept by floods this year; in order to make sure that people in these areas lead a normal life, cadres from all sectors have taken measures to ensure the supply of materials.
遇到复杂的词语要作个简释，以便学生明白。
Yùdào fùzá de cíyǔ yào zuò gè jiǎnshì，yǐ biàn xuésheng míngbai。
Difficult words should be annotated, so that students will be able to understand them.
他遇到了麻烦，只有我们才能帮他解愁。
Tā yùdào le máfan，zhǐyǒu wǒmen cáinéng bāng tā jiěchóu。
He is in trouble now, and only we can help him and cheer him up.
年轻人经事少，遇到问题难免想的不周到。
Niánqīngrén jīngshì shǎo，yùdào wèntí nánmiǎn xiǎng de bùzhōudào。
Young people lack experience and can not consider things in a comprehensive way.
取经途中师徒四人遇到了很多精怪。
Qǔjīng tú zhōng shītú sì rén yùdào le hěnduō jīngguài。
On the way to the West, the monk and his followers encountered a lot of demons.
卷曲的茶叶遇到开水渐渐舒展开来，在杯子里上下浮沉。
Juǎnqū de cháyè yùdào kāishuǐ jiànjiàn shūzhǎn kāilái，zài bēizi lǐ shàngxià fúchén。
The crimped tea leaves gradually unfold after hitting the hot water and are floating up and down in the cup.
别看她平时挺能说的，真遇到该表明态度时，她就卷舌不语了。
Biékàn tā píngshí tǐng néngshuō de，zhēn yùdào gāi biǎomíng tàidu shí，tā jiù juǎnshé bùyǔ le。
Though she talks a lot generally, when it is time to make her attitude clear, she says nothing.
遇到烦恼的事，开颜笑笑，烦恼总会过去的。
Yùdào fánnǎo de shì，kāiyán xiàoxiào，fánnǎo zǒng huì guòqù de。
Whenever coming across upset things, smile, because everything will pass in the end.
一遇到困难，他就满脸苦相。
Yí yùdào kùnnan，tā jiù mǎnliǎn kǔ xiàng。
He gives an agonized look whenever he faces difficulty.
这支足球队一遇强劲对手就立即溃乱不堪了。
Zhèzhī zúqiúduì yíyù qiángjìn duìshǒu jiù lìjí kuìluàn bùkān le。
The football team was defeated and left in disarray by a strong adversary.
他泪涟涟地向我们诉说她的不幸遭遇。
Tā lèiliánlián de xiàng wǒmen sùshuō tā de búxìng zāoyù。
He told us his unfortunate experiences with tears in his eyes.
在列车上遇到什么困难，都可以请列车员帮忙解决。
Zài lièchē shàng yùdào shénme kùnnan，dōu kěyǐ qǐng lièchēyuán bāngmáng jiějué。
If you have any trouble on the train, you can ask the train attendant for help.
他路遇了初恋情人，和她交谈了许久。
Tā lùyù le chūliàn qíngrén，hé tā jiāotán le xǔjiǔ。
He met his first love on the road and chatted with her for a long time.
他总是这样慢慢悠悠的，遇到什么事情都不着急。
Tā zǒngshì zhèyàng mànmànyōuyōu de，yùdào shénme shìqing dōu bùzháojí。
He is such a slowcoach that he won’t feel urgency whatever happens.
年轻人要朝气蓬勃，不能因为遇到一时的挫折就显得暮气沉沉的。
Niánqīngrén yào zhāoqì péngbó，bùnéng yīnwèi yùdào yìshí de cuòzhé jiù xiǎnde mùqì chénchén de。
Young people should be full of youthful spirit, and can not get lethargic due to temporary frustration.
截止目前，难船已经成功营救了130多名遇难人员。
Jiézhǐ mùqián，nànchuán yǐjing chénggōng yíngjiù le yīyìbǎisānshíduōmíng yùnàn rényuán。
Till now, the boat containing refugees has successfully rescued over 130 victims.
没想到会在大街上突然遇见分别多年的旧情人，她像泥塑木雕似的呆住了。
Méi xiǎngdào huì zài dàjiē shàng tūrán yùjiàn fēnbié duōnián de jiù qíngrén，tā xiàng nísù mùdiāo sì de dāizhù le。
Never expecting to come across her old lover in the street after many years apart, she was stunned as wooden as a dummy.
年轻力壮的大小伙子，怎么能一遇到挫折就叹气呢？
Niánqīng lìzhuàng de dàxiǎohuǒzi，zěnme néng yí yùdào cuòzhé jiù tànqì ne？
You are a young and vigorous man. How can you sigh when you meet a setback?
他总有这样一股拧劲儿：越是遇到困难就越是充满斗志。
Tā zǒngyǒu zhèyàng yìgǔ nǐngjìnr:yuè shì yùdào kùnnan jiù yuè shì chōngmǎn dòuzhì。
He is always so pigheaded. The more difficulties he encounters, the more fighting spirit he has.
我迷路了，正好遇到一个放牛的牛郎，给我指了路。
Wǒ mílù le，zhènghǎo yùdào yígè fàngniú de niúláng，gěi wǒ zhǐ le lù。
I was lost, when a cowherd appeared and showed me the road.
遇到不懂的问题，他总是喜欢刨根儿问底。
Yùdào bùdǒng de wèntí，tā zǒngshì xǐhuan bàogēnr wèndǐ。
He always like to get to the root of everything he doesn\'t understand.
她面容憔悴，目光凄楚，大概是遇到了不幸的事。
Tā miànróng qiáocuì，mùguāng qīchǔ，dàgài shì yùdào le búxìng de shì。
She looks wan, sallow and miserable, she\'s probably had some bad luck.
企事业单位的报酬待遇是不太一样的。
Qǐshìyè dānwèi de bàochóu dàiyù shì bú tài yíyàng de。
The payment and treatment of each enterprise and institution are not exactly alike.
面对机遇，我们应该学会弃取。
Miànduì jīyù，wǒmen yīnggāi xuéhuì qìqǔ。
When facing opportunities, we should learn which to take and which to let go.
遇到抢匪时他冲在了最前面。
Yùdào qiǎngfěi shí tā chōngzài le zuì qiánmiàn。
He was right at the front when they were confronted by the robbers.
无论遇到什么困难，你都可以求助于人民警察。
Wúlùn yùdào shénme kùnnan，nǐ dōu kěyǐ qiúzhùyú rénmín jǐngchá。
You can turn to the people\'s police for help, no matter what kind of trouble you are in.
他经常遇到这种棘手的事情，因此处理起来也是如履平地。
Tā jīngcháng yùdào zhèzhǒng jíshǒu de shìqing，yīncǐ chǔlǐ qǐlái yěshì rúlǚ píngdì。
He always runs into tough matters like this, so it is easy for him to solve them.
今年遇到了特大旱情，看来农作物要失收了。
Jīnnián yùdào le tèdà hànqíng，kànlái nóngzuòwù yào shīshōu le。
There was a serious drought this year, and it seems there won\'t be a good harvest of crops.
我与他手谈数局而难分胜负，真是遇到对手了。
Wǒ yǔ tā shǒután shù jú ér nánfēn shèngfù，zhēnshì yùdào duìshǒu le。
We\'ve drawn several times in chess. He is really a match for me!
他不是一个遇到困难就束手无策的人。
Tā búshì yígè yùdào kùnnan jiù shùshǒuwúcè de rén。
He is not a man without resources when running into trouble.
他在遇到突发事件时总能泰然处之，这点让我很佩服。
Tā zài yùdào tūfā shìjiàn shí zǒng néng tàirán chǔzhī，zhè diǎn ràng wǒ hěnpèifú。
He is always calm when faced with an emergency, which makes me admire him very much.
他的命真苦，遭遇了这样的天灾人祸。
Tā de mìng zhēn kǔ，zāoyù le zhèyàng de tiānzāi rénhuò。
He\'s got a bad lot, to be struck by such calamities.
他和我享受同级待遇。
Tā hé wǒ xiǎngshòu tóngjí dàiyù。
He is treated at the same level as me.
我没有想到能在街上突遇到我的老师。
Wǒ méiyǒu xiǎngdào néng zài jiē shàng tū yùdào wǒ de lǎoshī。
I didn\'t expect to meet my teacher in the street.
无论遇到什么样的困难我们也不能退后。
Wúlùn yùdào shénmeyàng de kùnnan wǒmen yě bùnéng tuìhòu。
We will never fall back, whatever difficulties we might run into.
每当遇到困难的时候，他总是畏葸不前。
Měidāng yùdào kùnnan de shíhou，tā zǒngshì wèixǐ bùqián。
He always shrinks away when faced with difficulties.
每次遇到困难你就退缩，真是个窝囊废！
Měi cì yùdào kùnnan nǐ jiù tuìsuō，zhēnshì gè wōnángfèi！
You shrink whenever you encounter difficulties, what a worthless wretch!
乌鲗遇到危险的时候会喷出黑色液体。
Wūzéi yùdào wēixiǎn de shíhou huì pēnchū hēisè yètǐ。
The cuttlefish spurts out dark ink when it is in danger.
你遇到这点小事就害怕了，真是吴牛喘月。
Nǐ yùdào zhè diǎn xiǎoshì jiù hàipà le，zhēnshì wúniú chuǎnyuè。
You are scared by such a tiny thing, what a coward.
他怀才不遇，感到非常怃然。
Tā huáicái búyù,gǎndào fēicháng wǔrán.
he is very depressed, because his talents are not recognized by others.
如果你遇到什么困难我必当相帮。
Rúguǒ nǐ yùdào shénme kùnnan wǒ bìdāng xiāngbāng。
I will surely help you out if you have difficulties.
无论遇到什么难事他都能想得通。
Wúlùn yùdào shénme nánshì tā dōunéng xiǎngdétōng。
Whatever happens, he can always take it easy.
每次遇到不开心的事，他都会向隅独坐。
Měicì yùdào bùkāixīn de shì，tā dōuhuì xiàng yú dúzuò。
He sits all alone in the corner every time something unpleasant happens.
他是一个心重的人，遇事总是放不下。
Tā shì yígè xīnzhòng de rén，yùshì zǒngshì fàngbúxià。
He is an oversensitive person who take things too hard.
今年遭天灾又遇人祸，真是一个凶年。
Jīnnián zāo tiānzāi yòu yù rénhuò，zhēnshì yígè xiōngnián。
There have been natural and man-made calamities this year. It is really a bad year.
循例你是要坐牢的，算你幸运，遇到贵人了，可以躲过此劫。
Xúnlì nǐ shì yào zuòláo de，suàn nǐ xìngyùn，yùdào guìrén le，kěyǐ duǒguò cǐjié。
You were suppose to go to prison, according to past experience, but it is very lucky for you that someone helped you to dodge this misfortune.
你是不是遇到什么妖怪了，满身的妖气。
Nǐ shìbushì yùdào shénme yāoguài le，mǎnshēn de yāoqì。
Have you met some evil spirits? You looked monstrous.
今年是百年未遇的灾年，各地的义仓都在放粮。
Jīnnián shì bǎinián wèiyù de zāinián，gè dì de yìcāng dōu zài fàngliáng。
This year is a famine year not seen in a hundred years, all public granaries are distributing grains of rice.
原来她丈夫遇车祸去世了，难怪她的哭声这么阴惨。
Yuánlái tā zhàngfū yù chēhuò qùshì le，nánguài tā de kūshēng zhème yīncǎn。
As it turns out that her husband died in a traffic accident, there is no wonder that her crying is so sorrowful and plaintive.
杰克是个优柔寡断的人，遇事难作决断。
Jiékè shì gè yōuróu guǎduàn de rén，yùshì nánzuò juéduàn。
Jack is indecisive and can\'t make decisions when something happens.
这场遭遇战打得十分艰苦，敌我双方伤亡惨重。
Zhèchǎng zāoyùzhàn dǎ de shífēn jiānkǔ，díwǒ shuāngfāng shāngwáng cǎnzhòng。
This contact battle is very hard. Both the enemy, and us have suffered heavy casualties.
遇到这种情况时，他总是支吾其词。
Yùdào zhèzhǒng qíngkuàng shí，tā zǒngshì zhīwú qící。
He always speaks evasively under these circumstances.
遇到困难时，姐妹们总是给我支招儿。
Yùdào kùnnan shí，jiěmèimen zǒngshì gěi wǒ zhīzhāor。
My sisters always give me suggestions when I have problems.
这一次，做事至当的他也遇到了意想不到的麻烦。
Zhè yícì，zuòshì zhìdāng de tā yě yùdào le yìxiǎng búdào de máfan。
This time, he who usually behaves appropriately came across unexpected troubles.
遇到突发状况，他总是先把别人置于安全中。
Yùdào tūfā zhuàngkuàng，tā zǒngshì xiān bǎ biérén zhìyú ānquán zhōng。
When coming across sudden accidents, he would always put others in safety first.
百年不遇的洪水，使这个村庄遭受了重灾。
Bǎiniánbúyù de hóngshuǐ，shǐ zhège cūnzhuāng zāoshòu le zhòngzāi。
A flood, the likes of which have not been seen in a hundred years, has devastated this village.
百年一遇的洪水吞没了这个县城，到处浊浪滔滔。
Bǎiniányíyù de hóngshuǐ tūnmò le zhège xiànchéng，dàochù zhuólàng tāotāo。
A flood, the first in nearly one hundred years, has engulfed the county with muddy waves.
遇到矛盾我们要多做自我批评。
Yùdào máodùn wǒmen yào duō zuò zìwǒ pīpíng。
When coming across contradictions, we should resort to self-criticism more often.
你如果遇到困难，可以去找同乡会的人帮忙。
Nǐ rúguǒ yùdào kùnnan，kěyǐ qù zhǎo tóngxiānghuì de rén bāngmáng。
If you run into trouble, you can turn to the Association of Fellow Provincials.
她抱怨不平等的待遇。
Tā bàoyuàn bùpíngděngde dàiyù。
She complained about the unfair treatment.
遇到不如意的事，她马上就会沉下脸来。
Yùdào bùrúyìde shì，tā mǎshàng jiùhuì chénxiàliǎnlái。
She pulls a long face as soon as anything happens to displease her.
遇到问题应该及时处理。
Yùdào wèntí yīnggāi jíshíchǔlǐ。
You should deal with problems as they arise.
我散步时赶巧遇见个老同学。
Wǒ sànbùshí gǎnqiǎo yùjiàngè lǎotóngxué。
I was out for a walk when I bumped into an old school friend.
遇到困难我们不应该龟缩。
Yùdào kùnnán wǒmen bùyīnggāi guīsuō。
We shouldn\'t recoil in the face of difficulty.
遇害
yùhài
be murdered
当他人遇到困难的时候，我们应该慷慨解囊。
Dāng tārén yùdào kùnnán de shíhou，wǒmen yīnggāi kāngkǎijiěnáng.
When others are in difficulties, we should be generous to them.
朋友遇到困难，我就拉他一把。
Péngyou yùdào kùnnán，wǒ jiù lā tā yìbǎ.
I would always help a friend in trouble.
他遭遇失败，处境狼狈。
Tā zāoyù shībài，chǔjìng lángbèi.
He failed, and is now in dire straits.
我遭到了她的冷遇。
Wǒ zāodàole tā de lěngyù.
She gave me the cold shoulder.
我们的相识是由于一次偶遇。
Wǒmen de xiāngshí shì yóuyú yícì ǒuyù.
We met through a chance encounter.
我碰巧遇见他。
Wǒ pèngqiǎo yùjiàn tā.
I met him by chance.
我一出门，劈头遇上了老王。
Wǒ yì chūmén，pītóu yùshàngle lǎowáng.
As soon as I went out, I came face to face with Lao Wang.
奇遇
qíyù
lucky encounter
我们起头遇到些困难，后来就好多了。
Wǒmen qǐtóu yùdào xiē kùnnán，hòulái jiù hǎoduō le.
We encountered some difficulties at the beginning, but later things got a lot better.
商人要善于抓住稍纵即逝的市场机遇。
Shāngrén yào shànyúzhuāzhù shāozòngjíshì de shìchǎng jīyù。
Business people must be good at taking advantage of every fleeting window of opportunity.
同等待遇
Tóngděngdàiyù
equal treatment
我们对遇难者家属表示同情。
Wǒmen duì yùnànzhě jiāshǔ biǎoshì tóngqíng。
We expressed our sympathies to the families of the deceased.
她有外遇后，就想和丈夫离婚。
Tā yǒu wàiyù hòu，jiù xiǎng hé zhàngfu líhūn。
After having an affair, she wanted to divorce her husband.
她遇到困难时，朋友们想方设法帮她解决。
Tā yùdào kùnnán shí，péngyǒumen xiǎngfāng-shèfǎ bāng tā jiějué。
When she encountered a difficulty, her friends moved heaven and earth to help her.
遇到这种麻烦事，他心慌意乱，不知所措。
Yùdào zhèzhǒng máfánshì，tā xīnhuāng-yìluàn，bùzhīsuǒcuò。
When he comes up against this kind of problem, he gets nervous and flustered and doesn\'t know what to do.
他们一再要求改善待遇。
Tāmen yízài yāoqiú gǎishàn dàiyù。
They repeatedly demanded an improvement in their treatment.
好像我男朋友有外遇了，我要回家抓他个正着！
Hǎoxiàng wǒ nánpéngyǒu yǒu wàiyù le ，wǒ yào huíjiā zhuā tā gè zhèngzháo ！
I think my boyfriend is having an affair, so I want to go home and catch him red handed.

每一项权利都包含着责任；每一个机遇都包含着义务；每一种获得都包含着职责。
I meet this men every day on my way to work and he salutes me.

我每天在上班的路上都会遇到这个人，他总是向我打招呼。
The facts were familiar but it was in the organization of them that he was original.
Nàxiē shìshí shì chángjiàn de，dàn qí zǔzhī fāngshì tā háishì dì-yīcì yùdào。
那些事实是常见的，但其组织方式他还是第一次遇到。

I don\'t know what happened to it; anyway, it\'s gone.

我不知道它到底遇到什么情况；不管怎样，它不在了。
We ran into each other by pure chance.
Wǒmen de yùjiàn chúnshǔ\'ǒurán。
我们的遇见纯属偶然。

Tánpàn yùdàole zǔ\'ài。

He never acknowledges his colleagues when they run into him in the hallway.

His answer to any problem was to get drunk.

一遇到问题他就用醉酒来逃避。

géwài yōuyù

shòu dào lǐyù 
be accorded a courteous reception

遭到冷遇
zāodào lěnɡyù 
be given the cold shoulder; be left out in the cold
我遭到了她的冷遇。
Wǒ zāodàole tā de lěngyù.
She gave me the cold shoulder.

冷淡的待遇
lěngdàn de dàiyù 
cold reception; cold shoulder
遇事要冷静，正所谓“兵来将挡，水来土掩”。
Yùshì yào lěngjìng，zhèng suǒwèi“bīnglái jiàngdǎng，shuǐlái tǔyǎn”。
One has to be calm when facing all kinds of situations, as the saying goes “counter measure for measure”.
冷遇。
遭人冷遇。
遇事要冷静处置，不可丧失理性。
遇事要沉着冷静。
I was given a cold welcome.
我受到了冷遇。
The film received a cool reception from critics.
Zhè bù diànyǐng zài pínglùnjiā nàli zāoshòule lěngyù。

遇到较冷的表面，蒸汽就会凝结成水。

极困难的境遇
jí kùnnan de jìngyù

伏案读书(作画)
fú\'àn dúshū（zuòhuà）
bend over one\'s desk reading (painting)
虽到老年，他仍吟诗作画，豪兴不减。
Suī dào lǎonián，tā réngyínshī zuòhuà，háoxìngbùjiǎn。
As an old man, he continued to compose verses and paint pictures, his exuberant spirits undiminished.
作画
zuò huà 
paint a picture
他一心作画，纯然不觉已经中午。
Tā yìxīn zuòhuà，chúnrán bùjué yǐjing zhōng wǔ。
He devoted himself to painting, so he had absolutely no idea that it was already noon.
她凝神贯注地作画，丝毫没有听到他走过来的脚步声。
Tā níngshén guànzhù de zuòhuà，sīháo méiyǒu tīngdào tā zǒuguòlái de jiǎobùshēng。
She paid all her attention to drawing the picture, unaware of the sound of his coming footsteps.
这老两口喜爱诗画，通常是老太太作画，老先生题诗。
Zhè lǎoliǎngkǒu xǐ\'àishīhuà，tōngcháng shì lǎotàitai zuòhuà，lǎoxiānshēng tíshī。
This elderly couple like poems and paintings. Usually, the lady paints, while the gentleman writes poems.
从小父亲就培养他作画的能力，现在他已经是小有名气的画家了。
Cóng xiǎo fùqīn jiù péiyǎng tā zuòhuà de nénglì，xiànzài tā yǐjing shì xiǎoyǒumíngqì de huàjiā le。
His father taught him to paint when very young. Now he is already a painter enjoying some fame.
辍笔5年后他又开始作画。
Chuòbǐ wǔniánhòu tā yòukāishǐ zuòhuà。
Five years after he stopped painting he started up again.

Huàyuàn wèi gǎnzhì xiàng huángshàng jìngxiàn de yì pī huìhuà zuòpǐn ér rìyè mánglù。
The drawing institute bustled about day and night, running up for a set of paintings dedicated to the Emperor.
这幅画作价值不菲，确实是精品。
Zhè fú huàzuò jiàzhí bùfěi，quèshí shì jīngpǐn。
This picture is very valuable, and exquisite indeed.
临行前她送给我两幅软木画作为纪念。
Línxíng qián tā sònggěi wǒ liǎng fú ruǎnmùhuà zuòwéi jìniàn。
Before I left she gave me two cork paintings as a souvenir.
这首题诗为整幅画作添色不少。
Zhèshǒu tíshī wèi zhěng fú huàzuò tiānsè bùshǎo。
The poem makes the drawing look even better.
这两幅绘画作品并不相同，但是有同工异曲之妙。
Zhè liǎng fú huìhuà zuòpǐn bìng bùxiāngtóng，dàn shì yǒu tónggōng yìqǔ zhī miào。
Though the two paintings are different from each other, they demonstrate equal skill.
宝宝把自己画的一幅儿童画当作年礼送给了爸妈。
Bǎobao bǎ zìjǐ huà de yìfú értónghuà dàngzuò niánlǐ sònggěi le bàmā。

zhuān cángzì，bù cánghuà 
only collect scripts (or writings), not paintings

画时圆，写时方；寒时短，热时长。—— 打一字。(谜底：日）
Huà shí yuán，xiě shí fāng; hán shí duǎn，rè shí cháng。—— Dǎ yí zì。（mídǐ：rì）
When drawn it is round, but when written it is square; in cold weather it is short, and in hot weather long. —A character. (Answer: the character 日 &quot;sun, day&quot;)

paint in oils
为举办画展向艺术家协会征借油画
wèi jǔbàn huàzhǎn xiàng yìshùjiā xiéhuì zhēngjiè yóuhuà 
borrow paintings from the Artists Association for a show
著名画家陈逸飞的油画已经在外国出展，引起了轰动。
Zhùmíng huàjiā Chén Yìfēi de yóuhuà yǐjing zài wàiguó chūzhǎn，yǐnqǐ le hōngdòng。
The famous painter Chen Yifei\'s works have caused a stir when exhibited abroad.
《印象日出》这幅油画，是印象派绘画的奠基石。
《Yìnxiàngrìchū》zhèfú yóuhuà，shì yìnxiàngpài huìhuà de diànjīshí。
The canvas Yin Xiang Ri Chu is the cornerstone of impressionistic paintings.
她特别喜欢这本画满了古装粉黛的画册。
Tā tèbié xǐhuan zhèběn huàmǎn le gǔzhuāng fěndài de huàcè。
She likes this picture book of ancient beauties.
他经常到山乡写生，画了许多关于农村庙会赶集、过年嫁娶的风俗画。
Tā jīngcháng dào shānxiāng xiěshēng，huà le xǔduō guānyú nóngcūn miàohuì gǎnjí、guònián jiàqǔ de fēngsúhuà。
He often draws sketches in the countryside and has painted a lot of paintings of temple fairs and marriage scenes.
这幅山水画刻画工细。
Zhè fú shānshuǐhuà kèhuà gōngxì。
The depiction in this landscape painting is exquisite.
他把爸爸的画集结在一起，出版成了画集。
Tā bǎ bàba de huà jíjié zài yìqǐ，chūbǎn chéng le huàjí。
He collected his fathers\' paintings, and published them in a painting anthology.
画院为赶制向皇上敬献的一批绘画作品而日夜忙碌。
Huàyuàn wèi gǎnzhì xiàng huángshàng jìngxiàn de yì pī huìhuà zuòpǐn ér rìyè mánglù。
The drawing institute bustled about day and night, running up for a set of paintings dedicated to the Emperor.
画院是一个以研究、创作、观摩交流为主要活动的绘画机构。
Huàyuàn shì yígè yǐ yánjiū、chuàngzuò、guānmó jiāoliú wéi zhǔyào huódòng de huìhuà jīgòu。
The Painting Institute is a drawing organization with research, creation, viewing, emulating, and communications as its main activities.
他通常使用徽墨来绘画，这样的画十分逼真。
Tā tōngcháng shǐyòng huīmò lái huìhuà，zhèyàng de huà shífēn bīzhēn。
He usually paints with Huizhou ink, which makes the paintings look very real.
这组纪事油画画得非常生动细腻。
Zhè zǔ jìshì yóuhuà huà de fēicháng shēngdòng xìnì。
This set of documentary oil paintings are very subtle and true to life.
这油画代表着画家的最高水准，简直是绝品！
Zhè yóuhuà dàibiǎo zhe huàjiā de zuìgāo shuǐzhǔn，jiǎnzhí shì juépǐn！
This oil painting represents the highest level of the painter and deserves to be called a matchless piece.
小明对于画卡通画可着迷了。
Xiǎo Míng duìyú huà kǎtōnghuà kě zháomí le。
Xiaoming is fascinated with cartoons.
他这幅山水画，画得很空蒙。
Tā zhèfú shānshuǐhuà，huà de hěnkōngméng。
His landscape painting is quite misty.
宝宝把自己画的一幅儿童画当作年礼送给了爸妈。
Bǎobao bǎ zìjǐ huà de yìfú értónghuà dàngzuò niánlǐ sònggěi le bàmā。
The child gave one of his paintings to his parents as a new year gift.
这老两口喜爱诗画，通常是老太太作画，老先生题诗。
Zhè lǎoliǎngkǒu xǐ\'àishīhuà，tōngcháng shì lǎotàitai zuòhuà，lǎoxiānshēng tíshī。
This elderly couple like poems and paintings. Usually, the lady paints, while the gentleman writes poems.
这次展出的作品多是中学生们画的水彩画。
Zhècì zhǎnchū de zuòpǐn duō shì zhōng xuéshengmen huà de shuǐcǎihuà。
Many of the works exhibited are watercolor paintings by middle school students.
出版社请知名画家为这篇文章配画尾花。
Chūbǎnshè qǐng zhīmíng huàjiā wèi zhèpiān wénzhāng pèihuà wěihuā。
The publisher has invited a famous painter to paint an ornamental flower for this article.
这幅画里的草莓画得真鲜灵，跟真的一样。
Zhèfúhuà lǐ de cǎoméi huà de zhēn xiānlíng，gēn zhēn de yíyàng。
The strawberries in this painting look so real.
这幅画画的是澳大利亚夏天的雨景。
Zhèfúhuà huà de shì Àodàlìyà xiàtiān de yǔjǐng。
This picture is of rain in Australia during summer.
学生们画了很多招贴画。
Xuéshengmen huà le hěnduō zhāotiēhuà。
The students have drawn lots of pictorial posters.
齐白石是著名的中国画画家。
Qí Báishí shì zhùmíng de Zhōngguóhuà huàjiā。
Qibaishi is a famous painter of traditional Chinese paintings.
从小父亲就培养他作画的能力，现在他已经是小有名气的画家了。
Cóng xiǎo fùqīn jiù péiyǎng tā zuòhuà de nénglì，xiànzài tā yǐjing shì xiǎoyǒumíngqì de huàjiā le。
His father taught him to paint when very young. Now he is already a painter enjoying some fame.
美术课上，孩子们在学画静物画。
Měishùkè shàng，háizimen zài xué huà jìngwùhuà。
The children are learning still life painting in art class.
昨天我在街上让一个路边艺人为我画了肖像画。
Zuótiān wǒ zài jiēshàng ràng yígè lùbiān yìrén wèi wǒ huà le xiāo xiàng huà。
I had my portrait drawn by a roadside painter in the street yesterday.
画画的
huàhuàde
painter
我教孩子画画。
Wǒ jiāo háizǐ huàhuà.
I teach children drawing.
我喜欢看动画、漫画诸如此类的东西。
Wǒ xǐhuan kàn dònghuà 、 mànhuà zhūrúcǐlèi de dōngxī。
I like cartoons, caricatures, and so forth.
把这幅画好好保藏起来。
Bǎ zhèfúhuà hǎohāo bǎocáng qǐlái。
Preserve the painting carefully.

bèidiāohuà

Zhèfúhuà de bèijǐng shì yípiàn sēnlín。

这幅湘竹画得十分逼真。
Zhè fú xiāngzhú huà de shífēn bīzhēn。

用尺比着画。
Yòng chǐ bǐ zhe huà。

他比画着讲。
Tā bǐhuà zhe jiǎng。

Tā cháng yú huìhuà。

他的画很能传神。

guóhuà dàshī

Xiǎohái bǎ huà guàdào le。

她对学外语不感兴趣，让她学学绘画看，倒许合适。

She is not interested in foreign languages. Let her try painting; maybe she has an aptitude for that.

huà yì tiáo xié dàor

他画起马来真可谓得心应手。

bǎ huàxiàng duānduānzhèngzhèng de guàqǐlái

这幅画是他们合作的。
Zhèfúhuà shì tāmen hézuò de。

yóu wénhuàbùzhǔbàn měishùjiā xiéhuì xiébàn de xiàndài yóuhuàzhǎn

zhuān cángzì，bù cánghuà 
only collect scripts (or writings), not paintings
作画
zuò huà 
paint a picture
画报
huàbào
illustrated magazine or newspaper; pictorial
画时圆，写时方；寒时短，热时长。—— 打一字。(谜底：日）
Huà shí yuán，xiě shí fāng; hán shí duǎn，rè shí cháng。—— Dǎ yí zì。（mídǐ：rì）
When drawn it is round, but when written it is square; in cold weather it is short, and in hot weather long. —A character. (Answer: the character 日 &quot;sun, day&quot;)
画舫
huàfǎng
gaily-painted pleasure-boat
国画
guóhuà
traditional Chinese painting
画屏
huàpíng
painted screen
画像
huàxiàng
draw a portrait; portray
画押
huàyā
make one\'s cross (or mark); sign
画展
huàzhǎn
art exhibition; exhibition of paintings
画轴
huàzhóu
painted scroll; scroll painting
一轴山水画
yì zhóu shānshuǐhuà
a scroll painting of scenery
这瓷瓶上彩绘着八仙过海的画儿呢。
Zhè cípíng shàng cǎihuì zhe bāxiānguòhǎi de huàr ne。
The porcelain bottle has a painting on it featuring the Eight Immortals fighting with the sea god.
他喜欢四处欣赏榜额上的字画。
Tā xǐhuan sìchù xīnshǎng bǎng\'é shàng de zìhuà。
He loves to go about admiring the words and paintings on horizontal inscribed boards.
后面的抱厦上绘有精美的壁画。
Hòumiàn de bàoxià shàng huì yǒu jīngměi de bìhuà。
There is an exquisite fresco on that porch.
他家北边的墙上挂着一幅油画。
Tā jiā běibiān de qiáng shàng guà zhe yìfú yóuhuà。
An oil painting is hanging on the northern wall of his house.
这幅漫画太有趣了，我差点笑背气。
Zhè fú mànhuà tài yǒuqù le，wǒ chàdiǎn xiào bèiqì。
This cartoon is so funny that I almost failed to catch my breath while laughing.
这支笔的笔管上还有一幅画。
Zhèzhī bǐ de bǐguǎn shàng háiyǒu yìfú huà。
There is a painting on the shaft of the pen.
随着书法家们笔走龙蛇，一幅幅字画跃然纸上。
Suí zhe shūfǎjiāmen bǐzǒu lóngshé，yìfúfú zìhuà yuèrán zhǐ shàng。
With vigorous and graceful strokes, the calligraphers create their excellent works.
这些是敝人三年来收集的书画。
Zhèxiē shì bìrén sān nián lái shōují de shūhuà。
These are the paintings and calligraphy works that I’ve been collecting for three years.
他正在研究这幅画的边款。
Tā zhèngzài yánjiū zhèfúhuà de biānkuǎn。
He is studying the inscriptions carved on the sides of paintings.
这本他编绘的漫画书目前已经出版了。
Zhèběn tā biānhuì de mànhuàshū mùqián yǐjing chūbǎn le。
His newly compiled comic books have been recently published.
只有善于擘画明天的人，才能真正拥有未来。
Zhǐyǒu shànyú bòhuà míngtiān de rén，cáinéng zhēnzhèng yōngyǒu wèilái。
Only those who are good at planning tomorrow can have a future in its real sense.
《荷塘香远》是一幅巨型彩墨画。
《Hétángxiāngyuǎn》 shì yìfú jùxíng cǎimòhuà。
“The fragrance of the lotus pond” is a large ink and color painting.
这次拍卖会的主办方会拿出多件珍贵的字画参拍。
Zhècì pāimàihuì de zhǔbànfāng huì náchū duō jiàn zhēnguì de zìhuà cānpāi。
The organizer put many valuable works of calligraphy, and paintings up for auction.
这些插画让我们更容易理解书中的内容。
Zhèxiē chāhuà ràng wǒmen gèng róngyì lǐjiě shū zhōng de nèiróng。
These iillustrations make the content of the book easier to understand.
这位画家仅仅用了一个月的时间就完成了一幅山水长卷。
Zhèwèi huàjiā jǐnjǐn yòng le yígèyuè de shíjiān jiù wánchéng le yìfú shānshuǐ chángjuàn。
It took the painter only a month to finish a long painting of moutains and rivers.
他的绘画天赋，超世稀有。
Tā de huìhuà tiānfù，chāoshì xīyǒu。
His has a rare drawing gift in the world.
他的成名作就是这幅油画。
Tā de chéngmíng zuò jiùshì zhèfú yóuhuà。
This painting established his reputation.
远处山峦重沓，仿佛是一幅画。
Yuǎnchù shānluán chóngdá，fǎngfó shì yìfúhuà。
In the distance lies a picturesque chain of towering mountains.
在剪接电视片时常会用重影，专业名称叫叠画。
Zài jiǎnjiē diànshìpiān shícháng huì yòng chóngyǐng，zhuānyè míngchēng jiào diéhuà。
While montaging telefilms, the secondary image is often used, called &quot; double image&quot; in the academic sense.
他们在这面墙上冲眼是为了在上面挂一幅画。
Tāmen zài zhè miàn qiáng shàng chòngyǎn shì wèi le zài shàngmiàn guà yìfúhuà。
They drilled a hole on the wall to hang a picture.
这幅画出自齐白石之手。
Zhèfúhuà chūzì Qí Báishí zhī shǒu。
This picture was drawn by Qi Baishi.
他一心作画，纯然不觉已经中午。
Tā yìxīn zuòhuà，chúnrán bùjué yǐjing zhōng wǔ。
He devoted himself to painting, so he had absolutely no idea that it was already noon.
这个镇子瓷画工艺远近闻名。
Zhège zhènzi cíhuà gōngyì yuǎnjìn wénmíng。
The porcelain painting techniques of this town are known far and wide.
他从师学习国画已经有两年的时间了。
Tā cóngshī xuéxí guóhuà yǐjing yǒu liǎng nián de shíjiān le。
It has been 2 years since he started following his teacher to learn traditional Chinese painting.
这幅画中的人物粗朴健壮。
Zhèfúhuà zhōng de rénwù cūpǔ jiànzhuàng。
The figure in this painting is simple and sturdy.
你都二十大几的人了，怎么还喜欢看动画片？
Nǐ dōu èrshí dà jǐ de rén le，zěnme hái xǐhuan kàn dònghuàpiān？
You are over 25 years old, how can you still love cartoons?
那幅名贵字画被盗劫了。
Nà fú míngguì zìhuà bèi dàojié le。
That rare work of calligraphy and painting has been stolen.
这幅画的价钱抵得上那辆汽车。
Zhèfúhuà de jiàqián dǐdéshàng nà liàng qìchē。
The price of this painting is almost the same as that of the car.
那画儿里的姑娘，真是婀娜多姿！
Nà huàr lǐ de gūniang，zhēnshi ēnuó duōzī！
The girl in that drawing has a supple and graceful bearing.
我是初学绘画，很希望能够得到方家指点。
Wǒ shì chūxué huìhuà，hěn xīwàng nénggòu dédào fāngjiā zhǐdiǎn。
I have just begun to learn painting and  hope to get instructions from experts.
收藏古书字画，要注意定时防除蛀虫。
Shōucáng gǔshū zìhuà，yào zhùyì dìngshí fángchú zhùchóng。
One must prevent and kill moths when collecting ancient calligraphy and paintings.
他家的房山上挂着几幅画。
Tā jiā de fángshān shàng guà zhe jǐ fú huà。
Several paintings are hanging on the gable walls of his house.
小刘很喜欢那幅画，山林飞瀑生动漂亮。
Xiǎo Liú hěn xǐhuan nà fú huà，shānlín fēipù shēngdòng piàoliang。
The painting which Xiao Liu likes very much depicts a waterfall in the mountain in a very vivid way.
这本书的扉画是张先生的作品。
Zhèběnshū de fēihuà shì Zhāng xiānsheng de zuòpǐn。
The front illustration of this book is one of Mr. Zhang\'s works.
这张照片的分辨率不太高，所以放大后画面显得有些模糊。
Zhèzhāng zhàopiàn de fēnbiànlǜ bú tài gāo，suǒyǐ fàngdà hòu huàmiàn xiǎnde yǒuxiē móhu。
Due to its low resolution, the picture doesn\'t look very clear when magnified.
他在粉白的墙上挂了两幅油画。
Tā zài fěnbái de qiáng shàng guà le liǎng fú yóuhuà。
He put two oil paintings up on the white wall.
她的卧室里挂着一幅油画，上面是一位丰腴的少妇。
Tā de wòshì lǐ guà zhe yìfú yóuhuà，shàngmiàn shì yíwèi fēngyú de shàofù。
There is a painting of a plump beauty in her bedroom.
这画儿上的美丽姑娘，真是丰韵动人！
Zhè huàr shàng de měilì gūniang，zhēnshì fēngyùn dòngrén！
The pretty girl in this painting is really charming.
他已在服辩上签字画押。
Tā yǐ zài fúbiàn shàng qiānzì huàyā。
He has signed his confession.
巫师煞有介事的画起了驱魔符节。
Wūshī shàyǒu jièshì de huàqǐ le qūmó fújié。
The wizard started to draw a magic figure to exorcise spirits, with a show of gravity and dignity.
这幅画幅宽三米。
Zhèfúhuà fúkuān sān mǐ。
The picture is three meters in width.
除了这几门主修课，我还副修了绘画和书法。
Chúle zhèjǐmén zhǔxiūkè，wǒ hái fùxiū le huìhuà hé shūfǎ。
Besides these major courses, I minored in painting and handwriting.
在这封信的结尾她画了一个大大的感叹号。
Zài zhèfēngxìn de jiéwěi tā huà le yígè dàdà de gǎntànhào。
She added a big exclamation mark at the end of this letter.
这幅画里的将士手里拿的是钢叉。
Zhèfúhuà lǐ de jiàngshì shǒulǐ ná de shì gāngchā。
In the hands of soldiers in the picture are steel fork weapons.
这本书里画杠杠的地方是这次考试的重点。
Zhèběnshū lǐ huà gànggàng de dìfāng shì zhècì kǎoshì de zhòngdiǎn。
The places marked in this book are focal points for this exam.
网络动画大有搞头。
Wǎngluò dònghuà dàyǒu gǎotóu。
Internet cartoons are worth drawing.
这幅《山景》是工笔画。
Zhè fú《Shānjǐng》 shì gōngbǐhuà。
The painting named &quot;A Mountain Scene&quot; is a drawing made with fine, delicate strokes.
他工于国画和书法。
Tā gōngyú guóhuà hé shūfǎ。
He is good at traditional Chinese painting and calligraphy.
只有坚持不断的勾描临画，才可能有所成就。
Zhǐyǒu jiānchí búduàn de gōumiáo línhuà，cái kěnéng yǒusuǒ chéngjiù。
Only by continuously sketching and copying can great achievements be made.
这幅古画要等待专家鉴定后才能进行拍卖。
Zhè fú gǔhuà yào děngdài zhuānjiā jiàndìng hòu cáinéng jìnxíng pāimài。
This ancient painting must be authenticated by specialists before its auction.
有些孩子认为动画片里的怪兽是真的。
Yǒu xiē háizi rènwéi dònghuàpiān lǐ de guàishòu shì zhēn de。
Some children think that monsters in cartoons are real.
他是故宫博物院的馆员，对古代名人字画很有研究。
Tā shì Gùgōng bówùyuàn de guǎnyuán，duì gǔdài míngrén zìhuà hěnyǒu yánjiū。
He works at the Forbidden City and knows a lot about ancient calligraphy and paintings of famous people.
他写字像鬼画符，没人能认出来。
Tā xiězì xiàng guǐhuàfú，méi rén néng rèn chūlái。
He scrawls, and no one can recognize what he writes.
少跟我在这鬼画符，你那点心思我早看出来了。
Shǎo gēn wǒ zài zhè guǐhuàfú，nǐ nà diǎn xīnsi wǒ zǎo kàn chūlái le。
Stop being a hypocrite, I already know what\'s on your mind.
海派的画风与岭南派有很大不同。
Hǎipài de huàfēng yǔ lǐngnánpài yǒu hěndà bùtóng。
The Shanghai style differs a lot from the Lingnan style of painting.
他画了一些湖绿色的浮萍，看起来很自然。
Tā huà le yìxiē húlǜsè de fúpíng，kànqǐlái hěnzìrán。
He has drawn some lake-green duckweeds, which look quite natural.
我喜欢他挂在墙上的这幅花鸟画。
Wǒ xǐhuan tā guà zài qiáng shàng de zhèfú huāniǎohuà。
I like the flower-bird painting hanging on his wall.
这张画符可以用来消灾免难。
Zhèzhāng huàfú kěyǐ yònglái xiāozāi miǎnnàn。
This talisman can block off disasters, and evil things.
只要一画供，他的罪名就成立了。
Zhǐyào yí huàgòng，tā de zuìmíng jiù chénglì le。
Once he signed on the confession, the charges against him would be established.
他因画虎类犬在学校成了众人的笑料。
Tā yīn huà hǔlèiquǎn zài xuéxiào chéng le zhòngrén de xiàoliào。
He became the public jape in school, because he overreached when imitating others.
他家的画镜线安的很美观。
Tā jiā de huàjìngxiàn ān de hěnměiguān。
The mirror-hanging-line of his home was put in beautifully.
每个句子在结尾的地方都要画句号。
Měigè jùzi zài jiéwěi de dìfāng dōuyào huà jùhào。
Every sentence should have a full stop on the end.
他的作品与众不同，自成一个画派。
Tā de zuòpǐn yǔzhòngbùtóng，zìchéng yígè huàpài。
His works are larruping, and form a genre of his own.
他的画堂让来访者觉得很温馨。
Tā de huàtáng ràng láifǎngzhě juédé hěnwēnxīn。
His well decorated hall makes visitors feel very warm.
他的画选正在图书大厦出售，销量火爆。
Tā de huàxuǎn zhèngzài túshū dàshà chūshòu，xiāoliàng huǒbào。
His book of selected paintings is selling well at Books Plaza.
画苑精英们经常在这家咖啡馆进行聚会。
Huàyuàn jīngyīngmen jīngcháng zài zhè jiā kāfēiguǎn jìnxíng jùhuì。
Elites of the painting field often gather at this café.
这幅画作价值不菲，确实是精品。
Zhè fú huàzuò jiàzhí bùfěi，quèshí shì jīngpǐn。
This picture is very valuable, and exquisite indeed.
此画虽是他随意挥洒之作，但却独具韵味。
Cǐ huà suī shì tā suíyì huīsǎ zhī zuò，dàn què dújù yùnwèi。
Though the painting was casually painted by him, it had a unique lingering charm.
百幅名画在北京历史博物馆汇展。
Bǎi fú mínghuà zài Bĕijīng lìshǐ bówùguǎn huìzhǎn.
Hundreds of famous paintings are exhibited together in the Museum of History in Beijing.
这匹马被画得活龙活现，十分逼真。
Zhèpǐmǎ bèi huà de huólóng huóxiàn，shífēn bīzhēn。
This horse was painted vividly, true to life.
这幅画的基底是金黄色，看起来有点刺眼。
Zhèfúhuà de jīdǐ shì jīnhuángsè，kànqǐlái yǒu diǎn cìyǎn。
The base color of this painting is golden, which looks a little dazzling.
郑板桥以善画竹兰见称于世。
Zhèng Bǎnqiáo yǐ shànhuà zhúlán jiànchēng yú shì。
Zheng Banqiao was renowned for skilled at drawing bamboo and orchids.
在以前男女交欢的画像是不允许公开展示的。
Zài yǐqián nánnǚ jiāohuān de huà xiàng shì bùyǔnxǔ gōngkāi zhǎnshì de。
Pictures of sexual intercourse were not allowed to be shown in public in the past.
他的绘画技艺日渐精进，真是难得。
Tā de huìhuà jìyì rìjiàn jīngjìn，zhēnshì nándé。
He is making great progress in painting, which is hard to achieve.
这幅《骏马图》画得非常精妙。
Zhè fú《Jùnmǎtú》huà de fēicháng jīngmiào。
This painting of steeds is exquisite.
老先生的精舍中挂着不少名人字画。
Lǎoxiānshēng de jīngshě zhōng guà zhe bùshǎo míngrén zìhuà。
There are many paintings and calligraphy works in the old gentleman\'s study.
名家书画拍卖会明天举槌。
Míngjiā shūhuà pāimàihuì míngtiān jǔchuí。
The auction of calligraphies and paintings of celebrities will be held tomorrow.
拍卖会上，这幅油画开叫1万元，可是没人应拍。
Pāimàihuì shàng，zhèfú yóuhuà kāijiào yíwànyuán，kěshì méirén yìngpāi。
During the auction, the bid price for this painting was 10,000 yuan, but no one responded to it.
他绘制的蛋壳彩画，精致漂亮，堪称一绝！
Tā huìzhì de dànké cǎihuà，jīngzhì piàoliàng，kānchēng yìjué！
The eggs he decorated with colored drawings are really exquisite and beautiful. They can be called unique.
借助珂啍版印刷术，我们复制出了几幅完美逼真的敦煌壁画。
Jièzhù kēhēngbǎn yìnshuāshù，wǒmen fùzhì chū le jǐ fú wánměi bīzhēn de dūnhuáng bìhuà。
With the help of collotype printing, we copied several Dunhuang frescoes, which are quite similar to the originals.
他在绘画方面，真是个可人。
Tā zài huìhuà fāngmiàn，zhēn shì gè kěrén。
He is good at drawing.
他的这幅画很有意思：空漠的荒原上只有一串人的脚印。
Tā de zhèfúhuà hěnyǒu yìsi：kōngmò de huāngyuán shàng zhǐyǒu yíchuàn rén de jiǎoyìn。
His painting is very interesting: an empty desert with a string of footprints.
看这款识，就知道这幅画出自大师之手。
Kàn zhè kuǎnshí，jiù zhīdào zhèfúhuà chūzì dàshī zhī shǒu。
On first sight of the signature, you know that it was painted by a grand master.
他是个老来少，最爱跟孙子一起看动画片。
Tā shì gè lǎoláishào，zuì ài gēn sūnzi yìqǐ kàn dònghuàpiān。
He is young at heart and is fond of watching cartoons with his grandson.
好的画家要历观名山大川，切身地感受其中的妙处才能下笔如有神。
Hǎo de huàjiā yào lìguān míngshān dàchuān，qièshēn de gǎnshòu qí zhōng de miàochù cáinéng xiàbǐ rú yǒushén。
A good painter must observe the famous mountains, and rivers one by one. Only after getting a subtle feeling of the wonderful points of them can the painter paint vividly, and smoothly.
这幅画虽然有立体感，但看似有些比例失调。
Zhèfúhuà suīrán yǒu lìtǐgǎn，dàn kànsì yǒuxiē bǐlì shītiáo。
Though this picture has a sense of third dimension, its proportions look a little maladjusted.
我有收集连环画的爱好。
Wǒ yǒu shōují liánhuánhuà de àihào。
My hobby is collecting comic strips.
他在这幅神像的周围又画上了一圈灵光。
Tā zài zhèfú shén xiàng de zhōuwéi yòu huàshàng le yì quān língguāng。
He drew another circuit of bright light around the head of  God.
他对于古玩字画真是门儿清。
Tā duìyú gǔwán zìhuà zhēnshì ménrqīng.
He is knowledgeable about antiques, scripts and paintings.
这幅画出自名笔，自然极有价值。
Zhèfúhuà chūzì míngbǐ，zìrán jíyǒu jiàzhí。
This picture is painted by a famous person, so it is extremely valuable.
他从小学画，如今他的作品早已名满天下了。
Tā cóng xiǎo xuéhuà，rújīn tā de zuòpǐn zǎoyǐ míngmǎn tiānxià le。
He began learning painting when he was young, and now his works are world-famous.
她觉得当个肖像模特儿挺简单，只要坐在画室里就行了。
Tā juédé dāng gè xiāo xiàng mótèr tǐng jiǎndān，zhǐyào zuòzài huàshì lǐ jiùxíng le。
She thinks that it is easy to be an image model for she only needs sitting in an atelier.
他跟师傅学到了磨漆画这项技艺。
Tā gēn shīfu xuédào le móqīhuà zhè xiàng jìyì。
He has learned the skill of lacquer painting from his master.
他的墨笔山水画是很不错的艺术作品。
Tā de mòbǐ shānshuǐhuà shì hěnbúcuò de yìshù zuòpǐn。
His Chinese landscape paintings by brush are wonderful artistic works.
美术馆下周要举办木版画展，咱们去看看吧！
Měishùguǎn xiàzhōu yào jǔbàn mùbǎn huàzhǎn，zánmen qù kànkàn ba！
A woodcut exhibition will be held in the art museum next week. Let’s go to see it.

现在有机读目录方便多了，可以直接识别出图书的文字。
Xiànzài yǒu jīdú mùlù fāngbiàn duō le，kěyǐ zhíjiē shíbié chū túshū de wénzì。
It is more convenient to use a machine-readable catalogue which can be read directly by a computer.
小张喜欢把工作文档保存在E盘根目录下。
Xiǎo Zhāng xǐhuan bǎ gōngzuò wéndàng bǎocún zài E pán gēnmùlù xià。
Xiao Zhang likes to save his work documents under the root directory of disc E.
我们的目录重码了，必须赶快修改。
Wǒmen de mùlù chóngmǎle，bìxū gǎnkuài xiūgǎi。
The contents has repeated coding. We must quickly modify it.
优秀运动员的目标不仅是夺冠，而且还要创纪录。
Yōuxiù yùndòngyuán de mùbiāo bùjǐn shì duóguān，érqiě háiyào chuàng jìlù。
The goal of an excellent athlete is not only to win but also to break old records.
目录卡
目录
产品目录
新书目录。
新书目录。
电视台派人来采录他们自编自演的节目
a table of contents
目录，目次
a library catalog card
(图书)目录卡片
a library index
图书馆目录
A picture of a cat on a log is a rebus for &quot;catalog&quot;.
画中一段圆木上有一只猫，其画谜底是“目录”(catalog)。
The table of contents is on page 5.
目录在第五页。
(table of) contents
目录
Have you tried listing your other directories?
你有没有试着把其他的目录列出来？
Several discrepancies were found in the inventory, compared with the original contract.
货物目录和原始合同上有数条不符之处。
He inventories the minor losses and submitted it to the management.
他将那些较小的损失编进目录，上交给管理层。
Sometimes it is convenient and time saving to keep a catalogue of relevent ads at hand.
有时候如果手头有本相关广告目录的话，就会很方便，很节省时间。
The directory was corrupted and unable to be read.
Mùlù yǐ sǔnhuài，wúfǎ dúqǔ shùjù。
目录已损坏，无法读取数据。
The exhibition catalogue contains two essays and a list of the artist\'s works.
Zhè běn zhǎnlǎn mùlù bāokuò liǎng piān sǎnwén hé yí liè yìshùjiā zuòpǐnbiǎo。
这本展览目录包括两篇散文和一列艺术家作品表。
He ordered the new sofa from a catalogue.
Tā cóng chǎnpǐn mùlù zhōng dìnggòule yì bǎ xīn shāfā。
他从产品目录中定购了一把新沙发。
You will find catalogues for the current exhibition in the stands near the display cases.
Nǐ huì zài zhǎnpǐn guì fùjìn de táizi shàng zhǎodào mùqián zhǎnlǎn de mùlù。
你会在展品柜附近的台子上找到目前展览的目录。
The catalogue of recent errors is now common knowledge.
Zuìjìn de cuòwù de mùlù xiànzài yǐ rénsuǒgòngzhī。
最近的错误的目录现在已人所共知。
I have many files in the directory, and have to compress them into a single file.
Zhège mùlù xià yǒu hěn duō wénjiàn，ér wǒ yào bǎ tāmen yāsuō chéng yí gè。
这个目录下有很多文件，而我要把它们压缩成一个。
We looked over the catalog during lunch.
Wǔcān de shíhou wǒmen bǎ mùlù zǐxì kànle yí biàn。
午餐的时候我们把目录仔细看了一遍。
All products in the catalog are normally in stock.
Mùlù zhōng suǒyǒu de chǎnpǐn tōngcháng dōuyǒu xiànhuò。
目录中所有的产品通常都有现货。
In each list they will be reduced in scope.
Zài měi zhāng mùlù xià，tāmen de fànwéi dōuhuì bèi jiǎnshǎo。
在每张目录下，它们的范围都会被减少。
Entries in the directory include such items as computers, dog leads, flowerpots, mobile phones, and wool among many others!
Mùlù bāohán zhèyàng de yìxiē shāngpǐn，bǐrú jìsuànjī，gǒuliàn，huāpén，yídòngdiànhuà hé yángmáo děngděng。
目录包含这样的一些商品，比如计算机，狗链，花盆，移动电话和羊毛等等。
Browse a computer directory.
Liúlǎn jìsuànjī de mùlù。
浏览计算机的目录。
He found it in the sears catalog.
Tā zài Sears Gōngsī de chǎnpǐnmùlù zhōng zhǎodàole tā。
他在Sears公司的产品目录中找到了它。
A library catalog is metadata because it describes publications.
Túshūguǎn mùlù shì yuán shùjù，yīnwèi tā miáoshùle chūbǎnwù xìnxī。
图书馆目录是元数据，因为它描述了出版物信息。
The job of compiling the inventory took several hours.
Biānjí xiángxì mùlù de gōngzuò huāfèile hǎo jǐ gè xiǎoshí。
编辑详细目录的工作花费了好几个小时。
Our accountants spent all day looking for the money in their records.
Wǒmen de kuàijì huāfèile quán tiān shíjiān lái cházhǎo tāmen zhàngmù jìlù shàng de qiánkuǎn。
我们的会计花费了全天时间来查找他们账目记录上的钱款。
The items have been posted up and recorded.
Xiàngmù yǐ bèi jìlù zàicè。
项目已被记录在册。
His 400 metres time broke the championship record for the event.
Tā de 400 mǐ pǎo shíjiān dǎpòle gāi xiàngmù de guànjūn jìlù。
他的 400 米跑时间打破了该项目的冠军记录。

我定期从广播四台录制节目，好第二天在车上听。

They also racked up the fastest time of all six heats in this event.

演员出现在舞台、广播、电视、录像或动画作品中。

log in to a website

chuàngjìlù 
set a record; chalk up a record
创造新记录
chuàngzào xīnjìlù 
set (or create) a new record
I am hoping to run something close to the Chinese record set in 2008.

Huā Mùlán dàifù cóngzhēng de gùshì liúchuán zhìjīn。
The story of Huamulan going to a military expedition for her father has been handed down to the present time.

A line in the Henan opera Mulan goes like this, &quot;Who says women are any inferior to men?&quot;
替父从军的花木兰说得上是位巾帼英雄。
Tì fù cóngjūn de Huā Mùlán shuōdéshàng shì wèi jīnguó yīngxióng。
Hua Mulan, who joined the army in place of her father, can be counted as a heroine.
木兰要开花了。
Nùlán yào kāihuā le。
The magnolias are beginning to blossom.
Precocious flowers appear before the leaves as in some species of magnolias.
Zǎoshú huā xiān yú yèzi chūxiàn，jiùxiàng mǒuxiē pǐnzhǒng de mùlán nàyàng。
早熟花先于叶子出现，就像某些品种的木兰那样。

波兰语中，呼格常常不同于主格。

láodònɡ zhìfù 
become rich through sweat and toil

那位普通读者有着关于人情世故的丰富智慧和知识。

gāi Gōngsī yú 2007 nián bèi chūshòu gěi le fù tōng Gōngsī 。
该公司于2007年被出售给了富通公司。
During the days of abundant farm labour women were very much confined to the roles of housewife and mother.
Zài nóngchǎng láolì dàliàng fùzú de shíqī，nǚxìng wǎngwǎng shòuxiàn yú bànyǎn jiātíngzhǔfù hé mǔqīn de juésè。
在农场劳力大量富足的时期，女性往往受限于扮演家庭主妇和母亲的角色。
富有特色的场景
fùyǒu tèsè de chǎngjǐng 
scene with special features of its own; scene with a distinctive flavour
他家非常富有。
Tā jiā fēicháng fùyǒu。
His family is very rich.
富有经验
fùyǒu jīngyàn
be rich in experience; be very experienced
建立富有活力的管理体制和运行机制
jiànlì fùyǒu huólì de guǎnlǐ tǐzhì hé yùnxíngjīzhì 
establish dynamic management systems and operating mechanisms
这次会谈富有建设性。
Zhècì huìtán fùyǒu jiànshèxìng。
The talks were very constructive.
富有竞争力
fùyǒu jìngzhēnglì
(of a price, product, etc.) highly competitive
她的舞姿袅娜，富有诗情画意。
Tā de wǔzī niǎonuó，fù yǒu shīqíng huàyì。
She danced with poetic grace.
一起富有戏剧性的事件
yì qǐ fùyǒu xìjùxìng de shìjiàn
a dramatic event
富有乐感
fùyǒu yuègǎn
musical and sensitive
富有朝气
fùyǒu zhāoqì 
be full of vigour

Zhèshǒushī fùyǒu zhélǐxìng。
This poem is philosophical.

Wǒ chīwàng zhe jiānglái nénggòu biàn de fùyǒu。
I am dying to become rich one day.

富有创造力
fùyǒuchuàngzàolì
be very creative

Tā de xiǎngfǎ hěn xīnqí，fùyǒu chuàngzàoxìng。
He has lots of novel ideas: he\'s bursting with creativity.
你有富余的钱吗？
Nǐ yǒu fùyú de qián ma?

粮食有富余。
Liángshi yǒu fùyu。
There is a surplus of grain.

yōngyǒu fēngfù de kuàngcáng 
have rich mineral resources; abound in mineral resources

Qióngrén shíjìshàng shì zài bāngzhù fùrén。
穷人实际上是在帮助富人。
Anxiety disorders are more common in the rich.
Yōuyùzhèng zài fùrén jiēcéng gèng pǔbiàn。
忧郁症在富人阶层更普遍。
It is a bit like a rich person living in a wealthy neighborhood not seeing any poverty.

有点像一个住在富人区有钱人，看不出任何贫穷。
Many rich men have their lives insured for great amounts.
Yìxiē fùrén wèi zìjǐ shēngmìng tóule dà é bǎo\'é。
一些富人为自己生命投了大额保额。
I thought they were going to try to shake down the rich man.
Wǒ yǐwéi tāmen yào shìtú lèsuǒ nà wèi fùrén。
我以为他们要试图勒索那位富人。
The rich turned a deaf ear to the cry of the poor.

富人对穷人的哭喊充耳不闻。

Fùrén xuànyào de shēnghuó fāngshì jīqǐle qióngrén de chóuhèn。
富人炫耀的生活方式激起了穷人的仇恨。
Private airplanes are a rich man\'s toy.
Sīrén fēijī shì fùrén de wánjù。
私人飞机是富人的玩具。
This system advantages the rich.
Zhèzhǒng zhìdù duì fùrén yǒulì。
这种制度对富人有利。
It is wrong for the rich to take advantage of the poor.
Fùrén qīfu qióngrén shì bú dàodé de。
富人欺负穷人是不道德的。
She dumped her boyfriend when she fell in love with a rich man.
Tā àishàng lìngyī gè fùrén zhīhòu，jiù shuǎidiàole tā de nánpéngyǒu。
她爱上另一个富人之后，就甩掉了她的男朋友。
Editors and journalists who express opinions in print that are opposed to the interests of the rich are dismissed and replaced by subservient ones.
Nàxiē yǔ fùrén lìyì zuòduì de biǎodá tāmen guāndiǎn de biānjí hé jìzhě bèi kāichúle，bìng bèi nàxiē qūcóng de rén suǒ qǔdài。

The Penalty and Study of Law, in the History of Han Dynasty said that after Qi Huanggong appointed Guanzhong, the country began to prosper and people lived in peace.
国富民强是中国人民的共同愿望。
Guófù mínqiáng shì Zhōngguó rénmín de gòngtóng yuànwàng。
The Chinese people all share the same dream, that the nation and people will be powerful.
与丰富人民的“菜篮子”和“米袋子”直接相关的农业科技开发项目
Yǔ fēngfù rénmín de“càilánzi”hé“mǐdàizi”zhíjiē xiāngguān de nóngyè kējì kāifā xiàng mù。
agricultural projects directly related to the people\'s vegetable and grain supply
得益于藏富于民的国策，我国民间资本的规模大大增加。
Déyìyú cángfù yú mín de guócè，wǒguó mínjiān zīběn de guīmó dàdà zēngjiā。
Benefitting from the national policy of storing treasures in the public, our civil capital grew greatly.
为了丰富居民的文化生活，小区里的民校新开设了舞蹈班。
Wèile fēngfù jūmín de wénhuà shēnghuó，xiǎoqū lǐ de mínxiào xīn kāishè le wǔdǎobān。
In order to enrich the cultural life of the citizens, a dance class was opened in the spare-time school for adults this quarter.
富国裕民
fùɡuóyùmín 
make one\'s country and people rich
富国安民是我们共同的愿望。
Fùguó ānmín shì wǒmen gòngtóng de yuànwàng。
We share a common desire to make our country rich and its people live in peace.
养猪是最好的家庭副业，是农民致富的好帮手。
Yǎngzhū shì zuìhǎo de jiātíng fùyè，shì nóngmín zhìfù de hǎobāngshǒu。
Raising pigs is the best household sideline and a good way of making money for farmers.
为了帮助村民们尽快致富，村里搞了多种农副业。
Wèile bāngzhù cūnmínmen jìnkuài zhìfù，cūn lǐ gǎo le duōzhǒng nóngfùyè。
In order to help the villagers get rich quick, the village carried out multiple agriculture and sideline occupations.
改革初期，农民害怕被称作富裕户；今天以冒富而自豪。
Gǎigé chūqī，nóngmín hàipà bèi chēngzuò fùyùhù; jīntiān yǐ màofù ér zìháo。
In the early stages of reform, farmers were afraid to be considered well-off, but today they are proud of doing better than average.
大农业体系的建立，使这个地区的农民很快脱贫致富。
Dànóngyè tǐxì de jiànlì，shǐ zhège dìqū de nóngmín hěnkuài tuōpín zhìfù。
Farmers in this region quickly got rid of poverty and became better off after the establishment of the agricultural economic system.
许多民间的俗谚都很富于哲理性。
Xǔduō mínjiān de súyàn dōu hěnfùyú zhélǐxìng。
There is philosophical meaning in many aphorisms.
富裕中农是较为特殊的农民阶层。
Fùyù zhōng nóng shì jiào wéi tèshū de nóngmín jiēcéng。

中国民族众多，礼俗也相应地丰富，研究起来很有趣。
