丰富多彩的节日活动
fēngfùduōcǎi de jiérì huódòng
varied and colourful festival activities
他不是很富的。
Tā búshì hěn fù de。
He is not very rich.
富日子当穷日子过。
Fù rìzi dàng qióng rìzi guò。
Be thrifty even in days of abundance.
富于养分
fù yú yǎngfèn
be rich in nutrition
富于自我批评精神
fù yú zìwǒ pīpíng jīngshén
be imbued with the spirit of self-criticism
富于创造性
fù yú chuàngzàoxìng
be highly creative
富贵人家
fùguì rénjiā
a rich and powerful family
富丽堂皇的建筑
fùlìtánghuáng de jiànzhù
magnificent buildings
使祖国更加繁荣富强
shǐ zǔguó gèngjiā fánróngfùqiáng 
make our country more prosperous and powerful
美丽富饶的国家
měilì fùráo de guójiā
a beautiful and richly endowed country
富饶的土地
fùráo de tǔdì
fertile land
他家非常富有。
Tā jiā fēicháng fùyǒu。
His family is very rich.
富有经验
fùyǒu jīngyàn
be rich in experience; be very experienced
日子过得挺富裕
rìzi guò de tǐng fùyù
lead a well-to-do life
我们还富余两张票。
Wǒmen hái fùyu liǎng zhāng piào。
We have two tickets to spare.
你有富余的钱吗？
Nǐ yǒu fùyú de qián ma?
Have you any money to spare?
粮食有富余。
Liángshi yǒu fùyu。
There is a surplus of grain.
富氧鼓风
fù yǎnɡ ɡǔfēnɡ
oxygen-enriched (air) blast
中国国土广阔，资源丰富。
Zhōngguó guótǔ guǎngkuò，zīyuán fēngfù。
China is a vast country abundant in natural resources.
建立富有活力的管理体制和运行机制
jiànlì fùyǒu huólì de guǎnlǐ tǐzhì hé yùnxíngjīzhì 
establish dynamic management systems and operating mechanisms
他在工作中积累了丰富的经验。
Tā zài gōngzuò zhōng jīlěi le fēngfù de jīngyàn。
He has accumulated a wealth of experience in his work.
内容丰富，文字简练
nèirónɡ fēnɡfù, wénzì jiǎnliàn
rich in content and succinct in style
这次会谈富有建设性。
Zhècì huìtán fùyǒu jiànshèxìng。
The talks were very constructive.
我国近海有丰富的水产资源。
Wǒ guó jìnhǎi yǒu fēngfù de shuǐchǎn zīyuán。
Our country has rich offshore aquatic resources.
经验丰富
jīngyàn fēngfù
have rich experience; be very experienced
富有竞争力
fùyǒu jìngzhēnglì
(of a price, product, etc.) highly competitive
他究竟经验丰富，让他负责这项工作最合适。
Tā jiūjìngjīngyàn fēngfù，ràng tā fùzé zhè xiàng gōngzuò zuì héshì。
After all, he is very experienced, so it is only suitable to put him in charge of the job.
只要你注意搜集，久而久之，资料就丰富了。
Zhīyào nǐ zhùyì sōují，jiǔ\'érjiǔzhī，zīliào jiù fēngfù le。
If you keep on collecting, in time you\'ll have a wealth of data.
积累了巨额财富
jīlěi le jù\'é cáifù
have accumulated a huge amount of wealth
美国石油巨富
měiguó shí yóu jù fù
a U. S. oil tycoon
客源丰富
kèyuán fēnɡfù
have no lack of potential customers (or tourists)
中国矿藏丰富。
Zhōngguó kuàngcángfēngfù。
China is rich in mineral resources.
贫富两极分化
pín fù liǎngjí fēnhuà
the polarity between rich and poor
这一带地下埋藏着丰富的矿产。
Zhè yídài dìxià máicáng zhe fēngfù de kuàngchǎn。
There are rich mineral deposits in this region.
与丰富人民的“菜篮子”和“米袋子”直接相关的农业科技开发项目
Yǔ fēngfù rénmín de“càilánzi”hé“mǐdàizi”zhíjiē xiāngguān de nóngyè kējì kāifā xiàng mù。
agricultural projects directly related to the people\'s vegetable and grain supply
年富力强的干部
niánfùlìqiáng de gànbù
young and energetic cadres
这地区有丰富的农产。
Zhè dìqū yǒu fēngfù de nóngchǎn。
This district abounds in farm produce.
贫富不均
pín fù bù jūn
unequal distribution of wealth
他知识丰富，但总是保持谦逊的态度。
Tā zhīshi fēngfù，dàn zǒngshì bǎochí qiānxùn de tàidu。
He\'s a man of great knowledge, but he always maintains an attitude of modesty.
侵吞社会财富
qīntūn shèhuì cáifù
appropriate social property
我们要把富日子当穷日子过。
Wǒmen yào bǎ fùrìzi dàng qióngrìzi guò。
We\'re well off now, but we should still live as if we were poor.
享不尽的荣华富贵
xiǎngbújìn de rónghuáfùguì
enjoy untold wealth and high honour
她的舞姿袅娜，富有诗情画意。
Tā de wǔzī niǎonuó，fù yǒu shīqíng huàyì。
She danced with poetic grace.
水产丰富
shuǐchǎn fēngfù
abound in aquatic products
天然财富
tiānrán cáifù 
natural resources (or wealth)
我国土地辽阔，资源丰富。
Wǒ guó tǔdì liáokuò，zīyuán fēngfù。
Our country has a vast territory and abundant resources.
一起富有戏剧性的事件
yì qǐ fùyǒu xìjùxìng de shìjiàn
a dramatic event
让一些闲富的人员返家待聘
ràng yìxiē xiánfù de rényuán fǎnjiā dàipìn
send redundant personnel home to await re-employment
富于乡土气息
fùyú xiānɡtǔ qìxī
be imbued with local colour
贫富悬殊
pínfù xuánshū
a wide gap between the rich and the poor
亿万富翁
yìwàn fùwēng
billionaire; multimillionaire
富于营养
fù yú yínɡyǎnɡ 
nourishing; nutritious
拥有丰富的矿藏
yōngyǒu fēngfù de kuàngcáng 
have rich mineral resources; abound in mineral resources
汉语的语汇是极其丰富的。
Hànyǔ de yùhuì shì jíqí fēngfù de。
Chinese has a very rich vocabulary.
富国裕民
fùɡuóyùmín 
make one\'s country and people rich
富有乐感
fùyǒu yuègǎn
musical and sensitive
我国地下蕴藏着丰富的矿物资源。
Wǒ guó dìxià yùncáng zhe fēngfù de kuàngwù zīyuán。
Our country is rich in mineral resources.
这部百科全书蕴藏着丰富的信息。
Zhè bùbǎikē quánshū yùncáng zhe fēngfù de xìnxī。
This encyclopedia is a vast storehouse of information.
富有朝气
fùyǒu zhāoqì 
be full of vigour
这首诗富有哲理性。
Zhèshǒushī fùyǒu zhélǐxìng。
This poem is philosophical.
贫(富)者
pín(fù)zhě
the poor (rich)
劳动致富
láodònɡ zhìfù 
become rich through sweat and toil
丰富的滋养
fēngfù de zīyǎng
rich nutriment
他的发言内容丰富，足见他是作了认真准备的。
Tā de fāyán nèiróngfēngfù，zújiàn tā shì zuò le rènzhēn zhǔnbèi de。
His speech is substantial, which shows he took great pains to prepare it.
丰富多彩
fēngfùduōcǎi
rich and varied; rich and colourful
财富
cáifù
wealth; riches
富丽堂皇
fùlìtánghuáng
beautiful and imposing; in majestic splendour; sumptuous
富裕
fùyù
prosperous; well-to-do; well-off
不要以为卖了几个钱就变富翁了。
Búyào yǐwéi màile jǐgèqián jiù biànfùwēng le。
他们村的人都是靠饲养安哥拉兔致富的。
Tāmen cūn de rén dōushì kào sìyǎng Āngēlātù zhìfù de。
People of their village earned a big fortune from Angora rabbit farming.
社区的板报办得还不错，挺丰富的。
Shèqū de bǎnbào bàn de hái búcuò，tǐng fēngfù de。
The community blackboard newspaper is pretty good, quite rich and diverse.
这个堡子是靠养蚕致富的。
Zhège bǔzi shì kào yǎngcán zhìfù de。
This town prospered by rearing silkworms.
这是一个富饶的地方，人们的生活水平就不用说了。
Zhè shì yígè fùráo de dìfāng，rénmen de shēnghuó shuǐpíng jiù búyòng shuō le。
This is a rich place, and there is no need to mention the living standards of people here.
这个村子是靠饲养菜蛇致富的。
Zhège cūnzi shì kào sìyǎng càishé zhìfù de。
This village got rich by keeping edible snakes.
他根本没有必要这样藏富装穷。
Tā gēnběn méiyǒu bìyào zhèyàng cángfù zhuāngqióng。
There is no need for him to pretend to be poor.
得益于藏富于民的国策，我国民间资本的规模大大增加。
Déyìyú cángfù yú mín de guócè，wǒguó mínjiān zīběn de guīmó dàdà zēngjiā。
Benefitting from the national policy of storing treasures in the public, our civil capital grew greatly.
内蒙的草业资源十分丰富。
Nèiměng de cǎoyè zīyuán shífēn fēngfù。
Inner Mongolia is rich in meadow resources.
靠诚实劳动致富是光荣的。
Kào chéngshí láodòng zhìfù shì guāngróng de。
It\'s a glorious to get rich through honest labor.
我们都要勤劳致富，不能吃白饭。
Wǒmen dōuyào qínláo zhìfù，bùnéng chī báifàn。
We should get rich through honest labor, instead of sponging off others.
我痴望着将来能够变得富有。
Wǒ chīwàng zhe jiānglái nénggòu biàn de fùyǒu。
I am dying to become rich one day.
他有丰富的舞台经验，不会怵场的。
Tā yǒu fēngfù de wǔtái jīngyàn，búhuì chùchǎng de。
He has got ample stage experience, and won\'t get stage fright.
今年春节，市场上的畜禽肉类特别丰富。
Jīnnián chūnjié，shìchǎng shàng de chùqín ròulèi tèbié fēngfù。
This Spring Festival both meat, and poultry were in abundant supply in the markets.
艺术创作需要极富创造力的思维。
Yìshù chuàngzuò xūyào jí fù chuàngzàolì de sīwéi。
Creation of art demands a kind of thinking that embodies extremely rich creations.
大农业体系的建立，使这个地区的农民很快脱贫致富。
Dànóngyè tǐxì de jiànlì，shǐ zhège dìqū de nóngmín hěnkuài tuōpín zhìfù。
Farmers in this region quickly got rid of poverty and became better off after the establishment of the agricultural economic system.
她是靠养殖代代花发家致富的。
Tā shì kào yǎngzhí dàidàihuā fājiā zhìfù de。
She built family wealth by planting bitter orange flowers.
本观的道藏极为丰富。
Běn guàn de dàocáng jíwéi fēngfù。
Our temple is rich in Taoist scriptures.
这个山区有非常丰富的地方种群。
Zhège shānqū yǒu fēicháng fēngfù de dìfāng zhǒng qún。
This mountainous area is rich in local animal species.
这个山区附近的地矿资源非常丰富。
Zhège shānqū fùjìn de dìkuàng zīyuán fēicháng fēngfù。
The vicinity of mountainous area is rich in geological minerals.
电视机的发明大大丰富了人们的生活。
Diànshìjī de fāmíng dàdà fēngfù le rénmen de shēnghuó。
The invention of television has greatly enriched people\'s lives.
她俩用自己的名贵首饰暗中斗富。
Tā liǎng yòng zìjǐ de míngguì shǒushì àn zhōng dòufù。
The two women showed off their wealth through their expensive jewelry.
他生在一个堆金积玉的富豪之家。
Tā shēng zài yígè duījīnjīyù de fùháo zhī jiā。
He was born into a wealthy family.
这些丰富的矿藏，是大自然给我们的恩泽！
Zhèxiē fēngfù de kuàngcáng，shì dàzìrán gěi wǒmen de ēnzé！
Abundant mineral resources are bounties bestowed by nature.
蜂王浆富含多种营养物质，是食疗滋补的佳品。
Fēngwángjiāng fùhán duōzhǒng yíngyǎng wùzhì，shì shíliáo zībǔ de jiāpǐn。
Royal jelly is rich in  nutritious substances and is good for one\'s health.
凫茈不仅营养丰富而且还具有食疗价值。
Fúcí bùjǐn yíngyǎng fēngfù érqiě hái jùyǒu shíliáo jiàzhí。
The water chestnut is not only nutritious, it also has medical benefits.
这些富豪们仍不忘扶贫济困。
Zhèxiē fùháomen réng búwàng fúpínjìkùn。
This group of rich people never forget to help the needy.
我的家乡富产乳制品。
Wǒ de jiāxiāng fùchǎn rǔzhìpǐn。
My hometown produces many dairy products.
富国安民是我们共同的愿望。
Fùguó ānmín shì wǒmen gòngtóng de yuànwàng。
We share a common desire to make our country rich and its people live in peace.
建国五十多年来，我们基本实现了富国强兵。
Jiànguó wǔshí duōnián lái，wǒmen jīběn shíxiàn le fùguó qiángbīng。
During the fifty years after the founding of the People\'s Republic of China, we\'ve already made our country rich and its military forces strong.
教育是富国兴邦的关键。
Jiàoyù shì fùguó xīngbāng de guānjiàn。
Education is the key to making our country rich and prosperous.
椰子水富含多种维生素。
Yēzishuǐ fùhán duōzhǒng wéishēngsù。
Coconut milk is rich in vitamins.
这户人家是方圆数十里的第一富户。
Zhè hù rénjiā shì fāngyuán shù shí lǐ de dìyī fùhù。
This family is the richest for tens of miles around.
维也纳金色大厅是如此的富丽堂皇。
Wéiyěnà jīnsè dàtīng shì rúcǐ de fùlì tánghuáng。
The Golden Concert Hall is so magnificent.
这位女企业家是个富婆。
Zhèwèi nǚ qǐyèjiā shì gè fùpó。
This female entrepreneur is rich.
这种面点最好用富强粉做。
Zhèzhǒng miàndiǎn zuìhǎo yòng fùqiángfěn zuò。
You\'d better made such kinds of snacks from strong flour.
他是个势利眼，看到富人就想巴结。
Tā shì gè shìlìyǎn，kàndào fùrén jiù xiǎng bājie。
He is such a snob that he wants to flatter every rich people he meets.
山西曾是一个出富商的地方。
Shānxī céng shì yígè chū fùshāng de dìfāng。
Shanxi province used to produce many rich merchants.
这座教学楼是一位富商大贾投资修建的。
Zhèzuò jiàoxuélóu shì yíwèi fùshāng dàjiǎ tóuzī xiūjiàn de。
The teaching building was built with money invested by a rich businessman.
再富实的家底儿，也经不住你这么挥霍。
Zài fùshí de jiādǐr，yě jīngbúzhù nǐ zhème huīhuò。
No matter how much wealth your family has, it can\'t continue being squandered by you like this.
多年没见，你变富态了。
Duōnián méijiàn，nǐ biàn fùtài le。
I haven\'t seen you for years, you\'ve become plump.
这部电影富于新意，耐人寻味。
Zhèbù diànyǐng fùyú xīnyì，nàirén xúnwèi。
The movie is rich in creativity and worth watching.
富裕中农是较为特殊的农民阶层。
Fùyù zhōng nóng shì jiào wéi tèshū de nóngmín jiēcéng。
Wealthy middle peasants are a special kind of peasant.
我认识一个收集古币的叔叔，他的收藏非常丰富。
Wǒ rènshi yígè shōují gǔbì de shūshu，tā de shōucáng fēicháng fēngfù。
I know an old man who collects ancient coins and possesses an extensive collection.
瑰奇的人生经历也是一笔财富。
Guīqí de rénshēng jīnglì yěshì yì bǐ cáifù。
Life is a treasure, both a rare and precious experience.
《汉书·刑法志》：“至齐桓公任用管仲而国富民安。” 。
《Hànshū·Xíngfǎzhì》：“zhì Qíhuángōng rènyòng Guǎnzhòng ér guófù mín\'ān。”。
The Penalty and Study of Law, in the History of Han Dynasty said that after Qi Huanggong appointed Guanzhong, the country began to prosper and people lived in peace.
国富民强是中国人民的共同愿望。
Guófù mínqiáng shì Zhōngguó rénmín de gòngtóng yuànwàng。
The Chinese people all share the same dream, that the nation and people will be powerful.
他们家很富有，要请专人来护院。
Tāmen jiā hěnfùyǒu，yào qǐng zhuānrén lái hùyuàn。
They were very rich, and had professionals take care of their house.
此地贫富差距较大，已经进入了黄灯区。
Cǐdì pínfù chājù jiàodà，yǐjing jìnrù le huángdēngqū。
The gap between the poor and the rich is very large in this area, and has already entered the yellow light region.
他已经混成了一个百万富翁了。
Tā yǐjing hùnchéng le yígè bǎiwàn fùwēng le。
He has made his way into the rank of millionaires.
混声可以使歌曲更加丰富有跳跃感。
Hùnshēng kěyǐ shǐ gēqǔ gèngjiā fēngfù yǒu tiàoyuègǎn。
Combined sounds can make songs richer and have a more lively feeling.
退休职工活动室的活动项目越来越丰富了。
Tuìxiū zhígōng huódòngshì de huódòng xiàng mù yuèláiyuè fēngfù le。
There are more and more activities in the amusement room for retired workers.
富人与穷人在生活质量上的差异可谓是九天九地。
Fùrén yǔ qióngrén zài shēnghuó zhìliàng shàng de chāyì kěwèi shì jiǔtiān jiǔdì。
The rich and poor live drastically different lives in terms of quality.
现代营养学指出，可食用菌类富含多种营养，且易于人体吸收。
Xiàndài yíngyǎngxué zhǐchū，kě shíyòng jūnlèi fùhán duōzhǒng yíngyǎng，qiě yìyú réntǐ xīshōu。
According to modern food science, edible fungus is rich in various nutrients and it is easy for them to be absorbed by the human body.
荞麦是一种抗寒农作物，富含粗纤维和多种营养。
Qiáomài shì yìzhǒng kànghán nóngzuòwù，fùhán cūxiānwéi hé duōzhǒng yíngyǎng。
Buckwheat is a kind of cold-resistant crop containing coarse fiber and is very nourishing.
我们一定要找到这个村的苦根，然后从根源治理，使乡亲们尽快富裕起来！
Wǒmen yídìng yào zhǎodào zhège cūn de kǔgēn，ránhòu cóng gēnyuán zhìlǐ，shǐ xiāngqīnmen jìnkuài fùyù qǐlái！
We should find out and control the root cause of poverty in the village, and help the villagers to become better-off as soon as possible.
我也不富裕，你还是去家境宽展的老李那儿借钱吧。
Wǒ yě bú fùyù，nǐ háishi qù jiājìng kuānzhǎn de Lǎo Lǐ nàr jiè qián ba。
I am not well-off either. You\'d better borrow money from Laoli, who is comfortably off.
这一带的矿体，宝石蕴藏量很丰富。
Zhè yídài de kuàngtǐ，bǎoshí yùncángliàng hěnfēngfù。
The mineral deposit in the area is rich in gems.
老夫我上了年纪，经验自然比你们年轻人丰富。
Lǎofū wǒ shàng le niánjì，jīngyàn zìrán bǐ nǐmen niánqīngrén fēngfù。
Old as I am, I am certainly more experienced than you young guys.
他们家虽然不富裕，但三口人生活得乐融融的，令人羡慕。
Tāmen jiā suīrán bú fùyù，dàn sān kǒu rén shēnghuó de lèróngróng de，lìng rén xiànmù。
Though they are not very rich, the three lived happily together, which was envied to others.
现在有一种观点强调用累进税来调节贫富差距。
Xiànzài yǒu yìzhǒng guāndiǎn qiángdiào yòng lěijìnshuì lái tiáojié pínfù chāijù。
Now there is one opinion which seeks to adjust the gap between the rich and poor through progressive taxation.
中国民族众多，礼俗也相应地丰富，研究起来很有趣。
Zhōngguó mínzú zhòngduō，lǐsú yě xiāngyìng de fēngfù，yánjiū qǐlái hěnyǒuqù。
There are many people in China, and accordingly their conventions and rituals are abundant. Thus studying  them is very interesting.
妈妈是个理家的好手，我们的生活虽不富裕但过得舒舒服服。
Māma shì gè lǐjiā de hǎoshǒu，wǒmen de shēnghuó suī bú fùyù dàn guò de shūshūfúfú。
Mother is a good house-keeper. Though we are not rich, we live a happy life.
多年的狩猎生活使他成为了一位经验丰富的猎手。
Duōnián de shǒuliè shēnghuó shǐ tā chéngwéi le yíwèi jīngyàn fēngfù de lièshǒu。
Years of hunting made him an experienced hunter.
在这个楼区里生活的人大多很富有。
Zài zhège lóuqū lǐ shēnghuó de rén dàduō hěnfùyǒu。
Most people living in this housing development are very wealthy.
绿野上有成群的牛羊，真是富饶之地啊。
Lǜyě shàng yǒu chéngqún de niúyáng，zhēnshì fùráo zhī dì a。
It is an abundant land with green fields, with flocks of cattle and sheep.
他家骡马成群，很富足。
Tā jiā luómǎ chéngqún，hěnfùzú。
He has flocks of mules and horses, he\'s very wealthy.
为了丰富居民的文化生活，小区里的民校新开设了舞蹈班。
Wèile fēngfù jūmín de wénhuà shēnghuó，xiǎoqū lǐ de mínxiào xīn kāishè le wǔdǎobān。
In order to enrich the cultural life of the citizens, a dance class was opened in the spare-time school for adults this quarter.
生活中的魔难，都是人生的财富。
Shēnghuó zhōng de mónàn，dōushì rénshēng de cáifù。
Hardships in life are all matters of fortune.
南瓜子营养丰富，据说有降血压、治疗慢性病等很多用处。
Nánguāzǐ yíngyǎng fēngfù，jùshuō yǒu jiàngxuèyā、zhìliáo mànxìngbìng děng hěnduō yòngchu。
Pumpkin seeds are nutritious. It is said that it can be used to reduce blood pressure, and cure chronic diseases.
他们家是清代末年南洋一带有名的富豪。
Tāmen jiā shì Qīngdài mònián nányáng yídài yǒumíng de fùháo。
Their family is famous magnate in the coastal provinces of Jiangsu, Zhejiang, Fujian and Guangdong during the remaining years of the Qing dynasty.
这些产自云南的牛肝菌，富含多种对人体有益的营养物质。
Zhèxiē chǎnzì Yúnnán de niúgānjūn，fùhán duōzhǒng duì réntǐ yǒuyì de yíngyǎng wùzhì。
These boletes originally produced in Yunnan province are rich in many kinds of nutrition which are healthy to one\'s body.
为了帮助村民们尽快致富，村里搞了多种农副业。
Wèile bāngzhù cūnmínmen jìnkuài zhìfù，cūn lǐ gǎo le duōzhǒng nóngfùyè。
In order to help the villagers get rich quick, the village carried out multiple agriculture and sideline occupations.
你虽生在蓬门荜户，但你拥有青春和知识这两种财富。
Nǐ suī shēngzài péngmén bìhù，dàn nǐ yōngyǒu qīngchūn hé zhīshi zhè liǎngzhǒng cáifù。
Though born in a humble home, you still own the two fortunes of youth and knowledge.
他年轻的时候四海飘游，经历丰富。
Tā niánqīng de shíhou sìhǎi piāoyóu，jīnglì fēngfù。
He led a wandering life in his youth and had abundant experiences.
冬天的海深沉而有魄力，颇富奇趣。
Dōngtiān de hǎi shēnchén ér yǒu pòlì，pōfù qíqù。
The ocean in winter is deep and bold, and rich in unusual charm.
他在起居室里摆了一盆富贵竹。
Tā zài qǐjūshì lǐ bǎi le yì pén fùguìzhú。
He laid a pot of bamboo in the living room.
他过得并不富裕，但在买书时他向来是千金一掷。
Tā guò de bìngbú fùyù，dàn zài mǎishū shítā xiàng lái shì qiānjīn yízhì。
He doesn\'t lead a life of abundance, but he throws away money like dirt when buying books
他并不甘心一辈子给富贵人家当清客。
Tā bìngbùgānxīn yíbèizi gěi fùguì rénjiā dāng qīngkè。
He is not willing to be a hanger-on of rich and powerful families.
这家餐厅的装饰极富西方情韵。
Zhèjiā cāntīng de zhuāngshì jí fù xīfāng qíngyùn。
The decoration of the restaurant is full of western style.
小康家庭应该帮助穷匮一同致富。
Xiǎokāng jiātíng yīnggāi bāngzhù qióngkuì yìtóng zhìfù。
Comfortably-off families should help the poor to get rich together.
他希望这辈子能有享不尽的荣华富贵。
Tā xīwàng zhèbèizi néng yǒu xiǎng bùjìn de rónghuá fùguì。
He hopes that he can enjoy unlimited wealth and honor.
我本是一个贫困的儒生，并不富裕。
Wǒ běn shì yígè pínkùn de rúshēng，bìngbú fùyù。
I used to be a poor Confucian scholar.
据说这伙强盗专门杀富济贫。
Jùshuō zhè huǒ qiángdào zhuānmén shāfùjìpín。
It was said that this group of bandits just killed the cruel rich to help the poor.
投身商海十几年，他积攒了不少财富。
Tóushēn shānghǎi shíjǐ nián，tā jīzǎn le bùshǎo cáifù。
Having struggled in commercial seamanship for several years, he has accumulated much wealth.
别看我现在穷困潦倒，我家上世可是有名的富翁。
Bié kàn wǒ xiànzài qióngkùnliáodǎo，wǒjiā shàngshì kěshì yǒumíng de fùwēng。
Though I am poor and wretched now, my progenitors were famously wealthy.
他自以为有丰富的社会经验、深谙世故。
Tā zìyǐwéi yǒu fēngfù de shèhuì jīngyàn、shēnānshìgù。
He claims himself rich in social experience and familiar with the ways of the world.
从生相看他应该是大富大贵之人。
Cóng shēng xiàng kàn tā yīnggāi shì dàfù dàguì zhī rén。
Judging from his appearance, he will make a huge fortune in the future.
我公司为用户准备了丰富多样的声讯服务。
Wǒ gōngsī wèi yònghù zhǔnbèi le fēngfù duōyàng de shēngxùn fúwù。
Our company has prepared many and various telephone services for users.
虽然他十分富有，但依然过着省俭的生活。
Suīrán tā shífēn fùyǒu，dàn yīrán guò zhe shěngjiǎn de shēnghuó。
Although very rich, he still leads an economical life.
食用菌富含多种营养，对人体大有益处。
Shíyòngjūn fùhán duō zhǒng yíngyǎng，duì réntǐ dàyǒu yìchù。
Edible fungi are rich in nutrition and beneficial to the human body.
做人不能太势利眼了，嫌贫爱富的人让人痛恨。
Zuò rén bùnéng tài shìlìyǎn le，xiánpín àifù de rén ràng rén tònghèn。
One shouldn\'t be too snobbish, as snobs are hated by all people.
听说养驼鸟可以致富，我们也试养了一些。
Tīngshuō yǎng tuóniǎo kěyǐ zhìfù，wǒmen yě shìyǎng le yìxiē。
I heard that one can become rich by raising ostriches, so I tried raising some.
这是我们的试用品，欢迎大家试用，并提出富贵的意见和建议！
Zhè shì wǒmen de shìyòngpǐn，huānyíng dàjiā shìyòng，bìng tíchū fùguì de yìjiàn hé jiànyì！
This is our trial product, you are welcome to try it and give us your valuable opinions and suggestions!
这些装满了书的书箱可都是我的“财富”啊！
Zhèxiē zhuāngmǎn le shū de shūxiāng kě dōushì wǒ de“cáifù”a！
These bookcases full of books are my treasure!
许多民间的俗谚都很富于哲理性。
Xǔduō mínjiān de súyàn dōu hěnfùyú zhélǐxìng。
There is philosophical meaning in many aphorisms.
文史馆的资料很丰富，每周我都会去一次。
Wénshǐguǎn de zīliào hěn fēngfù，měi zhōu wǒ dōuhuì qù yícì。
The historical reference library has many books, and I go there once a week.
这位作家的想象力可真丰富呀！
Zhèwèi zuòjiā de xiǎng xiàng lì kě zhēn fēngfù ya！
This writer has a great imagination.
我们这个地方蕴藏着十分丰富的银矿资源。
Wǒmen zhège dìfāng yùncáng zhe shífēn fēngfù de yínkuàng zīyuán。
Our district is rich in silver mines.
地下蕴含着丰富的铁矿。
Dìxià yùnhán zhe fēngfù de tiěkuàng。
There are rich iron mines underground.
他总是看杂书，所以知识丰富。
Tā zǒngshì kàn záshū，suǒyǐ zhīshi fēngfù。
He has read lots of books on various topics so that he has a wide range of knowledge.
生活中自己需要去找窍门才会过得丰富多彩。
Shēnghuó zhōng zìjǐ xūyào qù zhǎo qiàomén cái huì guò de fēngfù duōcǎi。
One needs to find their own skills to make life more colourful.
从他知人论世的言论中，可以看出他的阅历很丰富。
Cóng tā zhīrén lùnshì de yánlùn zhōng，kěyǐ kànchū tā de yuèlì hěn fēngfù。
We can sense his rich experience from his comments on people, and the world.
朱漆的门窗更能突显她家的荣华富贵。
Zhūqī de ménchuāng gèngnéng tūxiǎn tā jiā de rónghuá fùguì。
The vermilion gates and windows better highlight the wealth and rank of her family.
现在小村庄的人们不但能自给自足，还把富裕的农产品卖到城市里去。
Xiànzài xiǎo cūnzhuāng de rénmen búdàn néng zìgěi zìzú，hái bǎ fùyù de nóngchǎnpǐn mài dào chéngshì lǐ qù。
Nowadays, people from small villages can not only support themselves but also sell surplus farm products to the city.
中国的地表水资源并不丰富。
Zhōngguó de dìbiǎo shuǐ zīyuán bìng bùfēngfù。
China is not rich in surface water.
养猪是最好的家庭副业，是农民致富的好帮手。
Yǎngzhū shì zuìhǎo de jiātíng fùyè，shì nóngmín zhìfù de hǎobāngshǒu。
Raising pigs is the best household sideline and a good way of making money for farmers.
现在市面上的冷冻食品特别丰富，给千家万户带来方便。
Xiànzài shìmiàn shàng de lěngdòng shípǐn tèbié fēngfù，gěi qiānjiā wànhù dàilái fāngbiàn。
Now in market, frozen food is very abundant which brings convenience to thousands of families.
新鲜的柠檬汁富含维C，我们要多喝。
Xīnxiān de níngméngzhī fùhán wéiC，wǒmen yào duōhē。
Fresh lemon-juice is rich in vitamin C, we should drink a lot of it.
他们家是靠种植啤酒花致富的。
Tāmen jiā shì kào zhòngzhí píjiǔhuā zhìfù de。
They got rich by growing hops.
资本家利用劳工的剩余价值发家致富。
Zīběnjiā lìyòng láogōng de shèngyú jiàzhí fājiā zhìfù。
Capitalists use laborers\' surplus value to make a fortune.
他帮扶过不少贫困家庭脱贫致富。
Tā bāngfú guò bùshǎo pínkùn jiātíng tuōpín zhìfù。
He has helped to lift many poor families out of poverty.
他通身的罗琦，一看就是个富贵的人。
Tā tōngshēn de luóqí，yí kàn jiùshì gè fùguì de rén。

chuàngzàocáifù

他已经走远了，赶不上了。

The photoelectric battery in the instrument is aging. We should replace it with a new one as quickly as possible.

Most of the fence around the yard is broken. Have it repaired quickly.
链子中的一个链环断了，就得赶快修好，否则链子就会散掉。

If one link of the chain is broken, we must repair it soon, or the whole chain will break.

脱岗是要扣工资的，还不赶快回去工作。

她总觉得自己命薄，赶不上好机会。

She always thinks that she was born unlucky, and could not encounter main chances.
如果咱们不快点儿走，就要赶不上通勤车了。

所有约稿必须月底前完成，否则就赶不上了。

I hurried here as soon as I got your telegram and didn\'t waste a single minute on the way.
他一听我们到来，就赶紧猫起来了。
Tā yì tīngwǒmen dàolái，jiù gǎnjǐn māo qǐlái le。
As soon as he heard us coming, he quickly hid himself somewhere.
要不是医生及时赶到，这小孩就没命了。
Yào búshì yīshēngjíshí gǎndào，zhè xiǎohái jiù méimìng le。
The child would have died if the doctor hadn\'t come just in time.
赶庙
ɡǎn miào 
go to the fair
摸黑赶路
mōhēi ɡǎnlù
press on with the journey at night
你再这样蘑菇就赶不上火车了。
Nǐ zài zhèyàngmógu jiù gǎn bu shànghuǒchē le。
If you go on dawdling like this, you\'ll miss the train.
赶紧把这本书排印出来。
Gǎnjǐn bǎ zhèběnshū páiyìn chūlái。
Rush the book into print.
暴风雨快来了，你还是赶紧跑吧！
Bàofēngyǔ kuài lái le，nǐ háishi gǎnjǐn pǎo ba！
A storm is coming up. You\'d better cut and run.
别泡蘑菇了，咱们赶紧干吧。
Bié pàomógu le，zánmen gǎnjǐn gàn ba。
No more dilly-dallying. Let\'s get going.
凭你跑多快，我也赶得上。
Píngnǐ pǎo duō kuài，wǒ yě gǎn de shàng。
I\'ll catch up with you no matter how fast you run.
我们赶到电影院，售票处恰好还有两张票。
Wǒmen gǎndào diànyǐngyuàn，shòupiàochù qiàhǎo háiyǒu liǎngzhāngpiào。
We got to the cinema just in time to buy the last two tickets left at the box office.
天气很快会变，得赶快抢收。
Tiānqì hěn kuài huì biàn，děi gǎnkuài qiǎngshōu。
The weather is bound to change soon. We must get the harvest in quickly.
赶上一场倾盆大雨
gǎnshàng yìcháng qīngpén dàyǔ
be caught in a downpour
驱赶苍蝇
qūgǎn cāngying
brush away flies; whisk flies off
驱赶麻雀
qūgǎn máquè
shoo away sparrows
赶热门
gǎn rèmén 
follow a craze
你还是识相点，赶快走吧。
Nǐ háishì shí xiàng diǎn，gǎnkuài zǒu ba。
You\'d better be sensible and quit.
赶时髦
gǎn shímáo
follow the fashion
天亮以前赶到
tiānliànɡ yǐqián ɡǎndào 
get there before daybreak
消防队闻讯赶到。
Xiāofánɡduì wén xùn ɡǎndào。 
On hearing the alarm the fire brigade rushed to the scene.
赶快做作业，别瞎闹。
Gǎnkuài zuò zuòyè，bié xiānào。
Hurry up and get your homework done; don\'t fool around.
被赶下台
bèi gǎnxiàtái
be driven out of office; be thrown out
赶赴新任
gǎn fù xīnrèn
go to take up a new post
蒸锅要烧干了，赶快续水。
Zhēngguō yào shāogān le，gǎnkuài xù shuǐ。
The steamer (on the fire) is nearly dry. Put some more water in it, quick.
我要赶不回来，你替我说一声。
Wǒ yào gǎn bu huílái，nǐ tì wǒ shuō yì shēng。
In case I can\'t get back in time, please apologize for me.
我得马上走，要不就赶不上火车了。
Wǒ dǎi mǎshàngzǒu，yàobu jiù gǎn bu shànghuǒchē le。
I have to leave at once or I\'ll miss the train.
赶快给他发个电报，要么挂个长途也行。
Gǎnkuài gěi tā fā gè diànbào，yàome guà gè chángtú yě xíng。
Send him a telegram at once, or call him long-distance.
再不走我们就赶不上火车了。
Zài bùzǒu wǒmen jiù gǎn bu shànghuǒchē le。
We\'ll miss the train if we delay any longer.
招呼他赶快来开会。
Zhāohū tā gǎnkuài lái kāihuì。
Tell him to come to the meeting at once.
赶场
gǎnchǎng
go to the village fair or market
赶超世界先进水平
gǎnchāo shìjiè xiānjìn shuǐpíng
catch up with and surpass the advanced world level
追赶世界先进水平
zhuīgǎn shìjiè xiānjìn shuǐpíng
measure up to advanced world levels
司机赶紧拨转方向盘，才没有撞上那个骑自行车的醉汉。
Sījī gǎnjǐn bōzhuǎn fāngxiàng pán，cái méiyǒu zhuàngshàng nàge qí zìxíngchē de zuìhàn。
上班快迟到了，为了赶时间，爸爸就抄了近路。
Shàngbān kuài chídào le，wèile gǎnshíjiān，bàba jiù chāole jìnlù。
赶快开窗透一透空气。
Gǎnkuài kāichuāng tòuyitòu kōngqì。
他倍道兼程，终于在第三天赶了回来。
Tā bèidào jiānchéng，zhōng yúzàidìsān tiān gǎn le huílái。
He doubled his speed and finally made his way back on the third day.
他鼻息已经很微弱了，需要赶快送去医院抢救。
Tā bíxī yǐjing hěnwēiruò le，xūyào gǎnkuài sòngqù yīyuàn qiǎngjiù。
He almost stopped breathing, and should be sent to the hospital immediately.
他知道自己说错了话，赶紧闭嘴了。
Tā zhīdào zìjǐ shuōcuò le huà，gǎnjǐn bìzuǐ le。
He realized that he had said something wrong, and checked himself immediately.
这么大老远的赶过来，别是因为我吧？
Zhème dàlǎoyuǎn de gǎn guòlái，bié shì yīnwèi wǒ ba？
You can\'t come here from such a long distance especially for me, can you?
我们本想稍作解释，但他不容分说就把我们赶出门。
Wǒmen běnxiǎng shāozuò jiěshì，dàn tā bùróng fēnshuō jiù bǎ wǒmen gǎnchū mén。
We wanted to explain, but he allowed no explanations and drove us away.
赶路的这几个人打算就在这个草窝里过夜了。
Gǎnlù de zhèjǐgè rén dǎsuàn jiù zài zhège cǎowō lǐ guòyè le。
These hurrying walkers intended to spend the night in this thatched cottage.
他准备赶往事发地点察验虚实。
Tā zhǔnbèi gǎnwǎng shìfā dìdiǎn cháyàn xūshí。
He intended to go to the spot of the accident to find out the truth.
赶上改革开放的潮头，他下海经商了。
Gǎnshàng gǎigé kāifàng de cháotóu，tā xiàhǎi jīngshāng le。
Following the policy of reform and opening, he resigned from his position and became a businessman.
今天看来赶不到县城了，就找个车马店过夜吧。
Jīntiān kànlái gǎnbúdào xiànchéng le，jiù zhǎo gè chēmǎdiàn guòyè ba。
他赶紧打开车门，跳了下来。
Tā gǎnjǐn dǎkāi chēmén，tiào le xiàlái。
He opened the door, and got off immediately.
冒着飞扬的尘沙，他赶去看望一位朋友。
Mào zhe fēiyáng de chénshā，tā gǎnqù kànwàng yíwèi péngyou。
He hurried off to visit a friend even as dust, and sand blew outside.
出版社已经答应给我出书了，我要赶快结稿。
Chūbǎnshè yǐjing dāying gěi wǒ chūshū le，wǒ yào gǎnkuài jiégǎo。
The publishing company has already promised to publish my book, so I must finish it quickly.
这台除湿机出故障了，赶快修理一下。
Zhètái chúshījī chū gùzhàng le，gǎnkuài xiūlǐ yíxià。
The dehumidifier is broken, please have it fixed quickly.
牧童把羊群催赶到了小山坡上。
Mùtóng bǎ yángqún cuīgǎn dào le xiǎoshānpō shàng。
The flock of goats were driven onto a small hill by the shepherd boy.
妈妈催赶着我完成今天的作业。
Māma cuīgǎn zhe wǒ wánchéng jīntiān de zuòyè。
My mother has urged me to finish today\'s homework.
这颗果树都是病虫，需要赶紧打药。
Zhè kē guǒshù dōushì bìngchóng，xūyào gǎnjǐn dǎyào。
You need to spray the fruit tree with pesticide soon, it is infested with insects.
他的大疮复发，赶快送医院吧。
Tā de dàchuāng fùfā，gǎnkuài sòng yīyuàn ba。
he has a reoccurring ulcer, we should take him to the hospital.
明天一早我们一起去赶大集吧。
Míngtiān yìzǎo wǒmen yìqǐ qù gǎn dàjí ba。
Let\'s go to the fair tomorrow morning.
要掉点儿了，赶紧把晾晒的衣服收回来。
Yào diào diǎnr le，gǎnjǐn bǎ liàngshài de yīfu shōuhuílái。
It is starting to rain. Bring back those drying clothes.
眼瞅上班要迟到，偏又赶上汽车抛锚，真叫人犯急！
Yǎn chǒu shàngbān yào chídào，piān yòu gǎnshàng qìchē pāomáo，zhēn jiào rén fànjí！
It was so annoying that the bus broke down when you were already late for work.
他经常到山乡写生，画了许多关于农村庙会赶集、过年嫁娶的风俗画。
Tā jīngcháng dào shānxiāng xiěshēng，huà le xǔduō guānyú nóngcūn miàohuì gǎnjí、guònián jiàqǔ de fēngsúhuà。
He often draws sketches in the countryside and has painted a lot of paintings of temple fairs and marriage scenes.
孩子们趁着赶潮的时候拾贝壳。
Háizimen chèn zhe gǎncháo de shíhou shí bèiké。
The children collect shells when the tide ebbs.
年轻人喜欢赶潮流。
Niánqīngrén xǐhuan gǎn cháoliú.
Young people are keen on following the trend.
有了小汽车，他再也不用赶车进城了。
Yǒu le xiǎoqìchē，tā zài yě búyòng gǎnchē jìnchéng le。
He doesn\'t need to drive a cart to the city after he bought the car.
因为要去赶车，我现在就得走。
Yīnwéi yào qù gǎnchē，wǒ xiànzài jiù děi zǒu。
Because I am going to catch a bus, I have to leave now.
请你务必在会议开始前赶到。
Qǐng nǐ wùbì zài huìyì kāishǐ qián gǎndào。
Please make sure to be here before the meeting.
这列火车开得这么快是为了赶点进站吧？
Zhè liè huǒchē kāi de zhème kuài shì wèi le gǎndiǎn jìnzhàn ba？
Is the train speeding up in order to arrive on time?
记者们总能在第一时间赶赴新闻现场。
Jìzhěmen zǒngnéngzàidìyī shíjiān gǎnfù xīnwén xiànchǎng。
Journalists can always rush to the scene of the news quickly.
赶工也要保证工程质量！
Gǎngōng yěyào bǎozhèng gōngchéng zhìliàng！
Even if you\'re speeding up work, you still should guarantee the project\'s quality.
这些鱼是赶海的时候捉到的。
Zhèxiē yú shì gǎnhǎi de shíhou zhuōdào de。
These fish were caught when I went to the beach to collect marine life.
大年初一我们去赶会吧。
Dànián chū yī wǒmen qù gǎnhuì ba。
Let\'s go to a temple fair on the first day of the lunar calendar year.
我在赶活儿，晚上就不去赴宴了。
Wǒ zài gǎnhuór，wǎnshàng jiù búqù fùyàn le。
I am rushing through my work in order to finish it on time, so I won\'t attend the party tonight.
那位大爷以前赶脚谋生。
Nàwèi dàye yǐqián gǎnjiǎo móushēng。
The old man used to make a living as a porter.
这个灯笼是在赶庙会的时候买的。
Zhège dēnglóng shì zài gǎn miàohuì de shíhou mǎi de。
The lantern was bought when I was visiting a temple fair.
赶明儿你来我家做客吧。
Gǎnmíngr nǐ lái wǒjiā zuòkè ba。
Call on me and be my guest some day.
来找茬的人被我们赶跑了。
Lái zhǎochá de rén bèi wǒmen gǎnpǎo le。
We drove away the people who come to pick crops.
我要赶前完成这项任务。
Wǒ yào gǎnqián wánchéng zhè xiàng rènwù。
I want to finish the task ahead of time.
这几天大家都在日以继夜的赶任务。
Zhè jǐtiān dàjiā dōu zài rìyǐjìyè de gǎn rènwù。
These days, everyone is working day and night in order to finish the job on time.
打车去肯定赶趟儿。
Dǎchē qù kěndìng gǎntàngr。
You will be able to arrive on time if you take a taxi.
不能不顾自己的实际情况盲目赶先进。
Bùnéng búgù zìjǐ de shíjì qíngkuàng mángmù gǎnxiānjìn。
We can\'t catch up with progress blindly without thinking of our current situation.
那么远的路，最好赶早走。
Nàme yuǎn de lù，zuì hǎo gǎnzǎo zǒu。
You\'d better leave early as you have to cover such a long distance.
我终于把那几个无理取闹的人赶走了。
Wǒ zhōng yú bǎ nà jǐgè wúlǐ qǔnào de rén gǎnzǒu le。
Finally, I drove away those people who were deliberately making troubles.
他用篙子把船头的野鸭赶下了水。
Tā yòng gāozi bǎ chuántóu de yěyā gǎnxià le shuǐ。
He drove these wild ducks on the bow into the water with a punt-pole.
谷粒散落了一地，赶快去拿簸箕收起来。
Gǔlì sǎnluò le yí dì，gǎnkuài qù ná bòji shōu qǐlái。
The grains are spread all over the ground, go and get a fan to collect them together.
他为了赶写访谈稿，连中饭都顾不得吃。
Tā wèi le gǎnxiě fǎngtángǎo，lián zhōng fàn dōu gùbùdé chī。
In order to finish the interview manuscript, he didn\'t even have time for lunch.
仪表中的光电池已经老化，赶快更新吧。
Yíbiǎo zhōng de guāngdiànchí yǐjing lǎohuà，gǎnkuài gēngxīn ba。
The photoelectric battery in the instrument is aging. We should replace it with a new one as quickly as possible.
他一路小跑赶回了家，身上汗津津的。
Tā yílù xiǎopǎo gǎnhuí le jiā，shēnshàng hànjīnjīn de。
He is sweaty after running home.
她嚎叫着把上门解决矛盾的民警赶了出去。
Tā háojiào zhe bǎ shàngmén jiějué máodùn de mínjǐng gǎn le chūqù。
She howled, and drove the police away when they came to solve the conflict.
画院为赶制向皇上敬献的一批绘画作品而日夜忙碌。
Huàyuàn wèi gǎnzhì xiàng huángshàng jìngxiàn de yì pī huìhuà zuòpǐn ér rìyè mánglù。
The drawing institute bustled about day and night, running up for a set of paintings dedicated to the Emperor.
在警察赶来前，他成功地毁证。
Zài jǐngchá gǎnlái qián，tā chénggōng de huǐzhèng。
He successfully destroyed the evidence before the police arrived.
赶上清明节，去火葬场烧纸的人会特别多。
Gǎnshàng Qīngmíngjié，qù huǒzàngchǎng shāozhǐ de rén huì tèbié duō。
A lot of people go to the crematory to burn paper as a sacrificial offering on Tomb-sweeping Day.
他日夜兼程一路饥餐渴饮，两天就赶出了很远的路。
Tā rìyè jiānchéng yílù jīcān kěyǐn，liǎng tiān jiù gǎnchū le hěnyuǎn de lù。
He kept on walking on the journey, having food for hunger and water for thirst, and covered quite a long distance in just two days.
她听到上课铃后，急步赶到教室。
Tā tīngdào shàngkè líng hòu，jíbùgǎndào jiàoshì。
She quickly went to the classroom after hearing the bell.
他看见我急匆匆地赶来，非常感动！
Tā kànjiàn wǒ jícōngcōng de gǎnlái，fēicháng gǎndòng！
He was greatly moved on seeing me hurrying here.
他拿着急救箱快速走出门，向出事地点快速赶去。
Tā ná zhe jíjiùxiāng kuàisù zǒuchū mén，xiàng chūshì dìdiǎn kuàisù gǎnqù。
Carrying a first-aid case, he went out of the door quickly towards the accident site.
大批的季节工赶往新疆从事摘棉花的工作。
Dàpī de jìjiégōng gǎnwǎng Xīnjiāng cóngshì zhāi miánhuā de gōngzuò。
Many seasonal workers go to Xinjiang to pick cotton.
在路上碰到熟人，见礼后我继续骑车赶往天津。
Zài lùshàng pèngdào shúrén，jiànlǐ hòu wǒ jìxù qíchē gǎnwǎng Tiānjīn。
On my way to Tianjin, I came across an acquaintance. We greeted each other, and then I went on riding.
110指挥台接警后立刻派民警赶赴出事地点。
Yāoyāolíng zhǐhuītái jiējǐng hòu lìkè pài mínjǐng gǎnfù chūshì dìdiǎn。
The 110 command center sent policemen to the site as soon as they received the crime report.
收到警报后救生筏立刻赶到了出事水域。
Shōudào jǐngbào hòu jiùshēngfá lìkè gǎndào le chūshì shuǐyù。
The lifeboat hurried to the accident scene immediately after receiving the alarm.
老牛脾气倔犟，生起气来怎么赶它都不走！
Lǎoniú píqi juèjiàng，shēngqǐqìlái zěnme gǎn tā dōu bùzǒu！
This old ox is very stubborn. Once it is angry, nothing can make it move.
他快步流星地往校园赶，否则就要迟到了！
Tā kuàibùliúxīng de wǎng xiàoyuán gǎn，fǒuzé jiùyào chídào le！
He quickened his step to school, not wanting to be late.
黄河马上就要溃口了，要赶快采取防护措施！
Huáng Hé mǎshàng jiùyào kuìkǒu le，yào gǎnkuài cǎiqǔ fánghù cuòshī！
The Yellow river will break soon; we should take protective measures as soon as possible.
他触电了，赶紧去拉闸停电！
Tā chùdiàn le，gǎnjǐn qù lāzhá tíngdiàn！
He\'s getting an electric shock. Switch off the power!
他就是个老赶，无论穿多时髦的衣服，也是土里土气的。
Tā jiùshì gè lǎogǎn，wúlùn chuān duō shímáo de yīfu，yěshì tǔlǐ tǔqì de。
He is a real rustic. However fashionable his clothes, he always looks cloddish.
冷却水不够了，赶快再去取些来。
Lěngquèshuǐ búgòu le，gǎnkuài zài qù qǔ xiē lái。
The cooling water is not enough. Please go, and fetch more.
他正赶着牛拉着犁杖犁地呢。
Tā zhèng gǎn zhe niú lā zhe lízhàng lídì ne。
He is just driving the cattle, pulling a plough to plough the field.
院子里的篱栅大部分都破损了，赶快修一修吧。
Yuànzi lǐ de lízhà dàbùfen dōu pòsǔn le，gǎnkuài xiūyixiū ba。
Most of the fence around the yard is broken. Have it repaired quickly.
链子中的一个链环断了，就得赶快修好，否则链子就会散掉。
Liànzi zhōng de yígè liànhuán duàn le，jiù děi gǎnkuài xiūhǎo，fǒuzé liànzi jiùhuì sǎndiào。
If one link of the chain is broken, we must repair it soon, or the whole chain will break.
听到门铃响，他赶忙撂下了扫把去开门。
Tīngdào ménlíng xiǎng，tā gǎnmáng liàoxià le sǎobǎ qù kāimén。
Hearing the bell, he put down the besom quickly and opened the door.
体育场上，他的动作如流星赶月，给人以视觉的享受。
Tǐyùchǎng shàng，tā de dòngzuò rú liúxīng gǎnyuè，gěi rén yǐ shìjué de xiǎngshòu。
He is at top speed on the sports ground, and is a pleasure to watch.
等我们赶回自习室的时候，门已经落锁了。
Děng wǒmen gǎnhuí zìxíshì de shíhou，mén yǐjing luòsuǒ le。
When we hurried back to the self-study room, the door had already been locked.
在这冥冥暗夜里独自赶路，心里还真有些害怕呢。
Zài zhè míngmíng ànyè lǐ dúzì gǎnlù，xīnlǐ hái zhēn yǒuxiē hàipà ne。
I am a little afraid walking in the dark at night.
她总觉得自己命薄，赶不上好机会。
Tā zǒng juédé zìjǐ mìngbó，gǎnbúshàng hǎo jīhuì。
She always thinks that she was born unlucky, and could not encounter main chances.
摸黑儿赶路时，他不小心扭伤了脚。
Mōhēir gǎnlù shí，tā bùxiǎoxīn niǔshāng le jiǎo。
He carelessly sprained his foot when he pressed on with the journey at night.
听说家乡今年闹灾了，他赶快给家里寄了些钱。
Tīngshuō jiā xiàng jīnnián nàozāi le，tā gǎnkuài gěi jiā lǐ jì le xiē qián。
He remitted some money home when he heard that there had been a calamity in his hometown.
赶上改革开放的年头儿，大家的生活都好多了。
Gǎnshàng gǎigé kāifàng de niántóur，dàjiā de shēnghuó dōu hǎo duō le。
After reform and opening up, people live a better life.
在警察赶到之前，他已经跟歹徒扭扯到了一起。
Zài jǐngchá gǎndào zhīqián，tā yǐjing gēn dǎitú niǔchědào le yìqǐ。
He scuffled with the gangster before the police arrived.
他一路风尘仆仆地赶来，只为了见上你一面。
Tā yílù fēngchénpúpú de gǎnlái，zhǐ wèi le jiàn shàng nǐ yí miàn。
He endured the hardships of a long journey just to see you once.
赶紧收起你的那些奇谈怪论，我们并不想听。
Gǎnjǐn shōuqǐ nǐ de nàxiē qítán guàilùn，wǒmen bìng bùxiǎng tīng。
Don\'t talk about your ridiculous arguments, we don\'t want to hear them.
他家离学校很远，每天都得起早赶路。
Tā jiā lí xuéxiào hěnyuǎn，měitiān dōu děi qǐzǎo gǎnlù。
His house is far from the school, so he has to get up early to go to school.
他心脏骤停，医生赶紧为他注射了强心针。
Tā xīnzàng zhòutíng，yīshēng gǎnjǐn wèi tā zhùshè le qiángxīnzhēn。
His heart halted suddenly, the doctor injected him with a cardiotonic needle.
都别傻愣愣地坐着了，赶快开始工作吧！
Dōu bié shǎlènglèng de zuò zhe le，gǎnkuài kāishǐ gōngzuò ba！
Don\'t sit there in trance. Start working quickly.
一匹马飞奔过来，人们都赶紧闪道。
Yì pǐ mǎ fēibēn guòlai，rénmen dōu gǎnjǐn shǎndào。
People hurried to dodge and step aside from the horse galloping towards us.
要下雨了，赶紧把粮食苫盖好。
Yào xiàyǔ le，gǎnjǐn bǎ liángshishān gàihǎo。
It is going to rain. Hurry to cover the grain.
请你少礼，赶紧入席吧！
Qǐng nǐ shǎo lǐ，gǎnjǐn rùxí ba！
Don\'t stand on ceremony. Sit down and enjoy the food!
设若我早一点赶来，大概就能及时阻止这场争端了。
Shèruò wǒ zǎo yì diǎn gǎnlai，dàgài jiùnéng jíshí zǔzhǐ zhèchǎng zhēngduān le。
If I had come here earlier, I might have prevented this dispute in time.
看你冻得直哆嗦，赶快站到太阳地儿暖和暖和。
Kàn nǐ dòng de zhí duōsuō，gǎnkuài zhàndào tàiyángdìr nuǎnhé nuǎnhé。
You are shivering. Why not make yourself warm in the sun?
为了能够按计划完成任务，陶工连夜赶制了这批陶器。
Wèile nénggòu àn jìhuà wánchéng rènwù，táogōng liányè gǎnzhì le zhè pī táoqì。
In order to finish the task as planned, the potter worked overnight making the earthenware.
时间不早了，赶紧淘米做饭吧。
Shíjiān bùzǎo le，gǎnjǐn táomǐ zuòfàn ba。
It\'s time that you washed the rice and cooked dinner.
赶车走远路，你应该给牲口换一条新的套绳。
Gǎnchē zǒu yuǎnlù，nǐ yīnggāi gěi shēngkǒu huàn yìtiáo xīn de tàoshéng。
It is a long journey. You need to change the cart rope.
由于工期紧，你还需要于近期赶制一批铁活。
Yóuyú gōngqī jǐn，nǐ hái xūyàoyú jìnqī gǎnzhì yì pī tiěhuó。
You need to make some more iron handiwork in the next few days.
如果咱们不快点儿走，就要赶不上通勤车了。
Rúguǒ zánmen bú kuàidiǎnr zǒu，jiùyào gǎnbúshàng tōngqínchē le。
Let\'s hurry, or we\'re going to miss the commuter bus.
他一定是吞服了过量的安眠药，应当赶紧送医院抢救。
Tā yídìng shì tūnfú le guòliàng de ānmiányào，yīngdāng gǎnjǐn sòng yīyuàn qiǎngjiù。
He must have taken a massive overdose of sleeping tablets, and should be sent to hospital at once.
脱岗是要扣工资的，还不赶快回去工作。
Tuōgǎng shì yào kòu gōngzī de，hái bùgǎnkuài huíqù gōngzuò。
Your salary will be reduced if you leave your job during working hours, so get back to work quickly.
喜筵就要开始了，请嘉宾赶快入席。
Xǐyàn jiùyào kāishǐ le，qǐng jiābīn gǎnkuài rùxí。
The wedding banquet is going to start, please be seated.
听说女儿生病了，老张戏服都没来得及脱就赶到了医院。
Tīngshuō nǚ\'ér shēngbìng le，Lǎo Zhāng xìfú dōu méi láidejí tuō jiù gǎndào le yīyuàn。
Knowing that his daughter is ill, Lao Zhang hurried to the hospital without changing his stage costumes.
考试时考生禁止夹带小抄儿，否则将被赶出考场。
Kǎoshì shí kǎoshēng jìnzhǐ jiādài xiǎochāor，fǒuzé jiāng bèi gǎnchū kǎochǎng。
Using paper slips to cheat in exams is forbidden, if you do it, you will be thrown out of the exam room.
这件事非同小可，必须赶快向领导汇报。
Zhèjiànshì fēitóng xiǎokě，bìxū gǎnkuài xiàng lǐngdǎo huìbào。
This is not a trivial thing, you have to report it to your boss immediately.
瞧你这件衣服的袖头脏的，赶快洗洗。
Qiáo nǐ zhèjiàn yīfu de xiùtóu zāng de，gǎnkuài xǐxǐ。
How dirty the cuff of your sleeve is! Go and wash it at once.
咱们赶紧开始谈判吧，虚礼都免了。
Zánmen gǎnjǐn kāishǐ tánpàn ba，xūlǐ dōu miǎn le。
Let\'s begin our negotiations right now and spare all the formalities.
车间里的牙轮磨损了，赶快换一个。
Chējiān lǐ de yálún mósǔn le，gǎnkuài huàn yígè。
The gear wheal in the workshop is worn out. Change it for another one immediately.

Zhádàochē huài le，gǎnkuài zhǎo rén lái xiū。
The line inspection trolley has broken down, have it fixed.
这羊有点咬群，赶快隔离开吧。
Zhè yáng yǒudiǎn yǎoqún，gǎnkuài gélí kāi ba。
The sheep is prone to fight within the flock, it should be isolated soon.
虽然小军上学期成绩不好，但这学期他迎头赶上了。
Suīrán Xiǎo Jūn shàng xuéqī chéngjì bùhǎo，dàn zhè xuéqī tā yíngtóu gǎnshàng le。
Though Xiaojun didn\'t do well last semester, he mananged to catch up with the others this semester.
所有约稿必须月底前完成，否则就赶不上了。
Suǒyǒu yuēgǎo bìxū yuèdǐ qián wánchéng，fǒuzé jiù gǎnbúshàng le。
All the appointed articles must be finished before the end of the month, or else they will be too late.
看到前方发生警匪枪战，他赶快走避躲藏。
Kàndào qiánfāng fāshēng jǐngfěi qiāngzhàn，tā gǎnkuài zǒubì duǒcáng。
Seeing the gun fight between the police and the bandits, he immediately ran away and hid.

Wǒmen de mùlù chóngmǎle，bìxū gǎnkuài xiūgǎi。

他暗示我赶快离开。
Tā ànshì wǒ gǎnkuài líkāi。
He hinted that I should leave soon.

I\'m afraid this pillar won\'t bear such weight longer than two days, somebody has to fix it soon.
这东西太沉了，恐怕这个柱子顶多能支撑两天，得赶快找人把它修好。
Please come here as fast as you can, I need your help.
请尽快赶来，我需要你的帮助。
She knew that she was going to miss the train, but she simply didn\'t care.
她知道赶不上火车了，但她根本不在乎。
I\'ll be there as soon as possible.
我会尽快到赶到的。
I could not reach the airport in time for my flight.
我没能及时赶到机场搭乘我的航班。
I\'m sorry I can\'t stay with you, time\'s really tight.
对不起，我不能在这儿陪你，我赶时间。
She arrived just in time to take the exam.
她到得正是时候，刚好赶上参加考试。
I missed the live broadcast of the Olympics.
我没赶上看奥运会的直播。
She didn\'t make it to the airport, so she missed her flight.
她没能赶到机场，所以错过了航班。
It took him like an hour to arrive here.
他差不过花了一个小时才赶到这儿。
I don\'t think there\'s much to be gained by catching the train today, we better go tomorrow morning.
我不觉得今天赶火车有什么好处，我们最好明早再走。
They finished nearly everything before the deadline.
他们赶在最后期限前差不多完成了所有工作。
We need to be there before noon.
我们要在正午前赶到那儿。
I need to be at the office around noon.
我得在中午左右赶到办公室。
Put your pen on that piece of paper and write your apology to Gina.
赶紧动笔，给吉娜写信道歉。
If you meet him, run!
你要是碰上他的话，就赶紧逃！
The dogs are running after the fox.
几只猎狗正在追赶一只狐狸。
Wake up or else you will miss the class.
醒醒，否则你就赶不上上课了。
The school is near enough, we can manage to get there in time.
学校离得很近，我们可以设法及时赶到。
Jack had already lost a lot of blood before the ambulance arrived.
杰克在救护车赶来之前就流了很多血。
I was late for the meeting so I started running, and when I got there I was totally out of breath.
因为开会快迟到了，我就开始跑步前进，所以赶到那儿时，已经是上气不接下气了。
Please choose quickly since I\'m in a big hurry.
请快点儿点，我赶时间。
If you delay, you won\'t be able to catch your flight.
如果你再耽搁，就赶不上飞机了。
He said he will arrive on time, but I really doubt it.
他说他会按时赶到，但我对此表示怀疑。
They broke up the fight when the police arrived.
警察赶到了，他们才停止了打斗。
It\'s going to be a long journey, so if you want to go to the can do so now.
此行路途遥远，想方便的话现在赶紧去。
We soon caught up with the car outside the garage.
我们很快就在车库外面赶上了那辆车。
He\'s doing extra work to catch up with the rest of the class.
为了赶上班里的其他同学，他做了很多额外的功课。
The secessionists firmly believed they would in a few days drive the army from this city.
分裂主义者坚信他们几天以后就能把军队从城里赶走。
I hate Sunday drivers when I am in a hurry.
赶时间的时候最怕遇到新手司机了。
to miss/get one\'s connection
误了/赶上要换的交通工具
to make a dash for it
得赶紧走了
I must dash
[inf] 我得赶紧走了
do sit down/help yourself
赶快坐啊/千万别客气
oh do shut up!
噢，赶快闭嘴吧！
Increased crime is driving away customers.
不断增长的犯罪赶走了顾客。
I\'m sorry, I must fly.
对不起，我得赶快走。
to gain on sb
赶上某人
to make haste (to)
[o.f.] 赶快
to hasten to do sth
赶快做某事
to hurry in/off/home
赶着进来/走/回家
they hurried to help him
他们赶紧去帮他
we can just about get there in time
我们可能刚刚能准时赶到那里
Bill lost no time in telling me about his idea.
比尔赶紧和我讲他的想法。
to cut one\'s losses
赶紧罢手以免更大损失
They travelled by night to avoid detection.
他们夜间赶路以免被人察觉。
He had to hurry in order to catch his train.
为了赶上火车他得快点了。
to send sb packing
[inf] 把某人赶走
in hot pursuit
紧紧追赶
to be pushed for time/money
[inf] 赶时间/缺钱
Russian banks rushed to buy as many dollars as they could.
俄罗斯银行赶紧买入尽可能多的美元。
We could still make it if we rush.
如果我们快点，还能赶上。
in time (for)
正好赶上(…)
I could hardly catch the train because I left too late.
我走得太晚了，大概赶不上火车了。
The Police hurried to untangle the remaining children barred by the abductor.
警方赶紧把被绑匪关着的剩下的那个孩子解救了出来。

在经济领域赶上发达国家，是本世纪我们坚定不移的目标。

我们必须舍弃伤兵以防敌人赶上我们。

我在追赶那个强盗，可是最终还是在拐角处把他给追丢了。

红军一直追击敌人，直到把他们赶出边境。

Tā liányè kāichē gǎnwǎng zhège guójiā dōngbù。
她连夜开车赶往这个国家东部。

Wèile gǎnshàng huíjiā de huǒchē，wǒ bùdébù pīnmìng kuài pǎo。
为了赶上回家的火车，我不得不拼命快跑。

He\'s such a sissy he easily breaks down and cries.
这个男人说话做事太不撇脱了，婆婆妈妈的！
Zhège nánrén shuōhuà zuòshì tài bùpiětuō le，pópómāma de！
This man doesn’t speak in a straightforward manner, he is garrulous.
你快点儿吧，别这么婆婆妈妈的了。
Nǐ kuài diǎnr ba，bié zhème pópomāmā de le。
Hurry up! Don\'t fuss like an old woman.
他就是这么婆婆妈妈的，动不动就掉眼泪。
Tā jiùshì zhème pópomāmā de，dòngbudòngjiù diào yǎnlèi。
He\'s such a sissy he easily breaks down and cries.
这个男人说话做事太不撇脱了，婆婆妈妈的！
Zhège nánrén shuōhuà zuòshì tài bùpiětuō le，pópómāma de！
This man doesn’t speak in a straightforward manner, he is garrulous.
这么点儿事你就唠叨个没完，真是个婆婆嘴！
Zhème diǎnr shì nǐ jiù làodāo gè méiwán，zhēnshì gè pópózuǐ！
You are really have such a long tongue, you don\'t stop nagging about such a trifle.
这个瞎眼的老婆婆完全依靠拐棍走路。
Zhège xiāyǎn de lǎopópó wánquán yīkào guǎigùn zǒulù。
This blind old lady relies completely on her walking stick to walk.
老婆婆
lǎopópó
old lady
面善的老婆婆
miànshàn de lǎopópó
kind-faced old lady
老婆婆像菩萨一样善良。
Lǎopópó xiàng púsà yíyàng shànliáng.
The old lady is as kind as a saint.
妞妞最喜欢吃橡皮糖，每次见到外婆都要外婆给她买。
Niūniū zuì xǐhuan chī xiàng pítáng，měi cì jiàndào wàipó dōuyào wàipó gěi tā mǎi。
Niu Niu likes to eat gum and asks her grandmother to buy them whenever she meets her.
姑嫜(婆婆和公公)。
老婆婆。
婆婆拿手镯给新媳妇作见面礼。
老太太是个婆婆嘴，说起话来没完没了。
Her mother-in-law was imposing on the couple\'s happiness.
Tā de pópo gěi tāmen fūqī de xìngfú dàilái máfan。
她的婆婆给他们夫妻的幸福带来麻烦。
My mother in law dropped over unexpectedly for dinner.
Chūhūyìliào de shì，wǒ de pópo shùnbiàn guòlái chīfàn le。
出乎意料的是，我的婆婆顺便过来吃饭了。
I got along well with my mother in law.
Wǒ hé yuèmǔ（pópo）xiāngchǔ de búcuò。
我和岳母（婆婆）相处得不错。
Her husband and mother-in-law tyrannize her.
Tā zhàngfu hé tā pópo nuèdài tā。
她丈夫和她婆婆虐待她。
She behaved beastly toward her mother-in-law.
Tā duì tā pópo hěn cūbào。
她对她婆婆很粗暴。
他很喜欢研究象婆罗门教这样古老的宗教。
Tā hěnxǐhuan yánjiū xiàng póluóménjiào zhèyàng gǔlǎo de zōngjiào。
He loves to research old religions such as Brahmanism.
他很喜欢研究象婆罗门教这样古老的宗教。
Tā hěnxǐhuan yánjiū xiàng póluóménjiào zhèyàng gǔlǎo de zōngjiào。
He loves to research old religions such as Brahmanism.
Originally all brahmans were priests.
Qǐchū，suǒyǒu de Póluóménrén dōushì jìsī。
起初，所有的婆罗门人都是祭司。
她今年28了，还没找婆家。
Tā jīnnián èrshíbā le，hái méi zhǎo pójiā。
She is twenty-eight this year, and still unmarried.
中午我要去姑婆家吃饭。
Zhōngwǔ wǒ yào qù gūpó jiā chī fàn。
I will go to my great aunt\'s home for lunch at noon.
她来到婆家哭闹，因为老公打了她。
Tā láidào pójiā kūnào，yīnwèi lǎogōng dǎ le tā。
She came to her husband\'s family and cried, because her husband had beat her.
妈妈去外婆家了，但她下晚儿会回家。
Māma qù wàipó jiā le，dàn tā xiàwǎnr huì huíjiā。
My mother went to my grandmother\'s, and will be back at dusk.
她下岗之后就做起了专职管家婆，照料一家老小的生活起居。
Tā xiàgǎng zhīhòu jiù zuòqǐ le zhuānzhí guǎnjiāpó，zhàoliào yìjiā lǎoxiǎo de shēnghuó qǐjū。
After being laid off from work, she became a full-time housekeeper, taking care of the whole family.
他家婆媳关系不睦。
Tā jiā póxí guānxì búmù。
His mother does not get along well with his wife.
她过去是我们家的管家婆，又聪明又勤劳。
Tā guòqù shì wǒmen jiā de guǎnjiāpó，yòu cōngmíng yòu qínláo。
She used to be our housekeeper; she\'s very smart and hard-working.
他家婆媳关系融洽，让他省了不少心。
Tā jiā póxí guānxì róngqià，ràng tā shěng le bùshǎo xīn。
The relationship between mother-in-law and daughter-in-law is harmonious, which saves him a lot of worries.
王总希望他老婆做一名家庭主妇。
Wáng zǒng xīwàng tā lǎopó zuò yìmíng jiātíng zhǔfù。
Mr. Wang, a manager, wants his wife to be a housewife.
他的婆娘很会干家务，对他真是体贴入微。
Tā de póniáng hěnhuì gàn jiāwù，duì tā zhēnshì tǐtiē rùwēi。
His wife is good at housework and is very considerate towards him.
她是个贤惠和善的媳妇，嫁到夫家后，把婆媳叔嫂关系处理得很融洽。
Tā shì gè xiánhuì héshàn de xífù，jiàdào fūjiā hòu，bǎ póxí shūsǎo guānxì chǔlǐ de hěnróngqià。
She is a virtuous and kind daughter-in-law, getting along well with her husband\'s brothers and sisters-in-law after marriage.
本店的当家菜是麻婆豆腐。
Běndiàn de dāngjiācài shì mápódòufu。
Ma Po\'s bean curd is a specialty in our restaurant.
这位女企业家是个富婆。
Zhèwèi nǚ qǐyèjiā shì gè fùpó。
This female entrepreneur is rich.
我老婆当然是我们家的内掌柜。
Wǒ lǎopó dāngrán shì wǒmen jiā de nèizhǎngguì。
My wife is of course in charge of our family.
在家里，他对他的老婆很服帖。
Zài jiālǐ，tā duì tā de lǎopó hĕnfútiē。
这家的老头儿和老婆儿相依为命，从没见有儿女来看望过他们。
Zhèjiā de lǎotóur hé lǎopór xiāngyīwéimìng，cóng méi jiàn yǒu érnǚ lái kànwàng guò tāmen。
The old couple rely upon each other. We haven\'t seen any of their children come to see them.
他在家里很能干活儿，老婆说他是模范丈夫，朋友们则说他像个“男仆”。
Tā zài jiā lǐ hěnnéng gànhuór，lǎopó shuō tā shì mófàn zhàngfū，péngyoumen zé shuō tā xiàng gè“nánpú”。
He is capable of doing housework. His wife praises him as a model husband, but friends say that he is a male servant.
我老婆让我必须在零点之前回家。
Wǒ lǎopó ràng wǒ bìxū zài língdiǎn  zhīqián huíjiā 。
My wife said I have to be back by midnight.
家里只剩下她一个孤寡老婆儿。
Jiā lǐ zhǐ shèngxià tā yígè gū guǎ lǎopór。
The old woman is the only one left in the family.
婆家

她幼年寄养在外婆家里

他在外面吃了亏，回到家就拿老婆孩子泄气。

méipó

The old couple rely upon each other. We haven\'t seen any of their children come to see them.
这个老婆子可讨厌了，总是传闲话，勾惹矛盾。
Zhège lǎopózi kě tǎoyàn le，zǒngshì chuán xiánhuà，gōurě máodùn。
The old biddy is nasty. She always gossips and arouses conflict.
自从老婆子去年去世后，我一直不能从悲痛中走出来。
Zìcóng lǎopózi qùnián qùshì hòu，wǒ yìzhí bùnéng cóng bēitòng zhōng zǒu chūlái。
Since my old lady died last year, I have been in deep grief.
《红岩》中的双枪老太婆令敌人们闻风丧胆。
《Hóngyán》zhōng de shuāngqiāng lǎotàipó lìng dírénmen wénfēngsàngdǎn。

他很喜欢研究象婆罗门教这样古老的宗教。

He loves to research old religions such as Brahmanism.

His wife is good at housework and is very considerate towards him.
他家婆媳关系融洽，让他省了不少心。
Tā jiā póxí guānxì róngqià，ràng tā shěng le bùshǎo xīn。
The relationship between mother-in-law and daughter-in-law is harmonious, which saves him a lot of worries.
他的婆姨是村子里最漂亮的女人。
Tā de póyí shì cūnzi lǐ zuì piàoliàng de nǚrén。
His wife is the most beautiful woman in the village.
神婆不住地在屋子里跳神儿，口中还念念有词。
Shénpó búzhù de zài wūzi lǐ tiàoshénr，kǒu zhōng hái niànniàn yǒucí。
The witch kept on dancing in a trance in the room, and mumbled at the same time.
在没有妇产医院的年代里，收生婆这个职业显得很重要。
Zài méiyǒu fùchǎn yīyuàn de niándài lǐ，shōushēngpó zhège zhíyè xiǎnde hěnzhòngyào。
In the ages when there were no maternity hospitals, the profession of midwifery seemed very important.
叔婆今年添了个小孙孙，高兴得整日合不拢嘴。
Shūpó jīnnián tiān legè xiǎosūnsūn，gāoxìng de zhěngrì hébùlǒng zuǐ。
Getting a little grandson this year, my husband\'s aunt is so happy that she smiled all day long.
她是个贤惠和善的媳妇，嫁到夫家后，把婆媳叔嫂关系处理得很融洽。
Tā shì gè xiánhuì héshàn de xífù，jiàdào fūjiā hòu，bǎ póxí shūsǎo guānxì chǔlǐ de hěnróngqià。
She is a virtuous and kind daughter-in-law, getting along well with her husband\'s brothers and sisters-in-law after marriage.
妈妈去外婆家了，但她下晚儿会回家。
Māma qù wàipó jiā le，dàn tā xiàwǎnr huì huíjiā。
My mother went to my grandmother\'s, and will be back at dusk.
地主婆一看到工人歇手就会大发脾气。
Dìzhǔpó yí kàndào gōngrén xiēshǒu jiùhuì dàfā píqi。
The landlady got angry whenever she saw the workers rest.
老太婆絮烦了半天也不嫌累。
Lǎotàipó xùfán le bàntiān yě bùxiánlèi。
The old woman has been talking for hours, doesn\'t she feel tired?
他出去寻欢作乐，老婆也不管管。
Tā chūqù xúnhuān zuòlè，lǎopó yě bùguǎnguǎn。
His wife doesn\'t care even though he goes out and seeks pleasure with other women.
她过去是牙婆，解放后被改造好了。
Tā guòqù shì yápó，jiěfàng hòu bèi gǎizào hǎo le。
She was engaged in the trafficking of young women and children. After Liberation, she was educated and abandoned the business.
电视剧里，美猴王说：“小妖婆，看打”。
Diànshìjù lǐ，Měihóuwáng shuō：xiǎoyāopó，kàn dǎ。
In the TV series, Monkey King said :&quot;Demon, I am going to kill you.&quot;
离婚以后他才发现老婆还是原配的好。
Líhūn yǐhòu tā cái fāxiàn lǎopó háishi yuánpèi de hǎo。
After getting divorced, he finally found that his first wife had been much better.
那个漂亮的女人是他再娶的老婆。
Nàge piàoliàng de nǚrén shì tā zàiqǔ de lǎopó。
That beautiful woman is his second wife.
他丈母娘不喜欢他，经常在他老婆面前说他的不是。
Tā zhàngmǔniáng bùxǐhuan tā，jīngcháng zài tā lǎopó miànqián shuō tā de búshì。
His mother-in-law doesn\'t like him, and always criticizes him in front of his wife.
他和老婆陷入了儿子抚养权的争夺战中。
Tā hé lǎopó xiànrù le érzi fǔyǎngquán de zhēngduózhàn zhōng。
He and his wife are fighting for the right to support their son.
老婆和他不停的争闹终于导致了离婚。
Lǎopó hé tā bùtíng de zhēngnào zhōng yú dǎozhì le líhūn。
The endless quarrel between him, and his wife finally led to their divorce.
他得知老婆作胎的消息后，高兴得跳了起来。
Tā dézhī lǎopó zuòtāi de xiāoxi hòu，gāoxìng de tiào le qǐlái。
He jumped for joy when he knew that his wife was pregnant.
他得知老婆生病的消息后，坐卧不安。
Tā dézhī lǎopó shēngbìng de xiāoxi hòu，zuòwò bùān。
He is on tenterhooks knowing that his wife is ill.
许多男人都希望老婆好好伺候他。
Xǔduō nánrén dōuxīwàng lǎopó hǎohǎocìhòu tā。
A lot of men hope that their wives will wait on them.
他从不说老婆坏话。
Tā cóngbù shuō lǎopó huàihuà.
He never speaks ill of his wife.
父母苦口婆心地劝他，他就是不听。
Fùmǔ kǔkǒupóxīn de quàntā，tā jiùshì bù tīng.
His parents did their best to persuade him but he just didn\'t listen.

lǎotàipó
old lady
公婆
gōngpó
parents-in-law

Tā mǎnliǎn bù gāoxìng，xiǎngbì hé lǎopó chǎojià le。
He looked totally miserable – presumably he had had an argument with his wife.
我老婆让我必须在零点之前回家。
Wǒ lǎopó ràng wǒ bìxū zài língdiǎn  zhīqián huíjiā 。

侍候公婆
他在外面吃了亏，回到家就拿老婆孩子泄气。
娘家、婆家哪一头都应照顾到。
Her mother-in-law was imposing on the couple\'s happiness.
Tā de pópo gěi tāmen fūqī de xìngfú dàilái máfan。
她的婆婆给他们夫妻的幸福带来麻烦。
My mother in law dropped over unexpectedly for dinner.
Chūhūyìliào de shì，wǒ de pópo shùnbiàn guòlái chīfàn le。
出乎意料的是，我的婆婆顺便过来吃饭了。
I got along well with my mother in law.
Wǒ hé yuèmǔ（pópo）xiāngchǔ de búcuò。
我和岳母（婆婆）相处得不错。
Her husband and mother-in-law tyrannize her.
Tā zhàngfu hé tā pópo nuèdài tā。
她丈夫和她婆婆虐待她。
She behaved beastly toward her mother-in-law.
Tā duì tā pópo hěn cūbào。
她对她婆婆很粗暴。
a conjure woman
巫婆
He took a wife a year ago.
他一年前娶了个老婆。
Look at her, everybody call her &quot;stupid old bag&quot;.
你看她，大家都叫她“愚蠢的老太婆”。
He used to pick on his wife.
他以前总是挑老婆的不是。
I had a miserable day. I lost my job, my house, and my wife.
我今天糟透了，丢了工作、房子，老婆也跑了。
Witches had to be burned at the stake or drowned.
必须把巫婆绑在火刑柱上烧死或者淹死。
He crawled his wife asking for forgiveness of his affair with the housekeeper.
他讨好老婆，希望她原谅自己和女管家出轨的事。
My mother said she would tell my wife her secret recipe for chicken wings.
我妈说过要把她做鸡翅的秘方告诉我老婆。
&quot;Have you got my tinderbox?&quot; asked the old witch.
“拿到我的火绒箱了吗？”老巫婆问。
Afternoons with my wife are the best gift a man could receive.
Xiàwǔ shíjiān hé lǎopo zài yìqǐ shì yí gè nánrén nénggòu shōudào de zuìjiā lǐwù。
下午时间和老婆在一起是一个男人能够收到的最佳礼物。
She was happier being the wife of an airline pilot.
Zuò hángkōng gōngsī fēixíngyuán de lǎopo，tā gǎndào gèng xìngfú le。
做航空公司飞行员的老婆，她感到更幸福了。
His lies caused his wife to banish him from the house.
Tā yīn shuōhuǎng ér bèi lǎopo qūzhú chū jiāmén。
他因说谎而被老婆驱逐出家门。
Europeans don\'t burn witches any more.
Ōuzhōurén yǐjīng bú zài shāo wūpó le。
欧洲人已经不再烧巫婆了。
I told her she was an interfering old cow.
Wǒ gàosu tā tā shì yí gè ài guǎnxiánshì de lǎopóniáng。
我告诉她她是一个爱管闲事的老婆娘。
She had been cursed by the witch after stealing some bread.
Tā tōu miànbāo yǐhòu，jiù bèi zhège wūpó zǔzhòu le。
她偷面包以后，就被这个巫婆诅咒了。
His action incensed his wife who came out of the house, shouting abuse.
Tā de xíngwéi jīnùle tā de lǎopo，tā cóng fángzi lǐ chōng chūlái，dàshēng rǔmàzhe。
他的行为激怒了他的老婆，她从房子里冲出来，大声辱骂着。
Lawson\'s late wife, the beautiful Vanessa Salmon, was his cousin.
Láosēn gāng guò shì de lǎopo，měilì de Fánnīshā·Shā\'ěrmàn shì tā de biǎomèi。
劳森刚过世的老婆，美丽的凡妮莎·沙尔曼是他的表妹。
The evil witch enchanted the naïve prince with a spell.
Xié\'è de wūpó jiāng mózhòu shīyú tiānzhēn de wángzǐ Shēnshàng。
邪恶的巫婆将魔咒施于天真的王子身上。
My wife grinds her teeth at night.
Wǒ lǎopo wǎnshang shuìjiào shí móyá。
我老婆晚上睡觉时磨牙。
His wife always has the final word in their arguments.
Měi cì tāmen zhēngchǎo shí，dōushì tā lǎopo zuìhòu pāibǎndìngduó。
每次他们争吵时，都是他老婆最后拍板定夺。
An air-cooled motor was more effective than a witch\'s broomstick for rapid long-distance transportation.
Zài kuàisù chángtú yùnshū zhōng，qìlěngshì diàndòngjī bǐ wūpó de sàozhou gèng yǒuxiào。
在快速长途运输中，气冷式电动机比巫婆的扫帚更有效。
His financial success encouraged him to look for a wife.
Tā zài cáiwù shàng de chénggōng jīlì tā zhǎo gè lǎopo。
他在财务上的成功激励他找个老婆。
The bad witch cursed the child.
Zhège è\'pó zhòumà gāi háizi。
这个恶婆咒骂该孩子。
Witches were burned in Salem.
Zài Sāilún，wūpó bèi shāosǐ。
在塞伦，巫婆被烧死。
Many Hindus worship Shiva.
Xǔduō yìndùrén chóngbài xiǎnpóshén。
许多印度人崇拜显婆神。
He arrived only to find his wife dead.
Tā dàolái shí què fāxiàn zìjǐ de lǎopo yǐjīng sǐ le。
他到来时却发现自己的老婆已经死了。
You are blocking the name of your first wife!
Nǐ jìng jìbùqīng nǐ dì-yī gè lǎopo de míngzi le！
你竟记不清你第一个老婆的名字了！
There were lone gentlemen and gentlemen accompanied by their wives.
Yǒu gūdān de shēnshì，yě yǒu yóu lǎopo péitóng de shēnshì。
有孤单的绅士，也有由老婆陪同的绅士。
How much does your wife take home after taxes and other deductions?
Kòuchú shuìkuǎn hé qítā kòujiǎn xiàngmù hòu，nǐ lǎopo néng nádào duōshǎo qián？
扣除税款和其他扣减项目后，你老婆能拿到多少钱？
The witch cackled madly.
Wūpó fēngkuáng de dàxiào。
巫婆疯狂地大笑。
He picked a wife blindly.
Tā mángmù de qǔle gè lǎopo。
他盲目地娶了个老婆。
Originally all brahmans were priests.
Qǐchū，suǒyǒu de Póluóménrén dōushì jìsī。
起初，所有的婆罗门人都是祭司。
She was frazzled after the visit of her in-laws.
Bàifǎngle gōngpó zhīhòu，tā gǎndào píbèibùkān。
拜访了公婆之后，她感到疲惫不堪。
She\'s a rich woman in her own right rather than by inheritance.
Tā shì gè píng zìjǐ běnshi ér bú kào jìchéng yíchǎn chénggōng de fùpó。
她是个凭自己本事而不靠继承遗产成功的富婆。
许多男人都希望老婆好好伺候他。
Xǔduō nánrén dōuxīwàng lǎopó hǎohǎocìhòu tā。
A lot of men hope that their wives will wait on them.
这个男人说话做事太不撇脱了，婆婆妈妈的！
Zhège nánrén shuōhuà zuòshì tài bùpiětuō le，pópómāma de！
This man doesn’t speak in a straightforward manner, he is garrulous.
Afternoons with my wife are the best gift a man could receive.
Xiàwǔ shíjiān hé lǎopo zài yìqǐ shì yí gè nánrén nénggòu shōudào de zuìjiā lǐwù。
下午时间和老婆在一起是一个男人能够收到的最佳礼物。
干瘪老太婆
gānbiě lǎotàipó
a wizened old woman
《红岩》中的双枪老太婆令敌人们闻风丧胆。
《Hóngyán》zhōng de shuāngqiāng lǎotàipó lìng dírénmen wénfēngsàngdǎn。
The old women with two guns in &quot;Hongyan&quot; make enemies panic-stricken.
老太婆絮烦了半天也不嫌累。
Lǎotàipó xùfán le bàntiān yě bùxiánlèi。
The old woman has been talking for hours, doesn\'t she feel tired?
老太婆
lǎotàipó
old lady
老太婆
她在戏里装一个老太婆。
老太太是个婆婆嘴，说起话来没完没了。
Look at her, everybody call her &quot;stupid old bag&quot;.
你看她，大家都叫她“愚蠢的老太婆”。
家里只剩下她一个孤寡老婆儿。
Jiā lǐ zhǐ shèngxià tā yígè gū guǎ lǎopór。
The old woman is the only one left in the family.
讨老婆
tǎo lǎopo 
take a wife; get married
在家里，他对他的老婆很服帖。
Zài jiālǐ，tā duì tā de lǎopó hĕnfútiē。
你怎么会找个拜金的女孩子做老婆？
Nǐ zěnme huì zhǎo gè bàijīn de nǚháizi zuò lǎopó？
Why do you marry a girl to whom money is the most important thing in the world?
他的大老婆人很恶毒，总是欺负手下的人。
Tā de dà lǎopó rén hěnèdú，zǒng shì qīfù shǒuxià de rén。
His official wife is vicious, and always treats her servants high-handedly.
王总希望他老婆做一名家庭主妇。
Wáng zǒng xīwàng tā lǎopó zuò yìmíng jiātíng zhǔfù。
Mr. Wang, a manager, wants his wife to be a housewife.
这家的老头儿和老婆儿相依为命，从没见有儿女来看望过他们。
Zhèjiā de lǎotóur hé lǎopór xiāngyīwéimìng，cóng méi jiàn yǒu érnǚ lái kànwàng guò tāmen。
The old couple rely upon each other. We haven\'t seen any of their children come to see them.
这个老婆子可讨厌了，总是传闲话，勾惹矛盾。
Zhège lǎopózi kě tǎoyàn le，zǒngshì chuán xiánhuà，gōurě máodùn。
The old biddy is nasty. She always gossips and arouses conflict.
自从老婆子去年去世后，我一直不能从悲痛中走出来。
Zìcóng lǎopózi qùnián qùshì hòu，wǒ yìzhí bùnéng cóng bēitòng zhōng zǒu chūlái。
Since my old lady died last year, I have been in deep grief.
他在家里很能干活儿，老婆说他是模范丈夫，朋友们则说他像个“男仆”。
Tā zài jiā lǐ hěnnéng gànhuór，lǎopó shuō tā shì mófàn zhàngfū，péngyoumen zé shuō tā xiàng gè“nánpú”。
He is capable of doing housework. His wife praises him as a model husband, but friends say that he is a male servant.
我老婆当然是我们家的内掌柜。
Wǒ lǎopó dāngrán shì wǒmen jiā de nèizhǎngguì。
My wife is of course in charge of our family.
小王的老婆刚生了个女儿，小王这几天都沉浸在弄瓦之乐中。
Xiǎo Wáng de lǎopó gāng shēng le gè nǚ\'ér，Xiǎo Wáng zhè jǐtiān dōu chénjìn zài nòngwǎ zhī lè zhōng。
Xiao Wang\'s wife gave birth to a girl recently. Xiao Wang is full of the of having a daughter these days.
这个瞎眼的老婆婆完全依靠拐棍走路。
Zhège xiāyǎn de lǎopópó wánquán yīkào guǎigùn zǒulù。
This blind old lady relies completely on her walking stick to walk.
他出去寻欢作乐，老婆也不管管。
Tā chūqù xúnhuān zuòlè，lǎopó yě bùguǎnguǎn。
His wife doesn\'t care even though he goes out and seeks pleasure with other women.
离婚以后他才发现老婆还是原配的好。
Líhūn yǐhòu tā cái fāxiàn lǎopó háishi yuánpèi de hǎo。
After getting divorced, he finally found that his first wife had been much better.
那个漂亮的女人是他再娶的老婆。
Nàge piàoliàng de nǚrén shì tā zàiqǔ de lǎopó。
That beautiful woman is his second wife.
他丈母娘不喜欢他，经常在他老婆面前说他的不是。
Tā zhàngmǔniáng bùxǐhuan tā，jīngcháng zài tā lǎopó miànqián shuō tā de búshì。
His mother-in-law doesn\'t like him, and always criticizes him in front of his wife.
他和老婆陷入了儿子抚养权的争夺战中。
Tā hé lǎopó xiànrù le érzi fǔyǎngquán de zhēngduózhàn zhōng。
He and his wife are fighting for the right to support their son.
老婆和他不停的争闹终于导致了离婚。
Lǎopó hé tā bùtíng de zhēngnào zhōng yú dǎozhì le líhūn。
The endless quarrel between him, and his wife finally led to their divorce.
他得知老婆作胎的消息后，高兴得跳了起来。
Tā dézhī lǎopó zuòtāi de xiāoxi hòu，gāoxìng de tiào le qǐlái。
He jumped for joy when he knew that his wife was pregnant.
他得知老婆生病的消息后，坐卧不安。
Tā dézhī lǎopó shēngbìng de xiāoxi hòu，zuòwò bùān。
He is on tenterhooks knowing that his wife is ill.
许多男人都希望老婆好好伺候他。
Xǔduō nánrén dōuxīwàng lǎopó hǎohǎocìhòu tā。
A lot of men hope that their wives will wait on them.
他从不说老婆坏话。
Tā cóngbù shuō lǎopó huàihuà.
He never speaks ill of his wife.
老婆婆
lǎopópó
old lady
面善的老婆婆
miànshàn de lǎopópó
kind-faced old lady
老婆婆像菩萨一样善良。
Lǎopópó xiàng púsà yíyàng shànliáng.
The old lady is as kind as a saint.
他满脸不高兴，想必和老婆吵架了。
Tā mǎnliǎn bù gāoxìng，xiǎngbì hé lǎopó chǎojià le。

老太婆
lǎotàipó
old lady
她下岗之后就做起了专职管家婆，照料一家老小的生活起居。
Tā xiàgǎng zhīhòu jiù zuòqǐ le zhuānzhí guǎnjiāpó，zhàoliào yìjiā lǎoxiǎo de shēnghuó qǐjū。
After being laid off from work, she became a full-time housekeeper, taking care of the whole family.
那个老奶奶做过接生婆。
Nàge lǎonǎinai zuòguò jiēshēngpó。
That old lady used to be a midwife.
她来到婆家哭闹，因为老公打了她。
Tā láidào pójiā kūnào，yīnwèi lǎogōng dǎ le tā。
She came to her husband\'s family and cried, because her husband had beat her.
他很喜欢研究象婆罗门教这样古老的宗教。
Tā hěnxǐhuan yánjiū xiàng póluóménjiào zhèyàng gǔlǎo de zōngjiào。
He loves to research old religions such as Brahmanism.

Zhèbù yǐngpiàn huò Àosīkǎjiǎng。
The film won an Oscar.
这个士兵因为作战英勇而受到嘉奖。
Zhège shìbīngyīnwèi zuòzhàn yīngyǒngér shòudào jiājiǎng。
The soldier was cited for his bravery.
有功者奖。
Yǒugōngzhě jiǎng。
Those who have gained merit will be rewarded.
得奖
dé jiǎng
win a prize
一等奖
yī děnɡ jiǎnɡ
first prize
精神奖励
jīnɡshén jiǎnɡlì 
moral encouragement
物质奖励
wùzhì jiǎnɡlì 
material reward
奖励发明创造
jiǎnglì fāmíngchuàngzào 
encourage innovations by giving awards
奖牌获得者
jiǎngpáihuòdézhě 
medalist
他因学习成绩优秀而受到奖赏。
Tā yīn xuéxí chénɡjì yōuxiù ér shòudào jiǎnɡshǎnɡ。
He was awarded a prize for excellence in his studies.
近年获奖的影片不少。
Jìnnián huòjiǎng de yǐngpiàn bùshǎo。
Quite a few films have won prizes in recent years.
扣发半年奖金
kòufā bàn nián jiǎngjīn
hold sb.\'s bonus for half a year
老师夸奖他进步快。
Lǎoshī kuājiǎnɡ tā jìnbù kuài。
The teacher praised him for his rapid progress.
滥发奖金
làn fā jiǎngjīn
distribute bonuses indiscriminately
领奖
lǐnɡ jiǎnɡ 
receive a prize (or an award)
明令嘉奖
mínglìngjiājiǎng
issue a commendation; mention in a citation
胸前佩带奖章
xiōnɡ qián pèidài jiǎnɡzhānɡ
wear a medal on one\'s breast
评功授奖大会
pínggōngshòujiǎngdàhuì
a meeting to announce commendations and issue awards

qiǎolìmíngmù lànfā jiǎngjīn

庆贺老张得奖
qìnghè Lǎo Zhāng dé jiǎng
congratulate Lao Zhang on winning the award
荣获一枚奖章
rónghuò yì méi jiǎngzhāng
be awarded a medal
立功者受奖。
Lìgōngzhě shòujiǎng。
Those who perform deeds of merit shall be rewarded.
授奖仪式
shòujiǎng yíshì
prizegiving ceremony; medal-awarding ceremony

tōnglìngjiājiǎng

dé tóujiǎng

优胜奖
yōushèngjiǎng

优质奖
yōuzhìjiǎnɡ

有奖征答比赛
yǒujiǎngzhēngdá bǐsài 
question and answer competition with prizes
对有特殊贡献的，要给以重奖。
Duì yǒu tèshū gòngxiàn de，yào gěiyǐ zhòngjiǎng。
Those who have made outstanding contribution should be amply rewarded.
抽了一个头奖
chōu le yígè tóujiǎng
have won first prize (in the sweep-take)
您的英语说得真好。——您过奖了。
Nín de yīngyǔ shuō de zhēn hǎo。——Nín guòjiǎng le。
You speak very good English. —Thank you. You flatter me.
奖掖
jiǎngyè
reward and promote; encourage by promoting and rewarding
奖状
jiǎngzhuàng
certificate of merit
我们社区的卫生状况得到了爱卫会的嘉奖。
Wǒmen shèqū de wèishēng zhuàngkuàng dédào le àiwèhuì de jiājiǎng。
We have won an Ai Wei Hui award for being a clean neighborhood.
群众报矿会得到政府的奖励。
Qúnzhòng bàokuànghuì dédào zhèngfǔ de jiǎnglì。
The government rewarded those who reported the discovery of untapped mineral resources.

Dēngshàng lǐngjiǎngtái de nà yíkè，tā jīdòng de liǎngyǎn cháorùn。
He was so excited that his eyes filled with tears when he stepped up to the platform.
公安局奖励了那起特大杀人案的出首者。
Gōngānjú jiǎnglì le nà qǐ tèdà shārénàn de chūshǒuzhě。
The police station granted a reward to the informer of the extraordinary murder case.
他的受奖答辞非常恳切感人。
Tā de shòujiǎng dácí fēicháng kěnqiè gǎnrén。
His prize acceptance speech was sincere and moving.
你这么夸奖我，我可当不起。
Nǐ zhème kuājiǎng wǒ，wǒ kě dāng bùqǐ。
I am not as good as you described.
获奖名单会在当夜揭晓，大家都很紧张。
Huòjiǎng míngdān huì zài dāngyè jiēxiǎo，dàjiā dōu hěnjǐnzhāng。
All of the people are nervous because the prize winners will be announced tonight.
他是今年诺贝尔物理学奖的得主。
Tā shì jīnnián nuòbèiěr wùlǐxué jiǎng de dézhǔ。
He is the winner of this year\'s Nobel Prize for Physics.
我们要奖励德智体全面发展的学生。
Wǒmen yào jiǎnglì dézhìtǐ quánmiàn fāzhǎn de xuésheng。
We should award those students who have combined development in moral, intellectual and physical education.
看到他获得了这个奖项，我不禁妒火中烧。
Kàn dào tā huòdé le zhège jiǎng xiàng，wǒ bùjīn dùhuǒ zhōng shāo。
He got the award, which made me really envious.
兑奖日期截止到这个月底。
Duìjiǎng rìqī jiézhǐ dào zhège yuèdǐ。
Please collect your awards before the end of this month.
他中了个大奖，美得走路都发飘。
Tā zhòng le gè dàjiǎng，měi de zǒulù dōu fāpiāo。
After he won a big prize, he felt on top of the world.
他买彩票中了个一等奖，可算是发洋财喽！
Tā mǎi cǎipiào zhòng le gè　yìděngjiǎng，kě suàn　shì fāyángcái lou！
He made a big fortune after he won first prize in the lottery.
他中了大奖以后，兴奋得辗转反侧难以入睡。

He tossed and turned in bed after winning a big prize, too excited to fall asleep.

本次抽奖将在公证人的监督下完成。

我的这点成绩哪值得如此夸奖，先生过誉了。

He was awarded a computer for his outstanding performance in his work.
我中了个头奖，可真是交运！
Wǒ zhòng le gè tóujiǎng，kě zhēnshì jiāoyùn！

她的舞蹈在舞蹈大赛上获得了金质奖。

你又迟到了，为此要扣减你50元的奖金。

工厂里所有的在聘职工都可以领到年终奖金。

竞争激烈的环境会逼使我们不断要学习新的东西。
Jìngzhēng jīliè de huánjìng huì bīshǐ wǒmen búduàn yào xuéxí xīn de dōngxi。
Fierce competition forces us to keep learning new things.
在竞争激烈的社会，鞭打快牛的现象屡见不鲜。
Zài jìngzhēng jīliè de shèhuì，biāndǎ kuàiniú de xiàn xiàng lǚjiàn bùxiān。
In this world of fierce competitions, it is a common practice to exert more pressure on able people.
革命先烈以彪炳千秋的光辉业绩激励我们不断向前。
Gémìng xiānliè yǐ biāobǐng qiānqiū de guānghuī yèjì jīlì wǒmen búduàn xiàng qián。
The great achievements of revolutionary heroes inspire us to move forward forever.
有时候，他会再次想起那惨烈的一幕。
Yǒu shíhou，tā huì zàicì xiǎngqǐ nà cǎnliè de yí mù。
Sometimes, he would remember that tragic and heroic scene.
刘胡兰牺牲得非常惨烈。
Liú Húlán xīshēng de fēicháng cǎnliè。

After an intense fight, our army finally conquered the enemy\'s position.
岳飞在满江红中写道：“抬望眼，仰天长啸，壮怀激烈” 。
Yuè Fēi zài mǎnjiānghóng zhōng xiědào:“tái wàng yǎn，yǎngtiān chángxiào，zhuànghuái jīliè”。
Yue Fei wrote in his Ci (a traditional Chinese poem) Man Jiang Hong,&quot;Lifting my eyes; towards the sky I let out a battle cry;\nmy blood is boiling.&quot;
出线权的争夺战异常激烈，队员们都使出了全力。
Chūxiànquán de zhēngduózhàn yìcháng jīliè，duìyuánmen dōu shǐchū le quánlì。
The competition for the right to continue on to the next round was extraordinarily fierce.
这酒是醇香型的，一点都不烈。
Zhè jiǔ shì chúnxiāngxíng de，yìdiǎn dōu búliè。
This wine is of the aromatic type and is not strong at all.
可叹罗成一世英名，到最后被苏烈乱箭攒射死于陷马坑。
Kětàn Luó Chéng yíshì yīngmíng，dào zuìhòu bèi Sū Liè luànjiàn zǎnshè sǐ yú xiànmǎkēng。
Although Luocheng had an illustrious life, he was shot dead in a horse pit by a volley of arrows fired by Sulie.
我所在的部队向敌阵发起了一波猛烈地攻击。
Wǒ suǒ zài de bùduì xiàng dízhèn fāqǐ le yìbō měngliè de gōngjī。
My army is launching a fierce attack on the enemy position.
烈火的毒焰烧毁了七八间民宅。
Lièhuǒ de dúyàn shāohuǐ le qībā jiān mínzhái。
The raging flames burned down nearly eight people\'s homes.
草原上的儿马最烈，你一定要小心。
Cǎoyuán shàng de érmǎ zuì liè，nǐ yídìng yào xiǎoxīn。
Male horses in the prairie are most violent, be careful there.
经过激烈的法庭辩论，我们终于胜诉了。
Jīngguò jīliè de fǎtíng biànlùn，wǒmen zhōng yú shèngsù le。
After a heated court debate, we won the appeal.
舞台上五颜六色的光柱使演出的气氛更加热烈。
Wǔtái shàng wǔyán liùsè de guāngzhù shǐ yǎnchū de qìfēn gèngjiā rèliè。
The colorful light beams on the stage make the atmosphere of the performance even more exciting.
这个洞的洞口有一股浓烈的狐臊气味。
Zhège dòng de dòngkǒu yǒu yìgǔ nóngliè de húsào qìwèi。
There is a strong body ordor at the mouth of the cave.
暴风雨来临，激浪猛烈地敲打船梢。
Bàofēngyǔ láilín，jīlàng měngliè de qiāodǎ chuánshāo。
A storm has come and surging waves are beating against the rudder end of the boat.
打击乐队运用了京剧锣鼓中擅长表现紧张、急促、激烈场面的“急急风”。
Dǎjīyuèduì yùnyòng le jīngjù luógǔ zhōng shàncháng biǎoxiàn jǐnzhāng、jícù、jīliè chǎngmiàn de“jíjífēng”。
The percussion band has used &quot;Ji Ji Feng&quot; (quick and lively beats) of Beijing opera that displays tense, pressing and violent situations well.
这出戏的女主角可真节烈。
Zhè chū xì de nǚzhǔjué kě zhēn jiéliè。
The heroine of the play is rigorously chaste.
敌人在我军的猛烈攻势下终于就歼。
Dírén zài wǒ jūn de měngliè gōngshì xià zhōng yú jiù jiān。
The enemies were finally eliminated after being faced with our army\'s fierce attacks.
经过几天的激烈角逐，我终于进入了决赛圈！
Jīngguò jǐtiān de jīliè juézhú，wǒ zhōng yú jìnrù le juésàiquān！
After several days of intense competition, I have finally got into the final round.
她家是军烈属，她儿子在一次战斗中牺牲了。
Tā jiā shì jūnlièshǔ，tā érzi zài yícì zhàndòu zhōng xīshēng le。
Her son died during a fight, which makes her family that of a martyred soldier.
开赛以来，双方争夺激烈，精彩不断。
Kāisài yǐlái,shuāngfāng zhēngduó jīliè,jīngcǎi búduàn.
Ever since the beginning, the competition is very intense between the two. Exciting scenes come one after another.
前不久，这个城市遭受了龙卷风的狂烈袭击，损失很严重。
Qián bùjiǔ，zhège chéngshì zāoshòu le lóngjuǎnfēng de kuángliè xíjī，sǔnshī hěnyánzhòng。
A ferocious tornado attacked the city not long ago, and caused serious damage.
老派和新派在经过激烈的争论之后还是没有在这个问题上达成一致。
Lǎopài hé xīnpài zài jīngguò jīliè de zhēnglùn zhīhòu háishi méiyǒu zài zhège wèntí shàng dáchéng yízhì。
After a fierce dispute, the old-fashioned and the up-to-date did not reach a consensus .
栗烈寒风，吹的人直发抖。
Lìliè hánfēng，chuī de rén zhí fādǒu。
The chilly wind makes us shiver all over.
沃特加是俄罗斯著名的烈酒。
Wòtèjiā shì Éluósī zhùmíng de lièjiǔ。
Vodka is a famous type of spirit in Russia.
每到建军节，我们都要安排慰问烈军属的活动。
Měidào jiànjūnjié，wǒmen dōuyào ānpái wèiwèn lièjūnshǔ de huódòng。
Every Army Day we will arrange activities to convey condolences to the members of soldiers, and revolutionary martyr\'s families.
这是一匹烈马，很难被人驯服。
Zhè shì yìpǐ lièmǎ，hěnnán bèi rén xúnfú。
This is a hot-tempered horse, so it is difficult to be tamed.
她真不愧是一位贞节烈女呀！
Tā zhēn bùkuì shì yíwèi zhēnjié liènǚ ya！
Only a great woman will die to defend her chastity.
烈日当空，天气异常炎热。
Lièrì dāngkōng，tiānqì yìcháng yánrè。
The scorching sun is in the sky. The weather is extraordinarily hot.
他是个烈性子，经常对人发脾气。
Tā shì gè lièxìngzi，jīngcháng duì rén fā píqi。
He is hot-tempered, and always gets angry at others.
陆坡区域的地壳经常出现剧烈的活动。
Lùpō qūyù de dìqiào jīngcháng chūxiàn jùliè de huódòng。
Violent crust movements always happen near the continental shelf.
他们论难得相当激烈，让人觉得很精彩。
Tāmen lùnnán de xiāngdāng jīliè，ràng rén juédé hěnjīngcǎi。
Their debate was quite fierce and splendid.
刚吃完饭不要进行剧烈运动，否则容易引发盲肠炎。
Gāng chīwánfàn búyào jìnxíng jùliè yùndòng，fǒuzé róngyì yǐnfā mángchángyán。
Do not exercise strenuously just after a meal, or you may get typhlitis.
清明节那天我们在墓园里墓祭了烈士们的英灵。
Qīngmíngjié nàtiān wǒmen zài mùyuán lǐ mùjì le lièshìmen de yīnglíng。
On the Tomb Sweeping Day, we held a memorial service for the martyrs at the cemetery.
这个墓园里有好几座烈士墓。
Zhège mùyuán lǐ yǒu hǎo jǐ zuò lièshìmù。
There are several tombs of revolutionary martyrs in this cemetery.
这匹烈马挣断了我的套马杆狂奔起来。
Zhè pǐ lièmǎ zhēngduàn le wǒ de tàomǎgān kuángbēn qǐlái。
The horse broke away from my horse pole and ran wild.
反政府军与政府军为争夺武库而展开了激烈的战斗。
Fǎn zhèngfǔ jūn yǔ zhèngfǔ jūn wèi zhēngduó wǔkù ér zhǎnkāi le jīliè de zhàndòu。
The anti-government army, and the government army fought fiercely for the storage of arms.
虽然烈日炎炎，农民伯伯们依然为夏耘而忙碌着。
Suīrán lièrì yán yán，nóngmín bóbómen yīrán wèi xiàyún ér mánglù zhe。
Though it is scorching outside, the farmers still work hard to cultivate the land.
根据你的现况，我建议你不要从事剧烈运动。
Gēnjù nǐ de xiànkuàng，wǒ jiànyì nǐ búyào cóngshì jùliè yùndòng。
Based on your condition, I advise you not to take part in strenuous exercises.
医生建议他每天做小量运动，切忌剧烈运动。
Yīshēng jiànyì tā měitiān zuò xiǎoliàng yùndòng，qièjì jùliè yùndòng。
The doctor suggests that he do little but strenuous exercise.
新派与旧派之间斗争激烈。
Xīnpài yǔ jiùpài zhījiān dòuzhēng jīliè。
The new faction is in fierce conflict with the old faction.
演讲比赛上他严辞激烈，把我们都给镇住了。
Yǎnjiǎng bǐsài shàng tā yáncí jīliè，bǎ wǒmen dōu gěi zhènzhù le。
He astonished us in the debate contest with his sharp tongue.
浮夸虚靡之风虽古已有之，却于今为烈。
Fúkuā xūmí zhī fēng suī gǔyǐ yǒuzhī，què yújīn wéiliè。
Though proneness to boasting and waste has existed for a long time, it is becoming more and more serious nowadays.
自从父母去世后，他有了强烈的责任感。
Zìcóng fùmǔ qùshì hòu，tā yǒu le qiángliè de zérèngǎn。
Since the death of his parents, he has a strong sense of responsibility.
按照丈夫的遗愿，烈士夫人将忠骨抛洒到海中。
Ànzhào zhàngfū de yíyuàn，lièshì fūrén jiāng zhōnggǔ pāosǎ dào hǎizhōng。
According to her dead husband\'s wishes, the martyr\'s wife threw his remains into the sea.
他们都是我们崇拜的新时期的忠烈人士。
Tāmen dōushì wǒmen chóngbài de xīn shíqī de zhōng liè rénshì。
They are the martyrs of the new time who we respect very much.
清明节的时候，我们去为忠烈扫墓。
Qīngmíngjié de shíhou，wǒmen qù wèi zhōng liè sǎomù。
During the Tomb Sweeping Festival, we went to clean the graves of martyrs.
军区在他死后把他追记为烈士。
Jūnqū zài tā sǐ hòu bǎ tā zhuījì wéi lièshì。
After death, he was posthumously awarded the title of martyr by the military command.
虽然只是一场安慰赛，但同样激烈精彩。
Suīrán zhǐ shì yìchǎng ānwèisài，dàn tóngyàng jīliè jīngcǎi。
Even though it was consolation match, it was both interesting and competitive.
经测定，这次地震的烈度为七级。
Jīng cèdìng，zhècì dìzhèn de lièdù wéi qī jí。
This earthquake measured 7 according to the seismic survey.
我们强烈反对殖民主义。
Wǒmen qiángliè fǎnduì zhímínzhǔyì。
We are strongly against colonialism.
由于处在太平洋地震带，这个岛国经常发生强烈地震。
Yóuyú chǔzài Tàipíngyángdìzhèndài，zhège dǎoguó jīngcháng fāshēng qiángliè dìzhèn。
Located in the Pacific Ring of Fire, this island country is often struck by strong earthquakes.
这个化学反应很激烈，有可能引起爆炸。
Zhège huàxuéfǎnyìng hěn jīliè，yǒu kěnéng yǐnqǐ bàozhà。
This chemical reaction is very fierce, and may cause an explosion.
这首三重唱的歌曲赢得了观众热烈的掌声。
Zhè shǒu sānchóngchàng de gēqǔ yíngdéle guānzhòng rèliè de zhǎngshēng。

I\'m here with open arms waiting for you to come back.
我在这里热烈欢迎你归来。

那座火山在沉睡几个世纪后开始剧烈活动。
Her arrival was greeted with a rousing fanfare.
Rèliè de hàojiǎo shēng huānyíng tā de dàolái。
热烈的号角声欢迎她的到来。
He had so rapaciously desired and so obtusely expected to find her alone.
Tā qiángliè kěwàng bìngqiě yúchǔn de xīwàng zìjǐ nénggòu fāxiàn tā yì rén dúchǔ de jīhuì。
他强烈渴望并且愚蠢地希望自己能够发现她一人独处的机会。
There was keen competition for the nomination.
Zhè yī tímíng de jìngzhēng fēicháng jīliè。
这一提名的竞争非常激烈。
Severe headaches are one of the side effects of the drug.
Jùliè tóutòng shì zhè zhǒng yào de fùzuòyòng zhīyī。
剧烈头痛是这种药的副作用之一。
His dislike for raw fish only deepened in Japan.

到了日本后，他对生鱼片的厌恶感觉更加强烈了。
Blind jealousy is a frequent corollary of passionate love.
Rèliè de àiqíng bìrán jīngcháng yǎnshēngchū mángmù de jídù。
热烈的爱情必然经常衍生出盲目的嫉妒。
Its was a brief and intense courtship.
Zhè shì yí cì duǎnzàn ér rèliè de qiú\'ài。
这是一次短暂而热烈的求爱。
They discussed the question enthusiastically.
Tāmen rèliè de tǎolùnzhe zhège wèntí。
他们热烈地讨论着这个问题。
A fine fiery blast against meek conformity.
Xiāngdāng měngliè de bàofā yǔ wēnshùn de fúcóng。
相当猛烈的爆发与温顺的服从。
Her tirade provoked a counterblast from her husband.
Tā de chángpiān dàlùn jīqǐle tā zhàngfu de qiángliè fǎnduì。
她的长篇大论激起了她丈夫的强烈反对。
She felt an alarming tightness in her chest.
Tā gǎndào yìzhǒng qiángliè de xiōngmèn gǎn。
她感到一种强烈的胸闷感。
Her violent feelings palpitated the young woman\'s heart.
Tā jīliè de qínggǎn ràng nà wèi niánqīng nǚrén de xīn pēngpēng tiàodòng。
她激烈的情感让那位年轻女人的心怦怦跳动。

Zhè yǐnqǐle lǎoshī de měngliè fǎnbó。

Winds were blowing furiously.
Fēng měngliè de guāzhe。

他们正对着前进的军队猛烈地扫射。
The exposed tree scorched in the hot sun.
Bàolù de shùmù bèi yányánlièrì kǎojiāo。

A sabre slammed fearsomely through the thicket in all directions.

They attacked violently.
Tāmen fāqǐ měngliè de jìngōng。

The town was broiling in the sun.

Dìzhèn shǐ Xiāngcūn jùliè zhèndòng。

Tā qiángliè fǎnduì tā de zhèngdǎng suǒ cǎiqǔ de lìchǎng。

There was a backlash of intolerance.
Cúnzài duì bù kuānróng de qiángliè fǎnduì。

He then so resoundingly denounced his former friend.
Jiēzhe，tā qiángliè de gōngkāi zhǐzé tā yǐqián de péngyou。

The debate sharpened.
Zhēnglùn yuèláiyuè jīliè。

He felt a compulsion to babble on about the accident.
Tā gǎndào zìjǐ yǒu zhǒng xiǎng tòulù shìgù jīngguò de qiángliè chōngdòng。

He took a slug of hard liquor.
Tā hēle yí dà kǒu lièjiǔ。

Vigorous worrying finally loosened the saw.
Měngliè de tuīlā dòngzuò zuìzhōng ràng nà bǎ jù sōngchí le。

She was rollickingly happy.

His motivation was at a high level.
Tā de dòngjī hěn qiángliè。

The reliving of a strong emotion can be therapeutic.

He vehemently denied the accusations against him.
Tā yáncíjīliè de fǒurènle biérén duì tā de zhǐkòng。

The hecklers pelted the discombobulated speaker with anything that came to hand.
Nàxiē jīliè zhìwènzhě náqǐ shǒubiān de rènhé dōngxīxiàng jīnghuāngshīcuò de yǎnjiǎngzhě rēng qù。
那些激烈质问者拿起手边的任何东西向惊慌失措的演讲者扔去。

Tāmen měngliè xíjīle nàgè chéngshì de chéngqiáng。

Week by week, the betrayal gnawed at his heart.
Yìzhōuzhōu guòqù le，bèipàn gěi tā nèixīn suǒ dàilái de tòngkǔ yuèláiyuè qiángliè。
