激烈的争论
jīliè de zhēnglùn 
heated argument
一场激烈的比赛
yìcháng jīliè de bǐsài
a closely fought game; a gruelling match
争吵得很激烈
zhēngchǎo de hěn jīliè 
quarrel bitterly
这是最近公众论坛上引起激烈争论的问题。
Zhè shì zuìjìn gōngzhònglùntán shàngyǐnqǐ jīliè zhēnglùn de wèntí。
This question has caused heated controversy in recent forums of public opinion.
这两个队旗鼓相当，打得十分激烈。
Zhè liǎnggè duì qígǔxiāngdāng，dǎ de shífēn jīliè。
The two teams were well-matched and the game was hotly contested.
就这个问题掀起了一场激烈的辩论。
Jiù zhège wèntí xiānqǐ le yìchǎng jīliè de biànlùn。
This question set off a fierce debate.
激烈的争吵
jīliè de zhēngchǎo 
fierce (or bitter) wrangling
今天的球赛真激烈，原本失利一方竟然把比分扳平了。
Jīntiān de qiúsài zhēn jīliè，yuánběn shīlì yìfāng jìngrán bǎ bǐfēn bānpíng le。
The match today was exciting. Though that team lagged behind at first, they came back and the match ended up a draw.
这场球赛双方队员都很积极，场上逼抢十分激烈。
Zhèchǎng qiúsài shuāngfāng duìyuán dōu hěnjījí，chǎng shàng bīqiǎng shífēn jīliè。
Players from both teams were quite active that day, the play was marked by fierce competition.
竞争激烈的环境会逼使我们不断要学习新的东西。
Jìngzhēng jīliè de huánjìng huì bīshǐ wǒmen búduàn yào xuéxí xīn de dōngxi。
Fierce competition forces us to keep learning new things.
在竞争激烈的社会，鞭打快牛的现象屡见不鲜。
Zài jìngzhēng jīliè de shèhuì，biāndǎ kuàiniú de xiàn xiàng lǚjiàn bùxiān。
In this world of fierce competitions, it is a common practice to exert more pressure on able people.
岳飞在满江红中写道：“抬望眼，仰天长啸，壮怀激烈” 。
Yuè Fēi zài mǎnjiānghóng zhōng xiědào:“tái wàng yǎn，yǎngtiān chángxiào，zhuànghuái jīliè”。
Yue Fei wrote in his Ci (a traditional Chinese poem) Man Jiang Hong,&quot;Lifting my eyes; towards the sky I let out a battle cry;\nmy blood is boiling.&quot;
出线权的争夺战异常激烈，队员们都使出了全力。
Chūxiànquán de zhēngduózhàn yìcháng jīliè，duìyuánmen dōu shǐchū le quánlì。
The competition for the right to continue on to the next round was extraordinarily fierce.
经过激烈的法庭辩论，我们终于胜诉了。
Jīngguò jīliè de fǎtíng biànlùn，wǒmen zhōng yú shèngsù le。
After a heated court debate, we won the appeal.
打击乐队运用了京剧锣鼓中擅长表现紧张、急促、激烈场面的“急急风”。
Dǎjīyuèduì yùnyòng le jīngjù luógǔ zhōng shàncháng biǎoxiàn jǐnzhāng、jícù、jīliè chǎngmiàn de“jíjífēng”。
The percussion band has used &quot;Ji Ji Feng&quot; (quick and lively beats) of Beijing opera that displays tense, pressing and violent situations well.
经过几天的激烈角逐，我终于进入了决赛圈！
Jīngguò jǐtiān de jīliè juézhú，wǒ zhōng yú jìnrù le juésàiquān！
After several days of intense competition, I have finally got into the final round.
开赛以来，双方争夺激烈，精彩不断。
Kāisài yǐlái,shuāngfāng zhēngduó jīliè,jīngcǎi búduàn.
Ever since the beginning, the competition is very intense between the two. Exciting scenes come one after another.
老派和新派在经过激烈的争论之后还是没有在这个问题上达成一致。
Lǎopài hé xīnpài zài jīngguò jīliè de zhēnglùn zhīhòu háishi méiyǒu zài zhège wèntí shàng dáchéng yízhì。
After a fierce dispute, the old-fashioned and the up-to-date did not reach a consensus .
他们论难得相当激烈，让人觉得很精彩。
Tāmen lùnnán de xiāngdāng jīliè，ràng rén juédé hěnjīngcǎi。
Their debate was quite fierce and splendid.
反政府军与政府军为争夺武库而展开了激烈的战斗。
Fǎn zhèngfǔ jūn yǔ zhèngfǔ jūn wèi zhēngduó wǔkù ér zhǎnkāi le jīliè de zhàndòu。
The anti-government army, and the government army fought fiercely for the storage of arms.
新派与旧派之间斗争激烈。
Xīnpài yǔ jiùpài zhījiān dòuzhēng jīliè。
The new faction is in fierce conflict with the old faction.
演讲比赛上他严辞激烈，把我们都给镇住了。
Yǎnjiǎng bǐsài shàng tā yáncí jīliè，bǎ wǒmen dōu gěi zhènzhù le。
He astonished us in the debate contest with his sharp tongue.
虽然只是一场安慰赛，但同样激烈精彩。
Suīrán zhǐ shì yìchǎng ānwèisài，dàn tóngyàng jīliè jīngcǎi。
Even though it was consolation match, it was both interesting and competitive.
这个化学反应很激烈，有可能引起爆炸。
Zhège huàxuéfǎnyìng hěn jīliè，yǒu kěnéng yǐnqǐ bàozhà。
This chemical reaction is very fierce, and may cause an explosion.
世界杯进入了淘汰赛阶段，比赛将更加激烈。
Shìjièbēi jìnrù le táotàisài jiēduàn，bǐsài jiāng gèngjiā jīliè。
The World Cup has entered the stage of elimination matches, so it will definitely become more intense.

We discussed the question heatedly.
激烈
jīliè
fierce
由于市场竞争十分激烈，大部分小公司被收购。

As the market is very competitive, the majority of small companies have been taken over.
激起强烈的反抗
jīqǐ qiángliè de fǎnkàng
evoke strong opposition
暴风雨来临，激浪猛烈地敲打船梢。

A storm has come and surging waves are beating against the rudder end of the boat.

经过昨天我们那次激烈的争吵，我想她不会再理我了。

经过两个月的激烈对抗，我们最终做出了决断。

他和我说话时，使用了最激烈的陈词。

to tear sb to pieces
[fig] 与某人激烈争吵
The world of football is very competitive.
足球界竞争很激烈。
The tilt between the two parties got fiercer.

革命烈士。

我永远不会忘记我们初次见面的那一天。

The supersession of the old by the new is a general, eternal and inviolable law of the universe.
永远记住我的劝告。
Yǒngyuǎn jìzhù wǒ de quàngào。

Wǒ bùxiǎngyǒngyuǎn zhù zài zhèr。

商场上没有永远的败将，也没有常胜将军。

他总是屈曲着腿，好像永远站不直。

老师的谆谆训诲我永远不会忘记。

I will always keep the teachers\' instruction in my mind.

周总理虽然不在了，但他的音容笑貌永远留在我们心中。

他们希望一辈子生活在一起，永远不分离。

They want to be together all their lives, and never part.
我永远不会与政客为友。

永远不要对顾客搪塞了事。

Love is abstract it can never be touched or held or seen.
Àiqíng shì chōuxiàng de，tā yǒngyuǎn mō búdào，zhuā búzhù，kàn bújiàn。
爱情是抽象的，它永远摸不到，抓不住，看不见。
He would never be a rival, he would remain the loyal servant of the chairman.
Tā yǒngyuǎn dōu búhuì chéngwéi jìngzhēng duìshǒu，tā jiāng jìxù zuò zhǔxí zhōngshí de púrén。
他永远都不会成为竞争对手，他将继续做主席忠实的仆人。
The moon\'s rear is never seen.
Yǒngyuǎn kàn bú jiàn yuèliang de hòumiàn。
永远看不见月亮的后面。
I\'ll never get onto level two.
Wǒ yǒngyuǎn zuò búdào dì-èr guān。
我永远做不到第二关。
Yet he could never identify himself with a counter-attack either.
Rán\'ér， tā kěnéng yǒngyuǎn yě bú rènwéi zìjǐ děngtóng yú fǎnjīzhě。
然而，他可能永远也不认为自己等同于反击者。
I am about to impart knowledge to you that you will never be able to forget.
Wǒ zhèng zhǔnbèi bǎ nǐ yǒngyuǎn dōu bù néng wàng de qíngkuàng gàosu nǐ。
我正准备把你永远都不能忘的情况告诉你。
Your secret will always be in safe hands.
Nǐ de mìmì jiāng huì yǒngyuǎn dōu bú bèi xièlòu。
你的秘密将会永远都不被泄露。
My brother, of all people, worries that I will never get married.
Suǒyǒu rén，yóuqí shì wǒ gēge，dānxīn wǒ yǒngyuǎn yě búhuì jiéhūn。
所有人，尤其是我哥哥，担心我永远也不会结婚。
The right reader of a good poem can tell the moment it strikes him that he has taken an immortal wound--that he will never get over it.
Héshì yōuměi shīgē de dúzhě，nénggòu fēnbiàn nàxiē dǎdòng tā xīnxián，gěi tā liúxià yǒngjiǔ xīn shāng de shíkè — tā jiāng yǒngyuǎn yě bùnéng jiāng tā wànghuái。
合适优美诗歌的读者，能够分辨那些打动他心弦，给他留下永久心伤的时刻—他将永远也不能将它忘怀。
He never knew what to do in an emergency.
Tā yǒngyuǎn yě bùzhīdào zài jǐnjí qíngkuàng xià gāi zuò xiē shénme。
他永远也不知道在紧急情况下该做些什么。
Will they never find a cure for the common cold?
Tāmen yǒngyuǎn yě bù néng zhǎodào zhìliáo gǎnmào de fāngfǎ ma？
他们永远也不能找到治疗感冒的方法吗？
An acquisitive society in which the craving for material things seems never satisfied.
Yí gè wùyùhéngliú de tānlán shèhuì duì wùzhì de zhuīqiú shì yǒngyuǎn dōu búhuì dédào mǎnzú de。
一个物欲横流的贪婪社会对物质的追求是永远都不会得到满足的。
That which is mortal is not immortal.
凡是会死的就不是永生的。
We\'ll never get to the bank if we keep sailing against the wind.
如果一直逆风行驶的话，我们永远也到不了岸边。　
If you go on fighting we\'ll never arrive at a solution.
你们要是再这么吵下去，我们永远都找不出个解决办法来。
There are so many buttons on this machine that I\'m sure I\'ll never learn what any of them do.
这机器上有这么多的按钮，我想我永远也搞不懂它们是干什么的。
Good looks don’t last forever, nor does wealth or fame.
美貌不能永在，财富和名誉也是如此。
You can\'t dine out on previous success forever.
Nǐ bùnéng yǒngyuǎn kào yǐwǎng de chénggōng lái wéichí shēngyù。
你不能永远靠以往的成功来维持声誉。
I should remind you that it won\'t stay open for ever.
Wǒ děi tíxǐng nǐ，mén búhuì yǒngyuǎn dōu chǎngkāizhe。
我得提醒你，门不会永远都敞开着。
The local seemed to take forever to get to New York.
Nà tàng mànchē sìhū yǒngyuǎn dàodá bù liǎo niǔyuē。
那趟慢车似乎永远到达不了纽约。
Poignant grief cannot endure forever.
Bù néng yǒngyuǎn chéngshòu jùtòng。
不能永远承受剧痛。
Fate won\'t accompany you all the time in gambling games.
在赌局中你不可能永远是赢家。
I think that was the vision that had remained with him always.
我觉得这是他永远也抛弃不掉的幻景。
He said there would always be some voices of dissent.
Tā shuō yǒngyuǎn dōuhuì yǒu bùtóng yìjiàn de shēngyīn。
他说永远都会有不同意见的声音。
This fighter plane will be permanently out of commission within a week.
Háiyǒu búdào yí gè xīngqī，zhè jià zhànjī jiù jiāng yǒngyuǎn tuìyì le。
还有不到一个星期，这架战机就将永远退役了。
If he declared undying love for you tomorrow, would you be happy or run as fast as your legs would carry you?
如果明天他说他将永远爱你，你是会非常开心，还是会避之唯恐不及地跑掉？
如果只是单兵作战，你永远别想取胜。
Rúguǒ zhǐ shì dānbīng zuòzhàn，nǐ yǒngyuǎn bié xiǎng qǔshèng。
You will never win if you fight alone.
蓉城一别，竟成永诀。
Róngchéngyì bié，jìngchéngyǒngjué。
When we parted at Chengdu, I little thought that we were never to meet again in this world.
老书记和我们永别了。
His advice to me was to never take risks.
Tā duì wǒ de jiànyì shì yǒngyuǎn bié màoxiǎn。
他对我的建议是永远别冒险。
愿亡人沉眠于此，永久安息。
Yuàn wángrén chénmián yú cǐ,yǒngjiǔ ānxī.
May you rest in peace.
eternal rest
永远安息；长眠
There is never peace where men are greedy.
在人们贪婪的情况下是永远不会有安宁的。

yǒng bǎo qīngchūn 
keep alive the fervour of youth

Rúguǒ bùfēn qīnghóngzàobái，yígài jùjué xiàng wàiguó xuéxí，jiù zhǐnéng shǐ Zhōngguó yǒngyuǎn chǔyú luòhòu dìwèi。

chǐtán yǒngjiǔ hépíng
prate about eternal peace

YǒngdìngHé hé DàqīngHé zài tiānjīn fùjìn héliú。
The Yongding and Daqing rivers meet near Tianjin.
你们的深情厚谊将永远留在我们的记忆中。
Nǐmen de shēnqínghòuyì jiāngyǒngyuǎn liú zài wǒmen de jìyì zhōng。
Your warm friendship will always remain in our memory.
我们永远不能骄傲，不能翘尾巴。

戒骄戒躁，永远保持谦虚进取的精神

yǒngyuǎn bǎochí qiānxū hé jìnqǔ de jīngshén
always remain modest and keep forging ahead

这个教训已经烙印在我的心头，永远不会忘记。

yǒngzhìbúwàng
will forever bear in mind; will always cherish the memory of sb. or sth.

商场上没有永远的败将，也没有常胜将军。

There are no permanent losers in the business world, neither are there permanent winners.
家永远是我们的避风港。

People\'s greed will never be satisfied.
不受挫折教育，孩子永远长不大。
Búshòu cuòzhé jiàoyù，háizi yǒngyuǎn zhǎngbúdà。

如果只是单兵作战，你永远别想取胜。

You will never win if you fight alone.

Fǎguān yǒngyuǎn yào bǐngchí gōngxīn。

世界贸易组织是独立于联合国的永久性国际组织。

他的花名叫张永，这是记载在花名册上的。

His name is Zhong Yong, which is recorded on the registration book.
希望你青春留驻，永远年轻。

这切骨之仇，我永生难忘。
Zhè qiēgǔ zhī chóu，wǒ yǒngshēng nánwàng。

Búyào rènwéi zìrán zīyuán shì yǒngbùqióngkuì de。
Don\'t believe that natural resources are inexhaustible.
他总是屈曲着腿，好像永远站不直。
Tā zǒngshì qūqū zhe tuǐ，hǎo xiàng yǒngyuǎn zhàn bùzhí。
He always bends his legs, as if he is always unable to stand up straight.
天壤中的万物将生生不息，直到永远。

Things in nature multiply.
秦桧在历史上留下的污名是永远抹不掉的。

Qing hui\'s bad reputation can never be erased from history.
唯物辩证法认为，运动永远不会息止。
Wéiwù biànzhèngfǎ rènwéi，yùndòng yǒngyuǎn búhuì xīzhǐ。
According to the dialectical materialism, things are forever in the process of changes.
我们都知道，“泳”和“永”这两个字谐声。
Wǒmen dōu zhīdào，“yǒng”hé“yǒng”zhè liǎnggè zì xiéshēng。
As we all know, that the characters of &quot;swim&quot; and &quot;forever&quot; have the same pronunciation.
认识汉字的人都知道，“泳”和“永”是两个谐声的字。

Everyone who can read Chinese knows that the characters of &quot;swim&quot; and &quot;forever&quot; rhyme have the same pronunciation.

马永贞也可以算是一代雄杰。

他的熊脾气估计是永远都改不了的。

老师的谆谆训诲我永远不会忘记。

Although Premier Zhou has passed away, his voice and appearance are still vividly remembered in our hearts.
他的音容笑貌永远印刻在我记忆深处。

雷锋助人为乐的精神将永存我们心中！

Zhugeliang\'s spirit of dedicating his lifelong energy to his job will live forever!
昨日的辉煌已经永逝，我们要懂得把握今天。

祝亲爱的妈妈青春永驻，笑口常开！

占统治地位
zhàn tǒngzhì dìwèi 
occupy a dominant position
《红楼梦》在中国文学史上占有重要位置。
《Hónglóumèng》zài Zhōngguó wénxuéshǐshàng zhànyǒu zhòngyào wèizhi。
A Dream of the Red Mansions occupies an important place in the history of Chinese literature.
占下风
zhàn xiàfēng
be at a disadvantage
占小便宜
zhàn xiǎopiányi
gain petty advantages
一张双人床占了房间的一多半。
Yì zhāngshuāngrénchuángzhàn le fángjiān de yìduōbàn。
A double bed took up the greater part of the room.
占优势
zhàn yōushì 
occupy a dominant position; gain the upper hand
占星术
zhānxīngshù
astrology
占用不少时间
zhànyòngbùshǎo shíjiān 
take up much time
占多(少)数
zhàn duō（shǎo）shù
constitute the majority (minority)
占世界第一位
zhàn shìjiè dìyī wèi 
rank first in the world
故宫占地72公顷。
Gùgōng zhàndì qīshí\'èr gōngqǐng。
The Imperial Palace covers an area of 72 hectares.
占据重要的战略地位
zhànjù zhòngyào de zhànlüè dìwèi 
occupy a position of strategic importance
她的话占理，我们按她说的办。
Tā de huà zhànlǐ，wǒmen àn tā shuō de bàn。
She\'s right. We\'ll do what she says.
占领要塞
zhànlǐngyàosài 
capture a fort
占领市场
zhànlǐngshìchǎng
dominate the market
别老想占我的便宜。
Bié lǎo xiǎng zhàn wǒ de piányi。
Don\'t always try to take advantage of me.
你个子高，打篮球占便宜。
Nǐ gèzi gāo，dǎ lánqiú zhàn piányi。
A tall fellow like you has an advantage in playing basketball.
我队下半场占了上风。
Wǒ duì xià bànchǎngzhàn le shàngfēng。
Our team gained the upper hand in the second half of the game.
上个月劳动竞赛，第一组占先了。
Shànggè yuè láodòngjìngsài，dìyī zǔ zhànxiān le。
The first team led all the others in last month\'s emulation drive.
不能随便占用耕地。
Bùnéng suíbiàn zhànyòng gēngdì。
It is illegal to occupy cultivated land and put it to other uses without authorization.
占有生产资料
zhànyǒu shēngchǎn zīliào 
own the means of production
占有第一手资料
zhànyǒu dìyīshǒu zīliào 
have firsthand data
商业在国民经济中占有重要地位。
Shāngyè zài guómínjīngjì zhōng zhànyǒu zhòngyào dìwèi。
Commerce occupies an important place in the national economy.
这会儿电话占线。
Zhèhuìr diànhuà zhànxiàn。
The line\'s busy at the moment.
占主导地位
zhàn zhǔdǎo dìwèi 
occupy the leading position; hold sway
占卦
zhānguà
divine by means of the Eight Diagrams (八卦)
占领
zhànlǐng
capture; occupy; seize
占便宜
zhàn piányi
gain extra advantage by unfair means; profit at other people\'s expense
占上风
zhàn shàngfēng
get the upper hand; win an advantage; prevail
他是今年的高考状元，可谓独占鳌头！
Tā shì jīnnián de gāokǎo zhuàngyuán，kěwèi dúzhànáotóu！
He came in the first place in this year\'s college entrance exam. He really was the best.
我想电话包席，可饭店那边一直占线。
Wǒ xiǎng diànhuà bāoxí，kě fàndiàn nàbiān yìzhí zhànxiàn。
I wanted to book at that restaurant, but the line was always busy.
他常用卜课的方法帮人占卜未来。
Tā chángyòng bǔkè de fāngfǎ bāng rén zhānbǔ wèilái。
He often practices divination to tell other’s fortune.
经过一番惨烈的战斗，我军终于占领了敌人的阵地。
Jīngguò yì fān cǎnliè de zhàndòu，wǒ jūn zhōng yú zhānlǐng le dírén de zhèndì。
After an intense fight, our army finally conquered the enemy\'s position.
他的行李把出租车的车箱都占满了。
Tā de xíngli bǎ chūzūchē de chēxiāng dōu zhànmǎn le。
His luggage filled the entire taxi.
触目皆是的汽车几乎占满了整条马路，交通问题真是令人挠头。
Chùmù jiēshì de qìchē jīhū zhànmǎn le zhěngtiáo mǎlù，jiāotōng wèntí zhēnshì lìngrén náotóu。
Traffic is really heavy, all you can see are cars.
按照村规，这块地谁都不许占为己有。
Ànzhào cūnguī，zhèkuàidì shéidōu bùxǔ zhànwéijǐyǒu。
According to village regulations, no one is allowed to appropriate this piece of land for himself.
敌我双方力量悬殊，我军明显占据优势。
Dí wǒ shuāngfāng lìliang xuánshū，wǒ jūn míngxiǎn zhànjù yōushì。
There is a great disparity between the enemy and us. We have a clear advantage.
敌占区的面积在不断地缩小。
Dízhànqū de miànjī zài búduàn de suōxiǎo。
The area occupied by the enemy is decreasing day by day.
起义的士兵攻占了冬宫。
Qǐyì de shìbīng gōngzhàn le dōnggōng。
Revolting soldiers attacked and occupied the Winter Palace.
在他的心里，朋友占有很重的份量。
Zài tā de xīnlǐ，péngyou zhànyǒu hěnzhòng de fènliàng。
His friends means a lot to him.
就业和升学的压力在一定程度上成了年轻人迷信星座占卜的风源。
Jiùyè hé shēngxué de yālì zài yídìng chéngdù shàng chéng le niánqīngrén míxìn xīngzuò zhānbǔ de fēngyuán。
In a certain sense, the pressures of work and study have caused the prevalence of astrology among young people.
沙俄曾割占中国东北和西北的大片领土。
Shāé céng gēzhān Zhōngguó dōngběi hé xīběi de dàpiàn lǐngtǔ。
The tsar used to separate and occupy a vast territory of northeast and northwest China.
城管队每天都开着辆挂斗车清理违章占道的小商贩。
Chéngguǎnduì měitiān dōu kāizhe liàng guàdǒuchē qīnglǐ wéizhāng zhàndào de xiǎoshāngfàn。
Every day, the city inspectors drive a trailer to clear away peddlers who are in the driveway against the regulations.
国有经济在国民生产总值中占有较大比重。
Guóyǒu jīngjì zài guómín shēngchǎn zǒngzhí zhōng zhànyǒu jiàodà bǐzhòng。
The state-owned economy holds a large proportion of the gross national production.
他是一个极顶吝啬的人，谁也别想占他半点便宜。
Tā shì yígè jídǐng lìnsè de rén，shéi yě biéxiǎng zhàn tā bàndiǎn piányí。
He is such a high-level miser that no one can gain anything from him.
他要是当了局长，简直就是鸠占鹊巢。
Tā yàoshì dāng le júzhǎng，jiǎnzhí jiùshì jiūzhàn quècháo。
It was illegal for him to occupy another\'s place and becoame the new director general.
他文才极好，经常当众口占新诗。
Tā wéncái jíhǎo，jīngcháng dāngzhòng kǒuzhàn xīnshī。
He is of eminent literary talent and always improvises poems in public.
企业所得税占国家所有税收的很大一部分。
Qǐyè suǒdéshuì zhàn guójiā suǒyǒu shuìshōu de hěndà yíbù fēn。
Enterprise income tax constitutes the greater part of revenue.
资本家无偿占有了生产者创造的剩余价值。
Zīběnjiā wúcháng zhànyǒu le shēngchǎnzhě chuàngzào de shèngyú jiàzhí。
Capitalists occupy the surplus value created by the productive forces for free.
他空占着职位，却不负责任何具体工作，简直就是尸位素餐。
Tā kōngzhàn zhe zhíwèi，què bú fùzé rènhé jùtǐ gōngzuò，jiǎnzhí jiùshì shīwèi sùcān。
Although in that position, he doesn\'t take responsibility for any work. He is exactly like a person at ancient sacrificial rites who sat as a god but didn\'t have to do anything.
贪小失大的道理她不是不懂，可就是改不了爱占小便宜的毛病。
Tānxiǎo shīdà de dàolǐ tā búshì bùdǒng，kě jiùshì gǎibùliǎo ài zhàn xiǎopiányí de máobìng。
There is a saying that goes: covet a little and lose a lot. It\'s not that she doesn\'t understand the saying, it\'s just that she cannot get rid of her bad habit.
集体的财物不能贪占。
Jítǐ de cáiwù bùnéng tānzhàn。
We should not embezzle property that is collectively owned.

Cultural consumption is ocuppying more, and more spending in the daily consumption of the city residents.
经过浴血奋战，我军终于攻占了这块险地。

Our army finally took the dangerous area after bloody struggles.
他在公司可是占一席之地，你别小瞧了。

He has a proper place in the company, don\'t sell him short.
敌人想要占领这座月城，却一直未能得逞。

The enemy wanted toremake this city in the shape of a crescent, but hasn\'t suceeded yet.

Nowadays, many young people believe in astrology.

The 3M Company holds the leading position among all medical equipment companies.
他们要求占领军立刻撤离他们的领土。
Tāmen yāoqiú zhànlǐngjūn lìkè chèlí tāmen de lǐngtǔ。
They demanded that the occupying troops withdraw from their land immediately.
由于市场不景气，工厂生产的货物占压了一仓库。
Yóuyú shìchǎng bùjǐngqì，gōngchǎng shēngchǎn de huòwù zhànyā le yì cāngkù。
Because of the depressed market, there is an overstocking of goods in the factory.

Zhànzhù zài wēilóu lǐ de míngōng bùdébùbān chūlái。
Labourers living in dangerous houses have to move out.

Zuòwéi zhǔyíng yīliáo qìxiè de gōngsī，tāmen zài hángyè nèibùdúzhàn áotóu。
As a company majoring in medical equipment, they lead the industry.
被侵犯的国家发出了最后通牒，要求占领部队撤出该地区。
Bèiqīnfàn de guójiā fāchū le zuìhòu tōngdié，yāoqiú zhànlǐng bùduì chèchū gāidìqū。
The offended country sent out its ultimatum, demanding the occupying troops withdraw from that region.
在资本主义社会里，剩余产品都被资本家所占有。
